title: ari maboko polisi kubera gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge
content: umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’akagari manwari gasigwa celestin avuga mpera z’icyi cyumweru dushoje girwa gushakisha ibicuruzwa murwanashyaka bosco wibwe bageze nzu y’uyu musore bahasanga ibiro by’urumogi bigera gasigwa avuga urumogi rugaragara aka gace kabo rukunze guturuka gasarenda y’ishyamba nyungwe icyakora bakomeje gufata ingamba zikomeye kugirango bahangane n’iri kwirakwizwa ry’urumogi twagerageje kuvugana n’inzego z’umutekano karere nyamagabe ariko ntibyadukundira eric muvara

title: abanyarwanda batuye canada bibutse abazize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi
content: igikorwa kwibuka kitabiriwe kandi n’abahagarariye ibihugu byabo canada n’izindi nshuti uyu muhango watangijwe n’urugendo walk to remember rwatangiriye nteko ishingamategeko canada rugera biro by’umujyi ottawa ahabereye imihango kwibuka nyuma y’indirimbo zubahiriza ibihugu byombi hakurikiyeho umunota kwibuka inzirikarengane zishwe jenoside padiri callixte kabalisa wayoboye isengesho yasabiye abahuye n’ibibazo binyuranye harimo abafashwe ngufu asaba imana gukomeza impfubyi n’abapfakazi n’abandi bagize ibibazo bikomeye uhagarariye u rwanda canada edda mukabagwiza perezida w’ishyirahamwe ry’abacitse kw’icumu rizwi kw’izina humura alain ntwali bagaragaje bibuka amateka jenoside yabaye rwanda bagamije gufata ingamba ibyabaye ntibizongere kuba ukundi nk’uko itangazo ambasade y’u rwanda canada ribivuga berekanye umuhango ukorwa ugamije kwibuka ariko abantu bakanatekereza uburyo gufasha abacitse icumu bagarutse nsanganyamatsiko y’uyu mwaka twigire mateka twubaka ejo hazaza bavuga genoside yakorewe abatutsi mateka y’ubu n’ejo hazaza itazibagirana mu muhango kwibuka kandi hatanzwe ibiganiro bibiri l’historique de l’impunit des crimes haineux au rwanda et les signes avant-coureurs du gnocide contre les tutsis cyatanzwe bwana richard nsanzabaganwa les mots qui tuent cyatanzwe prof philippe basabose nsanzabaganwa yerekanye ubwicanyi bwagiye buba ariko ubutegetsi ntibuhane abakoze ibyaha kwica aha yavuze uduce tunyuranye ubwoko bw’abatutsi bwagiye bwicwa yerekanye kwica byagiye bishyigikirwa n’ubutegetsi kurengera abatutsi babaga bibasiwe prof basabose yerekanye amagambo yagiye akoreshwa rwanda yagize uruhare ishyirwa bikorwa ry’ubwicanyi yakoze isesengura ry’ijambo ryavuzwe leon mugesera i kabaya yakanguriye abanyamuryango mrnd abereka umwanzi wabo umututsi n’abahutu mashyaka ataravugaga rumwe mrnd gahunda ziteganijwe zijyanye kwibuka zizagera kwezi gatanu zirimo amasengesho ikiriyo n’ibiganiro bizatangwa taliki mata abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo bongeye guhura gitambo misa kwibuka cyabereye paruwasi mutagatifu yozefu gatineau quebec

title: umuhanzi fulgence nzira kugaruka ruhando rw’umuziki
content: mu kiganiro cyihariye twagiranye yadutangarije amafaranga amaze iminsi akorera kongo-kinshasa azamufasha gusohora indirimbo sitidiyo mu ikubitiro arashaka gukorana lick lick cyangwa masota indirimbo nyampinga ntibishoboka minsi vuba akomeza avuga azanye umuziki w’umwimerere njyana afrobeat idasondetse uzamuhesha itike guhiga abahanzi bakunzwe minsi kamichi kitoko king james knowless yadutangarije n’ubwo atagaragaraga ruhando rw’umuziki amaze iminsi akora indirimbo z’ibigo n’amasosiyete zamuhaga amafaranga atari make ku mpamvu zatumye ava ruhando rw’umuziki gihe gisaga imyaka ibiri avuga mwaka mafaranga muziki none abona abanyarwanda batangiye gukunda umuziki yagize icyanshimisha ugushimisha abakunzi banjye nanjye nkagira mbona birababaje kujya scene ukaririmba ugashishimisha abantu ejo ukaba usaba ababyeyi tike fulgence afite indoto gukora umuziki akamenyekana rwego mpuzamahanga kandi ukamuteza imbere fulgence amaze ibyumweru bitatu gihugu kongo-kinshasa yakoraga ikiraka kuririmba komisiyo y’amatora ifatanyije n’ishami loni rikorerayo nk’uko abivuga kiraka cyari icya meddy wamenyekanye cyane i goma kubera indirimbo amayobera ariko bw’amahirwe meddy yarabuze fulgence akibonye gutyo nshimiyimana leonard

title: nsanzimana etienne yishwe anizwe anatewe ibyuma
content: nkuko bitangazwa n’inzego police karere rutsiro ikigaragara nsanzimana etienne yishwe masaha saa mbili z’ijoro mvura nyinshi yagwaga ikindi police yemeza musore yishwe anizwe kandi abamwishe bakaba bamuteye icyuma nsanzimana etienneubusanzwe umukozi murugo yakoreraga umuyobozi w’ishuri ryisumbuye bumba ho murenge gihango urupfu rwe rwamenyekanye gitondo kane abaturage babonaga yatinze gukingura nabwo umurambo wagaragaraga umuvugizi police y’igihugo theos badege avugako police y’igihugu imaze igihe ibona imfu nyinshi bityo akaba asaba umuryango nyarwanda kuzuzanya ugatekereza kibazo kimaze igihe kigaragara bakakirwanya bagakomeza kwihesha agaciro guhora bwicanyi ubwo twandikaga nkuru inzego police zari zimaze guta yombi abantu batatu bakekwaho kuba aribo bakoze bwicanyi abafashwe muhayimana jean uzabakiriho ildephonse kayumba nsengiyumva abaturanyi nsanzimana etienne bari maboko police station gihango police karere rutsiro ivugako hari ibimenyetso bigaragara bashobora kuba aribo ababikoze umuvugizi police y’igihugu avugako hari n’amagambo bantu batatu bakekwaho bwicanyi baravuze nsanzimana etienne mbere yuko yicwagusa iperereza rikaba rigikomeje vdaste nkikabahizi

title: sekamana maxime yahetse apr ayihesha amanota atatu imbere mukura
content: byasabye ikipe apr fc gutegereza sekamana maxime yinjira kibuga asimbuye gice ayifasha gutahana amanota atatu nyuma gutsindira mukura victory sports - stade kigali i nyamirambo umukino ugitangira mukura yasaga nk’aho irusha apr n’ubwo igice mbere cyarangiye - habyarimana innocent yaje kugira ikibazo cy’imvune mbere gato y’uko igice mbere cy’umukino kirangira asimburwa patrick sibomana igice kabiri kigitangira blaise itangishaka yafunguye amazamu ruhande apr byakanguye mukura yongera kotsa apr igitutu buryo munota rusheshangoga michel yategeye hakizimana lewis rubuga rw’amahina iba penaliti yinjizwa neza christophe ndayishimiye nyuma gato blaise itangishaka yaje kugira ikibazo cy’invune maxime sekamana yinjira kibuga ku munota ahita atsinda icya kabiri apr imvune zakomeje kuba nyinshi mukino youssuf habimana mukura yagiraga ikibazo yasimbujwe ibrahim apr fc nayo ihita ikora impinduka rusheshangoga avamo hinjira djihad bizimana nyuma y’iminota gusa maxime sekamana yatsindiye apr icya gatutu kiba n’icya kabiri cye umukino mbere w’umunsi gatatu urangira apr fc - mukura vs ababanje kibuga mpande zombi apr fc emery mvuyekure rugwiro herve ngandu omar rusheshangoga michel emmanuel imanishimwemuhadjili hakizimana yannick mukunzi blaise itangishaka issa bigirimana innocent di maria butera andrew mukura vs jumayine hassan zagabe jean claude shyaka philbert twagirayezu fabien rugirayabo hassan ndayegamiye abdou niyonzima ally habimana yussuf harerimana lewis cyiza hussein ndayishimiye christophe yanditswe lucky van rukundomuhaburarw

title: abafite amazu i nyagatare barasabwa kwishyura umusoro nyungu y’ubukode vuba
content: abaturage bemera gusora ariko ntibavuga rumwe n’ubuyobozi buryo bikorwamo n’amafaranga bishyurwa kuko hari ubuyobozi bufata nk’igice cy’umujyi abaturage bakahafata nk’icyaro bitewe n’imirimo ihakorerwa urugero nko gasozi bita ruramira ubuyobozi bw’akagali nyagatare bwatumikiraga abaturage bahatuye bibaza bagomba gusora kimwe n’abafite amazu mujyi nyagatare kayumba eugene umugenzuzi w’imisoro karere nyagatare yasubije avuga yemeranywa n’abaturage ruramira isa n’icyaro ariko atarenga mabwiriza kuko akagali nyagatare kose gafatwa nk’umujyi abaturage basabye ubuyobozi kureba bajya bakora badahutaje uburenganzira bamwe baturage urugero uburyo igihe kwishyuza imisoro kigeze usanga abashinzwe iby’imisoro bitura bacuruzi batabateguje bagafunga amazu bakoreramo kandi barubahirije basabwa byose umwe basoreshwa karere nyagatare yagize ko tuba twishyuye imisoro dusabwa harimo n’ipatanti mwajya kwaka imisoro nyungu kuyibaza nyir’amazu mukaba twe muza mugafungira kureba nyir’amazu ibicuruzwa byacu bikangirika mwumva karengane karimo uretse umusoro nyungu y’ubukode indi misoro abaturage basabwa gutanga vuba bishoboka imisoro y’ipatanti y’ibabanza n’amapatanti y’ubucuruzi ku bishyura umusoro w’ipatanti basabwe kutarenza ukwezi werurwe niyonzima oswald

title: ishavu ry’abanyarwanda ritubere umusingi kwiyubaka umuyobozi w’umurenge bwishyura
content: umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’umurenge bwishyura niyonsaba cyriaque wifatanyije n’abaturage b’imidugudu nyarurembo karutete yagize ishavu ry’abanyarwanda ritubere umusingi kwiyubaka aha niyonsaba yungaga nsanganyamatsiko yahariwe mwaka igira iti twigire mateka turusheho kubaka ejo hazaza niyonsaba yaboneyeho akanya kunenga politike yazanywe n’abazungu gushyamiranya abantu yatunze agatoki ababiligi baje rwanda bagasanga abanyarwanda babanye neza bagasiga barukongeje n’ikintu kigaragara barusigiye umuyobozi w’umurenge bwishyura yagize urugero nk’aha kibuye basize bubatse gereza yonyine nk’aho abanyakibuye bakeneye hatanzwe ubuhamya bw’umwe bacitse icumu kibuye mukangoga emelita ufite imyaka gusa igihe jenoside yabaga yari afite ikiniga kinshi ariko yabashije kuvuga make byamugendekeye yabisobanuye magambo ikintu ntazigera nibagirwa igihe papa yampamagaye arangije guteka inkono y’ibijumba nituze aduhe ifunguro nyuma namubajije impamvu atubwiye atyo ambwira bagiye kutwica kuva bahise badutera turatatanangenda nomongana ntazi ngana hashize akanya gato mbona iwacu barahatwitse narinihishe mbona interahamwe zizanye papa kumwe murumuna papa afite bibiliya barayimwaka barayica amanika amaboko hejuru agira mana bantu ubababarire ntibazi barimo gukora ako kanya bahita bamutema amaboko murumuna babatsinda ahonanjye bashatse kunyica inshuro nyinshi buryo nageze mera nk’ikinya nkajya mbabwira nabi nti nimukore mushakaibyambayeho birebire mbivuze bwakwira bugacyagusa ndashimira imana nkiriho nk’uko mukangoga yakomeje abitangamo ubuhamya mukangoga emelita yasigaye wenyine muryango w’abana nyina bamwishe atwite inda cyenda se n’abavandimwe barabamaze ubu umubyeyi w’abana babili umuhungu w’imyaka n’imfura y’umukobwa w’imyaka ubura umwaka umwe angane mama igihe jenoside yabaga nyuma y’ubuhamya mukangoga hatanzwe n’ikiganiro ruhare leta yagize jenoside umwe bacitse icumu watanze ikiganiro yasobanuye ukuntu abatutsi kibuye kimwe n’ahandi hose rwanda bagiye bahezwa gahunda leta y’icyo gihe umuntu akabaho atazi bucya kugeza igihe jenoside ibereye n’uwo bitaga inshuti n’umuturanyi arabahinduka umuhango wabimburiwe n’urugendo rwahereye rwibutso jenoside ruri iruhande rw’ahahoze sitade gatwaro mujyi kibuye kugera mudugudu nyarurembo ahabereye ibiganiro gukurikira ijambo ry’umukuru w’igihugu yahariye munsi radiyo televiziyo abari babashije gukusanya amafaranga ibihumbi gutera inkunga abacitse icumu mu rwego rw’akarere gutangiza icyunamo byabereye murenge mubuga umuyobozi w’akarere karongi kayumba bernard n’abandi bayobozi bagiye kwifatanya n’abandi kwibuka nshuro jenoside yakorewe abatutsi gasana marcellin

title: kongo angola byiyemeje gufasha u rwanda uganda gukemura ikibazo bifitanye
content: mu nama yahuje abakuru b’ibihugu by’u rwanda uganda repubulika demukarasi kongo angola biyemeje gushyigikirana bikorwa bigamije gushakira umuti ikibazo cy’amahoro n’umutekano bihugu n’akarere k’ibiyaga bigari rusange mu nama yahuje abakuru b’ibihugu by’u rwanda uganda repubulika demukarasi kongo angola biyemeje gushyigikirana bikorwa bigamije gushakira umuti ikibazo cy’amahoro n’umutekano bihugu n’akarere k’ibiyaga bigari rusange kuri nyakanga nibwo i luanda gihugu cy’ angola habereye inama yibanze kibazo cy’ umutekano karere iyi nama yahuje bakuru b’ibihugu yatumijwe perezida angola jao laurenco yitabiriwe perezida w’ u rwanda paul kagame uwa uganda yoweli museveni uwa repubulika demukarasi kongo felix tshisekediitangazo ryakurikiye nama rivuga ibiganiro by’ bakuru b’ ibihugu byibanze mahoro n’ umutekano n’ imibanire y’ bihugu bine abakuru b’ bihugu bagaragaje bashyigikiye kongo rugamba guhashya inyeshyamba ziba kongo zigahungabanya umutekano wayo n’ uw’ ibihugu by’ abaturanyi umwanzuro kane ugira uti abakuru b’ ibihugu bashimangiye akamaro k’ ibiganiro bihoraho birimo kuvugisha ukuri bemeza byongererwa imbaraga rwego rw’ igihugu rwego rw’ akarere hagamijwe gushimangira akamaro k’ amahoro bufatanye bukungu umwanzuro gatanu uvuga abakuru b’ bihugu bashyigikiye kwamagana imitwe iteza umutekano karere ku kibazo cy’ umubano utifashe neza hagati y’ u rwanda uganda abakuru b’ bihugu bafashe umwanzuro gushyigikira ibiganiro hagati yabyo umwanzuro ugira uti hashingiwe buryo umubano wifashe hagati y’ u rwanda uganda inama ishyigikiye ubushake bw’ impande zombi gukomeza gushakira umuti ikibazo gihari ni urwo rwego nama ishyigikiye ubushake repubulika demukarasi kongo n’ ubwa angola gufasha nzira perezida uganda butumwa yashyize twitter nyuma y’ nama yavuze uganda ishyigikiye umugambi gushimangira amahoro n’ umutekano karere ndetse ashyigikiye gahunda z’ ibihugu gushakira ineza ibihugu bukungu n’ imibereho myiza binyuze kwishyirahamwe mu mpera gicurasi nibwo perezida laurenco tshisekedi kagame bemeranyije guhuza imbaraga gushakira umuti ikibazo cy’ inyeshyamba uyu munsi perezida museveni yatangaje azatanga umusanzu gushyigikira gahunda kurwanya inyeshyamba zihungabanya umutekano w’ akarere iyi nama yatumijwe perezida laurenco angola

title: tour du rwanda kigali-rubavu ikipe y’u rwanda yabaye iya mbere
content: kwitwara neza kw’ikipe karisimbi byaturutse bakinnyi bakoresheje imbaraga nyinshi gasore hategeka waje mwanya kabiri ruhumuriza abraham waje mwanya gatatu mu kiciro cyabanje ruhumuriza yaje mwanya ku mukinnyi giti cye umunyamerika joseph rosskopf ukinira team type waje mwanya mbere yawusimbuyeho mugenzi kiel reijnen waje mwanya kane muri rusange kugeza tour of rwanda iyobowe n’umunyamerika rosskopf joseph ukinira team type amaze gukoresha amasaha iminota n’amasegonda akurikiwe hategeka gasore karisimbi umaze gukoresha amasaha iminota n’amasegonda mwanya gatatu haza ruhumuriza abraham karisimbi umaze gukoresha amasaha iminota n’amasegonda adrien niyonshuri watangiye yitwara neza yasubiye inyuma ho gato kuko mwanya akaba amaze gukoresha amasaha iminota n’amasegonda ku rutonde rw’uko amakipe akurikirana ikipe karisimbi y’u rwanda mwanya mbere igice kane cy’iri siganwa cyabaye munsi abasiganwa bahagurutse i rubavu berekeza i muhanga bakaza gusiganwa intera ireshya n’ibirometero ejo bazahaguruka i muhanga bajya i huye gice gatanu theoneste nisingizwe

title: u rwanda rwiyemeje kuzamura ubwikorezi bw’indege
content: nzahabwanimana yafunguraga inama y’iminsi ibiri mugaragaro yiga bijyanye n’ubwikorezi gucunga umutekano ndege yagize guverinoma yihaye intego kwita bwikozi bw’indege kandi izakomeza gukorana n’abafatanyabikorwa kuzamura imikorere y’uru rwego iyi nama kubera i kigali yatangiye kuwa mbere tariki ukwakira yitabiriwe n’abakozi bakora nzego zijyanye n’ubwikorezi bw’indege rwanda yateguwe n’urwego mpuzamahanga ry’indege gisivile ruhuza ibihugu afurika nyanja y’abahinde icao-afi bufatanye leta y’u rwanda nzahabwanimana yavuze ubwikorezi bw’indege ingenzi gihugu nk’u rwanda kidakora nyanja yibukije u rwanda igihugu kigendwa naba mukerarugendo benshi kandi ubukerarugendo bukaba butanga umusanzu kuzamura ubukungu bw’igihugu kugeza mukerarugendo barenga bakoresha ikirere kuza gihugu bukerarugendo mu rwanda hakorera ibigo bitandukanye bikora ubwikorezi kirere nk’ikigo cy’u rwanda gutwara abantu n’ibintu ndege rwandair ndetse hakorera n’ibigo bitwara abantu n’ibintu kirere klm brussels airlinesmu mpera z’uku kwezi kanama rwandair yazanye mbere mugabane w’afurika indege mbere zihanitse bwoko boeing - umunyamakuru kigali today

title: mont kigali urutare semafigi rugiye guturitswa
content: amasosiyete npdcotraco china road amaze igihe kubaka umuhanda nyamirambo- karama uzahuza bice giti cy’ inyoni rwego kurushaho kwihutisha imirimo yiyemeje kumena urutare semafigi rwatumye imirimo y’umuhanda isa nk’ikomwa nkokora nyuma kumenyeshwa uru rutare ruzaturitswa kuwa kamena abaturage baruturiye batangiye kugira impungenge bavuga bishobora kuzabagiraho ingaruka buryo batinya amazu ashobora gusenyuka mu kiganiro bwizacom yagiranye n’ umukuru w’ umudugudu ruhango i kanyarutoki dieudonne yahumurije abaturage batuye yaho gikorwa kigiye gukorerwa avuga ubuyobozi bw’ umujyi kigali bwakoze ibarura ryihuse ryo kwandika amazu n’ iyindi mitungo itimukanywa ishobora kwangiraka metero ati ntacyo mugomba abaturage kwikanga kuko ubuyobozi bushyize imbere inyungu rusange ahubwo twanasabye saa ine mugitondo abaturage bagomba kujya kure y’ikilometero kimwe kugira bataza gukomereka uru rutare rwakomeje kuba imbogamizi ikomeye kuko hakoreshejwe imashini kabuhariwe gukora imihanda ariko zirananirwa noneho hakaba hagiye gukoresha ubundi buhanga gakondo bwitwa guturitsa intambi dynamite abakurikiranira amateka y’aka gace kitwa ruhango nangingare bavuga uru rutare runini kandi rugoye kumena rwitiriwe semafigi bwoko bw’ abasinga bahoze abakinnyi b’ ibwami bamwe batuye ruhango kera baganiriye bwizacom bemeza semafigi gafurufuru yabayeho ngoma kigeli iv rwabugiri umunsi umwe mwami yasuraga ingabo ze zari zikambitse i mwurire yasabye semafigi yamubyinira mukannyi abyinira urwo rutare ashimishe abantu aho semafigi yaje kunanirwa cyane biba ngombwa asaba agahushya agiye kuzana murumuna uzi kubyina agenda ntiyagaruka

title: ubwiza bw’imideli yamurikiwe birori mercedes-benz fashion week byabereye i kigali amafoto
content: abakunda kurimba kwizihirwa abihebeye kumurika imideli bamaze iminsi bategerezanyije amatsiko ibirori mercedes benz byabereye rwanda guhera gicurasi ni ibirori byihariye kandi bifite izina rikomeye ghana bimaze imyaka myinshi bibera ibyabereye rwanda byari byahuruje abantu b’ingeri zitandukanye baturutse bihugu byose afurika ku kamena ibirori mercedes-benz fashion week byaberaga rwanda nshuro yabyo mbere nibwo byasojwe ibi birori byabimburiwe kwifotoza kw’abanyamideli myambaro isanzwe street style gikorwa cyabereye hanze kigali convention centre mbere y’uko ibirori nyirizina bitangira saa tatu zuzuye nibwo umushyushyarugamba yavuze abahanga imideli bagomba kumurika imyambaro bahanze ku ikubitiro imyambaro yahanzwe rupari designs y’umunyarwandakazi rupari cynthia umaze kubaka izina bikorwa by’imideli niyo yabanje kwerekana imyambaro yayo rupari umwe bahanga imideli babigize umwuga wagiye ahagararira u rwanda imurika ry’imideli bihugu bitandukanye yanaruhagarariye marushanwa arimo miss grand lacs east african model search n’ayandi by’umwihariko yagize amahirwe guhuza imishinga n’umunyamideli wambika umugore perezida cte d’ivoire bigeze guhurira iwabo yaserukiye u rwanda mu yegukanye igihembo gikomeye imurika ry’imideli ryahuje abasaga bakomeye afurika mujyi conakry guine byitwa guss fashion show akimara gusoza kwerekana imyambaro hakurikiyeho imyambaro yahanzwe neopele concepts nigeria ufite imyambaro yihariye ariko y’abagabo gusa abanyamideli batandukanye barimo rwanda bayishinjagiyemo bituma abari bitabiriye gikorwa babasha kunyurwa n’uburyo baserutse uyu yakurikiwe karrsh collections y’umunyarwandakazi ufite imyambaro yihariye irimo iy’abasore n’inkumi yamuritswe buryo butandukanye bwanyuze benshi yakuriwe ingata inkanda fashion house patrick muhire nayo yerekanye imyambaro itandukanye yiganjemo iy’abakunda ibirori george malelu afurika y’epfo wambitse beyonce utegerejwe n’abatari bake gitaramo yerekanye imyambaro ikoranywe ubuhanga buhambaye yatumye akurirwa ingofero benshi uyu musore imyambaro yerekaniwe i kigali iy’abakobwa gusa y’igitsina gabo irimo clavon leonard leta zunze ubumwe amerika bahanga imideli bigaragaje gikorwa yerekanye iyiganjemo amakanzu n’amakositimu y’abagabo iki gitaramo cyagaragarijwemo abanyempano bakomeye kumurika imideli baturuka mfuruka zose z’isi cyashyizweho akadomo quophi akotuah ghana werekanye imyambaro yiganjemo iyambarwa muco w’iwabo yaserutse imbere y’imbaga yarebye mideli ahagana saa tanu zirengaho iminota mike ndayishimiye daniel wagize uruhare rukomeye kugira gikorwa kibe title: cristiano ronaldo yabaye umukinnyi mbere ruhago utunze miliyari y’amadolari
content: ronaldo waherukaga kuza mwanya kabiri w’abakinnyi binjije amafaranga menshi mikino itandukanye isi - akaba uwa mbere mupira w’amaguru n’uwa kane byamamare - yinjije miliyoni mbere gukuraho imisoro uyu mugabo w’imyaka umushahara aheruka kubona watumye umukinnyi mbere w’umupira w’amaguru utunze miliyari y’amadolari amaze kubona ndetse umukinnyi gatatu mikino ubashije kugera urwo rwego ronaldo mukinnyi ukinana n’abandi ikipe ubashije kugeza miliyari y’amadolari gihe abandi bakinnyi babiri babigezeho tiger woods ukina golf wabigezeho floyd mayweather ukina iteramakofe wabigezeho umutungo mukinnyi juventus amaze kwinjiza myaka amaze akina ruhago ugera miliyoni ndetse byitezwe azageza miliyoni amasezerano azaba arangira lionel messi watangiye gukina imyaka itatu nyuma ronaldo amaze gukorera miliyoni forbes yatangaje kandi ronaldo umaze gutorwa nk’umukinnyi mwiza w’umwaka isi inshuro eshanu amafaranga yinjije hejuru kure y’ayinjijwe david beckham wasezeye umupira amaze kubona miliyoni amafaranga cristiano ronaldo yinjije arimo miliyoni z’umushahara wagabanutse ugereranyije n’uw’umwaka ushize bitewe n’uko bagenzi juventus mata bemeye gukatwa kubera icyorezo coronavirus lionel messi winjije miliyoni akaba uwa gatanu rutonde rw’ibyamamare byinjije menshi isi yakaswe by’umushahara kubera coronavirus ndetse byitezwe azagera miliyari y’amadolari mwaka utaha mbere y’uko amasezerano arangira fc barcelone

content: aurelien agbenonci yabwiye umunyamakuru the new times imibare yakoreshjwe rapport yiswe sustanainability and equity a better future for all yataye igihe kandi itaturutse biro bye i kigali muri raporo yashyizwe ahagaragara itariki kabiri uku kwezi u rwanda rwashyizwe mwanya w’i bihugu bigaragaza iterambere ry’abaturage ryiza bice byose minisitri w’imari n’igenamigambi john rwangombwa yahakanye ibyagaragajwe aulerien n’ubwo yatangaje adashaka kwinjira raporo yavuze azavugana n’abakoze raporo iyi raporo yakozwe n’ishami ry’umuryango w’abibumbye ryita iterambere united nations development program undp emmanuel n hitimana

title: sam rushimisha usa yasohoye indirimbo nshya yesu ganza’ yakoranye
content: umuhanzi sam rushimisha uba leta zunze ubumwe amerika yashyize hanze amashusho y’indirimbo nshya yise yesu ganza’ yakoranye n’umuvugabutumwa w’umunyamerika i-von indirimbi yesu ganza’ irimo ubutumwa butandukanye by’umwihariko bakoresheje ikinyarwanda n’icyongereza kugira buriya butumwa bugere banyarwanda ndetse n’abanyahamahanga hari baririmba bagira bati hanze yawe byishimo bibayo abawe bahora banezerewe n’ubwo barwanywa uhora ubarwanirira abawe bahora banezerewe kuko abarwanywa uhora ubarwanirira abawe bahora banezerewe kuko barwanywa wowe ubarwanirira wowe murengezi byiringiro by’abakwizeye sam rushimisha avuga ndirimbo yayikoranye i-von gitekerezo cyaje bavuye materaniro yababereye meza ati indirimbo nayikoranye n’umukozi w’imana i-von gitekerezo cyaje tumaze kugira amateraniro meza cyane n’umukozi w’imana worship leader’ akaba n’umuvugabutumwa abicishije church papa’ ayoboye senior pastor ndetse tell the world’ rushimisha akomeza avuga impamvu yakoranye indirimbo i-von w’umunyamerika kugira ubutumwa bugere bantu benshi bumva ikinyarwanda n’icyongereza ati nyuma y’amateraniro twemeje twakorana indirimbo yashyira hamwe indimi ebyiri zitandukanye rwego kugeza ubutumwa bwiza bantu batandukanye mico n’indimi jye nari mfite beat nakorewe chillax record’ hanyuma duhurira studio kuko n’umu producer indirimbo turayandika turayikora n’amashusho nyuma tuza kuyakora sam rushimisha amaze gushyira hanze indirimbo nyinshi zirimo shimwa mwami’’ yakoranye romulus rushimisha wamwinjije muziki ntibikingora’’ inshuti nyanshuti’’ nayagaciro’’ ubutunzi’’ ndetse yesu ganza’ uyu muhanzi yavukiye repubulika iharanira demokarasi congo bita mirimba akurira rwanda i kigali yerekeje amerika ajyanye n’umuryango jean paul mugabeumusekerw

title: huye abaturage ntibarumva akamaro guhuza ubutaka

title: rib yafashe abandi babiri bashakishwaga nyuma gukubita niyonzima bikamuviramo gupfa
content: umugabo witwa niyonzima salomon w’imyaka wagaragaye mashusho arimo gukubitwa n’abaturage nyuma y’uko bamufashe bamushinja kwiba igitoki yitabye imana ijoro rishyira cyumweru tariki werurwe aguye bitaro gisenyi umugabo witwa niyonzima salomon w’imyaka wagaragaye mashusho arimo gukubitwa n’abaturage nyuma y’uko bamufashe bamushinja kwiba igitoki yitabye imana ijoro rishyira cyumweru tariki werurwe aguye bitaro gisenyi tariki werurwe nibwo mugabo yakubiswe amashusho akubitwa atangira gukwirakwizwa mbuga nkoranyambaga uyu mugabo yapfuye nyuma y’iminsi ibiri polisi y’u rwanda itangaje yamaze guta yombi abantu babiri bane bagaragaye video bakubita salomon niyonzima abo niyonzima jean baptiste bitwayiki jean bosco bahise batabwa yombi gihe hashakishwaga bafatanyije gukubita nyakwigendera nyuma y’igihe bashakishwa n’urwego rw’ubugenzacyaha rib ntirenganya jean claude wagaragaye mashusho akubita niyonzima salomon bikamuviramo urupfu yafashwe hamwe naberaho afisa bafatanyije ibi byemejwe rib gatandatu abakekwa bakaba bafungiye sitasiyo rib gisenyi gihe iperereza rikomeje kugirango hakorwe dosiye ishyikirizwe ubushinjacyaha rib irashimira abagize uruhare ifatwa ry’aba bagizi nabi inongera kwibutsa kwihanira icyaha kandi itazihanganira ariwe wese uzagikora

title: ibiribwa bitumizwa karere biri bituma ifaranga ry’u rwanda rikomeza guta agaciro
content: mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru kabiri nyuma kugeza raporo y’ingengo y’imari yakoreshejwe umwaka ushize imbere y’inama y’abaminisitiri john rwangombwa yavuze ibituruka hanze bikomeza gutuma ibintu rwanda bizamba asubiza ikibazo abajijwe bantu benshi bakomeza kwibaza uburyo litiro lisansi hagabanutseho amafaranga ariko ibiciro bigakomeza kuzamuka yasubije n’ubwo lisansi yagabanyutse ariko ifaranga ryo ritigeze rireka guta agaciro ati ibiribwa bitumizwa hanze nko kenya bigira uruhare izamuka ry’ibiciro guta agaciro kw’ifaranga ryacu kuko nabyo biba byaguzwe mafaranga atagifite agaciro yagaragaje ingero z’uburyo u rwanda rufite ifaranga rikigerageza kugira agaciro karere n’ubwo umwaka ushize guta agaciro ifaranga ry’u rwanda byari uku kwezi bikaba bigeze nyuma y’u rwanda kenya nicyo gihugu kigerageza aka karere kuko ifaranga ryacyo ryataye agaciro kugeza hejuru muri kiganiro kizajya kibaho buri gihe minisitiri w’imari amaze gushyikiriza raporo inama y’abaminisitiri rwangombwa yasobanuye u rwanda rwabonye amafaranga angana miliyari ugereranyije miliyari rwabonye mwaka kuba mafaranga yariyongeryeho byaturutse bikorerwa imbere gihugu byatanze amafaranga y’u rwanda miliyari zingana y’inyungu miliyari z’ayaturutse hanze zingana by’inyungu emmanuel hitimana

title: muhanga bdf yafashije urubyiruko gutangiza umushinga wunguka ibihumbi munsi
content: urwo rubyiruko rugizwe n’abahungu batanu n’abakobwa batanu rwishyize hamwe nyuma kumara umwaka wose rwiga umwuga gutunganya imisatsi ishuri ry’imyuga gahogo tvt school rwashinze sosiyete yitwa beauty in the sky ltd nayo rukoreramo bikorwa byarwo umuyobozi beauty in the sky ltd habihirwe habis avuga bakirangiza kwiga biyemeje kujyana umushinga wabo bdf ibafasha kuwunoza kubona inguzanyo murenge sacco ati bdf yadufashije kubona miliyoni eshanu z’amafaranga y’u rwanda ariko harimo ibikoresho salon miliyoni enye miliyoni baduhaye ruhande tuyikoresha gukodesha inzu n’ibindi bimwe bikoresho baguze bigezweho harimo intebe indorerwamo amatara casques imashini zogosha n’ibindi bitandukanye bifashisha kogosha gutunganya umusatsi bakorera nzu nziza bakodesha ibihumbi frw kwezi rwagati mujyi muhanga muri mafaranga miliyoni eshanu bahawe bazishyuramo kandi bazatangirana n’uku kwezi mutarama kuko umushinga wabo watangiye kunguka habihirwe avuga mezi atatu bamaze batangiye mushinga batangiye kubona inyungu ifatika kandi batanze akazi gahoraho bantu batanu ati iyo umunsi wagenze neza dushobora kubona inyungu y’amafaranga ibihumbi frw twamaze guhemba abakozi urumva umushinga mwiza umwe bagize sosiyete umutesi agnes avuga bishimira umushinga wabo babashije kuwushyira bikorwa kandi ukomeje gutera imbere ati intego twihaye mbona igenda igerwaho kuko turakora inyungu ikaboneka umutesi agira inama urubyiruko by’umwihariko abakobwa gutinyuka bagakora kuko nabo bashoboye umukozi bdf karere muhanga murigande flix yavuze urubyiruko beauty in the sky ltd rufite umushinga mwiza kandi ruwushyira bikorwa bikwiye murigande yavuze honyine bafashije abantu bagera kubona ibikoresho gutangiza imishinga bazishyura by’ayo bahawe naho bishingiye bigo by’imari kugira bahabwe inguzanyo abantu yasabye n’abandi bafite imishinga bifuza gushyira bikorwa kugana bdf ikabagira inama ikabafasha kubona inguzanyo ikigega bdf cyashinzwe banki y’u rwanda itsura amajyambere brd by’umwihariko bdf iha amahirwe abagore n’urubyiruko kurusha abandi kuko bahabwa ubufasha kubemerera kubishingira nk’ingwate kigero gihe abagabo bemererwa kwishingirwa kigero email protected

title: diamond platnumz yatunguye umukunzi tanasha nyina abaha imodoka zanditseho amazina yaboreba amafoto
content: icyamamare muzika diamond platnumz yatunguye umukunzi tanasha donna nyina sandra sanura bizihizaga isabukuru y’amavuko cyumweru tariki nyakanga mbere y’uko nyina diamond n’umukunzi bizihiza isabukuru y’amavuko bahuriza nyakanga muhanzi yabanje gutangaza bagore akunda by’ikirenga isi uyu mugabo ufite abana batatu yanahishuye umukunzi kwibaruka umuhungu bizera azaba imbaraga z’igihugu mu ijambo rye yagize ntibikiri ngombwa biba ibanga nshurokuri afitetanasha inda y’amezi arindwi mezi abiri umuryango wacu uraba ugize umwana nyuma diamond platnumz yatunguye nyina sandra sanura bakunze kwita mama dangote cyangwa bi sandra ndetse n’umukunzi tanasha donna abaha imodoka zihenze diamond yahaye nyina imodoka y’umweru bwoko toyota land cruiser v umukunzi amuha toyota land-cruiser prado bishima buryo burenze kuko ntawabitekerezaga ibi birori byabereye mujyi mlimani tanzania byitabiriwe n’ibyamamare bitandukanye birimo abahanzi babarizwa wasafi records y’uyu muhanzi byayobowe n’umunyarwenya eric omondi kenya yanditswe habarurema djamali

title: imikorere y’ikigega kigamije kuzahura ubukungu bw’u rwanda bwazahajwe coronavirus
content: iki kigega kigamije gutera inkunga ibikorwa by’abikorera byahungabanyijwe n’icyorezo coronavirus minisitiri w’imari n’igenamigambi dr uzziel ndagijimana aherutse gutangaza ikigega kizafasha amabanki gutanga inguzanyo iciriritse byiciro byose kugira bigaruke kazi byongere bikore bibyare umusaruro uzagire ingaruka kuzamuka k’ubukungu rusange muri kigega hashyizwemo ingamba zihariye zifasha amahoteli kuvugurura amasezerano y’inguzanyo afite mabanki akaba igihe kirekire n’inyungu zikagabanuka ndetse buryo gihe yatangiye gufungura abona amafaranga aciriritse kugira imirimo yongere ikore imikorere y’iki kigega ireba amabanki y’ubucuruzi n’ibigo by’imari biciriritse banki nkuru y’igihugu niyo izagicunga gusa amafaranga bakiliya azajya atangwa n’amabanki ku ikubitiro leta yemeye gushyiramo miliyari frw ariko hagakomeza gushakwa abandi bashyiramo amafaranga kugira cyaguke usibye mahoteli kizafasha gutanga igishoro bucuruzi bwagizweho ingaruka coronavirus kugira bukomeze gukora kudahagarika abakozi hari kandi inguzanyo bucuruzi buto n’ubuciriritse nabwo bwibasiwe covid- banki nkuru y’igihugu izacunga imikorere yacyo izaguriza amabanki kugira nayo agurize abakiliya bayakeneye gusaba inguzanyo bizakorwa binyuze banki zibishinzwe nazo zizajya zikurikirana ikibazo nyuma zohereza bnr ibyifuzo by’abasabye gufashwa kugira bisuzumwe biganishe cyemezo nyuma nyuma kwemezwa amabanki azatanga amafaranga konte y’uwayasabye hanyuma ibyakozwe bigaragarizwe bnr nayo izatuma amafaranga agera kuwasabye umuyobozi w’urugaga rw’abikorera rwanda robert bapfakurera aherutse kuvuga nk’ubukerarugendo amahoteli byagize ibibazo bikomeye kuko barafunze burundu nubwo rwanda ibibazo coronavirus byarangira ntabwo ibibazo bizaba byarangiye ahandi hose kuko ubukerarugendo bukorana n’amahanga bakeneye gufashwa cyane raporo y’ishami ry’ubukerarugendo rugaga rw’abikorera psf yagaragazaga werurwe bwagize igihombo miliyari frw bivuye nama zasubitswe n’ibindi bikorwa by’ubukerarugendo byahagaritswe ibi bihombo byaje bisanga urwego rw’ubukerarugendo rwanda rufite inguzanyo miliyari frw imibare banki y’isi kuwa mata igaragaza ubukungu afurika munsi y’ubutayu sahara bwagizweho ingaruka coronavirus ndetse buzamanuka kigero - - buvuye bwariho ikigega mpuzamahanga cy’imari isi imf nacyo giherutse gutanga ikigereranyo umusaruro mbumbe w’isi mwaka uzamanuka mpuzandengo - uw’ubukungu bw’ibihugu byateye imbere kurusha ibindi bumanuke kigero - minisitiri w’imari n’igenamigambi dr ndagijimana uzziel ni ibintu bikomeye bidaheruka mateka y’isi muri afurika munsi y’ubutayu sahara hateganyijwe ubukungu buzamanuka - natwe birumvikana ubukungu bwacu butazagenda busanzwe buteganyijwe minisitiri dr ndagijimana yavuze igipimo cy’ubukungu bw’u rwanda kigaragaza butazazamuka kigero nk’uko byari byitezwe imibare yagiye ivugururwa ikava nyuma biramanuka bigera turi nubwo bitari byarangira neza indi nkuru wasoma ikigega miliyari frw ngamba zigiye kwifashishwa kuzahura ubukungu bw’u rwanda

title: video cobra washinze akabyiniro cadillac yakijijwe abatizwa gitwaza israel
content: kuri gatatu tariki werurwe apotre paul gitwaza yabatirije abantu benshi mugezi yorodani jordan gihugu israel barimo cobra nyir’akabyiniro kamamaye cyane myaka yashize kazwi cadillac muvugabutumwa uyobora insengero zose zion temple akaba akomereje gihugu ibikorwa by’ivugabutumwa n’ibyo gusura ubutaka bwera buherereye gihugu israel ahari ibirango by’amateka menshi avugwa bibiliya kuri gatatu tariki werurwe apotre paul gitwaza yabatirije abantu benshi mugezi yorodani jordan gihugu israel barimo cobra nyir’akabyiniro kamamaye cyane myaka yashize kazwi cadillac muvugabutumwa uyobora insengero zose zion temple akaba akomereje gihugu ibikorwa by’ivugabutumwa n’ibyo gusura ubutaka bwera buherereye gihugu israel ahari ibirango by’amateka menshi avugwa bibiliya cobra eugene umwe babatijwe apotre paul gitwaza gihugu israel nyuma kwakira agakiza gitwaza yamwibije inshuro zirindwi kugirango amwezeshe amazi n’umwuka wera uyu asanzwe afite akabyiniro n’akabari kazwi cadillac kari gafite amateka akomeye mujyi kigali abantu bakundaga kwita isoko rikomeye ry’abakobwa bicuruza indaya reba hano video uko byari byifashe gusa aka kabyiniro tariki ugushyingo kafashwe n’inkongi y’umuriro karashya karakongoka burundu gahinduka umuyonga impamvu yateye nkongi kugeza n’ubu ntiyigeze imenyekana itangazwe cobra ariko yemeye kwihana akakira agakiza ndetse akaba yarifuje yabatirizwa israel nk’igihugu cy’isezerano benshi bakirisitu bafata nk’ubutaka bwera akemera kwimika yesu kiristu mutima aha niho yabatirijwe yorodani gihugu israel cobra eugene yibizwaga inshuro zirindwi mazi hari abandi babatijwe hamwe cobra eugene aha cobra kumwe gitwaza batembera bice bitandukanye israel

title: abanyarwanda babiri bakubitiwe bikabije uganda bajugunywa mupaka- gatabazi
content: umuyobozi w’ intara y’ amajyaruguru gatabazi jean marie vianney yashyize ahagaragara amafoto avuga ay’ abanyarwanda bakubitiwe uganda bakajugunywa mupaka w’ u rwanda uganda umuyobozi w’ intara y’ amajyaruguru gatabazi jean marie vianney yashyize ahagaragara amafoto avuga ay’ abanyarwanda bakubitiwe uganda bakajugunywa mupaka w’ u rwanda uganda mu butumwa gatabazi yashyize twitter yagize guverinoma uganda ikomeje kwica abanyarwanda mu ijoro ryakeye maniragaba emmanuel w’ imyaka sebudirima john bakubitiwe bikomeye i kisoro uganda bajugunywa mupaka cyanika kwitabwaho n’ abaganga kigo nderabuzima cyanika mu ntangiriro z’ mwaka nibwo byatangiye kugaragara cyane u rwanda uganda bitabanye neza abanyarwanda bafatirwa uganda bagafungirwayo binyuranyije n’ amategeko ndetse bakanakorerwa iyicarubozo mu kwezi mwaka ibihugu byombi byasinye amasezerano gukemura ibibazo biri hagati yabyo byongere bibane neza ariko kugeza kintu gifatika kirava masezerano uganda ivuga abanyarwanda ifunga iba ibakekaho kuba maneko b’ u rwanda muri harimo abamaze imyaka irenga bafungiye ahantu hatazwi nk’ leta y’ u rwanda ibitangaza guverinoma y’ u rwanda isaba uganda hari ikekaho ibyaha yabageza imbere y’ ubutabera bakaburanishwa kuva kwezi werurwe mwaka u rwanda rugira abanyarwanda inama kutajya uganda kuko bamwe bagiyeyo bagirirwa nabi

title: bishop rugagi agiye kugura indi modoka irenze ranger rover indege nayo yabajije ibiciro
content: nyuma y’uko imodoka bishop rugagi bwoko range rover minsi ishize yavugishije benshi ndetse abantu batandukanye ntibavuge rumwe magambo muvugabutumwa yakoresheje ashima imana yamuhaye imodoka nziza noneho bishop rugagi innocent yavuze agiye kugura indi modoka y’igitangaza irenze kure range rover ndetse yaciye amarenge azahita akurikizaho kugura indege kuko yamaze kubaza ibiciro byayo nyuma y’uko imodoka bishop rugagi bwoko range rover minsi ishize yavugishije benshi ndetse abantu batandukanye ntibavuge rumwe magambo muvugabutumwa yakoresheje ashima imana yamuhaye imodoka nziza noneho bishop rugagi innocent yavuze agiye kugura indi modoka y’igitangaza irenze kure range rover ndetse yaciye amarenge azahita akurikizaho kugura indege kuko yamaze kubaza ibiciro byayo kuwa gatatu tariki werurwe bishop rugagi innocent yashimye imana yamuhaye imodoka y’akataraboneka range rover sport modoka zihenze cyane ibirenze ikaba yaramuhaye n’imodoka ifite ibirango plaque bifite umubare ugaragaza ikimenyetso yesu gihangana n’ikimenyetso satani kizwi iyo modoka bishop ruragi innocent ifite ibirango rad b mubare akaba yarahamije ikimenyetso yesu bisho rugagi niba shitani afite ibimenyetso yesu afite ibimenyetso kandi imisozi igose i yerusalemu niko uwiteka agose abantu nyuma i burayi yagiye biterane bitandukanye bihugu byiganjemo ibituyemo abanyarwanda benshi bishop rugagi noneho cyumweru materaniro yahishuye agiye kugura indi modoka ihenze cyane kandi n’indege yamaze kubaza ibiciro byayo bishop rugagi yagize ntabwo umukozi w’imana ukwiriye kubaho nabi oya habe gato ahubwo ukwiriye kubaho neza mbere y’abandi muvuga ranger rover ubu ngiye kuzazana indi modoka iyirenzeho ndetse n’indege namaze kubaza ibiciro byayo mutegereze gato gusa iyi imodoka bwoko range rover bishop rugagi asanzwe afite gusa ntabwo ihagije ashaka kugura indi akazagura n’indegeiyi nayo indi modoka bishop rugagi yahawe nk’impano y’imodoka nziza n’umupasiteri witwa bishop david uyobora itorero ryitwa mica rikorera mujyi bruxelles

content: nkuko twatangiye nyigisho yacu ifite umutwe ugira uti ibintu wakora kugirango ugaragarize mwashakanye umukunda by’ukuri mbere twabagejejeho ibice bibiri by’iyi nyigisho tukaba tugiye gukomeza title: rayon sports yiteguye gukina imikino y’afurika gihe mukura yabura amikoro
content: ubuyobozi bw’ikipe rayon sports bwahamije bwiteguye gusohokera u rwanda mikino y’afurika gihe cyose mukura yaba inaniwe kubona amikoro yatuma isohokera igihuguibi byatangajwe muvunyi paul umuyobozi mukuru rayon sports nyuma y’inama y’inteko rusange y’abanyamuryango rayon sports yabaye tariki ukwakira yitabirwa n’abantu babiri bavuye matsinda y’abafana nkuko muvunyi yabisobanuriye abanyamakuru nyuma y’iyi nama rayon sports yagize umwaka mwiza mikino y’afurika igera ndetse yiteguye kuba yasohoka gihe ikipe mukura yatwaye igikombe cy’amahoro yabura ubushoboziati muri shampiyona gikombe cy’amahoro umwaka ushize umusaruro ntiwagenze neza ariko tugomba kwikubita agashyi ubu turizeza abakunzi bacu tuzitwara neza ikindi gihe mukura yaba itabashije gusohoka twe turi tayariabafana rayon sports batuma kipe yinjiza amafaranga menshimu bindi muvunyi yishimira bikomeye umusaruro wabonetse rayon sports yinjije miliyoni z’amafaranga y’u rwanda arimo miliyoni yinjiye bibuga mikino shampiyona miliyoni mikino y’igikombe cy’amahoro miliyoni zavuye mikino y’afurika miliyoni zavuye bafana hari miliyoni zavuye baterankunga miliyoni zirimo izavuye bihembo kugera matsinda y’imino y’afurika kugurisha abakinnyirayon sports iravuga yihaye intego kwinjiza mwaka arenga miliyoni zirimo miliyoni bazinjiza mikino shampiyona harimo miliyoni zizava azam gihe rayon sports yaba itwaye igikombe shampiyona miliyoni bazinjiza gikombe cy’amahoro miliyoni gikombe cy’intwari miliyoni zizava bakunzi b’iyi kiperayon sports yanateguye imikino gicuti izayihuza n’amakipe hanze mamelodi title: ndizihiwe fabien yapfuye yiyahuye kivu
content: amakuru dukesha bakeneyemungu obara umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’akagari gabiro avuga ndizihiwe fabien yagiye gitondo saa kumi n’ebyiri n’igice mugitondo avuga agiye giseke ahacukurwa amabuye y’agaciro yasize abwiye iwabo agiye asize amafaranga telephone bugaruke nyuma kubona atagarutse umuryango wafashe icyemezo kujya kumushaka kuko wakekaga yaba yiyahuye doreko bitari ubwa mbere abigerageje tariki saa kumi nimwe n’iminota mirongo itatu z’umugoroba nibwo umurambo ndizihiwe fabien wabonetse utoragurwa gace kitwa giseke yagaragaye amazi ariho yamunaze nkombe z’ikivu mbonyumukiza justin kabera felesitaababyeyi ndizihiwe fabien bemeza ntawabiciye umwana kuko n’ubundi yajyaga ashaka kwiyahura bakamugarura bavuga umuhungu wabo arwaye amagini kuko bagiye kumuvuza bikananirana biteganijwe nyuma gusuzuma umurambo wajyanywe bitaro kibuye aribwo aza gushyingurwa ndizihiwe fabien apfuye akiri ingaragu yari atuye mudugudu murama akagari gabiro umurenge musasa akarere rutsiro vdaste nkikabahizi

title: amwe mateka yaranze umuhanzi w’injyana country don williams
content: umuhanzi don williams umwe bahanzi bagiye bigaragaza mateka y’injyana country kuburyo yaje guhimbwa akazina bafana umwami w’injyana country rumi rw’icyongereza the gentle giant of country music don williams yavutse tariki gicurasi w’ avukira gace floydada leta texas gihugu leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika uretse kuba umuririmbyi n’umwanditsi w’indirimbo hakiyongeraho gukina film ise umubyara umukanishi nyina umubyara umucuranzi gitari ibi byatumye myaka itatu gusa umucuranzi gitari ku myaka gusa yahise ajya itsinda the strangers two uretse tsinda yagiye matsinda menshi atandukanye harimo pozo-seco singers matsinda yanyuzemo afite umurava kuko amwe mwe yayavagamo yahitaga asenyuka mu bihangano yagiye ashyira hanze twavugamo nk’indirimbo you’re my best friend i got love god will make a way n’zindi nyinshi zitandukanye uretse kuririmba indirimbo zishimisha abantu yanaririmbye indirimbo gushimisha imana gospol don williams yavukiye kariya gace ariko siko yakuriyemo kuko yaje kwimukira gace portland yarangirije amashuri makuru ahita ashaka umufasha banabyararana abana aribo gary natim mu bihembo bitandukanye yagiye atwara byinshi cyane twavuga nko yabaye umuhanzi w’umwaka ndetse album expressions yabaye iyambere ubu don williams umwe bagize ishyirahamwe ry’abahanzi baririmba injyana country country music association sitio ndoli gihamyacom

title: suzy perez wakoranye jennifer lopez p-diddy kuga gakomeye
content: suzy perez umwe mubakobwa babayeho neza mwaka ariko ubuzima bwe buri mukaga yahindutse mayibobo yibera kumuhanda uyu mukobwa ukomoka brezil mubagize ubuzima bwiza ndetse akundwa benshi kuburyo byanatumye akorana n’ibigo byinshi byerekana imideli yaba iburayi ndetse amerika suzy perez yatangiye kwamamara cyane yakoranaga n’umuhanzikazi amerika jennifer lopez yagaragaye mashusho y’indirimbo ze zirenga agaragaramo nk’umunyamideli wabigize umwuga nyuma yaje gukorana p-diddy agaragara mashusho y’indirimbo ze suzy kubera gukundwa cyane yabonye amasezerano kwamamaza imyenda y’abagore igezweho iburayi nabwo yatangiye gukorana n’ikigo mubudage cyerekana imideli ikigo ubudage cyamuhaye kwamamaza imyambaro bagiranye amasezerano y’imyaka myka ibiri niyo yagiriyemo ibibazo bidasanzwe mubyara suzy perez yagiranaga ikiganiro n’ikinyamakuru brazil yahamijeko ububabare afite yabutewe kwiheba ndetse kwiyanga uyu mukobwa avugako abamukuye amerika bakamujyana iburayi yagezeyo bakamuhata ibiyobyabwenge byinshi barangiza bakajya banamurongora kungufu nyuma yaje kubacika asubira amerika yabaga mbere kubera kumurongora kungufu n’ibiyobyabwenge bamuhaye nibyo byatumye ahinduka umurwayi mutwe kugeza mukobwa yibera kumuhanda umuryango wagerageje kumutabariza aravurwa biranga ubuzima bwe buri kaga umubonye ameze ntiwamugeranya n’umunyamideli ugezweho ibyago byamuteye ubwoba cyane buryo yakoresheje ibiyobyabwenge kugira ahangane n’ububabare bwe umuryango suzy uracyamurwanirira munsi ariko inzira gukira ntabwo yoroshye amasengeshoforsuzy

title: umunya-nigeria timaya ategerejwe i kigali
content: umuhanzi nigeria tiyama niwe uzataramira abakunda kwizihirwa n’umuziki gitaramo kigali jazz junction gusoza ukwezi werurwe bimaze kumenyererwa buri gatanu nyuma w’ukwezi habaigitaramo kigali jazz junction batumira umuhanzi ukunzwe mahangaagafatanya n’undi rwanda umuyobozi rg-consult itegura gitaramo remmy lubegaku gatanu w’icyumeru gishize yatangaje igitaramo gusoza uku kwezi kwawerurwe umunya-nigeria timaya uzasusurutsa abakunzi b’umuziki timaya ubusanzwe witwa inetimi timaya odon kibuga cy’umuzikikuva ni umwe bahanzi bakunzwe kandi bubashywe nigeria ahafatwank’igicumbi cy’umuziki afurika uyu mugabo w’imyaka yakunzwe ndirimbo nyinshi munjyana dancehall harimo ukwu sanko balance dance yakoranye narudeboy n’izindi nyinshi timaya kandi yakoranye n’itsinda urban boys indirimboyitwa show me love timaya agiye gutaramira yiyongera rutonde rurerure rw’abahanzibo nigeria bahagaze rubyiniro kigali jazz junction imaze imyakaine ku gatanu tariki gashyantare umusore ukunzwe cyane n’urubyiruko joeboy wataramanye n’abanya-kigali afatanyije davis d

title: abaganga b’indwara z’uruhu baraburira abiharaje kwisiga amavuta mukorogo
content: abaganga b’inzobere kuvura indwara z’uruhu ndetse n’abahanga byerekeye imiti pharmacien bahuriye i kigali nama igamije kungurana ibitekerezo buryo gukumira kurwanya indwara z’uruhu bakomoza bubi bw’uruvangitirane rw’amavuta bamwe baharaye gukoresha yamenyekanye ’mukorogo’ abaganga b’inzobere kuvura indwara z’uruhu ndetse n’abahanga byerekeye imiti pharmacien bahuriye i kigali nama igamije kungurana ibitekerezo buryo gukumira kurwanya indwara z’uruhu bakomoza bubi bw’uruvangitirane rw’amavuta bamwe baharaye gukoresha yamenyekanye ’mukorogo’ iyi nama yabaye kuwa gatanu tariki kanama yahuriyemo n’abaganga ndetse n’abaganga by’imiti baturutse hirya hino gihugu yateguwe bufatanye kipharma sebapharma ingingo nyamukuru y’utuntu nama nyunguranabitekerezo kwiga buryo kwita ruhu kuvura indwara zitandukanye zifata uruhu zikarwangiza hanagarutswe kandi bantu biharaje guhindura uruhu rwabo bakoresheje uruvangitirane rw’imiti inyuranye ibintu abahanga by’imiti ndetse n’abaganga b’uruhu bavuze bigira ingaruka zikomeye bisiga mavuta dr gahongayire francoise impuguke bijyanye n’indwara z’uruhu yavuze abisiga mukorogo babikora byabanje kugenzura bamenye ziba zakozwe buhe buryo cyane imiti ivangwavangwa ishobora kugira ingaruka nyinshi kandi zikomeye mubiri w’uwayikoresheje yanavuze n’ubwo benshi bisiga mavuta mukorogo bashaka guhindura uruhu rwabo batamenye bashobora kwegera abaganga bakabagira inama ndetse bakanababwira amavuta yabugenewe bashobora gukoresha bahindura uruhu kandi ntabagireho ingaruka yagize si mbona impamvu ushaka guhinduka simbona impamvu ushaka kuba umuzungu kandi muzungu n’ubwo uzanaba kuko kenshi uzasanga bintu azajya gukoresha wenda ubwa mbere ibyumweru bibiri cyangwa bitanu azaba koko yishimiye kuba yarahindutse atagifite urwo rukara ariko nyuma yaho ahubwo mubi kurushaho nshobora kukwemeza hari abantu batakiva nzu kubera mukorogo bisize umuhanga by’imiti uyobora umuryango nyarwanda ugamije kurushaho kuzamura ubuzima rusange bw’abaturage organization for public healthy improvement ophi uwambajineza tito yavuze mavuta mukorogo ibintu bikorwa n’abantu ahanini batabifitiye ubumenyi buhagije yagize ibya mukorogo ibintu bikorwa n’abantu badasobanukiwe umuti aricyo kubera umuhanga by’imiti uba uzi imiti ugiye kuvanga urayivanga ruhe rwego urashyiramo wenda nabyita nk’ubukana yunzemo ubukana bw’uyu muti nimbuvanga n’ubwuyu burakemura ikibazo umuntu afite ibyo ngibyo bikorerwa inyingo ukanabyemererwa n’inzego zigiye zitandukanye ntabwo ibintu ujya ahantu hihishe ukavangavanga ugahereza abantu uwambajineza yavuze hari igihe abakora mwuga farumasi cyangwa abandi bahanga by’imiti baha abaturage imiti batabanje kumenya bakeneye by’umwihariko y’uruhu avuga rugira ibyiciro bitandukanye birimo uruhu ruba rwumye urw’amavuta n’uruhu rukakaye cyane abahanga by’imiti ndetse n’inzobere z’abaganga n’indwara z’uruhu bagarutse ngaruka z’amavuta mukorogo umuhanga by’imiti uyobora umuryango nyarwanda ugamije kurushaho kuzamura ubuzima rusange bw’abaturage ophi uwambajineza tito

title: rurangirwa louis wayoboraga fra buroko
content: ishyirahamwe abereye umuyobozi n’ubwo bamwe barihuriyeho batemeraga umuyobozi waryo ryaranzwe n’ibibazo bikomeye ndetse bikaba nayo ntandaro y’ifungwa rye ibibazo byinshi byaranze shyirahamwe mwaka byaturutse isiganwa ryitwa kigali international peace marathon yabereye i kigali kwezi gatanu kuva gihe abayobozi b’iri shyirahamwe bashinjanyaga kunyereza amafaranga agenewe iryo siganwa maguru abatungwaga agatoki harimo uwari umunyamabanga twajamahoro constantin uwari umuyobozi kabiri wungirije disi dieudonn nadine mutezinkindi umubitsi ibi byatumye uwari umuyobozi w’iri shyirahamwe gihe spt gerard ntare yitabaza inzego polisi zihate ibibazo abavugwagaho kunyereza mafaranga ariko ntibyashimishije abakurikirana imikino rwanda bavugaga ntaho politike ikwiye kwivanga n’imikino ibyo bibazo byose bimaze kuba buyobozi bw’iri shyirahamwe havutsemo ibice bibiri harimo itsinda rigizwe ahanini n’uwari umunyamabanga twajamahoro constantin uwari umuyobozi kabiri wungirije disi dieudonne nadine mutezinkindi umubitsi iri tsinda ryari rihanganye n’iry’uwari umuyobozi mukuru ntare gerard rurangirwa louis umwungirije nyuma hashyizweho akanama kagamije kubunga basabwa kumvikana ariko biranga abanyamuryango bagize fra basabwe gutegura amatora y’inzibacyuho bayakora tariki kanama ariko ntiyagombaga kugaragaramo umuntu ariwe wese bibazo abatowe by’agateganyo ntibigeze bemerwa ntare gerard hamwe rurangirwa louis ndetse banga buyobozi nyuma y’igitutu kinini yaterwaga n’abakurikira imikino rwanda gerard ntare yatangaje yeguye mirimo n’ubwo hari habaye amatora kumusimbura ariko ntayemere rurangirwa louis ahita atangaza amusimbuye by’agateganyo rurangirwa louis yahise ategura amatora yandi giti cye agizwe umuyobozi w’ishyirahamwe ry’imikino ngororamubiri gutyo ariko hari abandi batamwemeraga bavuga yatowe n’abantu batazwi batagira n’amashyirahamwe babarizwamo ibi byaje kutavugwaho rumwe n’impande nyinshi ndetse minisiteri sport komite olympique barwanya cyane ubuyobozi rurangirwa louis kuko bavugaga ayobora buryo butemewe n’amategeko rurangirwa louis yavuze nyuma gukoresha matora yahise abimenyesha ishyirahamwe ry’imikino ngororamubiri isi iaaf buryo nihanagira umwivangira gahunda u rwanda rushobora gufatirwa ibihano iaaf kubera kutishimira ubuyobozi rurangirwa louis minisiteri sport yahise ifunga ibiro rurangirwa louis kugira adakomeza kuyobora nk’uko twabitangarijwe emmanuel bugingo ushinzwe imikino minisiteri sport kiganiro yagiranye n’abanyamakuru yavuze minisiteri yashatse ingufuri nshya iyifungisha ibiro rurangirwa ubwo rurangirwa aje biro bye nk’uko bisanzwe yasanzeho indi ngufuri ahita ayimena arinjira minisiteri ikibimenya yahise yitabaza polisi rurangirwa louis ahita atabwa yombi akaba afungiwe sitasiyo polisi i remera twagerageje uburyo twavugana nyirubwite rurangirwa ariko ntibyadukundira muri kiganiro n’abanyamakuru cyari cyateguwe komite olympique umuyobozi wayo dr colonel charles rudakubana yahakanye amakuru avuga komite olympique yagize uruhare ifungwa rurangirwa louis yavuze nk’abareberera imikino rwanda bifuzaga kugaragariza itangazamakuru ikibazo fra giteye ndetse n’ingamba bagomba gufata kugira ibibazo nk’ibi bitazongera kubaho rudakubana yavuze ibibazo bitari fra gusa kuko yandi mashyirahamwe y’imikino birimo uretse bitararenga inkombe yadutangarije bagiye gushyira imbaraga iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko kugira ibintu byose bijye bikorwa mucyo yagize turashaka amategeko yubahirizwa buri shyirahamwe rikayagenderaho hakamenyekana uburyo amatora akorwa n’uko abayobozi basimburana kandi hakanajyaho ushaka kuyobora ishyirahamwe runaka agomba kuba yujuje nta mpamvu kugirango wumve munsi kanaka yagiye buyobozi utazi abugiyeho iri fungwa rurangirwa louis ryabaye arimo gutegura ikiganiro n’abanyamakuru cyagombaga kuba tariki kugira asobanure gahunda ishyirahamwe rifite ndetse n’ibyo amaze kugeraho ariko minisiteri sport iramubuza nk’uko twabitangarijwe kiganiro cyateguwe comite olympique theoneste nisingizwe

title: nkurunziza waririmbye magi magi yahishuye nganzo yita perezida kagame amafoto

title: abagenzi barifuza ibiciro by’ingendo nabyo byagabanuka

title: oms itangaza abanyarwanda bagira ihungabana kubera jenoside bangana
content: oms itangaza hungabana rikunze kugaragara ahanini rubyiruko ruri hagati y’imyaka ubushakashatsi buherutse gukorwa n’iri shami bugaragaza abagira hungabana bagaragaza ibimenyetso byerekana jenoside yongeye kuba bityo bakibona basubiye baciyemo muri gihugu cy’ imisozi igihumbi huye umujyi munini uherereye majyepfo y’igihugu oms ivuga mujyi wagezwemo n’ubwicanyi cyane kandi wagaragayemo abantu bakoze jenoside benshi kurusha ahandi rwanda abavura indwara guhungabana mujyi bavuga bakunze kuvura abantu byiciro by’abana ingimbi cyangwa abangavu ndetse n’urubyiruko mugihe kwibuka jenoside vincent sezibera umwarimu kaminuza nkuru y’ u rwanda avuga kaminuza bigisha abanyeshuri amasomo ajyanye n’indwara mutwe bamwe barangije amasomo bafasha abagize ibibazo by’ihungabana bitabujije hari n’abakiga bafasha abagize kibazo gihe bibaye ngombwa sezibera icyihutirwa ugukurikirana umurwayi tugakurikirana uburyo bushya twamufashamo ariko tugakomeza kwigisha abanyeshuri bagire buvuzi umwuga ubu dufite abanyeshuri biga cyiciro mbere n’icya kabiri kaminuza abenshi abakobwa ikinyamakuru la-croixcom dukesha nkuru kivuga umubare w’aba bavuze bamaze kugira dipolome kugera baturage barenga miliyoni hamwe n’ikipe sezibera avuga gihe cy’imyaka itanu impfubyi bafite hagati y’umwaka umwe gihe jenoside babakozeho ubushakashatsi rwego oms basanga abakunda kugira ibibazo by’ihungabana abakobwa kurusha abahungu muri abari bafite hagati y’imyaka itanu bihe jenoside nibo bakorwaho cyane n’ibi bibazo ibibazo bikunze kurangwa n’ibimenyetso by’indwara y’umutwe cyangwa hakaba kujya mihango buryo butunguranye bakobwa n’ibindi gerard gitoli mbabazi

content: nubwo u rwanda rufite rugeze guhangana n’ingaruka jenoside abana bagizwe imfubyi baracyakeneye inama urukundo gusurwa kwitabwaho kuko abakagombye kubibaha batagihari nk’uko byatangajwe n’uhagarariye ibuka karere rubavu kabanda innocent kabanda yasabye abanyarubavu kwita bana ndetse n’abapfakazi kabanda yongeyeho ubupfura batojwe butabemerera kwangana mpamvu biteguye gutanga imbabazi babiciye babishaka yagize ntabwo tuzizirika muntu watwiciye uzashaka imbabazi azatwegere tuzazimuha uyu munsi kwibuka tariki wabimburiwe n’urugendo ruva murenge rugerero rujya rwibutso rw’uwo murenge wanaranzwe n’indirimbo z’abana barokotse jenoside yakorewe abatutsi bibumbiye itsinda ryitwa imanzi’ ubuhamya gushyira indabo rwibutso rugerero ku isaha saa sita abanyarubavu bunamiye inzirakarengane iminota itatu hanyuma bakurikirana radiyo ijambo nyakubahwa perezida repubulika yavugiye sitade amahoro mujyi kigali umuyobozi w’akarere rubavu sheikh bahame hassan yashimiye abaturage b’ako karere kuba bitabiriye gahunda benshi anabasaba kuzitabira gahunda z’icyumweru cy’icyunamo zizaba zirimo ibiganiro yongeyeho kwegera abacitse icumu ingenzi bagahumurizwa urwibutso rugerero rushyinguyemo imibiri y’abatutsi gusoza icyumweru cy’icyunamo karere rubavu bikazabera murenge mudende tariki mata kugeza imibare yavuye bushakashatsi bwakozwe ibuka yerekana abazize jenoside bangana rwanda hose pascaline umulisa

title: mwarimu akurikiranyweho gusambanya abanyeshuri abyita gukina filime
content: umugabo witwa chris obi wakinnye filime yitwa star trek’ inyamaswamuntu yahawe izina klingon’ akurikiranyweho kuba yarasambanyije abanyeshuri akiri mwarimu drama’ bwongereza umugabo witwa chris obi wakinnye filime yitwa star trek’ inyamaswamuntu yahawe izina klingon’ akurikiranyweho kuba yarasambanyije abanyeshuri akiri mwarimu drama’ bwongereza obi w’ imyaka arashinjwa n’ abagore yabasambanyaga myanya gushyira bikorwa amasomo yabaga yabigishije gukina filime ntakiri mwarimu drama asigaye abarizwa hollywood yatawe yombi ndege avuye los angles obi amazina nyakuri yitwa christopher ogugua nyuma guhatwa ibibazo n’ inzego z’ ubutabera yarekuwe atanze ingwate gihe iperereza rikomeje gusa ahakana aregwa kuba yarafashe ngufu abanyeshuri yigishaga agakubita abandi akavuga kibi yigeze akora ibi byaha ashinjwa yaba yarabikoze umwarimu drama ishuri ryo bwongereza rifite amashami koreje kensingtonna n’ iya chelsea obi wakinnye umuyobozi klingon filime y’ uruhererekane yitwa star trek’ yanakinnye andi mafilime arimo american gods’ doctor who’ filime yanditse zirimo iyitwa snow white and the huntsman’ ghost in the shell the counsellor filime yitwa the call up’ obi uku yakinnye star trek asa

title: agatabo gafasha umuturage gusobanukirwa n’ingengo y’imari kashyizwe ahagaragara

title: arusha callixte nzabonimana arasabirwa igihano gufungwa burundu
content: umushinjacyaha w’uru rukiko paul ngarua yasabiye nzabonimana igihano gufungwa burundu buri cyaha jenoside aregwa byaha byose akurikiranyweho n’uru rukiko nzabonimana wize ibijyanye n’ubutaka kaminuza bufaransa ashinjwa kuba bateguye bagaashyira bikorwa akanategeka ubwicanyi bw’abatutsi ndetse kwica abataravugaga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bwariho ashinjwa kandi kuba yarakanguriye agashishikariza abaturage perefegitura zitandukanye gutsemba abatusi kuba yaratanze intwaro nzabonimana wafatiwe gihugu tanzania kwezi kabiri ahakana ibyaha byose aregwa yabwiye urukiko yarahungiye ambasade y’u bufaransa jenoside yatangiraga ariko umushinjacyaha yahakanye ukwiregura kwe avuga abantu barahungiye ambasade bafite uburenganzira gusohoka igihe cyose babyifurije gutanga ibindi bimenyetso biteganyijwe kurangira gatanu abacamanza bakazahita bajya mwiherero gusuzuma ibyatangajwe mpande zombi uru rubanza rwatangiye kwezi cyenda mu kwezi gushize uru rukiko rwari rwakatiye igihano cy’imyaka abandi bahoze minisitiri babiri kubera uruhare bagize jenoside ariko rufungura n’abandi babiri nyuma kubura ibimenyetso bibahama urukiko ictr rwashizweho nyuma jenoside rwanda rwego gukurikirana abantu b’ingenzi bagize uruhare jenoside yakorewe abatusi abantu barenga miliyoni bayiguyemo gihe cy’iminsi emmanuel hitimana

title: legacy xp irigisha abanyarwanda kwizigamira
content: mu turere tw’igihugu bamaze kugeramo bitwaje ababyinnyi n’abakinnyi b’udukinamico duto twigisha abaturage umuco kwizigamira mabanki bigo by’imali iciriritse sacco intego legacy xp ugukangurira buri munyarwanda wese kwizigamira kumenya uburyo bunoze bw’imicungire y’amafaranga kugira bimufashe gutera imbere bukungu n’imibereho myiza nk’uko bisobanurwa eliane umwali umukozi w’iyi sosiyete ubwo karere nyanza tariki eliane umwali yavuze umuco kuzigama umuntu wese ugomba kuwutozwa akiri muto kugira awukurane bityo bizamufashe kugira yigezaho legacy xp yanigishije abaturage mujyi nyanza bashobora gukoresha ibyuma bibikurizwaho amafaranga bita atm machine hamwe n’imikorere konti igendanwa iyo konti igendanwa ushobora kuyikoresha amasaha iminsi irindwi igihe cyose isaha ariyo murongo utonze nk’uko eliane yabisobanuye mukamusoni annonciata umwe baturage bumva bukangurambaga yavuze muntu ushobora gutera imbere adakoresha uburyo kwizigamira abisonabura atya nta muntu wahabwa inguzanyo banki atabanje gutera intambwe kubanza kwizigamira nicyo gituma nihereyeho nafashe iya mbere ngafunguza konti murenge sacco w’umurenge wacu busasamana legacy xp yanatanze udutabo tw’imfashanyigisho baturage mujyi nyanza tubashishikariza kwizigamira kugira bashobore kwihuta iterambere ubukungurambaga nk’ubu legacy xp imaze kubukorera turere twa kamonyi muhanga ruhango nyanza ikaba iteganya kubugeza tundi turere dutandukanye nk’uko eliane umwali umukozi w’iyi sosiyete abitangaza jean pierre twizeyeyezu

title: rulindo barasaba kugabanyirizwa umusoro bigori bacuruza
content: jean pierre ngerageze umwe bacuruza ibigori avuga amafaranga y’ inyungu bakura bucuruzi bwabo bahita bayatanga byinshi bigatuma babona kamaro gafatika bubafitiye agira ngunguru y’ ibigori nshobora kungukaho amafaranga nkishyura umusoro ndetse n’inkwi ngasigarana gusa mukanyindo berancille avuga amafaranga babona bucuruzi bw’ibigori adahwanye n’imirimo bakoze kubitegura agira batwaka umusoro uhanitse twakuramo amafaranga y’ishyiramwe ndetse n’ayo kugura inkwi ugasanga usigaranye ubusa umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’ umurenge base mwigira antoine avuga batari bazi kibazo ariko bagiye kugikurikiranira akarengane kazagaragara kagakemuke mwigira avuga kandi bazitonda bakareba gukabya birimo kuko umuntu ashobora kuba asoreshwa bijyanye n’agaciro k’ibyo acuruza jean noel mugabo

title: dore impamvu zifatwa nk’izoroheje nyamara zimunga umubano kugeza gatanya divorce
content: buri gihe urukundo ruba rwinshi abantu bashyingiranwa ndetse bakiyemeza kubana by’iteka ryose bagasangira ibyiza n’ibibi kugeza batandukanijwe n’urupfu nyamara ntibibuza kumva gatanya ziyongera umunsi wundi amafaranga gucana inyuma byakomeje kugenda bigaragazwa nk’impamvu zikomeye gatanya ariko nubwo biba bibaye imbarutso gufata umwanzuro burya biba byarapfuye kera buhoro buhoro mu bushakashatsi bwashyizwe hanze kaminuza copenhague danemark bwakozwe n’abahanga by’umubano w’abashakanye bwakorewe bantu bamaze igihe gito batandukanye n’abo bashakanye byagaragaye hari impamvu zagarutsweho benshi muri nkuru tugiye kubagezaho mpamvu zifatwa nk’izoroheje nyamara zimunga umubano w’abashakanye kugeza biyemeje gutesha agaciro urukundo rukomeye rwabahuje guhagarika kwerekana urukundo hafi bavuze batandukanye n’abo bakundaga kuko batari bakigaragarizwa bakunzwe mu gihe mbere cy’umubano w’abashakanye ubuzima burabaryohera ahanini kuko bagiha agaciro kubwirana ’ndagukunda’ ndetse gukora utuntu twinshi uduto n’utunini bagaragarizanya bakundanye nyamara iminsi yegera imbere mubano basa n’abawumenyera bakawufata nk’ikintu gisanzwe ikosa rikomeye cyane kuko buri wese bashakanye afite uburyo yifuza kubonamo agifitiwe urukundo kutaganira bihagije ibiganiro bakundana ingirakamaro cyane bikaba akarusho bashakanye kubwirana amagambo meza mukunda mwanga icyabababaje icyabashimishije n’ibindi nk’ibyo ndetse mukamenya kujya inama mbere gufata imyanzuro ibi bidakozwe nibwo usanga buri wese afite byinshi mutima ugasanga bigenda bizimya rukundo ufitiye uwawe kugeza utakibona ikintu cyiza ahubwo bibi akaba aribyo wibonera gusa gutakaza icyubahiro n’icyizere icyubahiro n’icyizere nabyo ibintu bikomeye cyane mubano w’abashakanye niba umwe abona atacyubashywe cyangwa cyizere akigirirwa usanga ashobora guhitamo kubivamo gutandukanya icyerekezo bivugwa abashakanye bahindutse umuntu umwe murumva bigenda abari umwe batangiye kureba nzira zitandukanye aho umwe yifuza kuganisha ubuzima akabirwanya akerekana ikindi cyerekezo akenshi biba impamvu z’igihe kinini imbarutso ikaza ibyutsa bimwe biba bisinziriye muntu ni byiza ufite mubana kandi ukaba wifuza mugirana umubano urambye wakwita bintu n’utundi tuntu duto kuko aritwo dusenya cyangwa tugakomeza umubano wanyu src sur

title: indirimbo yitiriwe album mbere kamichi izasohoka nyuma gusohoka kw’ album
content: iyi album ikaba yitiriwe indirimbo umugabirwa kamichi azakorera gihugu uganda uku kwezi cumi mwakamu rwanda byari bimenyerewe indirimbo yitirirwa album iba indirimbo iba yarasohotse mbere y’uko album ishyirwa ahagaragara ariko kamichi akaba yarakoze ibitandukanye n’abandi rwego kwicisha abafana amatsiko kugira bagure album ishyirwa mugaragaro album umugabirwa rizaba minsi ibiri tariki ugushyingo album izamurikirwa kaminuza nkuru y’u rwanda i huye ntara y’amajyepfo tariki ugushyingo album ikazamurikirwa i kigali petit stade kigali today iganira kamichi akaba yayitangarije album umugabirwa izaba iriho indirimbo kugeza tariki ukwakira hakaba hamaze kurangira indirimbo indirimbo album izitari munsi zikazaba zifite amashusho imyiteguro kamichi avuga igeze kure nubwo atarabona abaterankunga nkuko abyifuzauyu musore wujuje imyaka tariki kamena mwaka akaba avuga yumva gushyira ahagaragara album igikorwa cy’ingenzi muririmbyikamichi agira gushyira ahagaragara album nubwo bitaguha amafaranga buryo bw’ako kanya ariko bikubakira izina kandi uba wumva hari igikorwa kigaragara muzika uba ukoze muri make cvuburyo bugaragaza umuntu yaragezeho kamichi umusore wamenyekanye ndirimbo yitwa komeza ubimbwire ariko azakumenyekane cyane ndirimbo zoubedha yafatanije n’umuririmbyi the ben mwaka indirimbo yitwa aho ruzingiye nayo ikaba indirimbo kamichi yakunzwe cyaneuyu muririmbyi akaba yaranahawe igihembo cy’umuririmbyi wahize abandi njyana afrobeat mwaka n’indirimbo zoubedha ikaba yaramuhaye igihembo cy’indirimbo yakunzwe kurusha izindi mwaka kamichi avuga yatangiye umuziki mwaka afite imyaka aririmba rusengero mwaka kaba aribwo yinjiye studio mbere nk’umuhanzi kugira aririmbe indirimbo yajya radio jean baptiste micomyiza

title: gatsibo batangiye icyunamo baharanira ubumwe
content: intwaro yakoreshejwe kugira jenoside igerweho ugucikamo abanyarwanda ibice nk’uko byasobanuwe n’ umunyamabanga nshingwbaikorwa w’akagari kabarore rigati gaspard yagize icyo dukwiye gukora uguharanira ubumwe nk’uko leta yacu ibidushishikariza tukirinda ibidukandukanya ahubwo tugahuriza umugozi umwe dufasha abafite intege nke tukagera iterambere mu kagari kabarore umurenge kabarore abaturage baganiriye uburyo mbere y’umwaduko w’abazungu abanyarwanda babanye neza bagarutse kandi buryo abazungu batangiye kuzana ivangura ishuri kugeza nubwo batangiye kwandika ubwoko marangamuntu kimwe ntwaro zakoresheshe kubiba itandukaniro ry’abanyarwanda uretse kuganiro ibiganiro by’amateka yaranze u rwanda abaturage karere gatsibo bafashe umwanya gutekereza bazakorera abacitse icumu jenoside biyemeje buri mudugudu ugomba kugira utegura kizagenerwa abacitse icumu batishoboye abaturage bamaganye bamwe bagaragaye bapfobya igikorwa kugenera inkunga kubacise icumu batishoboye bavuga ivangura bagombye gufasha abatishoboye abaturage bavuga ntacyo bakora bashobore guhoza uwabuze abantu nubwo batanga inkunga ukumufata mugongo atari ivangura kuko gahunda leta zafasaha abantu biciye budehe abaturage bemeranyijwe bagomba kujya bahura buri saa munani kugira go bagire ibiganiro kandi basabwa kwirinda kwamagana ingengabitekerezo jenoside kuko abaharanira ubumwe batagomba kugira ikibatandukanya ku rwego rw’akarere gatsibo igikorwa gutangiza icyunamo cyatangiriye murenge muhura mudugudu taba ariko abaturage siho bagiye kuko bamwe midugudu bagiye bagira ibiganiro bisesengura icyateye jenoside bibukiranya amateka sylidio sebuharara

title: hagarika gushidikanya gihe wizeye kuko bikubuza umugisha wawe
content: yakobo kuko umuntu w’ imitima ibiri anamuka inzira ze zose bigenda gute igihe ushidikanyije gukora ikintu imana yakubwiye gukora uwo muhanganye ahita atera intambwe mbere bisobanura satani ahita agusimbukiraho ako kanya niba ushaka kubaho ukwizera menya gushidikanya umuco mubi kandi wagobye gukura inzira yawe gushidikanya kuza igihe utabashije gufata umwanzuro decision kubyo imana yakubwiye cyangwa ibya gufashije nyigisho uba gusoma bibliya itubwira umuntu umeze gutyo umuntu utagira umusimamo iyo umuntu ugira ibitekerezo bibiri gushidikanya kwizera ikintu kimwe mwanya umwe umwanzuro ufata nawo ucikamo kabiri uba ushaka kubaho kwizera igihe nabwo uba ushaka nabwo kurengera ubwoba uba ufite bibazo byawe yego mu urundi ruhande nk’ umuntu uba ubona ntayindi nzira isigaye kugira utabarwe kuko uba waragerageje inzira zishobaka zose nk’ umwana w’ umuntu ariko menya ko imana igira inzira nyinshi wizera icyo imana ikuvuzeho uwundi mwanya ubwoba nabwo bukaza bukabigukuramo kubera ntaho ushobora kugera bityo bikarangira gutabarwa kw’ imana ubonye kandi byari biri mu inzira biza uyu munsi urasabwa gutera ishoti n’ ingufu nyinshi gushidikanya ufite cyangwa ujya ugira nkuko umukinnyi w’ imupira amagura awamurura hanze gihe ikipe yatsinze atashaka babishyura igitego babatsinze nawe watsinze igitego satani kuko imana yavuganye kubwi inyigisho imana yakoherereje kugira umenye umugambi wayo wowe kugutabara tangira gufata umwanzuro mwiza kwizera imana yawe kandi utangire gushyira ibikorwa ijambo ry’ imana riri kugusaba gukora kandi unakomeze kubibika wowe kuko n’ ejo uzabikenera mu igihe wumvise gushidikanya kwongeye kugaruka uhite ukoresha nabwo izina kuko kibazo rira gishoboye wita umwnya kuko uwo muhanganye ari uruhande rwawe zamukira ukwizera ukomeze nzirakuko kurusha uwo muhanganye sataniintambwe ijya imbere akaba yasigaye inyuma yawe kubera kwizera ugize imana iguhe umugisha ushobora kohereza nyigisho inshuti zawe kugira nazo zibone mahirwe kugerwaho n’ ijambo ry’ imana iminsi itari cyumweru kandi ushobora twandikira email estachenibyahoocom or whatsappkandi ngombwa ushobora kutubwira utubazo muhanganye natwo munsi tukaba twabafasha kutwereka imana ubu butumwa mubugezwaho n’umukozi w’imana revev eustache nibintije umunyeshuri patriots bible university leta zunze ubumwe amerika abinyujije minisiteri y’ivugabutumwa yise nibintije evangelical ministries yigisha ijambo ry’imana nkuko imana yamuhaye muhamagaro ikamwuzuza ubwenge kugira agirire abantu benshi umumaro turagukunda nibintije evangelical ministries international

title: miss rwanda nishimwe agiye guhindura uburyo umushinga guhangana kwiheba azawukoramo
content: ku gashyantare nishimwe naomie yatsindiye ikamba miss rwanda mukobwa wahise anabona itike kwitabira irushanwa miss world afite umushinga kurwanya kwiheba rubyiruko cyane yasanze ikibazo gikomeye kandi akenshi abantu badaha agaciro kugeza ntabwo nyampinga w’u rwanda nishimwe naomie arabona uburyo gutangira gukora neza umushinga yabiteguye bitewe n’imbogamizi nyinshi yagiye ahura nazo zirimo iziterwa n’ibi bihe kurwanya ikwirakwira coronavirus gusa munsi mukobwa yasobanuye uburyo agiye guhinduramo azakora umushinga kiganiro cyitwa the overdrive yagiriye radio munsi uyu mukobwa yabwiye ikiganiro the overdrive zimwe mbogamizi yahuze nazo yavuze covid yabangamiye umushinga kwita kubafite ibibazo mutwe depression agiye gushyira imbaraga gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga anashyireho umurongo utishyurwa gufasha abafite depression indi mbogamizi miss nishimwe naomie yahuye nayo kwita bafite depression abenshi bayifite badakunze kuvuga bameze by’ukuri bafashwe kuyivamo ngo nubwo yahuye n’imbogamizi gushyira bikorwa umushinga manda izarangira ageze kubyo yiyemeje munezero martin umwanditsi w’ikinyamakuru umuryango yatangiye gukorera kinyamakuru nzeli imbuga nkoranyambaga ze instagrammartin promoterfacebookmunezero martintwitter martin promoter

title: brd yaje mwanya gatatu ma banki atsura amajyambere afrika
content: brd yaje mwanya gataatu n’amajwi ikurikiye african export and import bank misiri yaje mwanya mbere ifite amajwi ndetse ibile holdings ltd nigeria yaje mwanya n’amajwi umuyobozi mukuru brd jack kayonga avuga mwanya babonye uzatuma banki irushaho kugirirwa ikizere n’abayigana ikarushaho kugira isura nziza ruhando rw’andi ma banki umuyobozi mukuru brd yavuze banki itegura gahunda yayo ikurikije ibikubiye cyerekezo izakomeza gushora imari yayo buhinzi uburezi ubucuruzi hanze y’igihugu n’ubukerarugendo kayonga yagize duhisemo gutera inkunga umushinga w’ubuhinzi tuwutera inkunga byiciro byawo byose urugero nk’ikawa tuzitera inkunga ihingwa ryazo kuzitunganya ndetse kuzicuruza hanze y’igihugu banki y’u rwanda itsura amajyambere igeze mwanya gatatu afrika ivuye mwanya iriho umwaka ushize iyi banki ikora nk’iyigenga ifite inshingano guteza imbere abayigana ihuriro nyafurika rihuza ibigo n’amabanki bitsura amajyambere rigenzura ibijyanye n’imiyoborere ubukungu ndetse n’imikorere gutanga amanota bigo n’amabanki bitsura amajyambere ihuriro ry’uyu mwaka ryahuriye repubulika iharanira demokarasi congo ritanga amajwi bigo by’imari bigera ndetse n’amabanki jean noel mugabo

title: ibuye ryaturutse kwezi ryashyizwe cyamunara miliyoni z’amadolari
content: iri buye rikomeye nk’urutare bikekwa rishobora kuba ryaravungutse kwezi bitewe n’ukugongana n’umubumbe muto cyangwa ikindi kintu bigize isanzure rikavungukaho rikagwa butayu sahara icyo kintu cyiswe nwa bikekwa ryo buye gatanu bunini yavuye kwezi yabashije kugaragara isi habarurwa agera biro amaze kuboneka isi yavuye kwezi umuhanga siyansi n’amateka karemano james hyslop yavuze iby’agaciro kuba nk’umuntu yatunga biganza bye ikintu azi neza cyaturutse wundi mubumbe buryo ibintu udashobora kwibagirwa yabwiye reuters ni igice gito cy’ukwezi kijya kungana n’uko umupira w’amaguru ungana ariko kijya kuba kirekire kurutaho ntabwo haramenyekana umuntu watahuye buye butayu sahara nyuma kuhagera rikoze intera y’ibilometero uturutse kwezi ryakoreweho ubushakashatsi biza kwemezwa ryaturutse wundi mugabane abahanga bamenye neza inkomoko yaryo nyuma kurigereranya gihanga n’amabuye abashakashatsi b’abanyamerika bavanye rutare kwezi icyogajuru apollo cyajyaga isanzure myaka icyo gihe abanyamerika bakuye kwezi amabuye angana n’ibiro rutare rwaho abahanga bavuga gake cyane amabuye nk’aya ushobora kuyabona isi ndetse nibura rimwe mabuye igihumbi gusa niryo wasanga ryaravuye kwezi buryo cyafashwe nk’ikintu kidasanzwe ingoro ndangamateka nyinshi ziba zishaka kubika mabuye buryo abashaka kwiga iby’isanzure bajya bazisura bakayabona

title: amateka uduhigo n’udushya byaranze imikino rayon sports imaze gukina apr fc
content: kuri kabiri tariki gicurasi nibwo habaye umukino w’amateka wahuje apr fc rayon sports ikipe apr fc irandagazwa bikomeye mukino uhuje makipe ahora iteka ahanganye twifashishije icyegeranyo ruhagoyacu turabagezaho amateka n’uduhigo twaranze imikino makipe yagiye akina kuri kabiri tariki gicurasi nibwo habaye umukino w’amateka wahuje apr fc rayon sports ikipe apr fc irandagazwa bikomeye mukino uhuje makipe ahora iteka ahanganye twifashishije icyegeranyo ruhagoyacu turabagezaho amateka n’uduhigo twaranze imikino makipe yagiye akina imwe mibare y’ingenzi wamenya hagati y’amakipe yombi mu myaka imaze ishingiwe mulindi byumba apr fc ifite ibikombe shampiyona harimo n’icya shampiyona ishize rayon sports yashingiwe i nyanza myaka ishize ifite ibikombe iheruka yagitwaye mwaka w’imikino yatwaye nyuma y’imyaka itagikozaho intoki guhangana makipe yombi si ubuhanga kibuga gusa kuko n’ak’abafana katiburira yewe akenshi usanga bakaniye umukino kurusha abakinnyi abafana rayon sports bita apr fc igikona n’ abafana apr fc bita rayon sports gasenyi umwaka wonyine makipe yabashije guhuramo inshuro nyinshi dore yahuye inshuro marushanwa atandukanye ibintu bitigeze bibaho mateka y’aya makipe yombi bikunda kuvugwa ahuzwa leta ntashobora gukina umukino gishuti yiteguriye ubwayo muri rusange ufashe imikino shampiyona ukongeraho n’andi marushanwa kipe zagiye zihuriramo n’imikino gishuti n’ubwo itabaye inshuro nyinshi usanga rayon sports apr fc zimaze guhura inshuro muri nshuro zose hamwe rayon sports yatsinzemo imikino ikipe apr fc itsindamo imikino zinganya imikino muri mikino habonetsemo ibitego harimo ruhande rayon sports n’ibitego ruhande apr fc n’ubwo kipe yarabashije gutsinda indi kabiri kikurikiranya shampiyona apr fc yashoboye gutsinda ikipe rayon sports kabiri yikurukiranya inshuro ebyiri shampiyona ishize gitego - mukino ubanza - mukino kwishyura bwa mbere apr fc yabashije gutsinda imikino ibiri itandukanye ihura rayon sports mukino shampiyona wahuje makipe yombi kuya apr fc yanyagiyemo rayon sports ibitego - iza kuyisubira iyitsinda - mukino wateguwe ferwafa rwego kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka shyirahamwe ryari rimaze ryemewe fifa indi nshuro hari nyuma y’uko lionnel st pleux ukinira azam tanzaniya afashije apr fc inyuma igatsinda rayon sports - shampiyona gihe yaje kuyitsinda mikino yombi cy’igikombe cy’amahoro yazihuje mwaka ikipe rayon sports ifite agahigo yabashije gutsinda ibitego byinshi mukino umwe kuko yabashije kunyagira apr fc ibitego - ubugira kabiri n’ abakinnyi n’abatoza bagiye bigaragaza mikino jimmy gatete wabashije gukinira makipe yombi ufite agahigo gutsinda ibitego byinshi mukino uhuza amakipe yombi dore buri kipe yayitsindiye ibitego bine mikino itandukanye sina jerme bakinnyi babashije gutsinda ibitego byinshi mukino amaze gutsinda ibigera gihe masudi djuma wabashije gutsindira apr fc ibitego byinshi bigera bitanu kugeza tariki gicurasi mukinnyi warabashije gutsinda ibitego mukino umwe makipe yombi yahuye nyamara aka gahigo katwawe kasirye davis watsinze ibitego rayon sports yanyagiye apr fc mbere abakinnyi barimo sina jrme bokota labama lionnel st pleux ruhinda farouk bokungu ndjoli kambale salita gentil n’abandi bagiye batsindamo ibitego mukino wabaga wabahuje umutoza washoboye gutoza imikino myinshi hagati y’aba bakeba raoul shungu watozaga rayon sports wabashije gutoza imikino yahuzaga makipe abasha gutsindamo atsindwa anganya ndayishimiye eric bakame yaciye ikipe apr fc mbere y’uko yerekeza rayon sports mu gihe rundi ruhande ngabo albert bizimana djihad usengimana faustin ntamuhanga tumayine tity djamar mwiseneza apr fc barakiniye rayon sports uretse abakinnyi tuvuze haruguru bagikinira makipe yombi ntawakwirengagiza amazina jimmy gatete bokota labama haruna niyonzima janot witakenge masoudi djuma hategekimana bonaventure bita gangi nizigiyimana kalim makenzi fuade ndayisenga muganza isaac n’abandi benshi bagiye bakinira amakipe yombi ibihe by’ingenzi byaranze mikino ku itariki i nyamirambo mukino nyuma w’igikombe cyari cyateguwe n’ icyahoze kaminuza nkuru y’ u rwanda unr rwego gukusanya inkunga gusana ibyari byangijwe n’ inkongi kamunuza rayon sports yabashije gutsinda apr fc ibitego - yongeye kuyisubira i remera stade amahoro mukino kuyishyikiriza igikombe shampiyona imaze kwegukana mwaka none rayon sports yongeye gutsinda apr fc ibitego - abayobozi abafana n’abakinnyi apr fc ntibazibagirwa itariki kanama shampiyona rayon sports yabanyagiye ibitego - ikaza gutwara igikombe shampiyona ibarusha inota rimwe mwaka ifite amanota gusa nabo baje gutegereza munsi bababariza ikipe rukari mukino nyuma w’igikombe cy’amahoro bitego - hari kuya nyakanga mu nshuro amakipe yombi yahuriye cecafa bagiye banganya gusa apr fc igasezerera rayon sports hitabajwe amapenaliti apr fc yabashije gutsinda rayon sports ibitego byinshi yayitsinze - mukino wateguwe ferwafa rwego kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka shyirahamwe ryari rimaze ryemewe fifa ikipe zombi zongeye kunganya mukino nyuma w’irushanwa ryateguraga shampiyona ryiswe lotto cup ukwakira mutarambirwa djabir atsindira abambara umukara n’umweru abambara ubururu bishyurirwa djamar mwiseneza apr itwara igikombe itsinze penaliti - rayon sports mu - gikombe cy’amahoro apr fc yatsinze rayon sports ibitego - cy’irangiza apr fc yatsindiwe lionel saint preux kabange twite papy faty impozamarira rayon sports yatsinzwe hamiss cedric mu - apr fc yatangiye umwaka w’imikino itwara igikombe cy’isabukuru y’imyaka fpr itsinze mukino nyuma rayon sports ibitego - ibitego byose byatsinzwe gice kabiri apr fc itsindirwa ruhinda farouk watsinze bibiri n’aho ikindi gitsindwa cyubahiro jacqueshategekimana aphrodis kanombe atsindira rayon sports impozamarira mu mukino shampiyona kwishyura wabaye tariki werurwe rayon sports yanyagiye apr fc ibitego - bitsinzwe hategekimana aphrodis kanombe hamisi cadric kambale salita papy kamanzi watsinzemo ibitego bibiri mu nshuro amakipe yombi yahuyemo apr fc yabashije gutsindamo ebyiri rayon sports itsinda banganya indi apr fc itsinda rayon sports penaliti hari cecafa y’amakipe yabereye i kigali kanama apr fc yatsinze umukino waherukaga guhuza amakipe yombi ukabonekamo intsinzi hari itariki yatsinze rayon sports ibitego -
