title: akarere rubavu karishimira ibikorwa by’amajyambere kagezeho
content: mu bikorwa byamuritswe harimo umuhanda uhuza imipaka yombi y’u rwanda repubulika iharanira demokarasi kongo grande et petite barierre ukazatwara akayabo k’amafaranga akabakaba miliyoni ndetse n’ umuhanda pave ujya biro by’akarere watangiye gukorwa munsi umuyobozi w’akarere sheh bahame hassan yavuze akarere kabwiye rwiyemezamirimo imodoka zikora mihanda zitazasubirayo utugari tutazikoresheje dusane uduhanda tujya hasuwe kandi umusozi wimuweho imiryango kubera ikibazo cy’isuri yicaga abahatuye gihe cy’imvura uyu musozi murenge gisenyi guterwamo ibiti binyuranye bifata ubutaka hakazubakwamo uduhanda intebe n’ibitare kuruhukiramo mukerarugendo iki gikorwa kizatwara amafaranga miliyoni bavuye musozi ubuyobozi b’akarere rubavu bwasuye akagari karukogo umurenge rubavu birebera ibikorwa ndengera foundation uyu muryango wubatse amasoko y’amazi agemurira abaturage amazi meza ndetse n’ibitaro kijyambere umuyobozi w’akarere yasabye umuyobozi ndengera foundation gufatanya n’akarere bakareba masoko y’amazi yakwaguka abaturage benshi bakavomaho abayobozi banagejejwe ahari kubakwa amashanyarazi ako kagali jean berchmas bahige ukuriye ewsa rubavu yasobanuye mashanyarazi azagera baturage tugali twa byahi kanembwe karukogo ibarizwa mirenge rubavu cyanzarwe bahige yashimangiye mashanyarazi afite ingufu zihagije zizafasha abaturage kwivana bukene bahige yagize mushinga wizwe neza ibikoresho byose birahari igikorwa cyose gikoreshwa n’amashanyarazi kizahakora kirahari mpungenge hasuwe n’isoko ryo ako kagali ariko rizatangira gukorerwamo mutarama nyuma y’ubunani uru rugendo rwasorejwe isoko kijyambere ry’akarere rubavu riri kubakwa mujyi rwagati murenge gisenyi imirimo kubaka soko iracyari hasi ariko irimo kwihutishwa kugira rizatangire gukoreshwa title: saka baka bluez yakoze indirimbo irikuvugisha benshi yahurije hamwe abahanzi mozambiquevideo
content: umuhanzi w’umunyarwanda saka baka bluez yakoze indirimbo kuvugisha abatari bake kumbugankoranyambaga uyu muhanzi ukomoka rwanda asigaye mozambique yanahurije hamwe abahanzi gihugu bagakorana indirimbo irigukundwa benshi mukiganiro sakabaka yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru ibyamamarecom yatubwiyeko ndirimbo muzikunzwe mozambique yakozwe n’aba producer babiri harimo mozambique witwa master flash wafashe amajwi barick rwanda watunganyije beatumudiho amashusho yafashwe nando muteto sakabaka yaduhamirijeko amashusho y’iyi ndirimbo arikurwego hejuru kuko yafashwe n’ibyuma bigezweho bifata amashusho mukireredrone iyi ndirimbo bahanzi bise rap de luxo amashusho yayo yafatiwe kirwa bita ponta do ourogiherereye majyepfo mozambique rap de luxo bisobanuye rapu irikurundi rwego ururimi rw’igiporutigari gikoreshwa cyane gihugu abahanzi bumvikana ndirimbo umunyarwanda sakabaka hamwe n’itsinda r bulla musik umuhanzi ukomeye witwa kico da kivu boi wax ndoreko boi wax kanda hano wumve ndirimbo saka baka bluez umwe mubahanzi bavuye rwanda bakunzwe munjyana hip hopyakoranye n’abahanzi bazwi barimo joddy phibi pacson p-fla umugabo wubatse afite umugore n’umwana yanakoze indirimbo yitiriye mwana yise niyo afatanyije kico da kivu saka baka bluez yakoreye nzu itunganya umuziki yamamaye cyane hano rwanda bmcg yayoborwaga n’umugabo witwa barick

title: papa francis yahinduye musenyeri diyosezi nyundo
content: papa francis umushumba kiliziya gatolika yatoye padiri anaclet mwumvaneza umunyamabanga mukuru caritas rwanda gusimbura musenyeri alexis habiyambere buyobozi diyosezi nyundo nk’uko bitangazwa n’urubuga vatikani newsva musenyeri alexis habiyambere w’imyaka asimbuwe kubera yasabye gusezera kuko ageze bukuru padiri anaclet mwumvaneza yavutse ukuboza avukira i murambi paruwasi rulindo arkidiyosezi kigali hagati yize amashuri abanza i rulindo ayarangije akomeza ajya iseminari nto kabgayi guhera mwaka mu kigero cy’imyaka yaje gusubira iseminari nto i kabgayi cyiciro cy’abigaga bakuze musenyeri habyarimana alexis wasimbuwe kubushumba diyoseze nyundo nyuma y’imyaka yatangiye iseminari nkuru i rutongo - ahavuye yakomeje cyiciro filozofiya - akomereza tewolojiya - seminari nkuru nyakibanda diyosezi butare yahawe isakaramentu ry’ubusaseridoti nyakanga ubutumwa bwe yabukoreye paruwasi kabuye - paruwasi y’umuryango mutagatifu mwaka - yavuye agiye gukomeza amasomo i roma hagati y’umwaka akaba yarahavanye impamyabumenyi y’ikirenga by’amategeko kiliziya mwumvaneza anaclet ugiye kuba umushumba diyoseze nyundo agarutse rwanda yakoze ubutumwa bwe paruwasi kicukiro - akaba n’umwarimu iseminari nkuru nyakibanda yabaye kandi umuyobozi caritas arkidiyosezi kigali hagati y’umwaka guhera mwaka akaba umunyamabanga mukuru caritas rwanda musenyeri alexis habiyambere ucyuye igihe yatangiye kuyobora diyoseze nyundo guhera mwaka yanditswe akayezu snappymuhaburarw

title: i kigali hagiye kubera ibirori bishya by’imideli ikorerwa rwanda
content: ibi birori byiswe cretos fashion experience byitezweho kuzagaragaza imyambaro y’amoko atandukanye ikorerwa rwanda biteganyijwe kuba guhera saa kumi n’ebyiri z’umugoroba itariki nyakanga villa portofino hotel mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru mugabushaka jacqueline hellevik wabiteguye yagarutse bikorwa bitandukanye asanzwe akora yibanda ntego afite kubona uruganda rw’ibijyanye gukora imideli rwanda rwagutse yagize ibi dukora intego njyewe mfite bizajya bijya hanze bikerekana ishusho y’u rwanda kugira bigume dukomeze kwibaza umwambaro runaka umuhanzi runaka umunyamideli runaka ariko rimwe ntihazagire ikintu kigera hanze nifuza kuba umwe bazabiharanira kugira bariya hanze bave hariya baze ahubwo twe tujye tubasangayo tubashyiriye dukora hakizimana abdallah uyoboye imyiteguro y’ibi birori yagize ni ibirori bizaba bifite intego kugaragaza imideli ikorerwa rwanda kuyitangaho amakuru ikindi cy’ibanze hakabamo kwerekana ubushobozi bw’abanyarwanda ruganda rw’imideli ngira nayo ntego kugaragaza dushobora kwikorera imyambaro itaduhenze tutarindiriye iy’abanyamahanga ijya kugera inaha ihenze mugabushaka avuga nubwo hakiri ibikibabera ingorabahizi kuzamura uruganda rw’imideli ariko badacika intege ahubwo bifuza gukomeza gukorana imbaraga bongeramo n’udushya kugira bagere bifuza bamaze kubona abanyamideli umunani basanzwe bazwi rwanda bazamurika imyambaro bakora nubwo batararangiza gutoranya bazakorana ku rundi ruhande yavuze ashaka imyambaro bakora izabasha kuzajya ihatana rwego mpuzamahanga kandi myambaro ikoze buryo bunyuranye butari bitenge gusa nkuko hari abishyiramo ibitege bikoreshwa gusa afurika gukora imyenda uyu mugore avuga yabaye umunyamideli by’igihe kirekire rwanda ndetse akaba n’umwe bamuritse imyambaro itandukanye ibirori by’ubu bwoko bicyaduka gihugu nubwo nyuma yaje kujya gukomereza umwuga i burayi mugabushaka wiyemeje kugaragaza imbaraga z’abanyarwanda gukora imyambaro myiza kandi ihendutse yagarutse rwanda aje gushinga uruganda rwayo yise cretos productions akora imyambaro itandukanye bitambaro biva mahanga ariko akayiha ishusho yifuza n’ibiciro biri hasi y’ibyo mahanga ibijyanye kumurika imideli yabyinjijemo n’umwana witwa roxanne hellevik umaze kugaragaza impano birori bitandukanye bikomeye mugabane w’i burayi paris fashion week london fashion week istanbul fashion week n’ibindi bitandukanye

content: umugabo witwa habarurema jean claude bakundaga kwita gasore bikekwa atwaye magendu y’inkweto yarashwe n’ umupolisi amasasu ane ahita apfa umugabo witwa habarurema jean claude bakundaga kwita gasore bikekwa atwaye magendu y’inkweto yarashwe n’ umupolisi amasasu ane ahita apfa byabereye kagari kijote umurenge bigogwe karere nyabihu saa sita z’amanywa gatanu tariki nzeri ababonye biba babwiye tv mugabo usanzwe acuruza inkweto modoka ituruka rubavu igana musanze afite agafuka karimo imiguru y’inkweto yabona polisi ibahagaritse agafata agafuka ke akiruka nabwo umupolisi yahise amwirukaho akamurasa amasasu ane nabyo byamuviriyemo urupfu abo baturage bagaragazaga umujinya mwinshi bavuga umupolisi yamwirukankanaga yamurashe amasasu abiri amuhusha nyuma akaza kumurasa andi abiri yamaze kumugeraho ndetse akaba yabanje kumukubita inshyi ebyiri ni ibintu abaturage bavugaga byabarakaje cyane nayo mpamvu bashatse gukora igisa n’imyigaragambyo bagahagarara muhanda banga umurambo w’uwishwe utwarwa nubwo bitamaze akanya umuvugisi polisi y’u rwanda cp john bosco kabera yavuze makuru ariyo koko abapolisi bacunze umutekano muhanda bahagaritse imodoka hakavamo umuntu ufite igikapu akiruka umupolisi yamurasa isasu rigafata cyico ku bivugwa n’abaturage muturage amasasu abiri nyuma yayarashwe yamanitse amaboko buryo yashobora gufatwa atishwe umuvugizi polisi avuga harimo gukorwa iperereza harebwe koko mupolisi kazi yaba yakoresheje imbaraga z’umurengera akaba yabibabazwa abaturage bifuza gihe byazagaragara mupolisi yakoze ibidakwiye yazaza kuburanishirizwa ruhame kuko aribyo byabereka koko ntawe hejuru y’amategeko n’uwemerewe guhutaza umuturage uyu habarurema jean claude bakundaga kwita gasore wapfuye arashwe n’umupolisi nubwo yarasiwe murenge bigogwe karere nyabihu asanzwe atuye murenge nyakiliba karere rubavu yasize umugore n’abana batatu

title: bugesera barayagwiza arishimira ubuvugizi yakorewe n’itangazamakuru none akaba abanye neza n’umufasha
content: mu minsi ishize nibwo itangazamakuru muhaburarw ryasuye umusaza barayagwiza charles avuga ikibazo cy’amakimbirane muryango bikaba ngombwa atandukana n’umugore akajya arara mifukaariko ikibazo w’imyaka y’amavuko utuye mudugudu rukindoakagari kagengemu murenge mayange ho karere bugesera amaze imyaka cumi n’itanu arara mifuka nyuma kugirana amakimbirane nuwo bashakanye witwa zaninka beatrice w’imyaka y’amavuko umunyamakuru yaramusuye bagirana ikiganiro amubwira ikibazo ke akorerwa ubuvugizi inzego zitandukanye zinjira kibazo kirakemuka bityo bakaba umuryango wishimye kandi wishimiwe mu buryo bugaragara nkaba ndikumwe n’umukecuru wanjye kiryamo kimwe makimbirane yakomeje avuga rwose babanye neza ibibazo ubuyobozi umurenge bwabihaye umurongo bakaba batuje batimaje kandi bashima imana yongeye kubahuza nyuma y’myaka isaga makumyabiri batabana yagize atirwose nyuma y imyaka makumyabiri natashye urugo rushya ntaho wadutandukanyiriza n’abageni bamaze iminsi mike bashinze urugo buriya iriya myaka myinshi muntu uziko byacyemuka tukongera kubana mahoro masa nkaya ku ruhande rw’umukecuru nyirazaninka yabwiye muhabura rw ashima imana amakimbirane afitanye n’umugabo yakemutse bakaba babanye neza kibazo yagize atindi umukristo adpr nahoraga nsenga imana nsaba yansubiranya n umugabo wanjye akava meson mbi yarimo ubuyobozi umurenge mayange bukaba bwaragize ikibazo icyabo bakagishyiramo imbaraga bakagicyemura buryo twishimiye twese mu myanzuro y’ikibazo makimbirane umurenge wafahe umwanya kuganiriza abashakanye bombi ariko mbere mbere hafatwa umwanya kubanza kubohereza title: itangazo ry’ibyemezo by’inama y’abaminisitiri tariki
content: none kuwa mbere tariki kamena inama y’abaminisitiri idasanzwe yateraniye village urugwiro iyobowe nyakubahwa perezida repubulika paul kagame none kuwa mbere tariki kamena inama y’abaminisitiri idasanzwe yateraniye village urugwiro iyobowe nyakubahwa perezida repubulika paul kagame inama y’abaminisitiri yemeje imyanzuro y’inama y’abaminisitiri itariki kamena inama title: u rwanda rwisanze itsinda rimwe nigeria gushaka itike afrobasket
content: ikipe y’igihugu y’u rwanda y’umukino basketball y’abagabo yisanze itsinda ririmo nigeria mali mikino gushaka itike y’igikombe afurika fiba afrobasket fiba afrobasket izabera rwanda nyuma y’uko rutsinze senegal cte d’ivoire repubulika iharanira demokarasi congo matora gutoranya igihugu kizakira rushanwa rigiye kuba nshuro riba nyuma y’imyaka ine kuri gatanu tariki ukuboza nibwo habaye tombora y’uburyo amakipe azahura majonjora gushaka itike umuhango wabereye kigali arena witabirwa n’abarimo perezida basketball africa league bal amadou fall perezida fiba africa anibal manave umunyamabanga uhoraho minisiteri siporo shema maboko didier ndetse n’abandi bahagarariye amashyirahamwe basketball bihugu byabo barimo mugwiza dsir uyobora ferwaba uduce turindwi zone tugize fiba afrique nitwo tuzakina imikino y’amajonjora ibanziriza gushaka itike amakipe azaba mbere mutarama akaziyongera yandi makipe yitabiriye rushanwa ryari ryabereye tunisia sngal ayo makipe yamaze kubona itike y’amatsinda angola camerouncentrafrique cte d’ivoire repubulika iharanira demokarasi congo misiri guine mali maroc mozambique nigeria sngal tunisia uganda ndetse n’u rwanda ruzakira imikino nyuma itsinda mbere irya gatatu n’irya gatanu azatangira imikino tariki kugeza gashyantare gihe andi abirimo arimo n’iry’u rwanda azatangira tariki ugushyingo kugeza ukuboza amatsinda atanu akazakinira rimwe imikino nyuma tariki kugeza gashyantare buri tsinda rizavamo amakipe atatu azabona itike kujya fiba afrobasket izabera rwanda kanama uko amatsinda ateye itsinda a tunisie centrafrique rdc ndetse n’ikipe izatsinda zone itsinda b sngal angola mozambique ndetse n’ikipe izatsinda zone itsinda c cameroun cte d’ivoire guine ndetse n’ikipe izatsinda zone itsinda d nigeria mali u rwanda ndetse n’ikipe izatsinda zones itsinda e maroc misiri uganda ndetse n’ikipe izatsinda zone

title: menya byinshi munyabitangaza padiri ubald uvugwaho kutishimirwa kiliziya gatorika
content: padiri ubald rugirangonga amaze kwamamara rwanda hanze kubera impano idasanzwe afite gusengera abarwayi bagakira ubumuga butandukanye n’indwara zikomeye ziba zarananiye abaganga b’inzobere yibazwaho byinshi n’abatari bacye ahanini bitewe n’umwihariko afite akora gusa minsi biravugwa kiliziya gatorika yaba itishimiye akora ndetse inyigisho ze zikaba zaranenzwe n’ubuyobozi kiliziya isi kuko hari amabaruwa yavuye i vatikani amunenga kwigisha ibifitanye isano politiki nk’aho akangurira abantu gutanga imbabazi n’ubumwe n’ubwiyunge ese ubundi muntu ki ni umupadiri diyosezi cyangugu ariko azenguruka ibice bitandukanye by’igihugu asengera abantu akanagera bihugu bitandukanye hirya hino isi akora murimo gukiza abarwayi akoresheje isengesho aho bizwi mupadiri ajya gusengera abantu uruvunganzoka imihanda batwaranira kudatangwa n’amasengesho padiri ubald padiri ubald yavukiye cyahoze segiteri rwabidege paruwasi mwezi komini karengera perefegitura cyangugu hari kwezi gashyantare bivuga afite imyaka y’amavuko muri nkuru turabagezaho ibintu by’ingenzi ukwiye kumenya mupadiri utarangarirwa benshi bw’impano n’ingabire yahawe kuva akiri muto ubuzima padiri ubald bwashinze imizi kiliziya gatorika padiri ubaldi yabatijwe kiliziya gatorika uruhinja rw’ukwezi kumwe gusa ukuvuga werurwe amashuri nayo yayize bigo by’abiyahe imana gatorika abanza yayigiye i rwabidege kugeza atangira ayisumbuye seminari ntoya i mibirizi ndetse ayakomereza iseminari nto yitiriwe mutagatifu piyo nyundo kugera yahungiraga i burundi ibibazo by’ivangura ry’amoko ntibyamworoheye dore mwaka w’ byamutwaye umubyeyi se umubyara byakomera bikaza gutuma ahungira i burundi mwaka w’ akaza kuharangiriza seminari nto yaje kugaruka rwanda mwaka w’ ahita akomeza amasomo iseminari nkuru nyakibanda ayirangije aza guhabwa ubupadiri tariki nyakanga umuhango wabereye iwabo pasuwasi mwezi mu myaka amaze isi imyinshi umupadiri padiri ubald yagizwe umupadiri mwaka w’ afite imyaka y’amavuko bisobanura amaze imyaka umupadiri utabariyemo yanamaze imyaka itari micye abyigira nyuma kumva imana imusaba anyure nzira azayinyuremo yigisha urukundo rwanda muri myaka amaze umupadiri yakozemo imirimo myinshi itandukanye kandi ashimwa benshi kuba yarayikoze neza padiri ubald yarihiye amashuri abana b’abishe umuryango jenoside jenoside yakorewe abatutsi rwanda mwaka w’yabaye padiri ubald umupadiri paruwasi nyamasheke n’ubwo nyuma yaje kwimurirwa paruwasi mushaka ndetse nyuma anahabera padiri mukuru se yishwe mbere jenoside azizwa ubwoko bwe ndetse gihe nibwo padiri ubald yaje guhunga nyuma gutotezwa azira ubwoko ariko akaza kugaruka rwanda nyuma kumva ijwi ry’imana rimusaba kuza kwigisha urukundo abanyarwanda mu nyirizina jenoside yavukije padiri ubald nyina n’abandi benshi muryango nyamara abamwiciye yaje kubababarira ndetse arihira amashuri abana babiri umuhungu n’umukobwa b’abamwiciye umuryango jenoside padiri ubald avuga gutanga imbabazi kimwe bintu bikomeye yakoze buzima bwe kuko byamufashije kubona amahoro mutima kandi icyaha gatozi kuburyo ntawe ukwiye guhora icyaha umubyeyi cyangwa umuvandimwe yakoze cyangwa abe yamurebera shusho yashinze yise sinodi gacaca nkirisitu nyuma gutanga urugero agatera intambwe kubabarira abamwiciye umuryango jenoside padiri ubald yabaye umukangurambaga w’ubumwe n’ubwiyunge diyosezi cyangugu yigisha abantu kubabarirana kongera kubana n’ubwo bitari byoroshye ni umwe bantu bagize uruhare rugaragara gucengeza banyarwanda ubumwe n’ubwiyunge uretse kwigisha abakirisitu kiliziya padiri ubald yanajyaga ma gereza akajya kwigisha abakoze ibyaha kwihana bagasaba imbabazi hanyuma agahindukira akajya gusaba abiciwe kubabarira ababahemukiye uko niko padiri ubaldi yashinze yise sinodi gacaca nkirisitu kwirega gusabana imbabazi byatojwe abaturage paruwasi mushaka diyosezi cyangugu rusange impano gukirisha isengesho abafite ubumuga n’uburwayi budakira imaze kwamamara amahanga uretse kuba rwanda hose bimaze kumenywa benshi amasengesho padiri ubald akiza indwara zananiye abaganga akanavura ubumuga busanzwe budakira mahanga hirya hino bamaze kumumenya kuburyo guhera mpera z’umwaka yagiye leta zunze ubumwe amerika agasubirayo kwezi gashyantare akaba yaragiye akahakorera ibikorwa by’amasengesho benshi bagakira padiri ubald ufite ngabire gusengera abarwayi bagakira avuga arimo gusenga hari yerekwa ndetse akaba abireba nk’ureba filime gukiza abarwayi ntabyiyitirira ahubwo avuga bikorwa yezu wabikoze kera kandi yasubira ijuru agasiga avuze abazamwemera nabo bazakora nk’ibyo yakoze izina rye padiri ubald asobanura byatangiye kuba mwaka w’ ariko gihe akaba yarasengeraga abantu hashira igihe bakazajya bamugaruka imbere bamuha ubuhamya hari uburwayi cyangwa ubumuga bakize kandi bakiriye masengesho nyuma y’imyaka ukuvuga mwaka w’ nibwo noneho yatangiye kujya abona mashusho akerekwa uburwayi bamwe ndetse bagataha noneho bakize asobanura kandi asenga yerekwa uburwayi abantu batandukanye bafite bamwe bagahita batangira ubuhamya bakize abandi bakamushaka nyuma bakamwibwirira bakijijwe n’isengesho rye indwara z’ibyorezo kanseri sida diyabete n’izindi zidakira cyangwa zikira bigoranye hari benshi bagiye batanga ubuhamya bazikiriye masengesho padiri ubald

title: u rwanda rwiyemeje kuzamura ubwikorezi bw’indege
content: nzahabwanimana yafunguraga inama y’iminsi ibiri mugaragaro yiga bijyanye n’ubwikorezi gucunga umutekano ndege yagize guverinoma yihaye intego kwita bwikozi bw’indege kandi izakomeza gukorana n’abafatanyabikorwa kuzamura imikorere y’uru rwego iyi nama kubera i kigali yatangiye kuwa mbere tariki ukwakira yitabiriwe n’abakozi bakora nzego zijyanye n’ubwikorezi bw’indege rwanda yateguwe n’urwego mpuzamahanga ry’indege gisivile ruhuza ibihugu afurika nyanja y’abahinde icao-afi bufatanye leta y’u rwanda nzahabwanimana yavuze ubwikorezi bw’indege ingenzi gihugu nk’u rwanda kidakora nyanja yibukije u rwanda igihugu kigendwa naba mukerarugendo benshi kandi ubukerarugendo bukaba butanga umusanzu kuzamura ubukungu bw’igihugu kugeza mukerarugendo barenga bakoresha ikirere kuza gihugu bukerarugendo mu rwanda hakorera ibigo bitandukanye bikora ubwikorezi kirere nk’ikigo cy’u rwanda gutwara abantu n’ibintu ndege rwandair ndetse hakorera n’ibigo bitwara abantu n’ibintu kirere klm brussels airlinesmu mpera z’uku kwezi kanama rwandair yazanye mbere mugabane w’afurika indege mbere zihanitse bwoko boeing - umunyamakuru kigali today

title: umubare muke w’abaganga utuma batabona umwanya kwihugura
content: uyu munsi abaganga babigize umwuga rwanda bagera gihe mwaka w’ nubwo bwose umubare wiyongereye ariko ababagana nabo bariyongera ibi bituma abaganga batabona umwanya kwihugura akaba nayo mpamvu batagendana n’ubumenyi bugezweho ubwo mahugurwa yateguwe n’ikigo gikurikirana amahugurwa baganga cdp dr innocent gakwaya yatangarije abanyamakuru kuba bake gihugu bibabangamira kubona umwanya kwihugura yavuze rwanda usanga umuganga wabigize umwuga yandikiwe abarwayi barenga ibihumbi icumi dr gakwaya yemeza umuganga amaze imyaka igera itanu atihugura yarasigaye inyuma kuko siyansi y’ubuganga itera imbere bukeye gusa yemera bimeze hari intambwe yatewe ugereranyije n’ibihe byashize minisitiri w’ubuzima dr agnes binagwaho yatangaje minisiteri ayoboye ishyigikira abaganga babigize umwuga bihugura ndetse bakanakora ubushakashatsi kuko aricyo gituma intego bihaye buzima zigerwaho ati umuganga wese uzashaka kujya kwihugura hanze tuzamushyigikira buryo bw’inkunga kuko bituma natwe dukorera abaturage ibijyanye n’igihe tugezemo umuyobozi w’ishyirahamwe ry’abaganga rwanda rwanda medical association dr steven rulisa yatangaje ishyirahamwe ryabo riri muryango w’abaganga isi iryo shyirahamwe rifite inshingano gukurikirana imikorere buri munsi y’abaganga kumenya ikigero cy’ubumenyi bafite bakanabafasha kucyongera iri shyirahamwe ryatangiye rivuga inshingano buri muganga ukora mwuga kuba shyirahamwe kubera inyungu ze n’iz’abamugana umunyamakuru kigali today

title: kigali hateguwe igiterane kizagaragaramo theo bosebabireba n’abavugabutumwa bakomeye
content: itorero inkuru nziza paruwasi gihogwe murenge jali akarere gasabo ho mujyi kigali ryateguye igiterane cy’ivugabutumwa kizitabirwa n’umuhanzi w’icyamamare ndirimbo kuramya guhimbaza imana theo bosebabireba n’umuvugabutumwa evangelist pastor irene ndetse n’abandi pasiteri banyuranye torero bazaba bafashwa kwinjira mwuka n’amakorali atandukanye itorero inkuru nziza paruwasi gihogwe murenge jali akarere gasabo ho mujyi kigali ryateguye igiterane cy’ivugabutumwa kizitabirwa n’umuhanzi w’icyamamare ndirimbo kuramya guhimbaza imana theo bosebabireba n’umuvugabutumwa evangelist pastor irene ndetse n’abandi pasiteri banyuranye torero bazaba bafashwa kwinjira mwuka n’amakorali atandukanye iki giterane kizaba gifite insanganyamatsiko iboneka mutwe w’amagambo bibiliya gitabo matayo - aho imana ikangurira abakozi bayo kujya imihanda bigisha abantu ubutumwa bwiza ndetse bakanabatiza abemera abateguye giterane babwiye ikinyamakuru ukwezicom giterane kizaba kirimo ubuhanuzi ndetse asaba akabirisitu by’umwihariko torero kuzaza kwifatanya nabo kuramya guhimbaza imana ndirimbo masengesho usibye umuhanzi theo bosebabireba uzaririmbira abazitabira giterane hazaba kandi hari pasiteri bakomeye torero barimo ev pastor irene pastor fred ndetse n’amakorali arimo vuzimpanda choir ijwi ry’impanda choir ibyiringiro choir ndetse n’inshuti yesu choir iki giterane kikaba kizaba cyumweru tariki ugushyingo i jali karere gasabo ahari torero ry’inkuru nziza paurwasi gihogwe

title: nyabihu amaze imyaka icyenda asaba kurenganurwa nyuma y’aho akarere kamugurishirije inzu
content: habiyambere simeon utuyeumudugudu kazuba akagari kijote murenge bigogwe amaze imyakaicyenda asiragizwa n’akarere kibazo cy’inzu kateje cyamunaraikanagurwa n’abakozi bako uyu wahoze ngabo z’igihugu akaza gusezererwa amazekwandikira inzego zose kugera perezidanzi ubu gihirahiro nyumay’amezi atatu urwego rw’umuvunyi rusabye akarere guha umurongo ikibazo cyenone amaso akaba yaraheze kirere mu ibaruwa urwego rw’umuvunyi rwandikiye akarere tarikiya ugushyingo rwasabaga akarere gutanga raporo y’uburyo kakemuyeikibazo habiyambere uru rwego rwasaba akarere kubikora minsi noneamezi abaye atatu gusa hashize ibyumweru bibiri meya nyabihu avuga koibaruwa yamaze gutegurwa kandi bagiye kuyoherereza urwego rwabandikiye arikoumuturage ntarahabwa kopi rwego rw’umuvunyi ntibaraduhamiriza kobayibonye habiyambere avuga yayubatse inzu kibanzayahawe n’ubuyobozi anayubaka bureba nyuma akarere kanamusabye kuvugururaarabikora iyi nzu yubatse santeri kora muhanda wakaburimbo ugana rubavu yegeranye n’inzu zahoze iz’umunyaburayi witwa pakiwakoraga ibikorwa by’ubuhinzi turere tunyuranye tw’u rwanda nyuma ubuyobozi bw’akarere nyabihu bwaje kwemeza koibikorwa paki bitezwa cyamunara haza kugurishwa miliyoni n’ibihumbimagana abiri mirongo itanu rwfs mu gusohora ibyangombwa by’ubwobutaka habiyambere yisanze inzu n’ubutaka bye nabyo byarahawe uwatsindiyeicyamunara uwagurishije n’uwaguze abakozi b’akarere muri kibazo havugwamo abakozi b’akarere batejecyamunara n’abayitsindiye abameya bamaze kuba batatu basimburana nyamara abobakozi baracyahari nibo babazwa amakuru ajyanye n’ikibazo bagizemo uruhare ndayambaje william niwewahagarariye icyamunara akaba umukozi w’akarere nyabihu ushinzweubutakaland administrator zawadi valentin niwe watsindiyeicyamunara umukozi w’akarere murenge kabatwa nyabihu nyirasafari solange umugore wazawadi cyamunara iba ashinzwe irangamimerere etat civil murenge wabigogwe ahaherereye mutungo ubwo habiyambere asiragira asabakurenganurwa nyirasafari umujyanama w’akarere by’amategeko akaba arinoteri legal advisor and notary twahirwa jean baptiste akora mukarere serivisi z’ubutakaland survey akaba yarandikiye umunyamabanganshingwabikorwa w’akarere mutungo scientifiquement anavuga byaribiteganijwe mafaranga ava cyamunara miliyoni eshatu zagombagaguhabwa umwe baturage bafite inzu butaka habiyamberesimiyoni mu gusoza baruwa twahirwa agira nyuma title: hari amadini n’amatorero agiye gufungwa bitarenze gatatu w’iki cyumweru
content: ubuyobozi bw’akarere gasabo bwaburiye amadini n’amatorero buzafunga insengero zitubahirije ibisabwa bitarenze gatatu w’iki cyumweru bubasaba kugira ibyangombwa by’ikigo cy’igihugu cy’imiyoborere rgb icyemezo cy’akarere umuyobozi w’itorero agomba kuba afite uburenganzira bumwemerera guhagararira iryo torero imyubakire y’urusengero igomba kuba itateza ibibazo abaruteraniramo ntibyemewe kandi guteranira nyubako ikirimo kubakwa urusengero rugomba kugira parikingi itarimo umukungu n’icyondo rugomba kuba rwubatse byibura buso bungana hegitare ntibyemewe gusengera shitingi hagomba uburyo kwirinda urusaku rusohoka hanze ntibyemewe gukorera nzu yagenewe guturwamo icururizwamo cyangwa igize umudugudu utuwemo insengero zitegetswe kandi kugira ubwiherero byibura ibyumba bine n’ahantu hafatirwa amafunguro hasukuye mu gusoma amabwiriza umuyobozi w’akarere gasabo stephen rwamurangwa yagize ubwiherero butameze neza bwonyine burahagije kuba itorero ryahagarikwa ati insengero zitubahirije mube muzifunze kugira zibanze zitunganye ibitameze neza gihe tubahaye kuko igenzura rirakorwa kabiri hanyuma gatatu amabwiriza azashyirwa bikorwa ubuyobozi bw’akarere gasabo n’inzego zishinzwe umutekano bavuga hari abantu bashobora guteza umutekano muke bitwaje kujya gusenga rwamurangwa yavuze bazagera bakanereba abantu bigisha kuko hari n’abigisha batazi b’abapagani atiariko murumva bitumvikanye neza kurushaho pasteri ntambara innocent uhagarariye itorero bita success umwe bahagarariye amadini n’amatorero uvuga cyemezo gitunguranye ati ku bijyanye n’insengero zaba zifite virusi guteza umutekano muke gihe zigomba guhabwa ariko turasaba iryo tsinda rigenzura ryagenda gahoro kuko insengero zubahirije muvuze nke cyane ubuyobozi bw’akarere gasabo buvuga gisibya hari insengero zitangira gufungwa bitarenze gatatu tariki gashyantare ku rundi ruhande ikigo gishinzwe imiyoborere rgb nacyo cyahise gitangariza abanyamakuru kigiye kongera ibisabwa amadini n’amatorero rwego gukaza umutekano w’abayasengeramo yanditswe niyomugabo albert

title: intwaro z’ingenzi abanyarwanda bifashishaga guhangana n’ibyorezo by’inzara n’indwara
content: hari ibyorezo bitandukanye byagiye byibasira u rwanda birimo nk’indwara z’umuze gusogobwa byahitanye abatagira ingano iyima mutara semugeshi hari indwara y’ubushita yateye gisaka ngoma mibambwe sentabyo hari ibindi biza byaje u rwanda rwar ruhanganye n’ubukoloni hagati y’umwaka n’uwa muri bihe u rwanda rwibasiwe n’indwara z’amatungo zirimo uburenge iragara muryamo n’amashuya hateye kandi indwara z’abantu zirimo mugiga ubushita n’ibihara haza gutera inzara karundura zahitanye abatagira ingano zirimo muhatibicumuro ruyaga rumanura gakwege rwakayihura ruzagayura n’ubwo byorezo byazaga bikidegembya ndetse hakaba n’ibimara iminsi itari mike ntibyabuzaga abanyarwanda bafata ingamba kubitsinda ubutazagaruka mu murage gihanga yahaye u rwanda ihangwa ry’igihugu gasabo yahaye abazamukomokaho n’umuryango mugari w’abenegihugu umurage ukomeye ugomba kugenga imiyoborere y’igihugu n’imibereho n’imibanire y’abanyarwanda myaka amagana n’amagana azaba atakiriho imitekerereze- murage gihanga yabaga inakubiye mihango y’ubwiru yakorwaga rwego kohera ibiza bizaza gihugu mu rwanda ha mbere bagiraga amahame y’imiyoborere imibereho n’imibanire akurikira gukunda imana yaremye u rwanda n’abanyarwanda gukunda u rwanda nk’umurage ukomeye ugomba kubungabungwa gukunda gukeza umwami cyangwa se kubaha kumvira ubuyobozi kubaha kurengera ikiremwamuntu n’urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima kugendera mahame kirazira kugira utinya n’ibyo wubaha ayo mahame niyo ngenderwaho kwesa imihigo y’ibyo babaga barahize kugeraho ibihe byose muri mahame habonekagamo intwaro zikomeye zifashishwaga guhangana n’ibiza ibyorezo by’inzara n’indwara z’abantu n’amatungo izo ntwaro zarimo gukunda kuramya umwami nubwo mvugo yakoreshwaga ityo bihe ha mbere yabaga ishaka kugaragaza abanyarwanda bahawe umurage w’ihame ryo gukunda kubaha ubuyobozi bwabo ibyo bikabarinda amakimbirane kurwanira ubuyobozi kubangamira gahunda leta iyo ikaba ariyo nkomoko-muzi kumvira abayobozi kw’abanyarwanda nayo mpamvu gihe cy’amatora kubashyiraho biba bimeze nk’ubukwe yandi mahanga amatora akaba intambara zihitana benshi kumvira ubuyobozi kw’abanyarwanda kwababereye intwaro idasaza yabafashije guhangana n’ibyorezo bikaze byabaga byarazengereje igihugu iyo ubuyobozi bwafatanga ingamba kurwanya kwagiriza byorezo abaturage bazakiranaga yombi bikanaborohera kuzishyira bikorwa kuko zabaga zatanzwe n’ubuyobozi bakunda kugira kirazira mu murage w’abanyarwanda batojwe kugira baziririza bibafasha kwigengesera bakora kugira ubushishozi bubatoza kudakora cyangwa se kiriya izo kirazira nizo zabafashije guhangana n’ibyorezo byadukaga gihugu kuko babibonaga nk’ibizira bigomba kwirindwa bakabirwanya bivuye inyuma

title: ruhango abaturage bifatanyije n’abandi kwibuka jenoside nshuro
content: uyu muhango karere ruhango watangijwe n’urugendo rwabaye mutuzo rwitabiriwe n’abaturage benshi baturutse mujyi ruhango berekeza rwibutso rw’akarere banaboneyeho umwanya kunamira imibiri isaga ibihumbi ihashyinguye nubwo hari byinshi byagezweho abacitse icumu aka karere basabye bafashwa bijyanye n’ubuvuzi kuko hagenda hagaragara abacitse icumu bagihura n’ibikomere batewe jenoside kuri nshuro hibukwa abazize jenoside yakorerewe abatutsi karere ruhango hazibandwa gufasha abacitse kwicumu babashakira imibereho myiza nk’uko byatangajwe n’umuyobozi karere ruhango mbabazi xavier francois ikindi kizibandwaho minsi kwibuka ugutunganya inzibutso ziri hirya hino karere ruhango zitaratunganywa uhagarariye ingabo z’u rwanda karere ruhango yasabye imbaraga zakoreshejwe guhagarika jenoside nazo zakoreshwa guteza imbere abacitse icumu eric muvara

title: umwana w’umukobwa yagiye kwidumbaguza mazi ahasiga ubuzima

title: umutoza mukuru w’ikipe apr fc yishimiye cyane imyitwarire rutahizamu byiringiro rague
content: umutoza mukuru w’ikipe apr fc mohammed adil erradi yishimiye cyane imyitwarire ruatahizamu byiringiro rague avuga umukinnyi ugenda akura umunsi munsi yaba mutwe ndetse buryo bw’imikinire ibi adil yabitangaje nyuma y’uko musore amutsindiye ibitego byatumye babona amanota bayakuye i muhanga batsinze as muhanga mukino w’umunsi shampiyona y’icyiciro mbere umwaka w’imikino - adil yavuze lague umukinnyi ukiri muto ugenda azamura urwego rwe umunsi munsi byongeye akaba akiri umwana bityo umwe bakinnyi barimo kumushimisha yagize atirague yatsinze ibitego lague umukinnyi mwiza agenda umukinnyi mukuru umunsi munsi agenda akura mutwe umunsi munsi lague umukinnyi ukiri muto ugenda uvamo umukinnyi mukuru umunsi munsi nishimiye kuba yarahamagawe ikipe y’igihugu adil kandi yakomeje avuga n’ubwo yashima rague kuba yatsinze ibitego ariko ntabwo yakwibagirwa akazi k’ikipe hamwe rusange bitego yatsinze byose bituruka musaruro w’uko bakoreye hamwe nk’ikipe

title: rubavu abakene’ batunganya umudugudu w’icyitegererezo barataka bambuwe
content: abaturage bakennye kurusha abandi murenge nyamyumba karere rubavu barataka bamaze amezi atandatu batishyurwa imirimo bakora gutunganya umudugudu w’icyitegererezo kandi nyamara bahawe akazi bikenure abaturage bagera bikorwa gukora imihanda kagari kinigi murenge nyamyumba kugira umudugudu w’icyitegererezo wahateganyijwe ushyirwe bikorwa uyu mudugudu w’icyitegererezo abaturage gukora bavuga bazi akamaro kawo kuko imihanda gukorwa izatuma bagera iterambere ariko nanone ntibikwiye kuba urwitwazo kubambura bizimungu theogene ukuriye ibikorwa kuvugurura gusana umuhanda gatyazo-kabiza yavuze ikibabaje kurushaho mirimo yashyizwemo abakenye kurusha abandi babone babona kubatunga ariko bakaba bakora ntibishyurwe yagize imirimo dukora iraduhombeje pe kuko bampisemo nk’umuntu utishoboye gahunda vup ngira nzishyurira abana amashuri mituweli none baratwambuye twarahebye ahubwo batubwire dukorera ubuntu nabyo tubimenye abenshi twafashe amadeni none tugiye gufungwa ibi bibazo byose umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa wmurenge nyamyumba habimana martin avuga yamaze kubivuganaho n’ababishinzwe buyobozi bw’akarere rubavu bakaba baremeye ikibazo bagiye kugikemura indatwanet

title: police hc yegukanye igikombe cy’u rwanda
content: iri rushanwa risoza umwaka w’imikino handball ryitabiriwe n’amakipe atandatu y’abagabo police fc yongera kugaragaza ubuhangange bwayo mukino itsinda amakipe kugeza mukino nyuma amakipe atandatu yitabiriye iryo rushanwa agabanyije matsinda abiri irya mbere ririmo police kigoma sfb nyuma guhura hagati yayo police hc yagize amanota menshi ihita ibona itike gukina umukino nyuma apr hc mu itsinda kabiri hakomeje apr hc nyuma kurusha amanota kaminuza y’u rwanda kie zari kumwe nayo itsinda umukino nyuma hagati police apr hc wagaragayemo imbaraga n’ishyaka mpande zombi warangiye police itsinze apr bigoranye manota police fc yabaye iya mbere yahawe igikombe n’imipira ibiri gukina apr yabaye iya kabiri sfb yabaye iya gatatu zihabwa umupira umwe gukina umuyobozi wungirije ishyirahamwe ry’umukino handball rwanda antoine ntabanganyimana avuga ibihembo byabaye bitoya kuko batabashije kubona abaterankunga iri rushanwa ubusanzwe ryitabirwa n’amakipe y’abagabo ndetse n’abagore ariko iry’uyu mwaka ryitabiriwe n’abagabo gusa kuko amakipe menshi y’abagore yatumiwe ariko akanga kwitabira ntabanganyimana avuga impamvu yatumye makipe atitabira agizwe ahanini n’abanyeshuri kandi bakaba biruhuko bikaba byaragoranye amakipe y’ibigo bakinira abohereza nyuma y’igikombe shampiyona police handball club yatwaye igikombe cy’u rwanda ikaba yarihariye ibikombe byose byakiniwe rwanda kuko marushanwa atandatu yabaye mwaka w’imikino police fc yagekanyemo ibikombe bine n’ubwo ariko yagiriye ibihe byiza rwanda police hc ntabwo yitwaye neza mikino y’igikombe gihuza amakipe yabaye mbere iwayo afurika yabereye maroc kuko yarangije irushanwa mwanya nawo nyuma theoneste nisingizwe

content: u rwanda ruri bihugu demokarasi kongo burundi afrika y’epfo zambia india sierra leone ethiopia rwanda liberia tanzania guatemala nepal pakistan mozambique cambodia resotho vietnam kenya malawi china brazil nigeria uganda gambia senegal ghana byibasiwe n’ihindagurika ry’ikirere ariko ruza mwanya kane bihugu byafashe ingamba zihamye guhangana n’icyo bibazo kugikemura nkuko umuyobozi action aid rwanda josephine uwamariya abitangaza rwego gufasha abanyarwanda kurwanya inzaraumuryango action aid international wahisemo gufasha abagore bakora umwuga w’ubuhinzi rwanda ubu ubushakashatsi bugaragaza abagore bagize by’abantu bitabira ibikorwa by’ubuhinzi rwanda ibi nibyo byatumye imbaraga nyinshi zishyirwa bagore rwego kubafasha kuzamura umusaruro w’ubuhinzi kuko byagaragaye babwitabira kurusha abagabo rwanda uwamariya yatangaje imbaraga z’abagore zitewe inkunga zagira zitanga bityo umusaruro w’ubuhinzi ukiyongera akaba mpamvu zatuma inzara icika burundu rwanda ndetse n’abaturage bakihaza biribwa safari viateur

title: urubanza rw’ubujurire bagosora bagenzi ruzacibwa tariki ukuboza
content: bagosora nsengiyumva barajuririra igihano cy’igifungo burundu bahawe kubera ibyaha jenoside n’ibindi byaha byibasiye inyoko muntu ntawukulilyayo yajuririye igihano cy’igifungo cy’imyaka yakatiwe kubera uruhare yagize jenoside ku itariki ukuboza nibwo bagosora wahoze ayobora ibiro minisitiri w’ingabo yakatiwe nyuma guhamwa n’ibyaha jenoside ibyaha byibasiye ikiremwamuntu n’ibyaha by’intambara birimo kwica uwari minisitiri w’intebe agathe uwilingiyimana n’abandi basirikare b’ababiligi onu bagosora anashinjwa kugira uruhare ishyirwaho bariyeri hirya hino kigali gisenyi hagati y’itariki mata nsengiyumva ukuriye ibikorwa gisirikare gisenyi yahamijwe ubwicanyi bakorewe kaminuza mudende paruwasi nyundo ndetse n’ubwicanyi bwakorewe abasivili gice ayoboye yanahamijwe kandi kuba yarohereje ibitero by’interahamwe bisesero kwica abatutsi bagosora nsengiyumva baburanishirijwe igihe kimwe hamwe n’abandi basirikare babiri aribo brigadier-general gratien kabiligi major aloys ntabakuze kabiligi yahisevarekurwa ntabakuze ajurira rubanza rwabaye itariki werurwe urubanza ntabakuze rwaje gutandukanywa n’urwabandi nyuma y’aho uwamwunganiraga mategeko umunyamerika peter erlinder ananiriwe kwitaba urukiko tariki werurwe ubujurire bwe bwaje gusomwa tariki nzeri na nubu buracyakomeza ntawukulilyayo yakatiwe igihano cy’igifungo cy’imyaka kubera uruhare yagize bwicanyi bwakorewe kibuye n’i butare umunyamakuru kigali today

title: perezida kagame abu dhabi nama yiga iterambere
content: perezida paul kagame umwe bakuru b’ibihugu n’abandi bayobozi bakuru bahagarariye guverinoma bagera baturutse hirya hino isi bageze mugi abu dhabi leta zunze ubumwe z’abarabu nama mpuzamahanga yiga iterambere rirambye ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu byatangaje perezida kagame n’intumwa mbere bifatanya n’abandi bayobozi barimo abahanga by’inganda abashinzwe gufata ibyemezo n’abandi bayobozi bakuru baturutse mugabane w’isi nama y’uyu mwaka yiga iterambere rirambye bamwe bayobozi bakuru barifatanya perezida kagame nama barimo sheikh mohammed bin zayed al nahyan uyobora gihugu hamwe n’igikomangoma emirate abu dhabi hamwe n’abandi bayobozi isi bikorwa gufungura mugaragaro nama ahaza gutangwa n’ibihembo iterambere rirambye byitiriwe zyed zyed sustainablity prize award’ iyo nama mpuzamahanga iterambere rirambye n’ihuriro rikuru ubusanzwe riterana buri mwaka ryatangiye mwaka ni inama ifasha kwihutisha iterambere rirambye bihugu bitandukanye isi abayobozi bagera gihumbi bayitumiwemo baganira bakungurana ibitekerezo bibazo byerekeranye n’inzego z’ubukungu imibereho myiza y’abaturage ibidukikije ndetse n’uburyo byahindura isi biganisha iterambere rirambye biteganyijwe umukuru w’igihugu yakirwa kandi agirane ikiganiro kihariye mbere gowing nik kibanda nsanganyamatsiko yibanda bimaze gukorwa ntego z’iterambere rirambye rwanda

title: gaerg bizihije umuganura biyibutsa n’amateka yaranze abanyarwanda
content: abanyamuryango gaerg bagera baturutse ntara zose z’igihugu n’umujyi kigali bavuga bahuriye hamwe kwizihiza muganura bishimira bagezeho mwaka ndetse n’ibyo bateganya gukora gatayire marie claire uyobora umuryango w’abanyeshuri barangije kaminuza yatubwiye igikorwa basanganwe guhura nk’abahoze abanyamuryango aerg bakiri ntebe y’ishuli biga bahuzwa gusabana kwishima gusangira ibitekerezo nk’abakomerekejwe n’ingaruka jenoside kugira bareke kwiheba ahubwo bashake icyabateza imbere bakomeze kwigirira icyizere kubaho kandi neza muri muhango bagize umwanya gutega amatwi bamwe basaza bakuze bababwiye inkomoko y’umuganura ndetse n’akamaro kawo muri harimo umusaza gasaza wavuze yavutse ngoma musinga mwaka w’ yababwiye amateka bihe cyane yanakoranye n’abakoloni b’ababiligi imyaka irenga umuyobozi w’intara y’amajyepfo alphonse munyantwari yababwiye bakomeza guharanira ndetse banashyigikira iterambere ry’igihugu ndetse n’iryabo giti cyabo munyantwari yababwiye byiza barushaho gukomeza gushyigikirana kuko gushyira hamwe cyabananira yagize mukwiye kurenga mwaciyemo bitari byiza nubwo amateka ntawayajugunya mugakomeza kwiteza imbere ndetse mugateza imbere n’urwababyaye uyu muryango ugizwe ahanini n’abahoze abanyamuryango b’imiryango aerg y’abanyeshuri bacitse icumu bigaga kaminuza batangaje batangiye gukora ibikorwa by’iterambere bizafasha abanyarwanda b’ingeri zose cyane cyane kugira uruhare kwigisha amateka n’umuco nyarwanda bashinze ishuri bise uruhongore’ rizagira uruhare kwigisha abana b’abanyarwanda umuco n’amateka by’igihugu cyabo ndetse rikazanafasha kuzamura impano buri mwana gerard gitoli mbabazi jean pierre twizeyeyezu

title: ubuzima buhagaze bute mujyi gisenyi bihe kurwanya
content: umujyi gisenyi uherereye karere rubavu ntara y’uburengerazuba bw’urwanda uhana imbibi n’umujyi goma burasirazuba repubulika demokarasi congo wafashe ingamba kongera isuku guhangana n’abatubahiriza amabwiriza yashyizweho rwego kwirinda ubwandu n’ikwirakwizwa ry’icyorezo coronavirus uyu mujyi wiganjemo ibikorwa by’ubucyerarugendo n’urujya n’uruza rw’ubucuruzi bwambukiranya imipaka minsi byarahagaze wambuka ajya i goma wucaracara mujyi ngendo zidafite akamaro n’ubigerageje ahura n’urukuta rw’abashinzwe umutekano gusa nkengero zaho abaturage baragendagenda ntacyo binona mu ngamba zafashwe harimo iz’uko buri mucuruzi w’ibiribwa ashyiraho abantu bakarabira akambara utwenda turinda intoki n’utwenda dupfuka umunwa ndetse hagati y’umuguzi hakabamo intera metero ngamba kugeza magingo benshi ntibumva akamaro kazo n’uwatinya kuvuga hamwe zitubahirizwa gato amasoko y’ibiribwa ararema ufite agafaranga akabasha kugura ashyira nda gusa hari abayobozi b’imidugudu usanga birukanka bagore bacururiza dusoko duto hari n’aho abacuruza ibiribwa ndetse serivisi zitumanaho bafungishwa n’inzego z’ibanze masaha y’amanywa ibintu byinubirwa cyane dore n’abo bayobozi uba ubona bwirinzi bafite bwatuma coronavirus itabafata ingendo zitari ngombwa urujya n’uruza rwarahagaze mujyi gisenyi rwagati urebye abantu muhanda abafite berekeje kw’isokokwa mugangakuma banki n’ahandi hantu ha ngombwa gusa hari n’abagendagenda barambiwe kuguma rugo cyangwa ugasanga bateraniye kumabaraza mihanda baganira ibintu bishobora gukwirakwiza icyi cyorezo gihe cyagera mujyi imibereho ihagaze ite bihe benshi baturage mujyi gisenyi n’abakora akazi gatandukanye higanjemo abakora ubucuruzi butandukanye bwambukiranya umupakaabakarasiabafundi n’abayedi n’abandi bakora akazi nyakabyizi baryaga bavuye gupagasa minsi barataka inzara kuko ntaho gukura kurya ubujura bumaze gufata indi ntera ibisambo byitwikira ijoro bigatobora amazu y’abaturage hari bategera abantu bakabashikuza utwabo harimo ahitwa cyanika byahirugerero n’ahandi aba batabona ifunguro ry’umunsi bavuga ubuzima busa n’ubwahagaze bagatakambira leta n’abagiraneza kubagezaho ifunguro kuko ntacyo kurya bafite birumvikana bahahiraga harafunzwe n’uwemerewe gukora ibinyuranyije n’amabwiriza leta rwego guhangana n’icyorezo coronavirus mubaganiriye ibyamamarecom bavuga ingamba leta y’urwanda yafashe guhangana n’icyorezo koronavirusi nziza ariko hakwiriye kurebwa ngaruka zikomeye zirimo n’inzara abaturage guhura nayo ingamba leta yafashe nziza cyane kuko cyorezo giteye ubwoba ariko tugiye kugwa nzu kubera inzara nkanjye naryaga mvuye gukora ubuyede goma nirirwa nzu mfite abana n’umugore mba nzu y’ubukode kurya birakomeye abagiraneza batwiteho undi muturage utuye mbugangali yemeza ubuzima busa n’ubwahagaze kuko nk’aho akodesha nyiri nzu yatangiye kumwishyuza ubukode ntago byoroshye mba nyiri nzu yatangiye kunyishyuzamfite abana batatu kurya n’ikibazo nyiri nzu sinamurenganya atunze umuryango munini kandi inzu niyo yamutungaga gusa yihangane nzaba mwishyura n’ubwo benshi bataka inzara ariko banishimira kuba leta yatangiye gahunda kubandika bahabwe imfashanyo bakaba basaba inzego z’ubuyobozi kuba maso kuko mw’iyandika ryabazahabwa imfashanyo hatangiye kugaragaramo amanyanga inzego z’ubuyobozi zizashyiremo ubushishozi cyane turikwandikirwa mw’isibo ugasanga harandikwa nyir’amazu abapangayi ntibandikwe bamwe ntibazwi kandi bahatuye igihe kirekire ikindi ugasanga nk’umuntu udafite icyiciro cy’ubudehe ntiyanditswe kandi by’ukuri bamwe baraje gupagasa bishyura mituweli by’iciro by’ababyeyi hazabeho gushishoza uyu muturage agira urugo rufite rurusha urundi rwagitanga tugafasha inzego zacu n’abayobozi bacu kugoboka abatishoboye kugira tuzasohoke cyorezo wishwe n’inzara s’abataka inzara gusa kuko nk’abivuriza bitaro bikuru gisenyi bavuga nabo batoroherwa haba kubagezaho ingemu ndetse gutaha basezerewe bitaro bagasaba hashakwa uburyo byakorwamo neza ibaze gusezerera umubyayi wabyaye abazwe kugera rugo n’bintu bikomeye cyane kuko modoka zitwara abagenzi moto n’ukuri bishobora gutera ikibazo gikomeye umubyeyi bashake uburyo nk’umubyeyi yajya afashwa kugera rugo ntago wakumva ukuntu kugeza ingemu hano bitaro bigorana nzira biba bikomeye cyane bijyanye gutambuka numva harebwa uburyo abantu bajya boroherezwa gutambuka nzira ubuyobozi bw’akarere rubavu buvuga ibibazo biri baturage hirya hino buri kubikurikirana bugasaba abaturage gutuza kugirana urukundo ufite arusha mugenzi akamufasha kandi hagakurikizwa amabwirizwa yashyizweho kwirinda coronavirus ubuyobozi buvuga abashaka gutanga n’ibiba ukuri bifatwa nk’ibinyoma kugeza igihe umuntu yiboneye ukuri kokoaha twavuga nk’ibyabaye munsi mwaka urubuga google rwatangazaga rwafunguye serivisi gmail kohereza ubutumwa internet ariko kubera benshi bazi umunsi kubeshya ntibigeze babiha agaciro kugeza igihe baboneye koko ukuri uyu munsi ariko ufite n’ingaruka zikomeye haba mibanire buzima n’ibindi abantu bagira ubwoba cyangwa umutima woroshye babeshywe munsi bamwe bishobora kubaviramo guhungabana bikomeye ndetse bamwe bikanabaviramo gupfa n’ubwo rwanda bitajyanye n’umuco munsi umaze kumenyerwa ndetse benshi bawizihiza babeshyanya ndetse bitangazamakuru muco wamaze kuhagera dore hari amakuru amwe atangazwa nyuma bakaza kuvuga byari ibinyoma bijyanye n’uyu munsi umunsi kubeshya ufite sura ki muco nyarwanda uyu munsi n’abanyarwanda bamwe bamwe bakaba bawizihiza babeshya buryo butandukanye nta wuzi abanyarwanda babikuye cyangwa igihe batangiriye kubikora ariko hari abavuga bawukuye bakoloni kuko munsi zageze bihugu by’i burayi kera rucagu boniface umuyobozi w’itorero ry’igihugu avuga munsi kubeshya utemewe bitewe n’uko uhabanye n’indangagaciro z’umunyarwanda rucagu boniface mu muco nyarwanda abanyarwanda barangwa kuvugisha ukuri kubeshya biri ndangagaciro zacu iby’abazungu hari igihe wabeshya ugirango kwizihiza munsi nyuma bikakugaruka ukaba wahita utakarizwa icyizere ugahita utakaza ubunyangamugayo ukaba wakwisenyera urugo n’izindi ngaruka mbi

title: irinde gukora ibi mbere kurushinga
content: hari itandukaniro rikomeye mugukundana fiance ndimi z’amahanga ndetse n’igihe mwamaze kwemeza mugiye kurushinga niyo mpamvu hagati y’abamaze gufata icyemezo kurushinga hari byinshi bagomba guhagarika gukora gihe bagitegereje umunsi w’ubukwe ngo byiza kugira amategeko ugomba kubahiriza mbere y’uko urushinga kuko kwemeranwa muzabana bitavuze mwabanye hari byahinduka uramutse utubahirije bikurikira wikwishyiraho umupaka ngo nyuma kugira umukunzi ndetse mukaba mwaranafashe icyemezo kurushinga n’iby’ingenzi gushyiraho umupaka nshuti zawe zindi ariko ntiwishyireho umupaka utangire kwanga inshuti zawe kuko mwumvikanye bishobora gupfa ni byiza kwitonda ugashishoza gusa ugomba cyane cyane kwirinda umubano n’inshuti zawe cyane mudahuje igitsina hagarika gukora imibonanompuzabitsina n’ibindi bijyanye nayo ni ngombwa kumenya wenda gushinga urugo kandi bikaba byiza ubaye isugiku gitsina gore cyangwa imanziku gitsina gabo kuba wakomeza gukora imibonanompuzabitsina cyane cyane n’izindi nshuti zawe byagusenyera urugo ndetse intego zanyu ntimuzigereho wikumva warushinze byarangiye itonde nibyo rwose wowe n’umukunzi wawe mwamaze gufata icyemezo ariko ntibyari byaba murushinge haracyabura igihe n’iyo cyaba gito wigabanya umubano n’umukunzi wawe wumve byarangiye ahubwo uracyafite byinshi kumenya neza muteganya kurushinga kugira muzabane umuzi neza cyane wikwita kubyo wumva hirya hino ubikurikize iyi n’inama ikomeye benda kurushinga gihe muba mwitegura kubana akaramata uba ugomba kugira byinshi witondera kumva cyane cyane igitsina gore mu gihe wenda kurushinga uzabwirwa byinshi n’abantu batandukanye ugirwe inama n’inshuti zawe ndetse n’abandi itondere inama ugirwa kuko zishobora kugusenyera hagarika kubwira amabanga umukunzi wawe ndetse n’abandi hari amabanga akomeye utagomba kubwira umukunzi wawe bitewe n’imvamvu runaka zishobora kuzana agatotsi mubano wanyu ndetse ntunagomba kubwira amabanga yawe izindi nshuti zawe zose ziteguye kukumva witekereza gukunda byarangiye uterere agati ryinyo si byiza rwose kugabanya gukunda mwemeje kurushinga witurize kumwereka urukundo mbere wiringiye mwafashe icyemezo ahubwo gihe kongeramo umunyu wirekeraho kumuha urukundo ahubwo kora ushoboye kose uzane udushya rukundo wikwemera ibyari byose udafitiye ibimenyesto bifatika kwemera ibyari byose udafitiye gihamya bishobora kukugusenyera rwose gihe witegura kurushinga ubwo ugomba kubaza umukunzi wawe ikintu cyose utumva ukamusobanuza neza kugira muzabashe kubana neza ntawishisha undiibyo bimwe ugomba kwirinda gukora gihe wamaze kufata icyemezo kurushinga kugira umubano wanyu uzagenge neza kugeza mubanyeyanditswe ukurikiyimfura leoncemuhaburarw

title: inama y’umutekano isi yavuze makimbirane y’u rwanda uganda ibya coronavirus n’ibindi
content: inama y’umutekano isi yateranye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga video conference rwego kwirinda icyorezo coronavirus yagarutse myitwarire y’ibihugu karere k’ibiyaga bigari kwirinda cyorezo cyugarije isi hanagaragazwa ubukungu bw’ibi bihugu bukomeje kuzahabwa n’ingamba zafashwe yavuze kandi mubano w’u rwanda uganda umutekano kongo amatora burundi n’ibindi inama y’umutekano isi yateranye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga video conference rwego kwirinda icyorezo coronavirus yagarutse myitwarire y’ibihugu karere k’ibiyaga bigari kwirinda cyorezo cyugarije isi hanagaragazwa ubukungu bw’ibi bihugu bukomeje kuzahabwa n’ingamba zafashwe yavuze kandi mubano w’u rwanda uganda umutekano kongo amatora burundi n’ibindi bbc dukesha nkuru ivuga umwanya munini wahawe abahagarariye ibihugu byabo aka kanama k’umuryango w’abibumbye gashinzwe umutekano isi nyuma raporo yasomwe n’intumwa yihariye y’umunyamabanga mukuru onu karere k’ibiyaga bigari bwana huang xia huang xia yabwiye abagize nama ibihugu by’aka karere bigerageza kurwanya icyorezo covid- ndetse imibare y’abandura n’ubwo izamuka ariko idakabije kugeza avuga ingamba zafashwe zizagira ingaruka zikomeye bukungu busanzwe bujegajega bw’ibihugu by’aka karere kuko ubucuruzi inganda ubukererugendo inama mpuzamahanga n’indi mirimo igize ubukungu bw’ibi bihugu byahagaritswe cyangwa bidakorwa nk’uko bisanzwe aka kanama onu kasabye amahanga gufasha ibihugu aka karere guhangana n’ingaruka z’icyorezo covid- kuko zishobora kunaniza umuhate w’iterambere rirambye n’amahoro karere amakimbirane y’u rwanda - uganda bwana huang xia yavuze n’ubwo hari ibitararangira ariko hatewe intambwe gukemura makimbirane bigizwemo uruhare n’abategetsi b’ibihugu angola dr congo intambwe yatewe amakimbirane yashimwe kandi n’abahagarariye u bufaransa amerika tunisia n’abandi gusa basaba ibihugu byombi byatera intambwe irushije kurangiza makimbirane bwana huang yavuze hari ibikorwa by’iterambere bitanga ikizere ibihugu by’akarere biri gufatanya nko kuba mwaka ushize leta z’u burundi dr congo tanzania zarumvikanye gutangira kubaka inzira gari moshi ihuza bihugu kwihutisha ubucuruzi inyeshyamba burasirazuba dr congo bwana huang yavuze inama z’abashinzwe iperereza bihugu by’u burundi tanzania uganda rwanda dr congo zemeje ubufatanye guhana amakuru kurwanya imitwe y’inyeshyamba burasirazuba dr congo yavuze nubwo hakiri imitwe n’imwe ikomeje ibikorwa kwibasira abaturage burasirazuba congo ariko hari intambwe yatewe kurandura bikozwe n’ingabo dr congo ibi byashimangiwe kandi n’uhagarariye dr congo un watumiwe kwitabira nama uhagarariye ubwongereza nama yavuze ikibazo cy’inyeshyamba burasirazuba dr congo hamwe n’iterambere rirambye ry’akarere byakemuka hahagaritswe ubucuruzi butemewe bwambukiranya imipaka bw’imitungo kamere n’amabuye y’agaciro uyu yasabye kandi ingabo monusco ziri burasirazuba congo zitanga raporo aka kanama z’ibyo zimaze igihe kinini zikora ako gace abagize aka kanama bashimye imibanire n’imikoranire rusange leta dr congo n’ibihugu bituranye ndetse gukemura ikibazo cy’umutekano mucye burasirazuba dr congo banavuga ihererekanywa ry’ubutegetsi mahoro ryabaye dr congo urugero rwiza politiki n’ikizere cy’amahoro karere amatora burundintabwo ingingo yagarutsweho byihariye n’intumwa yihariye y’umunyamabanga mukuru onu aka karere gusa bamwe bahagarariye ibihugu byabo nama bayagarutseho uhagarariye ubwongereza yavuze bafite impungenge z’uko ibintu byifashe mbere y’amatora burundi asaba leta guha urubuga itangazamakuru n’abanyapolitiki gihe cy’amatora kugira amatora azabe atabogamye nicolas de rivire uhagarariye ubufaransa yavuze gihugu gitewe impungenge kuba leta yaratsimbaraye amatora azaba bihe by’icyorezo bwana nicolas avuga ubufaransa bufite impungenge z’ubwisanzure n’imigendekere myiza y’amatora agasaba haba ibikorwa kwirinda icyahungabanya amahoro n’umutekano matora kuko byagira ingaruka karere kose kelly craft uhagarariye leta zunze ubumwe amerika yavuze batewe impungenge kuba abaturage bazitabira amatora gihe cy’icyorezo asaba leta kumenya neza amatora abaye buryo budashyira kaga abayitabira madamu kelly yongeyeho amerika ifite impungenge zirushijeho makuru kuniga ubwisanzure bw’ibitekerezo guhitamo kwishyira hamwe bivugwa burundi ati ibyo byiyongera makuru gufunga kunyuruza kwica iyicarubozo n’ihohotera rishingiye gitsina ubutumwa bwacu leta y’u burundi bukomeje gusobanuka amatora mahoro ubwisanzure uburenganzira buri wese kandi agaragaza amahitamo y’abaturage b’u burundi ingenzi mahoro arambye burundi karere dmitry polyanskiy uhagarariye uburusiya nama yavuze ibihugu karere biri bihe bikomeye guha icyerekezo amateka yabyo bimwe nk’u burundi bigiye matora ati nta gushidikanya ibyemezo biganisha mahoro arambye bigira akamaro byafashwe n’ibihugu ubwabyo ibisubizo bitegetswe n’ibindi bihugu bihugu byigenga ikintu kutihanganira uhagarariye ubudage avuga batewe ubwoba kuba amatora agiye kuba gihe cy’icyorezo cyugarije isi akavuga u burundi bukwiye gufashwa n’amahanga kugira hataba ingaruka zitewe nacyo matora asaba leta y’u burundi nayo gukorana neza omswho n’indi miryango nterankunga kubahiriza amabwiriza gufasha kurwanya cyorezo

title: amateka ubutwari n’ibigwi byaranze fred gisa rwigema umwe ntwari zabayeho rwanda
content: gisa fred rwigema intwari rwego rw’imanzi rumwe nzego eshatu z’intwari z’u rwanda izo nzego eshatu imena imanzi n’ingenzi urwego rw’imanzi narwo fred gisa rwigema arimo rushyirwamo abantu baranzwe n’ibikorwa by’ubutwari bihebuje kandi bakaba batakiriho bakaba baratabarutse bitangira igihugu ibi bikorwa birimo kugaragaza ubwitange batizigama kwigomwa inyungu bwite hashyirwa imbere inyungu z’igihugu zifitiye akamaro gahebuje imibereho rusange y’abanyarwanda ubu turi cyumweru cyahariwe kuzirikana intwari z’igihugu kibanziriza umunsi w’intwari nyirizina uba buri mwaka tariki mbere gashyantare kubera ubutwari kwitanga fred gisa rwigema yaguye rugamba ayoboye kubohora u rwanda itariki ukwakira umugaba w’ingabo rpf inkotanyi rwanda patriotic army-inkotanyi yaguye rugamba kubohora u rwanda yatangije ariko ntarusoze n’ubwo abamusimbuye batigeze bamutenguha tariki ukwakira umunsi utazibagirana w’itangizwa ry’uru rugamba kwibohora tariki ukwakira umunsi fred gisa rwigema atabarutseho yaguye i kagitumba karere nyagatare ntara y’uburasirazuba gisa fred rwigema yavukiye i ruyumba tariki mata yavukiye murenge nyamiyaga ho karere kamonyi ntara y’amajyepfo yabyawe anastase kimonyo gatarina mukandirima ahabwa amazina emmanuel gisa yashakanye jeanette urujeni bakora ubukwe tariki kamena nyuma babyarana abana babiri umuhungu n’umukobwa bakaba gisa junior gisa tetaintambara n’imyivumbagatanyo yabaye rwanda mwaka w’ yaranzwe gutoteza kwica abatutsi ndetse anastase kimonyo se gisa fred rwigema aratotezwa aranafungwa amara umwaka wose gereza nyuma y’uko mubyeyi afunguwe umuryango wabanje guhungira paruwasi gaturika kamonyi nyuma bikomeje kuba bibi bahungira gihugu uganda yakuriye bakigera uganda babanje kuba nkambi y’impunzi ankole nyuma mwaka w’ bimurirwa nkambi kankunge gace kitwa toro kumwe n’izindi mpunzi z’abanyarwanda barahunze intambara gutotezwa kwarangwaga rwanda gihe akigera nkambi fred gisa rwigema yahise atangira amashuri abanza ayarangiza mwaka w’ kuva bwana bwe fred gisa rwigema ntiyumvaga neza impamvu ituma ababyeyi n’umuryango rusange bahunze ndetse yahoraga anababaza impamvu badataha bajye kuba iwabo rwanda bave buhunzi ariko bakamubwira rwanda bitoroshye kuko n’abashatse gutahuka bahuye n’akaga gakomeye karimo gutakaza ubuzima bwabo fred gisa rwigema yakundaga akarasisi gisirikare cyane bigatera umuryango impungenge cyane cyane nyina gatarina mukandirima kuko gukunda ibijyanye n’abasirikare cyane byatumaga bacyeka bishobora kuzamuviramo kureka amashuri akigira gisirikare arangije amashuri abanza mwaka w’ yahise akomereza mashuri yisumbuye yatangiye kigo cyitwa mbarara high school ankore n’ubwo akiri umwana yahoranaga inyota kumenya amateka y’u rwanda kandi yakundaga kuganiriza abantu bakuru nabo barahunze bava rwanda batuye y’ishuri akababaza amateka y’u rwanda mu bantu bakomeye gisa fred rwigema yahuriye nabo mashuri ndetse bakaba inshuti zikomeye bagatandukanywa n’urupfu harimo paul kagame wabaye perezida w’u rwanda kugeza n’ubu amateka y’u rwanda n’ay’ibijyanye kubohora u rwanda ntiwayavuga utibanze cyane nshuti buto zaje kuba icyomoro cyomoye imitima y’abanyarwanda benshi dore imitekerereze gukunda igisirikare kwitanga kwanga akarengane ibintu bahuje cyane biganaga bombi baragendanaga kenshi bagasura abakuru bazi amateka y’u rwanda bagahora bafite inyota kurushaho kumenya igihugu cyabo cy’amavuko kandi bagahora batekereza bazakora kugirango akarengane n’itotezwa bakorewe bihagarare burundu bandi banyagihugu bumvaga bakibikorerwa fred gisa rwigema yakundaga gusoma ibitabo by’abaharaniye kubohora ibihugu byabo kwame nkrumah mao-tse-tung fidel castro n’abandi bagiye abantu b’indashyikirwa isi aho yigaga yahoranaga ishema ryo kwerekana umunyarwanda kandi agakunda kuvugisha biganana ikinyarwanda n’ubwo bavugaga indimi z’amahanga bigaragaza urukundo afitiye u rwanda rwahereye buto bwe mu mwaka w’ fred rwigema nibwo yaje kureka amashuri asanzwe ajya gihugu tanzaniya gukurikirana imyitozo gisirikare politiki bagenzi bahamagajwe yoweri kaguta museveni uyobora uganda washakaga kuzarwanya ubutegetsi bw’igitugu idi amin dada wategekaga uganda gihe muri nyakanga nibwo fred gisa rwigema n’abo kumwe harimo inshuti salim saleh bakomereje imyitozo gihugu mozambike bahuriye n’abandi basirikari barimo col musitu waje kuba umwe basirikare bakuru b’ingabo zari iza fpr-inkotanyi zatangije kandi zikanatsinda urugamba kubohora u rwandafred gisa rwigema yatangiye kumenyekana cyane mwaka w’ nyuma y’intambara yakuye butegetsi umunyagitugu idi amin mu igihe cy’amatora y’umukuru w’igihugu fred gisa rwigema basirikare bakuru bacungaga umutekano yoweli kaguta museveni wayoboraga umutwe upm uganda patriotic movement umutwe ufite umwihariko gihugu kuko utari ushingiye idini cyangwa bwoko nk’uko byari bimenyerewe kuwa gashyantare hamwe n’abandi basore barimo abanyarwanda babiri rwigema fred paul kagame bafatanyije kaguta museveni batangije intambara kurwanya ubutegetsi bw’igitugu obote kuva mwaka w’ fred rwigema yakomeje kuba umwe bayobozi bakuru nra ishami gisirikare rnm yaboneye umwanya gukomeza gutoza intambara abanyarwanda akabwira abanyamahanga yabagamo agaciro kuba umunyarwanda fred rwigema yagiye agira imyanya ikomeye nra ndetse n’uwungirije umugaba mukuru w’ingabo icyo gihe rwigema yasabwe n’ubuyobozi nra kwinjiza abasore barangije amashuri makuru gisirikare abanyarwanda binjiramo benshi babona banatangira imyitozo y’igisirikare kuzabohora u rwanda muri basore harimo kagame paul waje kaba umugaba mukuru w’inkotanyi nyuma y’urupfu fred gisa rwigema kuwa ukwakira aza kuzigeza ntsinzi nyakanga bityo intego kubohora u rwanda iba igezweho fred gisa rwigema n’itsinda ayoboye ry’abasirikare babohoye u rwanda bazirikana ibikorwa by’ubutwari byamuranze abanyarwanda benshi nabo bubaha cyane izina fred gisa rwigema kuko yabuze ubuzima gihe yashakaga kurokora ubwa benshi yanditswe chief editormuhaburarw

title: muhanga ihungabana rikomoka jenoside si iry’abacitse icumu gusa
content: mu biganiro yagiranye n’abanyamuhanga tariki nyirabahire yasobanuye ihungabana imihindukire y’imyitwarire imiterere iterwa n’ikintu kibi kibaye muntu bimutunguye avuga ihungabana riterwa jenoside yakorewe abatutsi ritagirwa gusa n’abacitse icumu kuko n’abandi bashobora kurigira kubera babonye bakoze cyangwa bumvise gihe jenoside umunyamabanga w’inama njyanama y’akarere muhanga avuga n’abatarahigwaga bashobora guhura n’ikibazo cy’ihungabana gihe cy’icyunamo yagize umuntu ashobora guhungabana bitewe n’ibyo yabonye bakorera abicwaga yarahetse intumbi cyangwa imirambo cyangwa yaragize uruhare bwicanyi umuntu wagize uruhare kwica abantu cyangwa kandi karengane arangwa kwiheba agahora yicira imanza ndetse agahora yifuza uwamubaza byabaye kugira abashe kubivuga abyikurimo nk’uko nyirabahire yakkomeje abisobanura yongeyeho benshi banyarwanda bahuye n’ihungabana ariko ngero zitandukanye abanyarwanda hanze y’igihugu hari ababa bumva buri munyarwanda wese umwicanyi ikaba byatera ihungabana rikomeye nk’uko umunyamabanga w’inama njyanama y’akarere muhanga abyemeza gerard gitoli mbabazi

title: muhanga gukoresha internet ntibikiri umwihariko w’abanyakigali
content: cyber caf ikaze nzu z’ubucuruzi internet karere muhanga ubuyobozi bwayo buvuga nubwo bizwi i kigali ariho hari iterambere ikoranabuhanga n’ i muhanga n’aho abantu baryitabira cyane umukozi cyber caf ikaze agira abakiriya baritabira kugura serivisi internet cyane dutangira akazi saa moya mugitondo kugeza saa tatu z’ijoro abakiriya bagihari hari abagura iminota nibo benshi ariko hari n’abagura isaha kugeza masaha agera atatu cyber caf alpha nayo ikorera karere muhanga yakira abaguzi serivisi internet benshi umukozi cyber avuga gihe abanyeshuri mashuri yisumbuye biruhuko babona abakiriya benshi uyu mukozi agira hano i muhanga abantu bitabira bwinshi kugura serivisi internet cyber caf buryo bamwe bahaguruka abandi bicara hari abagura igihe kitageze isaha ariko kandi hari n’abagura amasaha hari igihe munsi tubona abakiriya bagera magana atanu abakiriya bavuga serivisi internet ibafitiye akamaro ariko serivisi itangirwa hakiri hakeumwe rukundo jean aim wiga kigo cy’amashuri yisumbuye mutagatifu yozefu saint joseph mwaka gatandatu agira ubu mba naje kureba utuntu dutandukanye internet cyane cyane amakuru naje kureba neza amakuru y’urupfu mouamar ghadaffi hari igihe mwarimu atubwira aderesi twasangaho ibintu bitandukanye urumva idufasha cyane masomo jean aim yongeyeho hari ikibazo cy’ubuke bw’ama cyber caf ngo hari igihe aza akicara agategereza abandi barangiza gukoresha internet ariko habaye hari cyber nyinshi wasanga hamwe hari abantu benshi ugahita ujya ahandi ubu karere muhanga hari cyber caf eshanu gusa u rwanda ruragenda rutera imbere ikoranabuhanga nkuko bigaragazwa n’ibigo bitandukanye bikora isesengura ikoranabuhanga isi mu mujyi kigali niho higanje ibikorwa by’ikoranabuhanga cyane harimo internet imijyi mito ndetse n’udu santeri tw’ubucuruzi nabyo biri kugenda byitabira ikoreshwa internet ibi bikaba bigaragarira ma cyber caf agenda ashingwa jean baptiste micomyiza

title: mafisango arashaka gukinira rayon sport bokota yanayikozemo imyitozo

title: tigo yafunguye amashami abiri i rubavu
content: rimwe mashami riherereye mujyi rwagati y’isoko irindi shami riri mupaka muto petite barriere w’u rwanda repubulika iharanira demokarasi kongo kevin mukotanyi ushinzwe ibikorwa tigo i rubavu yatangaje gufungura amashami ukwegereza abanyarubavu serivisi batajyaga babona telefoni sim swap tigo cash n’ibindi ngo bikorwa byatinze kubageraho kuko tigo ikiri nshya mikorere mukotanyi yagize hehe n’ingendo kigali-rubavu bafatabuguzi tigo bitegure serivisi batigeze babona ahandi nyuma gufungura mugaragaro ishami ryo mupaka hakurikiyeho igikorwa gutanga amasaha n’amakaramu baturage bitabiriye gahunda binyuze tombola igikorwa gufungura amashami tigo cyari kirangajwe imbere n’umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe ubukungu karere rubavu ezechiel buntu n’umuyobozi mukuru ceo tigo rwanda diego camberos matthew dutrisac ushinzwe ibicuruzwa n’amasoko kugeza tigo imaze kugira abafatabuguzi miliyoni ebyiri nabyo byagaragajwe n’abakozi bayo bazaga bambaye imipira byanditseho ndetse kuzamura intoki ebyiri bivuga miliyoni ebyiri tigo izakomereza gufungura amashami ntara y’iburengerazuba nk’uko mukotanyi yabitangaje pascaline umulisa

title: minisitiri w’ububanyi w’u bubiligi agiye kugira uruzinduko rwanda
content: ambasaderi w’u rwanda bubiligi olivier nduhungirehe yagiranye ibiganiro minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’u bubiligi didier reynders byibanze mubano w’ibihugu byombi n’uko ibintu byifashe karere rusange ibi biganiro byabaye kabiri byibanze kureba akarere u rwanda rubarizwamo gahagaze bijyanye n’umutekano iterambere rusange ambasaderi nduhungirehe yavuze ibiganiro bye reynders byanagarutse ntambwe u rwanda rukomeje gutera iterambere minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’u bubiligi yashimye igihugu cyari cyarasheshwe jenoside kigeze cyiyubaka minisitiri reynders yamenyesheje ambasaderi nduhungirehe ateganya kugirira uruzinduko rwanda karere kwezi gutaha kamena u bubiligi busanzwe butera inkunga u rwanda burezi ubuzima gahunda kwegereza ubuyobozi abaturage mu mpera z’umwaka ushize gihugu cyahaye u rwanda miliyari frw agenewe kugeza amashanyarazi aya mafaranga inyongera miliyoni z’amayero yatanzwe n’u bubiligi bijyanye n’ingufu bitewe n’uko ibihugu byombi byahise bitangiza umushinga guteza imbere ingufu zikomoka mashyuza ibihugu byombi kandi biheruka gushyira umukono masezerano y’inkunga irenga miliyoni y’amayero u bubiligi bwatanze agenewe kujya atangwa nyigo leta ikora bijyanye kwegereza ubuyobozi n’ubushobozi abaturage ubuzima bijyanye n’ingufu yanditswe ubwanditsimuhaburarw

content: ku nshuro mbere mateka liverpool manchester united abake b’ibihe byose bahuriye mukino uefa europa league umukino ubanza liverpool yatsindiye anifield ibitego - naho kwishyura werurwe i oldtraford liverpool iyoboye andi makipe bwongereza kugira ibikombe byinshi championsleague ifite ikurikirwa n’iyi manchester united ifite muri shampiyona manchester united niyo iyoboye kukoimaze gutwara gusa nayho ikurikirwa liverpool ifite ibi nibyo biha uburemere ubukeba bw’aya makipe kuko uu ariwo mukino ukomeye gihugu cy’ubwongerezaibitego - liverpool yatsindiye anifield mukino ubanza byabahaye imbaraga n’icyizere gutegure neza umukino kwishyura ngo intego ukubona igitego kibuga manutd bakica imibare yayo baramutse babigezeho bakabona igitego kimwe man utd yasigara isabwa ibitego bine kugirango isezerere liverpool umutoza liver pooljurgen klopp daniel sturridge roberto firmino bafashije jurgen klopp kwandika amateka gutsinda umukino mbere uhuje makipe mugabane w’i burayi aganira liverpool echo daniel sturrigde yavuzeko bagomba gukina umukino kwishyura nkaho finale icyizere cyose rwambariro kandi twiteguye gukora akazi neza buryo bwose agaciro europa ntikakiri igikombe gusa hariho ikipe itwaye igikombe ihabwa n’ikite kwitabira uefa championsleague ibi nzira liverpool igomba gukoresha kugera champions league yanditswe rukundo xavermuhaburarw

title: bpr yatangije uburyo bushya kohereza kwakira amafaranga
content: ubu buryo bushya bwitwa izi cash butuma umufatabuguzi bpr ukoresha telefone yohereza amafaranga serivisi mobile money abasha kohereza amafaranga wundi muntu wese ufite telefone kabone n’ubwo yaba atari umufatabuguzi w’iyo banki richard ndahiro ushinzwe kwamamaza guteza imbere serivisi nshya bpr avuga ibijyanye kohererezanya amafaranga byorohejwe buryo igisabwa ukuba mwese mufite telefone zigendanwa ariko uwohereza akaba akoresha bpr mobile money yagize ukoresheje telefone yawe ushobora kohereza amafaranga nshuti n’abavandimwe ubundi bagafatira amafaranga atm ibegereye karita bakoresheje uwohererejwe amafaranga abona umubare w’ibanga ndetse n’ingano y’amafaranga yohererejwe ubundi akajya atm agafata amafaranga ndahiro yagize uwohererejwe amafaranga yandika umubare w’ibanga ndetse n’ingano y’amafaranga atm imwegereye agahabwa amafaranga ako kanya bpr ifite abakiriya bagera miliyoni n’ibihumbi ifite amashami agera gihugu cyose akoresha ikoranabuhanga interineti ubuyobozi bw’iyi banki buvuga bitarenze kamena amashami azaba akoresha iryo koranabuhanga jean noel mugabo

title: abanyarwanda batuye canada bibutse abazize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi
content: igikorwa kwibuka kitabiriwe kandi n’abahagarariye ibihugu byabo canada n’izindi nshuti uyu muhango watangijwe n’urugendo walk to remember rwatangiriye nteko ishingamategeko canada rugera biro by’umujyi ottawa ahabereye imihango kwibuka nyuma y’indirimbo zubahiriza ibihugu byombi hakurikiyeho umunota kwibuka inzirikarengane zishwe jenoside padiri callixte kabalisa wayoboye isengesho yasabiye abahuye n’ibibazo binyuranye harimo abafashwe ngufu asaba imana gukomeza impfubyi n’abapfakazi n’abandi bagize ibibazo bikomeye uhagarariye u rwanda canada edda mukabagwiza perezida w’ishyirahamwe ry’abacitse kw’icumu rizwi kw’izina humura alain ntwali bagaragaje bibuka amateka jenoside yabaye rwanda bagamije gufata ingamba ibyabaye ntibizongere kuba ukundi nk’uko itangazo ambasade y’u rwanda canada ribivuga berekanye umuhango ukorwa ugamije kwibuka ariko abantu bakanatekereza uburyo gufasha abacitse icumu bagarutse nsanganyamatsiko y’uyu mwaka twigire mateka twubaka ejo hazaza bavuga genoside yakorewe abatutsi mateka y’ubu n’ejo hazaza itazibagirana mu muhango kwibuka kandi hatanzwe ibiganiro bibiri l’historique de l’impunit des crimes haineux au rwanda et les signes avant-coureurs du gnocide contre les tutsis cyatanzwe bwana richard nsanzabaganwa les mots qui tuent cyatanzwe prof philippe basabose nsanzabaganwa yerekanye ubwicanyi bwagiye buba ariko ubutegetsi ntibuhane abakoze ibyaha kwica aha yavuze uduce tunyuranye ubwoko bw’abatutsi bwagiye bwicwa yerekanye kwica byagiye bishyigikirwa n’ubutegetsi kurengera abatutsi babaga bibasiwe prof basabose yerekanye amagambo yagiye akoreshwa rwanda yagize uruhare ishyirwa bikorwa ry’ubwicanyi yakoze isesengura ry’ijambo ryavuzwe leon mugesera i kabaya yakanguriye abanyamuryango mrnd abereka umwanzi wabo umututsi n’abahutu mashyaka ataravugaga rumwe mrnd gahunda ziteganijwe zijyanye kwibuka zizagera kwezi gatanu zirimo amasengesho ikiriyo n’ibiganiro bizatangwa taliki mata abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo bongeye guhura gitambo misa kwibuka cyabereye paruwasi mutagatifu yozefu gatineau quebec

title: nyanzamututumu mezi abaturage bazaba begerejwe amashanyarazi
content: mu gihe abaturage kagari mututu ho murenge kibilizi karere nyanza batangaza hari ibikorwa by’iterambere batabasha kugeraho kuko batagira umuriro w’amashanyarazi ubuyobozi bw’akarere nyanza burasezeranya baturage bitarenze amezi bazaba begerejwe bikorwa remezo bifuza meya ntazinda erasme yesezeranyije abaturage b’i mututu bitarenze amezi bazaba babonye amashanyarazi abaturage kagari mututu bavuga bishimira kuba hari byinshi bamaze kugeraho babikesha imiyoborere myiza gusa ariko bagatangaza kuba batarabona umuriro w’amashanyarazi bituma hari iterambere ritabageraho nko kuba hari bateganya gukora byabazanira inyungu bifashishije umuriro w’amashanyarazi ariko ntibabikore uwizeyimana hamida umwe batuye murenge yagize twishimira ibyiza twagezeho tubikesha imiyoborere myiza gusa ariko kuba muriro w’amashanyarazi uratugeraho hari byinshi iterambere tutabasha gukora nko kwihangira imirimo ibyara inyungu kandi ikoresha umuriro w’amashanyarazi twifuza natwe baduha umuriro tukarushaho kugana iterambere uyu muturage kimwe bagenzi bemeza baramutse begerejwe amashanyarazi babasha gushora imari salo zogosha mirimo ijyanye gusudira ibyuma ibyuma bisya n’ibindi byinshi ntazinda erasme umuyobozi w’akarere nyanza ahumuriza baturage abasaba kwihangana kuko bitarenze amezi nabo bazaba babonye muriro w’amashanyarazi nk’uko babyifuza bityo bakaba basabwa gutangira gutekereza bazakora yagize ni aka kagari muriro w’amashanyarazi uhari ariko nabwira abaturage mbahumuriza kuko bitarenze amezi atandatu hazaba hageze umuriro w’amashanyarazi nk’ahandi turizera tudashidikanya bufatanye n’ikigo reg bizakorwa gihe kuri karere nyanza abaturage bamaze kugerwaho n’umuriro w’amashanyarazi bageze kigereranyo ijanisha rikiri rito cyane ugereranyije n’umubare w’abaturage akarere kifuza bagerwaho n’amashanyarazi kubwimana jean indatwaorg

title: amakosa abantu bakunze gukora mugitondo bigatuma birirwana umunabi icyo wakora
content: hari igihe umuntu ava buriri akiriranwa umushiha kandi atazi neza icyawumuteye n’ikibazo kimwe afite munsi ubushakashatsi bwerekanye akenshi biterwa n’amakosa dukora buri gitondo kandi bamwe bakayakora batayazi tugiye kurebera hamwe amakosa agera wakirinda buri gitondo bigatuma wiriranwa akanyamuneza kuko ibyishimo guseka aribyo soko kuramba kugera munezero w’ubuzima tubayemo gukangurwa n’inzogera isaha reveille abantu benshi bahitamo gukangurwa n’isaha cyane cyane bashyira matelefoni ikagenda ivuga buri minota bitewe isaha kubyukiraho umubiri uba utarayimenyera iki ikintu kibi cyane kinaniza umubiri umunsi wose ahubwo abahanga batubwira umuntu yagombye kumenyereza umubiri igihe kubyukiraho buri munsi kuguma kizima bwacyeye abantu bamwe bahitamo kwijimisha icyumba baryamamo bashyiramo amarido yijimye kugirango urumuri rw’umucyo gitondo rutaza kubakangura ibi sibyo kuko ukuvuna umubiri wacu kandi uba ukeneneye ruriya rumuri gitondo kubyuka vuba vuba igihe ukangutse iri rimwe makosa ananiza umubiri umunsi wose igihe ukangutse ugahita ubaduka vuba bwangu bituma amaraso yirukanyira maguru bikaba byanagutera umuvuduko w’amaraso ukabije isereri n’ibindi tugirwa inama kubanza kwicara buriri gato ukabanza ugatekereza ugiye gukora kunanura umubiri kudakora imyitozo ngororamubiri siporo gitondo niyo iruta izindi twakora yandi masaha y’umunsi kuko ariyo ituma umuntu atiyongera ibiro yiboneye iyi myitozo yoroheje ikorwa igihe uvuye buriri ituma umuntu yiriranwa akanyamuneza umunsi wose kutoza amenyo iri ikosa rikorwa n’abantu batari benshi ariko rikomeye cyane kuko ubyutse ntusukure amenyo wiriranwa uburyaryate kanwa butuma umubiri wirirwa wumva utameze neza koza amenyo ukimara kunywa ibintu byifitemo acide iri ikosa rikorwa n’abantu benshi bamaze gufata ifunguro gitondopetit dejeunner ku bakoresha ikawa amazi arimo indimu n’ibindi biribwa birimo acide ifunguro gitondo bagirwa inama bajya basukura amenyo nyuma nibura y’iminota mirongo ine nyuma y’uko bafata iryo funguro kwihutira kubyukira byuma by’ikoranabuhanga iri ikosa rikorwa n’abantu benshi bitewe n’umuvuduko w’iterambere isi yacu igezemo ariko rimwe makosa akomeye ananiza umubiri wacu harimo kubyukira ako kanya telefoni usoma ubutumwa bugufi mbuga nkoranyambaga mashini y’akazi ukiva buriri ahubwo bushakashatsi bugira inama abantu bagomba kubanza kwitegura umunsi ukabikora aruko winjiye kazi kawe buri munsi iri kosa hari n’abarigwamo bakibereye buriri gutangira akazi gahunda ufite y’umunsi iri ikosa rikomeye kubyuka ukajya mirimo buri munsi utarategura gahunda yawe y’umunsi kuko akenshi hari igihe umunsi ukwiriraho kintu kimwe ukoze gifatika ubishoboye byuka wandike gapapuro gahunda yawe y’umunsi kubyuka utekereza ibibazo ufite uyu umwitozo twese dusabwa gukora buri
