content: kubera mpamvu twahisemo kumubaza ibisobanuro bihagije bigaragara affiche nk’umuriro ndetse n’amababa agaragara inshuro ebyiri rimwe rireba imbere irindi rireba inyuma riderman avuga umuriro urasobanura igicaniro igicaniro izina ry’imwe ndirimbo z’uyu muhanzi akaba nayo yahisemo kwitirira alubumu muri ndirimbo agira ncigatiye igicaniro mana mfasha ntikizime sinshaka umuriro wanjye wazima hato nkazisanga mwijima amafoto abiri y’uwo muhanzi ireba imbere indi ireba inyuma riderman yavuze mafoto asobanuye buzima bw’umuntu habaho ibintu bibiri hasi hejuru cyangwa se imbere n’inyuma bigaragazwa kugwa kubyuka yagize hariya ubona ndeba imbere bisobanura nyine umuntu akora agomba guharanira kujya mbere kureba imbere hariya ndeba inyuma bisobanura kureba ibyahise kuko nk’uko umunyarwanda yabivuze utazi ava ntamenya n’iyo agana bisaba gusubiza amaso inyuma kugirango ushobore kumenya wakora kugirango utere imbere kuri affiche kandi hagaragaraho muriro riderman yasobanuye ushaka kuvuga magambo ncigatiye igicaniro kugira kimurikire mbashe kubona nzira mva n’iyo ngana iyo umuntu agenda mwijima ntabasha kumenya ajya kandi ugenda mwijima ashobora kuhahurira n’ingorane nyinshi akandi gashya kari affiche yamamaza kumurika alubumu riderman riderman agaragara nk’ufite amababa aha ho yadusobanuriye agira biriya amateka yanjye urabyibuka nabaga itsinda ryitwa inshuti z’ikirere nawe urabyumva nyine ntiwaba inshuti y’ikirere udafite amababa ikindi wenda ariko kitatungura cyane ibara ry’umutuku ryiganjemo ibi utanabajije wahita wumva ibara ry’umuriro biza kuzuzanya n’igicaniro igitaramo kumurika alubumu kizaba itariki petit stade i remera kwinjira amafaranga ahasanzwe vip after party izabera quelque part bar resto clemence keza

title: maj gen ruvusha yaburiye abayobozi biremereza abaturage babatinye
content: umuyobozi w’ingabo ntara y’amajyepfo major general emmanuel ruvusha yasabye abayobozi gukunda bayobora bagaharanira babubaha kubatinya nk’uko bijya bigenda bamwe yabigarutseho gatanu yitabiriye inama mpuzabikorwa karere gisagara yahuje abayobozi rwego rw’umudugudu kugeza karere muri nama hasuzumiwemo abayobozi bageze bafatanya n’abaturage gukemura ibibazo bihari cyane cyane ibibangamiye imibereho myiza y’abaturage gen ruvusha yagarutse myitwarire ikwiye kuranga umuyobozi mwiza asaba abayobozi kubyitaho ati iyo umuyobozi ukigangarika burya uyobora ntabwo bakubaha ahubwo bagutinya muyobozi haranira uyobora bakubaha kugutinya kuko byanze bikunze ninicisha bugufi imbere yawe uzanyubaha kandi nanjye nkubahe ariko ninza nareze igituza njyewe ndi jenerali nca ibiti n’amabuye cyangwa ndi gitifu cyangwa ndi meya gihe ntabwo uzanyubaha ahubwo uzantinya bivuze n’imikoranire hagati yanjye ntabwo izaba iryoshye kuko ngutinya yabasabye gufata abaturage bayobora nk’abana yibutsa umubyeyi afata umwana amwitura ati reka ntange urugero duhere bana bacu burya umwana ubyaye urukundo umuhaye akwitura uzarebe rugo hari ushobora gusanga abana bakunda nyina kurusha se cyangwa bakunda se kurusha nyina handi bituruka rukundo waberetse umuyobozi w’ingabo ntara y’amajyepfo major general emmanuel ruvusha yavuze kwegera umuturage kumutega amatwi bizafasha abayobozi kuyobora neza gukemura ibibazo bihari buryo burambye ati uko guca bugufi ukajya muturage ukinjira nzu ukarya ibijumba ukabisangira ibintu bikomeye cyane kintu twese dukwiye kucyigiraho kwegera tuyobora kandi tubacira bugufi yabagiriye inama kugira umuco gusaba imbabazi igihe bakosheje kandi bakikosora ati wanabakosereza ukabasaba imbabazi hari ijambo rigufi rigira inyuguti enye gusa ryitwa sorry’ akantu kagufi ariko kavuze ikintu gikomeye cyane kandi burya bitera akanyabugabo muri nama bamwe bayobozi bageze bikorwa by’indashyikirwa bahawe umwanya basobanura bakora kugira bagenzi babigireho umuyobozi w’umudugudu mareba murenge kibirizi mukangarambe christine yagaragaje bakemuye ikibazo cy’abacuruzaga ibiyobyabwenge n’inzoga z’inkorano zitemewe ati nakoranye komite y’umudugudu twegera abaturage dukora inama tukajya duhanahana amakuru tugenda dusura urugo rundi ibiyobyabwenge turabica kuva ibiyobyabwenge twabica abana barataye ishuri kubera ababyeyi abasinzi basubiyemo mwana wataye ishuri ngira mudugudu umuyobozi w’umudugudu nyarurama murenge gishubi havugiyaremye jean damascne yabasangije batoje abaturage kwizigama amafaranga n’imyaka beza ati buriya igituma abantu bagira ubukene bukabije ukutamenya kwizigamira twebwe mudugudu wacu buri muturage afite ikimina barizwamo kandi akizigama yishoboye hari uzigama ijana magana atanu igihumbi tubatoza kandi kwirinda gupfusha ubusa imyaka bejeje bayigurishe mafaranga makeya umuyobozi w’akarere gisagara rutaburingoga jrome yavuze nama mpuzabikorwa igamije gushyira imbaraga mudugudu kugira komite ikorane gukemura ibibazo bihari ati ibiganiro byose byibanze kwegera umuturage kandi turishimira byumvikanye neza imbaraga z’umuyobozi w’umudugudu komite zagaragaraye bashobora kurangiza ibibazo byose mu gusoza nama habaye ubusabane kwishimira akarere gisagara kesheje imihigo itandukanye irimo kugira umudugudu ntangarugera ntara y’amajyepfo gutwara igikombe cy’ibikorwa kurwanya ruswa kuba aka kabiri kwesa imihigo ijyanye n’ubumwe n’ubwiyunge abitabiriye inama biyemeje gukomeza kwesa imihigo guharanira kudasubira inyuma

title: ferwafa iyirukanwa ry’umutoza w’ikipe y’igihugu amavubi ibihuha
content: ubuyobozi bw’ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru rwanda ferwafa buremeza jonathan mckinstry umutoza w’ikipe y’igihugu amavubi uzatoza kipe mikino cecafa izatangira gatandatu taliki ugushyingo ethiopia ibi ferwafa babitangaje nyuma y’ibihuha byari byagiye hanze bivuga mckinstry atazajyana n’amavubi cecafa ahubwo kipe izajyana mashami vincent usanzwe yungirije hari hashize iminsi bihwihwiswa mckinstry yirukanwe nyuma gutsindwa imikino yatoje amavubi harimo n’uwo yatsinzwe libiya ibitego - kabiri taliki ugushyingo umunyamabanga mukuru ferwafa mulindahabi olivier yabwiye itangazamakuru makuru azi y’iyurukanwa ry’uwo mutoza ati kuri saha tuvugana ndashaka kukubwira makuru ntayo nzi n’icyo cyemezo kumwirukana ntakirafatwa nta muntu n’umwe waganira umuyobozi siporo minisiteri y’umuco siporo minispoc bugingo emmanuel yemeza cyemezo cyari cyafatwa kwirukana mutoza ati umusaruro ntabwo mwiza kandi turabibona inzego zirabiganiraho zirebe gukora ibyo kumuhagarika ntabyo nzi dutegereze ababishinzwe bahure bugingo avuga atazi igihe nama izabera anashimangira imyitwarire mibi ihangayikishije bikomeye abashinzwe siporo kuruta yewe n’abakunzi b’umupira hari abakinnyi biyongereye mavubi ajya ethiopia mu gihe amavubi yerekeza ethiopia munsi kane taliki ugushyingo jonathan mckinstry yongeyemo abakinnyi munezero fiston myugariro rayon sports habimana yusuf ukinira mukura senyange ukinira gicumbi fc ikipe y’u rwanda izakina umukino ufungura cecafa ethiopia gatandatu taliki ugushyingo akurikizeho tanzania somalia zose ziri kumwe itsinda a yanditswe ubwanditsimuhaburarw

content: radiyo rwanda yavuze kwisobanura abahagarariye minicom bavuze litiro miliyoni ebyiri essence babazwa zaburiwe irengero mwaka bikozwe petrorwanda abadepite bibajije impamvu kibazo kimaze imyaka kitarakemuka umunyamabanga uhoraho minicom emmanuel hategeka avuga bandikiye minisiteri y’imari bayisaba leta yakwemera gihombo cyatejwe petrorwanda minicom kandi irashinjwa gutanga amasoko buryo budasobanutse harimo n’aho yagiye asubirwamo kandi yaratanzwe hategeka yasobanuye minisiteri yahuye n’ikibazo kutagira abakozi bafite ubumenyi buhagije kazi kabo bityo ugasanga hari amasoko atangwa adateguwe neza bikaba ngombwa asubirwamo yavuze minisiteri itakaza abakozi beza inshuro nyinshi kubera umushahara muto minicom yanenzwe kutagira ububiko bw’inyandiko zakwifashishwa kugenzura umutungo umucungamari mukagihana lucie yavuze yazibikaga mudasobwa yavuze bubiko bwabonetse minicom kandi yabajijwe iby’imitangire y’akazi idasobanutse ndetse n’itangwa ry’imishahara miremire idateganywa minisiteri y’umurimo byarateje igihombo miliyoni hategeka yavuze bitakwiye kwitwa igihombo kuko bakozi bakenewe kugira barangize akazi kabo obadio biraro umugenzuzi mukuru w’imari leta yanenze ababazwa basubiza kuko akenshi badasubiza babajijwe komisiyo ishinzwe imicungire y’imari leta nteko ishingamategeko umutwe w’abadepite ikaba iteganya gutangaza ibyavuye bazwa mpera z’uyu mwaka emmanuel nshimiyimana

title: pggss season yatangiye
content: abayobozi bralirwa n’aba east africa promotors basobanuye hafashwe ingamba sim card izongera gutora inshuro irenze munsi kandi sim card yemerewe gutora itaramara nibura amezi atatu ikora abazatorera interineti hari uburyo kubikurikirana buryo e-mail y’umuntu izajya ibona amahirwe gutora inshuro gusa munsi kugira binyure mucyo usesuye biyambaje inararibonye kugenzura ibijyanye tombora bazakorana pwc pricewaterhouse ikigo mpuzamahanga kugenzura audit company nyuma gusobanurirwa magambo atari maremare cyane abanyamakuru bahawe umwanya kubaza ibibazo kubyo batasobanukiwe neza bimwe bibazo byagaragaye ibijyanye n’impungenge z’ukuntu ubushize harimo abahanzi benshi bitoye bakoresheje sim card baguze bakazinyanyagiza bantu babatore itsinda ryo kujya amerika ryabaye tom close bigatuma atabonana sean kingstone n’ibindi bibazo binyuranye uyu muhango witabiriwe n’ abanyamakuru bakora muzika n’abandi bantu banyuranye harimo abatunganya umuziki producers hatowe abahanzi harimo bane buri cyiciro muzika injyana byakozwe n’abanyamakuru n’abatunganya umuziki bimwe byagombaga gukurikizwa ukuba umuhanzi hejuru y’imyaka akaba nibura yarakoze indirimbo zakunzwe hano rwanda akaba kandi indirimbo ze zarakozwe hagati kandi umuhanzi wegukanye pggss ntagomba kugarukamo abahanzi batoranijwe bazatangazwa gatanu tariki nyuma y’iryo tora ry’abanyamakuru abaturage nabo bazitorera abahanzi bavuye bazaba batowe mbere hanyuma bahanzi abe aribo binjira pggss umwe gusa ariwe uzegukana umwanya n’amahire kuririmbana n’igihangange muzika kitaratangazwa kuko kizatangazwa yindi nama izakurikira hazaba harimo n’abahanzi ibirori byasojwe n’umuhanzi tom close waririmbye abanje gusaba imbabazi abanyamakuru n’ubuyobozi bralirwa east africa promotors kubera uburyo yatutse umunyamakuru dj adams minsi ishize marie clemence cyiza uwimanimpaye

title: musanze fondation kabeho irakangurira abandi kwitabira gahunda z’icyunamo
content: ukuriye fondation kabeho fidele abimana atangaza bikorwa bitandukanye gufasha gutegura icyumweru kwibuka nk’urubyiruko dusanzwe dukora ibijyanye n’imyidagaduro twifuje gutanga umuganda wacu twifashishije mpano n’ibindi tubona byatuma abantu bitabira birushijeho gahunda kwibuka ibyo bazifashisha harimo indirimbo bakoze n’abahanzi batoranyijwe ntara y’amajyaruguru yabisobanuye magambo kwibuka kimwe bikorwa bikomeye fondation yacu yashyize mategeko atugenga wahimbye indirimbo kwibuka irimo amagambo atwibutsa amateka kandi anahumuriza abarokotse anagarurira abantu icyizere kubaho bakagana imbere mu bundi butumwa yatanze abimana fidele ahamagarira abantu kurushaho kwegera abacitse icumu bakarushaho kubafasha kubereka hari icyizere kwitabira ibiganiro kwirinda imvugo zikomeretsa kwirinda gupfobya amateka yaranze gihugu cyane cyane jenoside yakorewe abatutsi abo bahanzi kandi bazazenguruka hirya hino gihe cy’icyunamo baririmba butumwa bw’ihumure n’icyizere muri gahunda bafite gihe cy’icyunamo harimo kwitabira ubwabo ibiganiro ariko by’umwihariko bakangurira abantu kubyitabira ahenshi byagaragaye urubyiruko rutitabira ibiganiro bitangwa gihe cy’icyunamo kandi rukeneye kumenya amateka mabi ariko umuntu akuramo isomo ryo kubaka ejo hazaza abagize fondation kabeho bavuga baniteguye gutanga ibiganiro gihe biyambajwe abagize fondation kabeho hari umukene bafashije kuvugurura inzu kugwira bakaba bateganya kumuha ubundi bugafasha bugamije gutuma atera imbere ibindi bikorwa bakoze birimo umuganda udasanzwe bakoreye rwibutso kinigi tariki fondation kabeho imaze amezi gusa kugera irimo abanyamuryango n’abandi basabye bagera jean claude hashakineza

title: igice cya iivestine yavuze uburyo umugabo ashobora gukoresha gutera akabariro n’umugore akazana amavangingo

title: tigo yafunguye amashami abiri i rubavu
content: rimwe mashami riherereye mujyi rwagati y’isoko irindi shami riri mupaka muto petite barriere w’u rwanda repubulika iharanira demokarasi kongo kevin mukotanyi ushinzwe ibikorwa tigo i rubavu yatangaje gufungura amashami ukwegereza abanyarubavu serivisi batajyaga babona telefoni sim swap tigo cash n’ibindi ngo bikorwa byatinze kubageraho kuko tigo ikiri nshya mikorere mukotanyi yagize hehe n’ingendo kigali-rubavu bafatabuguzi tigo bitegure serivisi batigeze babona ahandi nyuma gufungura mugaragaro ishami ryo mupaka hakurikiyeho igikorwa gutanga amasaha n’amakaramu baturage bitabiriye gahunda binyuze tombola igikorwa gufungura amashami tigo cyari kirangajwe imbere n’umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe ubukungu karere rubavu ezechiel buntu n’umuyobozi mukuru ceo tigo rwanda diego camberos matthew dutrisac ushinzwe ibicuruzwa n’amasoko kugeza tigo imaze kugira abafatabuguzi miliyoni ebyiri nabyo byagaragajwe n’abakozi bayo bazaga bambaye imipira byanditseho ndetse kuzamura intoki ebyiri bivuga miliyoni ebyiri tigo izakomereza gufungura amashami ntara y’iburengerazuba nk’uko mukotanyi yabitangaje pascaline umulisa

title: ishyaka psp ryashimye ibyagezweho
content: fotonkubana alphonse perezida psp yagaragaje hari byinshi byagezweho ishyaka ry’ubwisungane rigamije iterambere psp ryishimiye ibyagezweho mwaka rikagaragaza hari ibikwiye gushyirwamo ingufu kugira bishobore gufasha abanyarwanda gutera imbere muri havuzwe mirenge itaragerwamo ibikorwa remezo by’amashanyarazi nk’uko byagarutsweho nama y’umushyikirano yabaye ibi ibyagarutsweho nkubana alphonse perezida psp kuwa mutarama kiganiro n’itangazamakuru mujyi kigali yifurije umwaka mushya perezida paul kagame yavuze ibikorwa remezo guverinoma y’u rwanda yabishyizemo imbaraga birimo kwagura umuhanda werekeza karere bugesera ntara y’iburasirazuba yagize hari byinshi birimo kwagura umuhanda uva kicukiro sonatubes gahanga akagera bizatwara miriyoni ukuvuga asaga miriyari z’amafaranga y’u rwanda ibi bimwe bikorwa remezo twishimira byubatswe kandi urugendo rw’iterambere rukaba rugikomeje ishyaka psp rivuga uretse umuhanda ugana bugesera urimo kwagurwa hari huye kibeho munini ngoma ureshya km uzuzura utwaye amafaranga y’u rwanda angana miriyari ukazakorwa gihe kingana n’amezi nkubana avuga hari inyubako nyinshi zubatswe mujyi kigali ndetse mijyi yunganira uwa kigali by’umwihariko mujyi musanze nyubako zikaba zigira uruhare bukungu bw’igihugu kuko hari serivisi zitangirwamo yagize hari inzu ndende zubatswe umwaka ushize haba mujyi kigali cyangwa mijyi yunganira uwa kigali by’umwihariko mujyi musanze hakaba harazamutse inzu ndende z’abikorera bityo zikaba zifite uruhare kwiyongera k’ubukungu bw’igihugu bitewe serivisi zitangwa ikindi hashyirwa ingufu kugeza amashanyarazi mirenge nk’uko byagaragajwe nama y’umushyikirano yabaye umwaka mukangwije laurence umunyamabanga mukuru psp avuga iterambere ry’umwari n’umutegarugori ritasigaye inyuma kuko hatanzwe inyigisho zijyanye n’ihame ry’uburinganire bw’umugabo n’umugore ndetse imiryango ikigishwa ingaruka z’amakimbirane muryango ati isize hari tugeze nk’abagore kuko nkanjye ubwanjye kuba naragiriwe ikizere ndi buyobozi bw’ishyaka bivuze hari intambwe yatewe mbere y’umwaka ibyo bituruka miyoborere myiza y’igihugu kuko nayo yashyizeho gahunda guteza imbere umwari n’umutegarugori hakigishwa ihame ry’uburinganire bw’umugabo n’umugore ariko n’ikibazo cy’amakimbirane muryango bigaragara cyashyizwemo ingufu kuko amakimbirane amaze kugabanuka ubuyobozi bw’ishyaka psp buvuga uretse kuba bwaratangije title: suzuma wujuje bikurikira mbere kwinjira rukundo
content: urukundo benshi barufata nk’imikino cyangwa se wenda igihe cyahariwe kuruhura ubwonko cyangwa kwidagadura gusa kubazi iby’urukundo barufata nk’umushinga umuntu atangira yamanje kwigaho ndetse yarafashe n’igihe gihagije gutegura mushinga niba wifuza kwinjira rukundo manza umenye neza koko wujuje bintu twaguteguriye kugira integourukundo rudafite intego nink’umugenzi udafite icyerekezo ni byiza wiha intego runaka y’urukundo ugiye kwinjiramo kumenya umukunzi ushaka ariweicyo umushakahoni ingenzi cyane byaba bibaje gukundana n’umusoreumukobwa imyaka igahita indi igataha nyamara cyerekezo runaka urukundo rwanyu ruganamo kugira inshuti zawe kandi wizeyeinshuti zibamo amoko menshi ariko inshuti nyanshuti si ihora ikubwira ibyiza gusa ni igihe uyobye iragukebura ikakwereka amakosa mwene nshuti nizo ugomba kwiyegereza mbere kwinjira rukundo iyo hari amakosa gukora rukundo rwawe rushya cyangwa mukundana n’umuntu twakwita udashobotse nibo mbere babikubwira kutagira umuntu ukuba agukebure utari kwitwara neza bishobora gutuma ugwa rwobo utazapfa kwikuramobaca umugani kinyarwanda agasozi gaterera ugatega inshuti igihe bizaba byazambyemu rukundo rwawe n’umusoreumukobwa w’inshuti yaweinshuti zawe nizo ziba zigomba kugufasha bibazo ndetse kugira inama zifatika mu buzima ntawigira kandi n’umugabo umwekumenya urukundo aricyokwinjira rukundo utazi biva n’aho biganabiba bigoye kumemya witwara mubano mushya uba ugiye kwinjiramo kwibwira rukundo habamo ibyiza gusa ukwihenda ugomba kumenya hari n’igihe bitagenda wabiteganyaga guhemukaguhemukirwa nabyo bibamo kwemera mwatandukanyewigeze gukundana n’umusoreumukobwa ariko nyuma bitewe n’impamvu runakamuratandukana ni byiza ubanza kumwikuramo burundu mbere y’uko utangira urukundo rushyashya gutandukana n’umukuzi wawe birababaza ariko si naryo herezo ry’isi ntibigukuraho igikundiro n’amarangamutima yawenumenyera guhora uteze amaboko uziga kwikemurira ibibazo ryariiteka se muzahorana cyangwa uzahorana umukunzi ugukemurira buri kabazo wikwijira rukundo kuko ubihatirijweurebeye bandiingendo y’undi iravuna gutangira gukundana kuko wabonye kanaka abikora ikosa rikomeye banza utekereze neza ugiye kwinjiramo ubizi koko guhatirizwa gukundagukundwa bitewe n’umuryango waweinshuti sebishobora kukugiraho ingaruka mbi kuko uba ubigiyemo kubera igitutu uhuye n’ikibazo rukundoukomereka kurusha wowe ubwawe waba ubyiyinjijemo kwimenyakwimenya kintu cy’ibanze ugomba kuba wujuje kugira ubashe kwinjira rukundo kumenya imiterere n’imitekerere yawe cy’ibanze mbere y’uko utangira gukundagukundwa ntibyakorohera kumenya abandi ubwawe utiyizikuba ugiye kongera gukundagukundwa si igihe kwihimuramugenziumukunzi waawe mushya ruhare ruto yagize kuba warahemukiwe kutitiranya urukundo ihahiromu rukundo si uba ugiye kubonera umutungo uruseho kuwo ufite abakobwa cyane kuko aribo bagira ngesobakunda kwitiranya urukundo ihahiro ihariro nshaka kuvuga gusoroma amafaranga n’ubutunzi mbere kwinjira rukundo ugomba title: sacco mayange intangarugero karere bugesera
content: ibi umuyobozi w’akarere akaba yarabitangaje kuwa kabiri tariki ukwakira nyuma gusoza amahugurwa y’abakozi sacco y’umurenge mayange ati sacco z’iyindi mirenge zikwiye kwigira kugira nazo zibashe kwiteza imbere nako ziteza imbere abazigana iyi koperative kubitsa kuguriza y’umurenge mayange niyo abaturage bahanze amaso kuko izabafasha kugira imbere hazaza heza kubafasha kugera majyambere arambye umuyobozi sacco mayange habinshuti aimable atangaza batazategereza imyaka itatu y’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe amakorative rwanda cooperative agency rca bahawe kugira babashe kwiyubaka yagize turasaba abakozi bacu bahabwa amahugurwa nk’aya ahoraho cyane cyane ibijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga kugira babashe gucunga neza umutungo w’abanyamuryango bacu sacco mayange ifite abanyamuryango bagera matsinda bafite ubwizigame bugera mafaranga miliyoni ndetse n’amakonte akora neza umukozi banki nkuru y’igihugu bnr nsabimana gerard yemereye abakozi b’iyo sacco amahugurwa ahoraraho cyane cyane mucungamari n’ushinzwe inguzanyo aya mahugurwa akaba yaramaze iminsi ibiri akaba yarateguwe millennium villages project mvp bufatanye banki nkuru y’igihugu bnr n’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe amakoperative rca umurenge sacco watangijwe rwanda mugaragaro kwezi k’ukwakira mwaka gihugu hose kuva koperative kubitsa kugurizanya zitangiye izigera zimaze kubona ibyangombwa banki nkuru y’igihugu bizemerera gutanga inguzanyo nk’uko bisabwa zigomba kuba zifite umutungo miliyoni nibura iyo ugeze turere dutandukanye tw’igihugu usanga abaturage benshi bamaze gusobanukirwa ibijyanye kwizigamira ubushakashatsi bwakozwe minisiteri y’imari n’igenemigambi mwaka bugaragaza gusa by’abanyarwanda aribo bakorana n’ibigo by’imari badakorana nabyo gihe abagera aribo bazigama amafaranga buryo gakondo nk’ibimina n’ibindi egide kayiranga

title: abanyarwanda malawi batanze miliyoni frw gufasha abagizweho ingaruka coronavirus
content: mu gihe rwanda abantu baherutse kumara iminsi igera rwego kwirinda ikwirakwira coronavirus malawi imirimo yarakomeje ibi byatumye abanyarwanda gihugu giherereye majyepfo afurika bakusanya inkunga gufasha abagizweho ingaruka n’icyo cyorezo rwanda hari abaryaga bakoze n’abandi bagizweho ingaruka n’ingamba kwirinda coronavirus ngizwenayo ephrem visi perezida kabiri ushinzwe ubukungu diaspora malawi yabwiye igihe bishatsemo ubushobozi kugira bafashe bagenzi rwanda nyuma kumenya imirimo itunze bamwe yahagaze ati tumaze kubona bagenzi bacu rwanda bamaze iminsi kubera icyorezo covid- twaricaye nk’abantu hanze hano malawi tubanza guterana nk’abantu komite twiga ikintu twakora dufashe bagenzi bacu twagiye inama dushishikariza abanyarwada malawi tubasaba bakusanya inkunga kugira dufashe bagenzi bacu batari kazi tuzi benshi batunzwe kujya kazi batari kurya inkunga ingana n’ibihumbi frw yakusanyijwe binyuze kugera duce twose turimo abanyarwanda malawi ati twitoyemo abantu batandatu bajya buri ntara malawi ahantu hose hari umunyarwanda tukamugezaho igitekerezo twagize buri wese twagezeho yabyakiriye neza akaduha inkunga mu gihe cy’icyumweru kimwe twabikoze twakusanyije miliyoni z’amafaranga hano ubwo ibihumbi nyuma gukusanya nkunga bifashishije ambasade y’u rwanda i lusaka zambia ibareberera bohereza inkunga i kigali cyumweru gishize ngizwenayo yakomeje avuga gihe bakomeje imirimo isanzwe bahisemo kuzirikana bagenzi rwanda nk’abantu bakunda igihugu cyababyaye ati turi abantu dushyira hamwe kandi dukunda igihugu ikibazo cyose cyaba gihugu gisaba ubufasha cyangwa ikindi kintu twagira dukora bigende neza twese hano dufite umutima guteza imbere igihugu cyacu aba banyarwana malawi bagera ubariyemo n’abana basanzwe kandi bafashanya hagati bita batishoboye si ubwa mbere diaspora malawi igize uruhare bikorwa gushyigikira abanyarwanda b’imbere gihugu kuko yatanze miliyoni frw gahunda bye bye nyakatsi n’ibihumbi kigega agaciro development fund

title: ikipe y’ u rwanda amavubi yahesheje u rwanda agaciro itsinda benin -
content: uyu mukino wabaye itariki ukwakira gihe ikipe y’u rwanda neza n’ubwo yatsinda mukino itazajya mikino nyuma guhatanira igikombe yatsinze igitego - igitego cyabonetse munota gatandatu w’umukino gitsinzwe meddie kagere muri tsinda ryarimo andi makipe abiri u burundi ivory coast ivory coast yatsinze u burundi ibitego - ikipe y’u rwanda ikaba yarabashije gutahukana ishema ry’ u rwanda kugarurira ikizere abanyarwanda kuko yegukanye umwanya kabiri n’amanota gusa ivory coast ikaba yarigaragaje cyane kuko irusha u rwanda amanota mutijima abu bernard

title: muhanga ihungabana rikomoka jenoside si iry’abacitse icumu gusa
content: mu biganiro yagiranye n’abanyamuhanga tariki nyirabahire yasobanuye ihungabana imihindukire y’imyitwarire imiterere iterwa n’ikintu kibi kibaye muntu bimutunguye avuga ihungabana riterwa jenoside yakorewe abatutsi ritagirwa gusa n’abacitse icumu kuko n’abandi bashobora kurigira kubera babonye bakoze cyangwa bumvise gihe jenoside umunyamabanga w’inama njyanama y’akarere muhanga avuga n’abatarahigwaga bashobora guhura n’ikibazo cy’ihungabana gihe cy’icyunamo yagize umuntu ashobora guhungabana bitewe n’ibyo yabonye bakorera abicwaga yarahetse intumbi cyangwa imirambo cyangwa yaragize uruhare bwicanyi umuntu wagize uruhare kwica abantu cyangwa kandi karengane arangwa kwiheba agahora yicira imanza ndetse agahora yifuza uwamubaza byabaye kugira abashe kubivuga abyikurimo nk’uko nyirabahire yakkomeje abisobanura yongeyeho benshi banyarwanda bahuye n’ihungabana ariko ngero zitandukanye abanyarwanda hanze y’igihugu hari ababa bumva buri munyarwanda wese umwicanyi ikaba byatera ihungabana rikomeye nk’uko umunyamabanga w’inama njyanama y’akarere muhanga abyemeza gerard gitoli mbabazi

title: mu rwanda hakomeje kugaragara impinduka kuri coronavirus zitanga ikizere
content: minisiteri y’ubuzima yatangaje cyumweru tariki gicurasi habonetse abarwayi bashya b’icyorezo koronavirusi covid- bipimo byafashwe masaha ashize ariko hataha abandi bakize neza ibyo byatumye umubare w’abakirimo kwitabwaho n’abaganga ugabanyuka ugera barwayi bamaze gutahurwaho cyorezo rwanda minisiteri y’ubuzima ivuga barwayi covid- bwose bamaze gutahurwa bipimo byafashwe umurwayi mbere yatahurwa rwanda werurwe kugeza abakirwaye bakomeje kuvurirwa ahabugenewe ndetse hakomeje igikorwa gupima abantu gihugu bikaba bivugwa kugeza murwayi mushya uratahurwa aturutse baturarwanda hagati kuko abenshi batahurwa bavuye mahanga cyangwa bashyizwe kato k’iminsi kugeza ntawurabikwa rwanda yishwe n’icyorezo covid- mu gihe guhera mbere tariki gicurasi imirimo n’imwe y’ubuzima busanzwe yasubukuwe abaturarwanda barasabwa kurushaho kubahiriza amabwiriza kwirinda gusiga intera metero kwambara udupfukamunwa gukaraba intoki kenshi bakoresheje amazi meza n’isabune cyangwa alukoro yabugenewe imibare yatangajwe rwego mpuzamahanga yerekana afurika abamaze kwandura covid- barimo bakize n’abandi bahitanywe abamaze kwandura isi bangana barimo abakize n’abapfuye bivuze abakirimo kwitabwaho n’abaganga isi bangana denis fabrice nsengumuremyi muhaburarw

title: impamvu abakundaniye ishuri akenshi urukundo rwabo rutaramba
content: abanyeshuri bakundaniye ishuri bigana ishuri cyangwa biga kigo kimwe haba mashuri yisumbuye abanza kaminuza barandukana cyane ariko akenshi urwo rukundo rurangirana kurangiza ikizami leta ntabwo rukunze gukomeza bashyingiranwe abanyeshuri bakundaniye ishuri bigana ishuri cyangwa biga kigo kimwe haba mashuri yisumbuye abanza kaminuza barandukana cyane ariko akenshi urwo rukundo rurangirana kurangiza ikizami leta ntabwo rukunze gukomeza bashyingiranwe muri nkuru tugiye kubagezaho impamvu eshatu zituma abakundaniye ishuri urukundo rwabo akenshi rurangirira ishuri niba wowe urimo gusoma nkuru hashize nibura imyaka urangikwije kwiga subiza amaso inyuma ureba banyeshuri mwiganye bakundana cyane ishuri urasanga kubona munsi bagikundana ntabyo kuburana impamvu mbere ituma umuhungu n’ umukobwa bakundana cyane ishuri ntibabihishe bakaba kumwe ishuri isomero resitora buryo abarimu n’ abandi banyeshuri babimenya bantu bakundana ariko ibyabo bikazarangira ubuzima bw’ ishuri ukuburana umwe akajya kure y’ undi’ iyo ubuzima bw’ ishuri burangiye umuhungu akajya iwabo n’ umukobwa iwabo hari haba harimo intera ndende ntibazongere guhura bigatuma iby’ urukundo rwabo birangirana kurangiza ikizami leta gushaka akazi ku ishuri umuhungu n’ umukobwa babayeho nk’ abatesi kuko buri umwe atunzwe n’ ababyeyi iyo ageze hanze agasanga ariwe ugomba gutangira kwitunga gushaka azibeshaho hari ubuzima bw’ umunezero n’ umuteto w’ urukundo ahita abishyira hasi agashyira imbaraga gushaka akazi bigatuma urukundo yakundaniye mugenzi ntebe y’ ishuri rurangirira ishuri bibaho buri umwe atwara nomero telefone mugenzi bakazakomeza guhamagarana ariko iminsi igenda ishira guhamagarana nako kugenda gucika intege kuko badafite icyizere bazongera guhura wawundi wagiye gushaka akazi agize amahirwe akakabona yisanga gukorana n’ abandi agenda amenyana nabo hakavuka urukundo rushya rukamwibagiza bakundaniye ishuri gusambana rimwe rimwe umuhungu n’ umukobwa bakundanira ishuri hari igihe babikora bigana bagenzi bakundana kuko babateye ishyari ryo gusomana gusambana iyo abanyeshuri bafashe umwanzuro gukundana bitewe n’ umuhungu ashyize imbere kwishimisha n’ umukobwa akaba aricyo agamije ubuzima bw’ ishuri burangiye burangirana rukundo nubwo abaruboneraga ruhande barabona urukundo ruhamye biragoye wabuza abanyeshuri gukundanira buzima bw’ ishuri kuko babonana kenshi buri umwe yisanga yakunze imico mugenzi agatangira kumwiyumvamo icyo abanyeshuri bakwiye gukora ukwirinda gukoreshwa n’ urukundo ikintu cyose cyabangiriza ejo hazaza

title: kigali abafite ubumuga bw’ uruhu gupimwa indwara zibibasira
content: abagera nibo bamaze kwitabira ubukangurambaga bugamije kurinda abafite ubumuga bw’ uruhu buri kubera bitaro gisirikare i kanombe abagera nibo bamaze kwitabira ubukangurambaga bugamije kurinda abafite ubumuga bw’ uruhu buri kubera bitaro gisirikare i kanombe bari gupimwa indwara z’ amaso kanseri y’ uruhu kuko arizo ndwara zikunzwe kwibasira abafite ubumuga bw’ uruhu col dr chrysostome kagimbana muganga w’indwara z’uruhu bitaro gisirikari kanombe yabwiye kigali today abantu bafite ubumuga bw’uruhu bagomba kwirinda izuba igihe cyose ndetse n’igihe hatariho izuba ariko hashyushye bakambara ibituma umubiri wabo utangirika yagize umucanga n’amazi bishyushye bizamura imirasire ishobora gutwika uruhu rw’umuntu usanzwe ufite ubumuga bw’uruhu bikaba byamutera kanseri y’uruhu ndetse bikaba byakwangiza n’amaso bikamutera ubumuga kutabona abantu bitabiriye gikorwa biganjemo mujyi kigali ibi bitaro birasaba n’ abandi bafite ubumuga bw’ uruhu kubigana bagahabwa inama bagapimwa indwara z’ uruhu ndetse bakanahabwa amavuta arinda uruhu rwabo ibi byose babikorerwa buntu col dr kagimbana asaba abafite ubumuga bw’ uruhu kwambara ingofero kuko irinda maso amatwi n’ijosi buryo bice by’umubiri bidahura n’imirasire yinjire mubiri abagira inama kwambara indorerwamo zirinda amaso kwangizwa n’ imirasire y’ izuba imibare y’ishami ry’ umuryango w’ abibumbye ryita buzima igaragaza buri mwaka abantu hagati miliyoni - badafite uruhu rwirabura bafatwa kanseri y’ uruhu mugihe abafite uruhu rwirabura bafatwa kanseri y’ urufu ibihumbi buri mwaka

title: kwandika facebook ndi single ntibivuze nshaka umukunzi king james
content: uyu muririmbyi uzwi ndirimbo naratomboye umugisha ntamahitamo n’izindi avuga koko ingaragu kandi kuba yarabyanditse facebook kindi kibiri inyuma king james yagize njyewe byanjemo gutyo gusa ndabyandika nta kindi nashakaga kuvuga ndi ingaragu ariko sindashaka umwanya kugira inshuti y’umukobwa nimbona unyura nzagirana ubucuti ku kibazo cy’uko yasobanura uburyo adafite inshuti y’umukobwa kandi icyamamare kandi ibyamamare bigira abantu benshi babikunda king james avuga gukunda ibintu byizana kuba atamufite igihe kitaragera king james agira ubu mfite imyaka mukobwa ndabona anyure numve yaba umukunzi wanjye igihenzamubonera nibwo tuzakundana nanageza n’imyaka nkimutegereje asubiza umuntu wanditse king james yigeze kugira umukunzi muhanzi yavuze afite umukunzi akaba atakibarizwa rwanda kandi bakaba batakiri inshuti king james umuririmbyi baririmbyi bakunzwe cyane rwanda kuko yabaye uwa kabiri irushanwa primus guma guma superstar ryagaragazaga umuririmbyi ukunzwe kandi ufite n’ubuhanga nyuma kugenda k’umuririmbyi the ben benshi bemezaga kinga james ufite abafana benshi b’igitsinagore nubwo bushakashatsi burabikorwaho jean baptiste micomyiza

title: ese waba uzi igisobanuro kimbitse cy’ijambo urukundo soma hano icyegeranyo
content: umuntu wese ava akagera buzima bwe buri munsi akenera urukundo yewe benshi bahamya urukundo ubuzima kuko n’abemera imana bavuga n’imana ubwayo urukundo kuko mategeko y’imana irisumba ayandi urukundo niyo mpamvu usanga abantu benshi abakenera urukundo umunsi munsi mu buzima ndakeka waba ntacyo uricyo udafite umuntu ugukunda uguhoza k’umutima ashobora kuba inshuti yawe ashobora kuba mwashakanye ashobora kuba umukunzi bamwe akaba imana cyangwa se umwana wayo yesu christu kubaza umuntu urukundo ninko kubaza ifi amazi amazi niyo ifi ibamo igakuramo oxygen ihumeka igakuramo n’ibyo kurya amafi manini akarya amato amato nayo akarya ibindi byaba udusimba tuba mazi cyangwa ibindi byaguyemo abahanga by’imibanire y’abantu bagaragaza abantu nabo babona urukundo nk’uko amafi abona amazi amwe mafi abona amazi nk’ubuzima andi akayabona nk’urupfu bitewe n’uburyo yirirwa ahigwa abantu bamwe nabo babona urukundo nk’ubuzima abandi bakarubona nk’ikintu cyaje kubarangiza ibi ahanini biterwa n’ibyo barahuriye nabyo rukundo cyane cyane nk’iyo inshuti zabo bizeraga zabahemukiye ndetse zikabasiga bonyine ahanini urebye si dutuyeho abantu benshi bemeza rukundo rukibaho ahubwo rwahindutse ubucuruzi business umuntu agukunda aruko hari inyungu ze bwite agukurikiyeho ariko njye siko mbibona njye mbona urukundo rukibaho ahubwo rwarakonje urukundo rw’abantu benshi rwarakonje bitewe bihe bibi bitandukanye banyuzemo bamwe barukonjesheje kubushake abandi rukonja bitewe n’inshuti zabo bizeraga zabahemukiye cyangwa bagahemukirwa n’abakunzi abarukonjesheje bushake ahanini byatewe gushaka kwigwizaho imitungo babinyujije nzira izarizo zose zaba nziza nimbi bagahitamo guhera nshuti zabo bakazihemukira yaba kuzihuguza imitungo cyangwa se kuzambura rero yaba abarukonjesheje kubushake cyangwa se ababitewe n’abagenzi bashobora kurushyira kuzuba rugashyuha bakongera bagakunda kandi bagakundwa byukuri kuba isake ibaho ntago impuhwe z’agaca bishatse kuvuga kuba umuntu abayeho atari kubw’urukundo ahabwa bagenzi ariko burya umuntu ubaho wenyine adakunda ntago ashobora kubaho neza nk’umuntu ufite inshuti nziza z’ukuri zimuhundagazaho urukundo rw’umwimerere kandi rw’ukuri ihame kandi bihuje n’imyemerere benshi si dutuyeho yanditswe akayezu snappymuhaburarw

title: aline gahongayire yihagazeho asaba imbabazi nyuma y’amagambo atari meza aherutse kuvuga itangazamakuru
content: aline gahongayire wavuze itangazamakuru ryo rwanda ritari rwego rwe yahinduye imvugo avuga aramutse arisuzuguye yaba yisuzuguye kuko arikoramo ni nyuma y’uko muhanzikazi yishongoye itangazamakuru ryo rwanda yabigaragarije buhamya yatanze gikorwa cyiswe ’because there is hope’ akavuga yatangarije itandukana rye n’umugabo radiyo ijwi ry’amerika kuko cyiciro kimwe itangazamakuru ryo rwanda riri hasi icyo gihe yagize bakambaza bati aline nyuma y’ibyakubayeho uzarongorwa gute ntarongorwa se nabibajijwe hehe radio ijwi ry’amerika bati se ubundi gahongayire avuga kirundi tubwire uburyo nti njye twaratandukanye n’umusore yunzemo njye nari kubivugira radiyo hano ntibishoboka ijwi ry’amerika bakajya bavuga abanyamakuru rwanda bitangazwa n’ijwi amerika nyine nari ndiyo i washington dc ntabwo nari hano isango star niyo mpamvu n’ujya kubimbaza tugomba kuba turi rwego rumwe aya magambo yababaje cyane abanyamakuru n’abandi barikurikira bashinja mugore kwihenura ubwibone n’ubwirasi abandi bemeza afite ihungabana yatewe kubyara agapfusha kunanirwa n’urushako n’ibindi byinshi abantu batandukanye barimo n’umunyamabanga leta minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga amb olivier nduhungirehe bagaragaje wiyita umukozi w’imana adakwiye kuvuga itangazamakuru ryo rwanda riciriritse mu kiganiro yagiranye kiss fm igitangazamakuru avuga babanye gihe kitoroshye yavuze gusugura itangazamakuru bishobora kumugiraho ingaruka kuko yaba kwisuzugura ati ngiye gusuzugura itangazamakuru njye mbere naba ndi kwisuzuguza ntabwo nasuzugura itangazamakuru ntabwo nanga itangazamakuru heza nk’iwacu ibyo kwirata yavugiye radio ijwi ry’amerika gahongayire yabigereranyije kwishimira intambwe yateye kuvugira radiyo ikomeye aboneraho gusaba imbabazi ababyumvise nabi ati uwaba yarabyumvise nabi yaba umunyarwanda yaba umunyamakuru ambabarire nubwo yasabye imbabazi ariko aline gahongayire yihagazeho avuga cyaha yishinja mutima ahubwo ikibazo gifitwe n’abumvise nabi yavuze ati nta kintu kimwe umutima unshinja reka nkubwire ahantu hari ikibazo hari uburyo kuvuga hari n’uburyo kumva uburyo antoinette umunyamakuru n’uburyo njye mbyumva biratandukanye uburyo bw’imyumvire y’abantu nibwo bushobora kuba bwarakomeretse ariko njyewe nyir’ukuvuga navuze nkanjye kuva gihe yikomwe n’abantu batandukanye kugeza n’ubu aline gahongayire yaranze kugira avuga kibazonone yemeye kuvugana radiyo kiss fm avuga gitangazamakuru rukumbi kitigeze kimuvaho bibazo afite yanditswe habarurema djamali

title: skol yashimishije abatuye huye
content: iki gitaramo cyateguwe skol cyabereye club universitaire kikaba kandi cyari kinagamije kumenyekanisha nzoga skol kubatari bwakayimenyeuhagarariye skol karere huye nyaruguru nyamagabe maniragaba dieudonn yatangaje bateguye gitaramo kugirango nakire abanyeshuri bashya kaminuza iki gitaramo cyahuriranye n’isozwa ry’ibizamini leta mashuri yisumbuye bibam akarusho usibye ibibazo bijyanye n’ibyuma muzika byagiye bigaragara ubundi abanyeshuri n’abandi bitabiriye gitaramo batangaje baryohewe cyane n’ibyo bateguriwe birimo igabanyirizwa ry’ibiciro skol nini n’intoya tombora ndetse n’umuziki ugezweho dieudonn aravuga ubwitabire yabonye bwari buhagije kuko gikorwa kitanateguwe igihe kinini kuri habonetse abantu atakekaga kandi n’ibinyobwa bye bikaba byaguzwe bihagije ikirutaho akaba yabashije gushimisha abantu akahava atagawe abaturage n’abanyeshuri mujyi huye bitabiriye gitaramo barasaba ibitaramo nk’ibi byajya bibageraho kenshi theogne umwe bitabiriye gitaramo yagize abahatuye tutakidagadura kandi bitaramo bizajya binafasha huye kwivugurura kuko kuvugurura si ukubaka gusa dieudonn aratangaza ibitaramo nk’ibi biteganyijwe aka gace byinshi kandi gihe kitarambiranye ngo bizajya biba birimo tombora nyinshi kuruta izari zirimo joro akaba ahamagarira abantu kuzajya babyitabira benshi iki gitaramo cyatangiye saa kumi n’ebyiri z’umugoroba kikarangira gitondo gatandatu cyitabiriwe n’abantu hagati kwinjira byari amafaranga ugahabwa skol ntoya y’ubuntu muryngo ibihembo byatanzwe tombora byari imipira kwambara amakarito y’ibirahure y’inzoga n’ibirahuri skol clarisse umuhire

title: naeb sopyrwa bafashe ingamba guteza imbere ibireti
content: umuyobozi naeb ntakirutimana corneille avuga ibireti birimo gucika kubera imbuto itari nziza yakoreshwaga n’abahinzi avuga bagiye gushakira abaturage imbuto nziza y’ibireti izajya itanga umusaruro kurusha iyari isanzwe kandi idasaza vuba uretse gushaka imbuto year cyane naeb sopyrwa bafite gahunda guteza imbere gihingwa buso gihingwaho ikindi biyemeje ugushishikariza abaturage basanzwe bahinga gihingwa kurushaho gushyira ingufu buhinzi bwacyo nk’uko ntakirutimana akomeza abisobanura imbuto yakoreshwaga ibitsinsi by’ibireti kandi ntibitanga umusaruro ushimishije ibi bituma umusaruro ugenda urushaho kugabanuka kubera abahinzi bacika integer gukomeza guhinga ibitera ubuhinzi bw’ibireti buzajya bukorwa buryo bushya mu gihe bihe abahinzi bateraga ibitsinsi by’ibireti noneho uburyo bushya uguhumbika umurama hanyuma abahinzi bagatera ingemwe z’ibireti zivuye buhumbikiro ibireti bihinzwe buryo bitanga umusaruro ukubye inshuro eshatu uw’ibiterwa ibitsinzi bitanga kandi bikaba bitanasaza vuba naeb yateguye gahunda gushakira abahinzi umurama w’ibireti ugera toni by’imbuto nziza si naeb gusa yateguye murama kuko sosiyete nyarwanda itunganya umusaruro w’ibireti sopyrwa yateguye umurama ungana n’ibiro ugomba guhumbikwa ugaterwa n’abahinzi rwego kuzamura gihingwa kugeza ubuso bw’ubutaka bugomba guterwaho ibireti bugera hegitali rwanda mu ntangiro z’ukwezi habaye umunsi w’abahinzi b’ibireti rwanda kwezi abaturage batangiye gufashwa guhumbika ingemwe nshya gihe bitegura guhinga ibireti kimwe bihingwa ngengabukungu bihingwa rwanda gikunze kuboneka turere tw’imisozi miremire burengerazuba bw’u rwanda ndetse duce tw’imisozi y’amajyaruguru y’uburengerazuba safari viateur

title: itorero inyamibwa ryakumbuje abanyarwanda batuye kenya umuco wabo
content: iri torero rimenyerewe bikorwa by’imbyino n’amakinamico gakondo nyarwanda ryagiye gihugu kenya gikorwa cy’iserukiramuco gakondo nyafurika ryatangiye tariki kugeza kuya ukwakira kaminuza yitiriwe kenyatta i nairobi iri serukiramuco ryari rifite insanganyamatsiko igira ira iti dushyire hamwe dukunde umuco kuko niwo shingiro ry’amahoro umuyobozi w’itorero flugence kwizera avuga basigiye urukumbuzi rukomeye abanyarwanda benshi batuye nairobi ndetse nkengero zayo cyane kuko baje kureba torero benshi kwizera agira abantu barishimye cyane kuko hariya benshi bakunda umuco nyarwanda abanyarwanda bahatuye baje benshi barishima birenze kandi wabonaga bafite urukumbuzi rw’umuco wabo iri torero rikaba ryarabyinnye nyuma munsi cyumweru umunsi witabiriwe cyane n’abanyarwanda batuye gihugu kenyakugirango torero ribashe kwitabira serukiramuco ryabifashishijwemo n’ubuyobozi kaminuza nkuru y’u rwanda gerard gitoli mbabazi

content: mu rwego kumurikira komite nshya yatorewe kuyobora rayon sports ihagaze kipe yagaragaje yakoresheje umutungo ifite ndetse n’ayo yinjije mwaka ushize w’imikino kuri cyumweru rayon sports yabonye ubuyobozi bushya bukuriwe munyakazi sadate wasimbuye muvunyi paul umaze imyaka ibiri perezida wayo nkuko inkuru dukesha igihe ibivuga kipe yagaragaje mwaka ushize w’imikino yungutse ibihumbi frw nyuma gukoresha asaga miliyoni frw rayon sports igaragaza yinjije asaga gato miliyoni mikino yakiriye bibuga bitandukanye gihe yahawe n’ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru rwanda ferwafa agera miliyoni n’ibihumbi frw abafatanyabikorwa bayo batandatu bayihaye miliyoni frw zirimo zatanzwe n’uruganda rwenga ibinyobwa bisembuye n’ibidasembuye skol impuzamashyirahamwe y’umupira w’amaguru afurika caf iyiha ibihumbi gihe amafaranga yagurishijwe abakinnyi agera miliyoni frw raporo ikagaragaza kandi abafana b’iyi kipe bayihaye asaga miliyoni frw binyuze cyiswe fan base abakinnyi n’abakozi rayon sports bahembwe miliyoni frw miliyoni zitangwa nk’uduhimbazamusyi gihe izisaga frw zakoreshejwe kwitegura imikino rayon sports yakoresheje asaga miliyoni frw kugura abakinnyi mwaka ushize w’imikino miliyoni frw zishyurwa akagera business group avance y’imodoka y’abakinnyi gihe kandi hakoreshejwe agera miliyoni frw matike y’indege kipe yakinaga caf confederation cup mwaka ushize muri rusange rayon sports yinjije frw ikoresha igaragaza yungutse frw iyi kipe izahura kcca cecafa kagame cup kabiri tariki nyakanga izahagararira u rwanda caf champions league nyuma kwegukana igikombe shampiyona mwaka ushize w’imikino rayon sports kwitegura umwaka mushya w’imikino yaguze abakinnyi bashya

content: umunyamideli w’umunyarwandakazi mbabazi shadia yiyifurije isabukuru nziza avuga umuntu yemera kurusha abandi ariwe ubwe umunyamideli w’umunyarwandakazi mbabazi shadia yiyifurije isabukuru nziza avuga umuntu yemera kurusha abandi ariwe ubwe ni butumwa yashyize twitter yagize isabukuru nziza muntu nemera kurusha abandi ariwe njyewe ubwanjye uyu mubyeyi w’abana babiri watandukanye n’umugabo witwa meddy saleh ntabwo yatangaje imyaka agize gusa ikwizwi afite abana babiri barimo uw’imfura yabyaye afite imyaka shaddy boo bantu bakurikiwe n’abantu benshi rubuga instagram rwanda abenshi bakunze kuvuga ashobora kuba yicuruza gusa arabihakana uyu mubyeyi akunze kugaragara bikorwa kwamariza ibigo by’ubucuruzi bitandukanye marushanwa atandukanye arimo tour du rwanda mu ntangiriro z’umwaka byatangajwe meddy saleh n’umugore gushaka gatanya nyuma kurushinga ndetse inkuru isa n’iyabaye impamo kuko buri wese asigaye rugo rwe nyuma yaho gashyantare shaddy boo asize meddy nzu babanagamo i nyamirambo arimuka ajya ahandi abana n’abana uyu mugore yagaragaye mashusho y’indirimbo zitandukanye buhoro buhoro king james ni wowe umutare gaby oya yvan buravan n’izindi nyinshi ikintu yakoze kwiyifuriza isabukuru ntabwo kimenyerewe kuko akenshi umuntu wagize isabukuru ayifurizwa n’abandi gusa kuba umuntu yakwiyifuriza isabukuru nziza kibazo kirimo ubutumwa bwe yabutangaje mata

title: abahindi bifatanyije n’abanyarwanda kwibuka jenoside y’abatutsi
content: icyo gikorwa kwibuka cyabereye ishuri rikuru bangalore murwamukuru new delhi cyitabirwa n’abantu bagera magana ane nyuma y’urugendo kwibuka umuyobozi uhagarariye u rwanda buhindi williams nkurunziza yavuze jenoside yakorewe abatutsi itazongera ukundi ati twibagiwe ubumuntu duhinduka inyamaswa dutsemba abavandimwe bacu iyi inkovu itari ikwiye kubaho turizeza ibyabaye bizasubira ukundi yatangaje u rwanda ruviriye jenoside rwateye intambwe itangaje ubukungu bw’igihugu bwiyongereye kigereranyo ijana ugereranyije n’imyaka ishize n’ubukene bukagabanuka gipimo ijana myaka itanu ishize iterambere u rwanda rwagezeho rurikesha perezida paul kagame nyuma kuyobohoza u rwanda agahagarika jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mwaka yahitanye ubuzima bw’inzirakarengane zisaga miliyoni nk’uko nkurunziza akomeza abitangaza ibikorwa nk’ibyo kwibuka byabereye kandi n’i pune salem kuri cyumweru tariki biteganyijwe abanyarwanda bagera i chidambaram coimbatore bangalore nabo baza kwibuka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi nshimiyimana leonard

title: uko ndushaho kuririmba numva ndushaho kwegera ubuntu bw’imana- umuhanzi-igorora
content: umuhanzi igorora iritararenga dieudonn uririmba indirimbo kuramya guhimbaza imana agarukanye indirimbo nshya yise ntawe uhwanye mana iyi ndirimbo ije ikurikira izindi umujyanama iyo uwiteka agukunze el shaddai mu kiganiro twagiranye twamubajije impamvu y’iyi ndirimbo ubu butumwa numvaga bubyiganira mutima wanjye narebye ibibaho bikorwa ntekereje mugenga byose numva ndirimbo igezweho ndavuga nti’ mana ntawe uhwanye we’ kandi mbinyuza ndirimbo yakomeje agira isi kugira ubone imbabazi runaka bisaba icyiru cyangwa ingurane ariko mana ubuntu busaga kandi gihe dushavuye turira gahinda uwiteka atubera ubuhungiro nsanga ntawe uhwanye umuhanzi igorora ukora indirimbo zihimbaza imana mu gushaka kumenya butumwa bumariye abantu yagize ubu butumwa bugarura intege bantu kumva gihe wihebye hari uwakwakira kandi usumba abandi uwiteka birahumuriza rwose kandi bikunze kugaragara ho duturiza duhabwa ihumure kurenza imidurunganyo isi igorora ubarizwa itorero adepr aterwa imbaraga kuririmba indirimbo nk’izi abazwa ikimutera imbaraga kongera ibihangano yatubwiye bimufasha kurushaho kwegera ubuntu bw’imana igorora nahoze ndirimba hiphop ariko mbona itandukaniro kuko umujinya nakundaga kugira wagabanutse urwango kutishima numva nararuhutse ndatuje kandi bimpa kurushaho kubana n’abandi mahoro gukorera imana nibyo bimwongerera imbaraga uyu musore igorora iritararenga dieudonne arateganya gukomeza kugisha inama imana rwego gukomeza kwagura ibikorwa muzika bye byuje ubutumwa kuramya guhimbaza imana yanditswe akayezu snappymuhaburarw

title: dream boyz umuziki niwo ubabeshejeho
content: iri tsinda rivuga umutungo bafite bawuvanye bitaramo n’ibihembo babonye indirimbo yitabirwaho n’abantu benshi best caller tune kuba baririmbyi bahataniraga gutwara igikombe cy’amarushanwa yiswe primus guma guma superstar yateguwe sosiyeti yitwa bralirwa ikora ibinyobwa iri tsinda ryatangiye muzika mwaka rigizwe n’abasore babiri jean claude mujyanama uzwi izina ry’ubuhanzi tmc platini nemeye uzwi izina ry’ubuhanzi platini dream boyz bavuga ubushobozi buturuka ntambwe nziza bagenda batera kazi kabo muzika urugero batanga nko kuba bamaze kugira indirimbo nyinshi kandi ziza mbere zikunzwe gihugu ibi bituma bagira abakunzi benshi bagatumirwa bitaramo bibinjiriza amafaranga platini aganira kigalitodaycom yemeje bagenda batera intambwe umunsi munsi nko kumenya gukoresha ijwi neza kandi bagenda bagira ubumenyi bundi bitewe guhura n’abandi baririmbyi kenshi yagize twateye imbere kuko amafaranga dukoresha buzima nko kurya kwambara gufasha inshuti ndetse n’ibindi tuyakura muziki dream boyz ibona hari intambwe ishimishije igenda iterwa muzika ariko rusange gutera imbere buryo bw’amafaranga muzika nyarwanda bitaragerwaho platini umwe bagize tsinda abihera kuba bindi bihugu bigize umuryango w’afurika y’uburasirazuba abanyamuziki babarirwa bantu bakize bitandukanye rwanda dream boyz itinda ryamenyekanye cyane ndirimbo magorwa mwaka baza gusohora n’izindi ndirimbo mpamiriza ukuri si inzika bella isano n’izindi iri tsinda rikaba riri gutegura gushyira ahagaragara album kabiri yitwa dufitanye isano itariki ugushyingo nyuma y’album mbere si inzika yashyizwe ahagaragara tariki gashyantare jean baptiste micomyiza

title: rdf yasinyanye amasezerano y’ ubufatanye n’ ingabo leta nebraska yitezweho byinshi

title: u burusiya n’u bufaransa ihangana ryeruye ryo kwigarurira centrafrique
content: ni igihugu cyaranzwe n’intambara z’urudaca cyabona ubwigenge inshuro nyinshi cyakunze kubaho nkunga y’igisirikare cy’amahanga igihugu cyadutsemo imvururu zasize ibihumbi by’abaturage bishwe abasaga miliyoni bava byabo izo mvururu zaturutse nyeshyamba ziyitirira kuba idini islam slka n’iz’abakirisitu ziyise anti balaka muri gashyantare i khartoum leta yasinye amasezerano n’imitwe y’inyeshyamba bitanga agahenge ariko ntibyahagaritse ibitero n’ubwicanyi bikozwe bamwe muri myaka ishize gihugu cyabengutswe n’ibihugu bikomeye by’umwihariko u bufaransa bwabanye nacyo bukoloni n’u burusiya buje vuba ihangana ry’u burusiya n’u bufaransa centrafrique mu ugushyingo loni yakuriyeho u burusiya ibihano kugurisha intwaro centrafrique gihugu gitangira kugurishayo intwaro nto guhera u burusiya bwatangiye kwiyegereza gihugu gisirikare kugeza bwanatanze umujyanama wihariye by’umutekano perezida faustin-archange touadra mu majyepfo ashyira uburengerazuba bw’umurwa mukuru bangui hashinzwe ikigo cy’imyitozo gisirikare abasirikare centrafrique batozwa n’abarusiya hafatwa nk’ibirindiro bikuru gisirikare u burusiya nabwo bwagize uruhare isinywa ry’amasezerano y’amahoro aherutse hagati leta n’imitwe y’inyeshyamba uko kwiyegereza centrafrique k’u burusiya ntikwashimishije gato u bufaransa bwabaye gihugu guhera bihe by’ubukoloni u bufaransa umutware ushaje mu gihe cy’ubukoloni hari igice cyiswe ubangi-shari cyahoze cyitwaga afrique-quatoriale franaise igice kirimo ibihugu tchad gabon congo cyakolonizwaga n’u bufaransa icyo gice cyaje kujya centrafrique muri gihe ubutegetsi bw’u bufaransa ubangi-shari bwaranzwe gusahura bujyana bufaransa gufata nabi abaturage kwica bamwe baturage ibyo byatumye abaturage binubira u bufaransa icyakora nyuma y’ubukoloni u bufaransa bwakomeje kugira ijambo rikomeye butegetsi centrafrique ariko abaturage basa nk’abatabyishimiye uruhare rw’u bufaransa rwakomeje guhamya ibirindiro ndetse buri muyobozi wese wayoboye centrafrique yajyagaho ihirikwa ry’ubutegetsi ryagizwemo uruhare n’u bufaransa urugero franois boziz yagiye butegetsi ihirikwa ry’ubutegetsi ryateguwe n’u bufaransa icyo gihe u bufaransa bwabonaga uwari perezida ange-flix patass atangiye kubatera umugongo ibintu byatangiye guhinduka centrafrique yabonaga perezida mushya michel djotodia uyoboye inyeshyamba slka zahiritse boziz nyuma gusinyana amasezerano akanga kuyashyira bikorwa djotodia perezida mbere centrafrique yagize ruhare rugaragara rw’u bufaransa kujyaho kwe djotodia amaze kujya butegetsi bamwe ngabo ze slka batangiye kugenda bica abaturage hirya hino gihugu cyane cyane abakirisitu byabaye ikibazo gikomeye perezida ananirwa kubihagarika afata umwanzuro gusesa slka nubwo nabyo bisa nk’ibitarahise bitanga umusaruro mu ukuboza ubugizi nabi centrafrique bwari bumaze gukaza umurego inyeshyambva slka zibasiye abakirisitu n’inyeshyamba z’abakirisitu anti balaka zibasiye abaturage b’abayisilamu buryo umuryango w’abibumbye wagize impungenge bishobora kuba jenoside akanama loni gashinzwe umutekano kahise kemeza kohereza ingabo gihugu butumwa bw’amahoro bwiswe misca nubwo loni yemeje ingabo zijya butumwa ziba mugabane afurika u bufaransa bwasabye bwajya gutanga ubufasha bw’igihe gito bwiswe operation sangaris abasesenguzi bavuga kugaruka k’u bufaransa atari impuhwe nyinshi bwari bufitiye centrafrique ahubwo ukwisubiza ijambo ryabwo gihugu cyagendaga ritakara ubufasha bw’u bufaransa ntacyo bwakoze buhagarike ubugizi nabi nubwo bwari buri gushora amafaranga menshi gikorwa nyuma y’aho perezida djotodia avuye butegetsi isura y’u bufaransa gihugu yarushijeho guhindana hasokaga raporo ivuga ingabo z’u bufaransa zafashe abagore n’abakobwa ngufu centrafrique muri gashyantare hatowe perezida mushya faustin-archange touadra u bufaransa buvana ingabo zabwo gihugu zisimburwa n’iz’umuryango w’abibumbye butumwa bwiswe minusca mu gihe ingabo z’u bufaransa zari zivuye centrafrique u burusiya bwabonye icyuho butangira gufasha gutera inkunga igisirikare leta centrafrique nyuma y’uko ingabo z’u bufaransa ziviriye gihugu perezida touadra ukimara gutorwa yabonye byaba byiza ashatse ikindi gihugu gikomeye yishingikiriza u bufaransa n’ibindi bihugu by’i burayi byatangiye gukemanga ubufasha bw’u burusiya nubwo gihugu kivuga kirajwe ishinga kugarura amahoro ibindi bihugu bisanga uburyo kugira ijambo rinini bihugu cyane ibya afurika bamwe bakeka u burusiya bufasha gihugu gisirikare buhabwe umutungo kamere urimo amabuye y’agaciro yifashishwa gukora ibyuma by’ikoranabuhanga mu by’ukuri amasezerano hagati y’u burusiya centrafrique ntarashyirwa ahagaragara nabyo bitera inkeke u bufaransa u burayi leta zunze ubumwe amerika ikirushaho gutera inkeke bihugu u burusiya bwaje centrafrique buryo bw’abikorera byinshi bigo bicunga umutekano bituruka burusiya nk’icyizwi cyane cyitwa wagner group bivugwa kandi u burusiya bwabonye amasezerano atandukanye gucukura diyama zahabu bice bigenzurwa n’inyeshyamba nabyo byatumye bwinjira bikorwa guhuza impande zitavuga rumwe mu u burusiya bwagoganye n’umuryango afurika yunze ubumwe guhuza impande zitavuga rumwe u burusiya bwashakaga guhuza mpande buryo bwabwo gihe afurika yunze ubumwe nayo yashakaga kubikora ukwayo iyo migirire y’u burusiya yamaganywe cyane n’ibihugu by’amahanga birimo u burayi amerika icyakora afurika yunze ubumwe yaje kubasha kwiyegurira buhuza bw’u burusiya nabyo byabyaye amasezerano y’amahoro gashyantare bamwe bayobozi b’imitwe y’inyeshyamba bahawe ubuyobozi guverinoma nubwo bitahagaritse ubugizi nabi nkuko byari byitezwe abaturage benshi centrafrique bishimira icyemezo perezida wabo yafashe kwigizayo u bufaransa bwaranzwe gutoba gihugu kibonye ubwigenge icyakora ntibashimishijwe n’uburyo amasezerano khartoum yagenze kuko ubutabera bwaguranywe amahoro nayo batarabona neza kugeza ni ukuvuga abaturage basanga guhana mitwe y’inyeshyamba bishe ibihumbi by’abaturage bagororewe imyanya leta uko kwinjira k’u burusiya gihugu kandi byaciyemo ibice abari leta kuko hari abiyumva ruhande rw’abafaransa n’abandi biyumva ruhande rw’abarusiya perezida centrafrique yahuraga vladmir putin w’u burusiya ukwakira mwaka yavuze bakeneye inkunga nyinshi gisirikare ivuye barusiya yagize hakenewe intwaro zikomeye tugire igisirikare gihamye twizeye abafatanyabikorwa bacu b’abarusiya bazaduha intwaro nini imodoka z’intambara imbunda zikomeye n’izindi ntwaro zizadufasha kugira ubushobozi by’ingabo n’umutekano icyakora ntabwo u burusiya burabasha kwirukana burundu u bufaransa centrafrique hari agatsinda gato k’abasirikare b’u bufaransa gafatanya n’ingabo centrafrique kurinda ikibuga cy’indege iki gihugu kandi cyiracyatanga ubufasha ngabo loni ziri butumwa bw’amahoro centrafrique icyo gihugu kandi ifaranga bakoresha iry’ibihugu byahoze bikolonijwe n’u bufaransa cfa n’amadevize menshi y’icyo gihugu banki nkuru y’u bufaransa u burusiya n’u bufaransa bisa n’ibyatangiye guhangana itangazamakuru nko kamena ibiro ntaramakuru by’abarusiya byatangaje abanyamakuru batatu b’abarusiya bishwe umwaka ushize centrafrique bigizwemo uruhare n’intasi z’u bufaransa icyakora nubwo ibihugu byombi bigihataniye ubutware centrafrique imvururu ntizahagaze ndetse guhangana gushobora gusubiza ibintu irudubi hakaduka izindi nyeshyamba zishamikiye kutumvikana kwabyo cyangwa kimwe kikaba cyatera inkunga imitwe y’inyeshyamba kigamije kwirukana ikindi

title: gatuna hatangajwe igihe abanyarwanda bazasubirira uganda
content: kuri gatanu taliki gashyantare nibwo abakuru b’ibihugu by’u rwandaugandaangolana rdc bahuriye nama yiga kuzahura umubano w’ibihugu byombi yarangiye hafahwe imyanzuro y’ingenzi imyanzuro ifashwe nama yamaze amasaha irimo ukomeye uvuga uganda isabwe kugenda igasuzuma ibirego ishinjwa n’u rwanda gukorana n’imitwe irwanya ubuyobozi bwarwo gihe kingana n’ukwezi hanyuma yasanga ukuri igahagarika burundu gukorana nayo nyuma y’ukwezi nibwo komisiyo z’ibihugu byombi zirimo iyobowe ambnduhungirehe olivier ruhande rw’u rwanda sam kutesa ruhande uganda zizareba uganda yasabwe kwezi yarabikoze hanyuma zihe raporo abakuru b’ibihugu nyuma y’iminsi raporo itanzwe abakuru b’ibihugu bazongera bahurire i gatunakatuna bishimira uganda yubahirije amasezeranoniba yabikoze u rwanda ruzahita rwemerera abanyarwanda gusubira uganda nubwo benshi bazi abanyarwanda barara bemerewe kujya ugandaiyi nama yemeje abanyarwanda bagiye gutegereza ukundi kwezi n’iminsi kugira barebe uganda yasabwe byakozwe ibyerekeye kongera gusubira uganda kw’aabanyarwanda bizaturuka kuntu uganda izaba yahagaritse gukora n’imitwe irwanya u rwanda ndetse bigashimangirwa n’izi komisiyo zashyiriweho i luanda nubwo uganda yabanje guhakana ikorana n’imitwe ishaka guhungabanya umutekano w’u rwandayaje kubyemera mugaragaro nyuma kurekura abanyarwanyi mutwe rud urunana bagabye igitero i musanzeingabo z’u rwanda zikabarasaho bagahungira uganda uganda yabanje guhakana ibafite ndetse ivuga idakorana n’iyi mitwe ariko yatangiye izima ariyo mpamvu byitezwe minsi hari izaba yakoze uganda kandi yaraye ihagaritse pasiporo yarahaye madamu mukankusi charlotte ushinzwe diporomasi mutwe w’iterabwoba rnc abakuru b’ibihugu bishimiye intambwe yatewe buri ruhande kugabanya umwuka w’amakimbirane bishimiye buri gihugu cyarekuye cyari gifunze nzira zidakurikije amategeko n’uburenganzira muntu abahuza barimo angola drcongo bishimiye isinywa ry’amasezerano hagati y’u rwanda uganda guhererekanya abanyabyaha yumvikanweho nama y’abakuru b’ibihugu rwego rw’amategeko harimo gushakira umuti ibibazo by’ibikorwa bishobora guhungabanya umutekano bikozwe n’abantu butaka buri gihugu aba bakuru b’ibihugu kandi title: indwara zandurira mibonano mpuzabitsina zitari sida zikomeje kwiyongera
content: oms ivuga abantu barenga miliyoni barwaye ndwara zandurira mibonano mpuzabitsina zitari sida muri abagera miliyoni bakaba abarwara inzoka tirikomunase trichomonase abagera miliyoni barwara indwara yitwa chamydiase miliyoni zikarwara uduheri tutandukanye dufata myanya y’igitsina imitezi buri mwaka rwego rw’isi yandurwa n’abantu bagera miliyoni ibibembe bifata gitsina bikibasira miliyoni mburugu igeza miliyoni gihe indwara z’umwijima bwoko b hpatite b zandurwa n’abantu basaga miliyoni ku ndwara sida nk’uko bitangazwa oms abayandura bagera miliyoni buri mwaka isi yoseubushakashatsi bwakozwe myaka cumi n’itatu ishize bwagaragaje indwara zendaga gucika ziyongera kubera abantu batagikora imibonano mpuza bitsina ikingiye mbere ibi biterwa habonetse imiti igabanya ubukana sida indwara zandurira mibonano mpuzabitsina ziterwa n’udukoko duto bactries nko mitezi cyangwa se none tugaterwa virusi nko ndwara z’umwijima bita hpatite b sida zikaba zishobora kandi guterwa y’amajyambere nko ndwara y’imitezi afurika yonyine ifite by’umubare twavuze haruguru w’abantu bayandura buri mwaka ahanini bantu bayirwaye abakora umwuga w’uburaya ku ndwara mburugu afurika ifite ibipimo ibibembe bifata gitsina ikagira imibare iteye inkeke ndwara z’umwijima zandurira mibonano hpatite b kuri ndwara afurika ikubye inshuro zose umubare w’abazandura burayi bitewe n’uko bihugu by’uburayi babona inkingo z’izo ndwara gihe afurika bagitangira kuzitanga atari bihugu byose kuri sida afurika abagore bibasiwe cyane kuko bagore bakora umwuga w’uburaya byabo bafite ubwandu sida muri rusange by’abagore bakomoka afurika munsi y’ubutayu sahara bafite ubwandu sida dr nyatanyi thierry ushinzwe gukumira indwara z’ibiza indwara zidakira kigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima rbs yavuze u mibonano mpuzabitsina bakwiriye kumenya hari n’izindi nyinshi kandi mbi cyane ngo umuntu yandura ndwara niko byorohera sida kwinjira bitewe n’ibisebe biza gitsinabimwe bimenyetso biranga uwanduye indwara zifata imyanya ndangagitsina ukuribwa myanya bagore kubona ibimenyetso bigenda bitandukana bitewe n’ubwoko bw’indwara umuntu yanduye ku bagore ho akenshi uburwayi buboneka bubobere buba title: padiri amerika agiye kumurika igitabo gitanga umucyo mpaka z’urudaca zishingiye bibiliya
content: muri gitabo padiri amerika yashyizemo ibice bitandukanye bishingiye bushakashatsi bibiliya bigaragaza ukuri kw’imyererere abantu bajya bibazaho avugamo inzira ikwiriye abanyamadini basa n’abarajwe ishinga kurwana intambara zishingiye myemerere ugasanga barwanira abayoboke kurusha bwaranira kwigisha ukuri kw’ijambo ry’imana agaruka bibazo bigaragara muryango ariko bitavugwaho rumwe nk’ibijyanye kwihorera gusenda abagore kuboneza urubyaro n’ibindi mu kiganiro yagiranye igihe padiri amerika yavuze yagize igitekerezo kwandika gitabo nyuma kwegerwa bamwe bakiristu ayoboye akumva ibibazo bakunze kumubaza bigaragaza hari badasobanukiwe yabihereye kandi gace paruwasi ayobora iherereyemo kabonekamo amadini menshi ariko ugasanga ashishikajwe gushaka abayoboke asebya andi kwigisha ukuri kw’ijambo ry’imana kuboneka bibiliya ati muri gihe abantu benshi baremera dufite amadini atandukanye dusengeramo ugasanga umuntu yabaye uw’idini kuruta kuba uw’ukuri agatsimbarara bindi bemera ariko atanabisobanukiwe yakomeje agira igitabo cyanjye ntabwo igitabo cy’idini igitabo nanditse nk’umuntu buzima bw’iyobokamana ariko cyakwifashishwa n’abantu padiri amerika nko kijyanye kuboneza urubyaro agaragaza hari abagendera mugambo aboneka bibiliya avuga mubyare mwororoke mungane n’umusenyi nyanja yavuze nubwo bibiliya ivuga ityo aburahamu ufatwa sekuruza w’abemera yabyaye abana umunani gusa gihe cye bishingiye bushobozi n’inshingano afite ibyo bijyanye n’andi magambo bibiliya ibaruwa kabiri pawulo intumwa yandikiye abanyakolenti handitse si abana bateganyiriza ababyeyi ahubwo ababyeyi bateganyiriza abana padiri amerika agaragaza ngingo yereka umubyeyi kubyara uburenganzira n’inshingano ati byara ushoboye kurera utazaba interagahinda akurushye arushye n’igihugu muri gitabo kandi umwanditsi agaruka buhanuzi bweze gihe cyane cyane ubujyanye n’igihe isi izarangirira yabwiye igihe ntawe ukwiriye guhanura iby’irangira ry’isi atarayishyizeho bikwiriye guharirwa imana nayo yaremye yifuza uzasoma gitabo asobanukirwa n’imyemerere ndetse n’itandukaniro n’iy’abandi ariko byose bikaba ibiganisha kubana neza n’abandi gushwana ati tureke kuba abantu b’idini ntabwo idini ishyaka ishyaka mbere ukurwanirira kubana neza n’abandi kugira mugenzi wawe akugirireho umugisha umugirireho umugisha musenyeri diyosezi kabgayi smaragde mbonyintege wanditse ijambo ry’ikaze ry’iki gitabo mbonyintege ijambo ry’ikaze yavuze gitabo kije gukemura impaka z’urudaca myumvire bibiliya matorerro atandukanye ati impaka z’urudaca myumvire bibiliya duhuriyehon’andi matorero ndetse masakramentu bamwe mubanyamatorero bakunze kugoreka imyumvire umwanditsiyabiboneye ibisubizo buryo bwumvikana yongeyeho iki gitabo ndagishimira kitagamije kwinjira mpaka n’abagoreka twigisha ahubwo gufasha mbere mbere abakristu bacu gusobanukirwa mpaka z’ababarundaho ibisobanuro biyobya iki gitabo kizamurikwa gatanu i kigali hotel st famille guhera saa kumi n’igice z’umugoroba

title: u rwanda rurahagarariwe imurikagurisha rikomeye ry’ubukerarugendo bufaransa amafoto
content: iri murikagurisha ryo rwego hejuru rizwi iltm international luxury travel market ribera i cannes ni nshuro kane u rwanda rwitabiriye murikagurisha iltm ihuriza imbaga nzu y’ahitwa palais des festivals’ isanzwe yakira ibyamamare sinema rwego mpuzamahanga inama mpuzamahanga zihuriramo abakuru b’ibihugu n’imiryango mpuzamahanga n’andi maserukiramuco akomeye rihuza abaguzi abagurisha n’abafatanyabikorwa bijyanye n’ubukerarugendo rwego ruhanitse baturutse isi bihugu aziya amerika y’epfo afurika cannes iby’abarabu n’u bushinwa u rwanda ruhagarariwe n’abagurisha ubukerarugendo bigenga baryitabiriye babifashijwemo leta y’u rwanda binyuze rdb itsinda ry’abanyarwanda bitabiriye imurikagurisha ry’ubukerarugendo rigizwe manzi kayihura thousand hills africa robert gakimbiri primate safaris daniel ndizeye akagera aviation elise milenge charleston tours david rutikanga songa africa eloisa barberis canonico volcanoes safaris roberto viviani wilderness safaris simon bruce miller uberluxe safaris bonita mutoni oneonly ariella kageruka philbert ndandali bahagarariye rdb aho kumurikira ibikorwa byabo harimbishijwe buryo buhamagararira abahanyura gusura u rwanda bakareba ibyiza rufite rwego rw’ubukerarugendo kageruka ariella uhagarariye rdb yabwiye igihe bitabiriye murikagurisha rihanitse bagaragarize amahanga serivisi zitandukanye zitangwa rwanda uru rwego yagize twazanye n’ibigo bigurisha ubukerarugendo rwanda buri wese avuga u rwanda ariko akanerekana serivisi ashobora gutanga ni byiza dukomeza kwitabira amamurika nk’aya uru rwego nk’abanyafurika n’abanyarwanda bafite gahunda gukomeza guteza imbere ubukerarugendo gihugu tugere ntego twiyemeje’’ yavuze rwanda hari hoteli nshya zizamurwa ndetse sosiyete y’ubwikorezi bw’ingendo kirere rwandair biri bituma ubukerarugendo butera imbere kurushaho yakomeje avuga turi hano tubwire isi ukora ntubyerekane bitange umusaruro ntacyo uba ukora turi gukora ubuvugizi tuganira n’abo twasanze tukabereka uburyo tuborohereza ingendo n’ibyo bazaba baje gusura rwanda’’ ubukerarugendo bw’u rwanda myaka ishize bukomeza kuzamuka kongera ingano y’amadovize bwinjiriza igihugu kageruka yavuze ubukerarugendo bukura harebwa uburyo abakerarugendo bake binjiza inyungu nyinshi bitewe n’imishinga yagutse ibakururira gusura u rwanda elise milenge uhagarariye charleston tours kiganiro igihe yavuze gutangira bakiraga abantu biyongereye bagera kandi bishimira serivisi bahabwa ati sinkubeshya abakiliya banjye bampa ingufu gukomeza gukorana n’u rwanda kuko baje iwanyu baza bifuza kugaruka natwe tukagaruka kuko bakoze ubuvugizi’’ yashimiye leta y’u rwanda rdb yaborohereje mikoranire bigatuma akazi kabo kagenda neza ati usanga kandi abakiliya bacu bagaruka kubera umutekano isuku kugira gps gihugu title: coronavirus abahanga australia batangiye kugerageza inkingo covid-
content: abahanga siyansi australia batangiye kugerageza ebyiri zishobora kuzaba inkingo coronavirus magerageza y’ ingenzi ’laboratoire’ izo nkingo zakozwe kaminuza oxford bwongereza kompanyi inovio pharmaceuticals leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika zahawe uruhushya n’ishami ry’umuryango w’abibumbye ryita buzima omswho kugeragerezwa nyamaswa bbc dukesha nkuru itangaza ikigo australia cyita bumenyi siyansi kizagenzura nkingo zikora ndetse ngaruka zagira bantu igerageza mbere ry’urukingo bantu ryabereye amerika kwezi gushize gatatu ariko risimbuka icyiciro kubanza kugeragerezwa nyamaswa hari izindi nkingo nyinshi zirimo gukorwa bice bitandukanye by’isi gihe kandi muvuduko udasanzwe ariko nkingo ziri kugeragezwa n’ikigo australia siyansi n’ubushakashatsi bugari gishamikiye muryango commonwealth csiro zirihariye nkuko kibivuga ikigo csiro kivuga magerageza azaba abaye mbere yimbitse nyamaswa abanziriza nkingo zigeragerezwa barwayi nyabarwayi abashakashatsi bavuga umuvuduko n’ubufatanye rwego rw’isi byatumye cyiciro cy’igerageza kigerwaho buryo butari bwarigeze bubaho mbere dr rob grenfell kigo csiro yabwiye abanyamakuru kane ubusanzwe bifata igihe cy’umwaka umwe kugera myaka ibiri kugira hagerwe cyiciro none by’ukuri twakigabanyije kiba igihe cy’amezi macye bizagenda gute mu minsi micye ishize itsinda ry’abashakashatsi kigo csiro bashyize ingero z’izo nkingo nyamaswa z’inyamabere muryango w’agasamunyiga byamaze kugaragara nyamaswa muryango w’agasamunyiga zandura coronavirus buryo bumwe nkuko abantu bayandura sars-cov- bwoko coronavirus butera indwara myanya y’ubuhumekero covid- ku isi hari gukorwa inkingo zigera covid- rero ikigo csiro kirikugerageza ebyiri zatoranyijwe n’urugaga isi ruri kugenzura bwinshi bushakashatsi bugamije kubona urukingo urwo rugaga rwitwa ’coalition for epidemic preparedness innovations’ uburyo bumwe bushobora kuzavamo urukingo nyirizina bwakozwe kaminuza oxford ni urukingo mwikorezi vector vaccine rukoresha virusi ’mpimbano’ rwifitemo bityo rugashyira intungamubiri coronavirus bwirinzi bw’umubiri ubundi rukareba bigenda n’uko umubiri ubyitwaramo profeseri trevor drew ukuriye ’laboratoire’ australia ipima ibijyanye n’ubuzima bw’inyamaswa iryo gerageza riri gukorerwa yagize ariko ntabwo ziyongera intungamubiri z’iyo coronavirus y’inkoranorero ntabwo bishoboka umuntu yarwara bitewe n’uru rukingo yavuze urundi rukingo ruri kugeragezwa - kompanyi ikora imiti inovio pharmaceuticals - rutandukanye cyane n’urwo rundi ariko rurashimishije rwakorewe gutahura intungamubiri proteins zimwe zimwe coronavirus ishyira bwirinzi bw’umubiri zigatuma utunyangingo tw’umubiri twihutira gukora nk’izo ntungamubiri mbere yuko ubwirinzi bw’umubiri butangira kugira buzikoraho profeseri drew yagize ni ingenzi cyane gukoresha uburyo gushakiriza henshi biduha amahirwe menshi cyane kugera ntsinzi ibyavuyemo tuzabimenya ryari hashoboka abo bahanga siyansi bavuze ibya mbere bizava magerageza y’inkingo nyamaswa bishobora gutangazwa kwezi gatandatu mwaka mu gihe byaba bitanze umusaruro mwiza nkingo zahita zoherezwa kugeragerezwa barwayi bigakorerwa ’laboratoire’ z’ahandi isi kuri cyiciro kwihutira kugeza muti isoko bishobora guhita byihutishwa cyane ariko impuguke ziburira haba hagisigaye nibura amezi urwo rukingo ruhabwe ibyangombwa ndetse rusuzumwe n’ubuziranenge nk’urugero urukingo kaminuza oxford ruri gukorerwa igerageza yindi ’laboratoire’ yindi nyamaswa bundi bwoko kugira rwuzuze ibisabwa n’amategeko amerika dr grenfell yagize mu by’ukuri ibishobora kuvamo inkingo byose biba bihuriweho kompanyi n’imiryango myinshi kuko muryango umwe rukumbi ushobora by’ukuri gukora urukingo wonyine ariko yavuze afite icyizere kizava magerageza ashingiye bufatanye bw’abantu n’ibigo bitandukanye isi kuyagiramo uruhare ati ubu ubufatanye bw’ukuri rwego rw’ubushakashatsi rubanda ndetse n’abikorera giti cyabo kugira rwose tugere ntsinzi ibintu bigeze

title: ubwongereza murumuna minisitiri w’intebe boris johnson yeguye nteko guverinoma
content: jo johnson murumuna minisitiri w’intebe w’ubwongereza boris johnson yatunguye abongereza n’isi rusange yatangazaga yeguye mwanya minisitiri mu nteko ishinga amategeko rwego gusigasira umuryango n’igihugu kuko atumvikanaga mukuru bijyanye brexit jo johnson yatangazaga ubwegure bwe kane yavuze atari agishoboye guhuza inyungu z’umuryango n’inyungu z’igihuguboris johnosn ibumoso murumuna jo johnson iburyo jo johnson usanzwe minisitiri ushinzwe ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi ndetse akaba umudepite uhagarariye agace orpington umwe bashyigikiye ubwongereza bwaguma muryango w’ibihugu by’i burayi ue ndetse kamarampaka yatoye bashyigikiye kifuzo ni gihe rundi ruhande mukuru boris johnson isonga mpirimbanyi zishaka gukura ubwongereza muryango bita brexit ndetse theresa may yananirwa kegura agasimburwa n’uyu mugabo yarahiriye kuzavana gihugu muryango ndetse cyumweru yatangaje kongera gusubika ’brexit’ yahitamo ’gupfa’ibinyamakuru byinshi bwongereza byagarutse nkuru bimwe bivuga muryango boris johnson batamufitiye icyizere uku kwegura murumuna ikimenyetso gikomeye cyongeye kugaragaza abongereza rusange bakomeje kutavuga rumwe cyemezo

title: rssb yagaragaje mutuelle de sant ifite icyuho miliyari frw
content: umuyobozi mukuru rssb regis rugemanshuro yabitangaje gatanu komisiyo y’ingengo y’imari n’umutungo by’igihugu nteko ishinga amategeko biganiro n’inzego zinyuranye mbanzirizamushinga y’itegeko rigena ingengo y’imari leta y’umwaka rugemanshuro yagarutse yagarukaga kibazo gutinda kwishyura fagitire z’ibigo nderabuzima ndetse n’ibitaro yavuze kugeza munsi dufite icyuho miliyari frw gahunda mituelle de sant nubwo hari miliyari z’amafaranga y’u rwanda yatanzwe gahunda ngengo y’imari y’uyu mwaka hari miliyari zisaga frw zakoreshejwe kwishyura amafaranga kwivuza haracyari miliyari zirenga z’amafaranga y’inyemezabuguzi atarishyurwa yavuze rimwe rimwe usanga bagera bakoresha amafaranga atangwa n’abakozi bakoresha ubwisungane rama kugira bazibe icyuho yatangaje rssb yagiranye ibiganiro minisiteri y’imari n’igenamigambi harebwa hazibwa cyuho minisitiri w’ubuzima dr ngamije daniel yavuze rimwe rimwe rssb itinda kwishyura ibitaro serivizi biba byarahaye abarwayi buryo bigera mezi ane cyangwa atanu yavuze ikibazo nk’iki kigira ingaruka mikorere yabyo kandi bituma bahanishwa ibihano gihe badashoboye kubahiriza igihe ntarengwa cy’iminsi kwishyura amafaranga y’amazi n’amashanyarazi akenerwa kazi kabo kugeza gahunda y’ubwisungane kwivuza ahanini ibona amafaranga baturage abayikoresha benshi batanga amafaranga ibihumbi bitatu buri mwaka guverinoma yishyura amafaranga ibihumbi bibiri buri muntu ukennye guverinoma iherutse gusaba uburyo bushya gutera inkunga gahunda harimo kongera umusanzu buri muntu ukennye bihumbi bibiri isanzwe itanga ikagera bitatu ubu buryo bushya bukaba bushobora gutanga arenga miliyari buri mwaka aya mafaranga kandi azava ahantu hatandukanye harimo miliyari esheshatu z’amafaranga y’u rwanda azatangwa leta hagati akazava mi bigo by’’itumanaho hariho kandi azava mushahara buri mukozi ukora bikorera ndetse n’abo nzego leta buryo bukaba bushobora kuzana miliyari z’amafaranga y’u rwanda buri mwaka n’ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye abantu bagera nibo bakoresha buryo ubwisungane mutuelle baturage bagera miliyoni batuye u rwanda

title: ntacyabuza imyiteguro chogm gukomeza-clare akamanzi
content: mu gihe hirya hino isi hari inkubiri gusubika ibikorwa bitandukanye bihuza abantu benshi birimo n’inama kubera impungenge z’ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo covid guverinoma y’u rwanda iratangaza imyiteguro y’inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu n’aba guverinoma bigize umuryango commonwealth ikomeje mu kiganiro yagiranye n’abikorera rwanda gitondo gatanu umukuru w’ikigo cy’igihugu cy’iterambere rdb clare akamanzi yagaragaje nubwo icyorezo covid giterwa n’agakoko corona giteye impungenge gihe guverinoma y’u rwanda yahisemo gukomeza imyiteguro y’iyo nama nako inakurikiranira ikibazo corona virus cyerekeza akamanzi yashimangiye hagendewe gihe kibura inama chogm iteranire i kigali kugeza u rwanda commonwealth rusange basanga mpamvu n’imwe yatuma imyiteguro y’iyo nama idakomeza biteganyijwe inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu n’aba guverinoma bigize umuryango commonwealth izwi chogm izabera i kigali hagati tariki z’ukwezi mwaka ikazitabirwa n’ababarirwa hagati y’ibihumbi birindwi n’icumi muhaburarw
