title: nzeyimana isidore yahimbye ishyiga kijyambere tekutangije
content: iyo mbabura ishobora guteka ibintu byinshi inshuro ibiryo mashyiga inyotse ziba zashyizwe ifuru ndetse n’amazi umuntu ashobora gushyushya gasiterine uretse kuba tekutangije ishobora guteka ibintu bitandukanye icyarimwe ifite akarusho kurondereza inkwi tekutangije ifite amashyiga abiri kandi buri shyiga rifite bashyira inkwi hagati y’amashyiga hari ifuru inyuma y’ibyo byose hakaba agasiterine gashyushya amazi nyezimana sobanura buri shyiga rijyamo ingeri sentimetero yemeza ingeri esheshatu zigahisha inkono enye ebyiri mashyiga ifuru siterine ikindi cyiza tekutangije umutetsi aticwa n’imyotsi kuko ifite uruhombo rurerure rujyana umwotsi kure akandi karusho shyiga riba riri kumwe n’ubwogerezo bumwe cyangwa bubiri lavabos bitewe n’icyifuzo cy’uyishaka hamwe n’ameza guteguriraho guteka ibyo byose imbabura n’ibiyiherekeje bikoze aluminium nzeyimana asobanura amashyiga akora arimo ibyiciro bitatu bitewe n’ingano y’amazi ashobora gushyushya irinini rishobora gushyushya litiro rikaba rigura hagati irikurikiyeho rishobora gushyushya litiro rikagura hagati y’amafaranga iritoya rishobora gushyushya litiro rikaba rigura hagati y’amafaranga uretse tekutangije nzeyimana isidore akora muvero zifashishwa gutekera abanyeshuri shodiyeri chaudire zikora vaperi vapeurs n’ibindi intego ukurengera ibidukikije nzayimana umwe bitabiriye ibiganiro bushakashatsi mpuzamahanga gukoresha ingufu tubungabunga ibidukikije yateguwe kaminuza nkuru y’u rwanda iherereye karere huye ibi biganiro byatangiye tariki bikazarangira tariki ugushyingo kakunze alfred

title: rubavu abifotoza bashaka indangamuntu baranenga serivisi mbi bahabwa
content: bamwe baturage karere rubavu bavuga abashinzwe irangamimere mirenge bahawe inshingano gufasha abakeneye indangamuntu batabashije kuzuza neza inshingano icyo bashingiraho nu babwira abaturage bafite akazi kenshi bikadindiza imitangire serivisi basaba umurenge gisenyi karere rubavu ukaba umwe mirenge gihugu hose yatoranijwe n’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe indangamuntu kugira hatangirwe serivisi gufotora abakeneye indangamuntu zegerejwe iyi serivisi ikaba yarashinzwe abakozi bafite nshingano irangamimirere murenge abaturage bakenera serivisi cyane cyane abanyeshuri bavuga bafite ikibazo guhabwa serivisi mbi n’aba bakozi bitewe n’uko bababwira bafite inshingano nyinshi nambajemariya sarah karere rubavu yagize twaje saa kumi n’ebyiri twategereje ariko ntacyo baradukorera bigeze saa tatu turifuza baduha serivisi neza tukajya ishuri tuyishime jean norbert twageze hano gitondo saa kumi n’ebyiri ariko twasanze serivisi zikiri hasiharacyarimo agatotsi ukuntu kuko nk’aha kuba bamaze kudufotora gukorera n’abandi kandi baduha umunsi umwe cyumweru ubwashize byarapfuye n’uyu munsi bigapfa urumva amasomo arikuducika uwase joselyne avuga kuba badahabwa serivisi zihuse bituma bakererwa amasomo ati twarituje kwifotoza abandi baje kwireba irangamimerereariko ntacyo badukorera kandi hari abahageze saa kumi n’ebyiri mpamaze amasaha kudukereza twataye amasomo abandi kwiga amasomo urumva birababaje umukozi ushinzwe irangamimerere murenge gisenyi ndagijimana sebunyenyeri aganira rba dukesha nkuru avuga akazi kenshi bagira akazi gukemura ibibazo by’abaturage serivisi zose z’irangamimirere n’ibindi bikorwa bitegurwa mirenge bakaba baranongerewe n’izi nshingano gufotora ntibiborohera gutanga serivisi nziza bikwiye baturage baturutse karere yagize dukurikije akazi dufite ntabwo kaba koroshye akazi kenshi cyane none akaba umurenge umwe ufotora baturage b’akarere rubavu kose umurenge umwe ufotora ntabwo biba byoroshye bibaye byiza hakiyongeraho murenge byaba byiza nk’uko hariho gahunda y’uko gufotora byagezwa mirenge mu kwezi mwaka ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe indangamuntu nida cyamanuye serivisi gufotora ziva murenge remera karere gasabo ndetse gukosora imyirondoro y’irangamimerere ndangamuntu ziva murenge niboye karere kicukiro zijyanwa mirenge gihugu hose umuyobozi w’ishami ry’irangamimirere n’inyandiko by’abaturage kigo harerelimana margaritte avuga bashishikarije inzego z’ibanze kugabanyiriza inshingano abashinzwe irangamimerere kuko bituma serivisi zidindira muri gikorwa gufotorera abaturage mirenge buri karere hashyizweho umunsi umwe cyumweru gufotora abaturage bujuje imyaka bakahahurira kuva hatangira gahunda gutanga irangamuntu ikozwe buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga abaturage basaga miliyoni bamaze guhabwa indangamuntu

title: ibirori by’imideli gakondo bizahuza bihugu birindwi
content: muri mwaka ibirori kurimba rwanda cultural fashion show’ byabaye bice bibiri icya mbere cyabaye itariki gicurasi cyari umusogongero kwerekana ibirori nyamukuru kuwa nzeri bizaba biteguwe ibirori nyir’izina bizabera sports view hotel i remera kuwa nzeri bizahuriza hamwe abahanzi b’imideli fashion designers bazava bihugu birindwi birimo rwanda kenya leta zunze ubumwe amerika repubulika iharanira demokarasi congotanzania nigeria uganda abahanzi b’imideli bazerekana ubwoko bw’imideli bugera cumi bubiri byiciro byose haba myambaro y’abagore n’iy’abagabo muri bahanzi b’imideli bitezwe rwanda cultural fashion show harimo batandatu rwanda gusa abandi bazaturuka hanze y’igihugu abo rwanda barimo augustin hakizima azerekana rwanda hambere bambaraga umurerwa jossete inzovu village african print batik odette sch ltd mutuyeyezu marie paule ns creationsni abahanzi bakizamuka bibumbiye hamwe kenya izaba ihagarariwe vinn clizz uzerekana imyenda abagabo barimbana ndetse tanzania izaba ifitemo umwe witwa hameed abdul ugiye kuza rwanda nshuro kabiri igihugu uganda kizaba gihagarariwe robinah u bazerekana ibyiganjemo imirimbo igezweho n’imyambaro y’abana muri leta zunze ubumwe amerika hazaza uwitwa nancy zeller anne dickson nigeria patricia kinga rdc uzerekana imyenda ikunze kwifashishwa birori by’ubukwe mu gutegura rwanda cultural fashion show izaba kuwa nzeri ntawirema celestin umuyobozi w’igikorwa avuga yabanje gukora ingendoshuri bindi bihugu yigira bandi bategura ibikorwa nk’ibi ati igikorwa kirihariye kuko nakoze ingendoshuri bindi bihugu nigira bandi nagiye dubai fashion week singapore hong kong hose narebye ukuntu bakora mu gikorwa twateguye nagerageje gufata abahanga imideli fashion designers b’abahanga bazerekana ibintu bizima ikindi tuzakora ibintu biri murongo yongeraho muri rusange abantu bakwitega bizaba byiza cyane kuko bazabasha kubona imyenda myinshi kandi myiza uburyo kwicara buzaba bumeze neza kuko buri tike izaba irimo kunywa ikindi n’umuntu uzazana n’umuryango twabateganyirije uburyo abantu bane bazicarana ahantu hamwe kandi bakabona kunywa abanyamideli baziyerekana birori harimo bane bazaturuka kenya n’abandi babiri bazava tanzania abasigaye abasanzwe bakora mwuga barimo n’abashya rwanda mu myaka ine ishize atangije rwanda cultural fashion show amaze kuzamura abanyamideli barenga ijana ndetse avuga ashakisha uburyo yabageza rwego mpuzamahanga amafoto y’ibirori by’umusogongero rwanda cultural fashion show byabaye gicurasi amafoto y’umwihariko udasanzwe birori by’imideli y’ibwami ntawirema aherutse gutegura i title: kigali serena hotel nyungwe forest lodge hoteli zifite inyenyeri rwanda
content: mu gikorwa gutangaza uru rutonde cyabereye serena hotel i kigali tariki amahoteli yahawe inyenyeri zitandukanye eshanu hejuru kugera nyenyeri hagendewe ibipimo afurika y’iburasirazuba urwo rutonde ruvuga the manor lemigo mille collines lake kivu serena ziri gice cy’amahoteli afite inyenyeri enye top tower alpha palace virunga musanze amwe hoteli arindwi kigero cy’amahoteli afite inyenyeri eshatu amahoteli niyo yahawe inyenyeri ebyiri relay’s gorilla hoteli niyo yonyine yahawe inyenyeri igenzura n’ishirwa rutonde rw’amahoteli byakozwe n’ikipe y’impuguke by’amahoteri igizwe n’abakozi leta abacuruzi rwanda hamwe n’impuguke karere k’afurika y’iburasirazuba rica rwigamba ushinzwe ubukerarugendo n’ibidukikije rdb yasobanuye isuku umutekano gushimisha umurava kwakira abantu ndetse n’ingano y’ibyumba biri ingingo zakurikijwe gutanga nyenyeri rwigamba yavuze amahoteli atarashyizwe rutonde adahejwe kuko bazayashyiraho nyuma kuzuza ibyangombwa bayasabye birimo kuvugura inyubako yabijeje bazajya rutonde tw’ubutaha perezida w’amahoteli utubari n’amarestora denis karera yasobanuye inyenyeri zirutanwa ubukuru bw’amahoteli burutanwa yabigereranyije n’inyenyeri gisirikare umusirikare yongerwa inyenyeri bitewe n’ibikorwa byiza yakoze monique mukaruliza ministiri ushinzwe ibikorwa by’afurika y’iburasirazuba umushyitsi mukuru yavuze leta y’u rwanda ishyigikiye igikorwa guteza imbere amahoteli rwanda kuko ariyo nkingi y’ubukerarugendo yagize amahoteli soko y’ifaranga ryo hanze rituma amafaranga y’u rwanda agira igihagararo cyiza minisitiri mukaruliza yasobanuye ishyirwa rutonde ry’amahoteli rwanda hakurikijwe ibipimo by’afurika y’iburasirazuba birushaho guha amahoteli nyarwanda uburyo kumenyekana rwego rw’isi john gara umuyobozi w’ikigo cy’igihugu cy’iterambere rdb yavuze gutanga uru rutonde bizatuma amahoteli ahorana ishyaka ryo kunoza serivisi kugira azamuke ntera kandi n’abashyitsi bazajya babasha guhitamo ihoteli bitewe n’urwego bashaka mu byishimo byinshi afite jean luc ushinzwe imurikagurisha nyungwe forest lodge yavuze adatunguwe kuba bahawe inyenyeri eshanu yabivuze magambo twigisha abakozi bacu bihagije kandi tukanakora bwabaga gutanga serivisi nziza buri gace kose kagize nyungwe forest lodge nshimiyimana barthazar nyiri virunga hotel yahawe inyenyeri eshatu yavuze leta y’u rwanda yaramufashije cyane kuzamura serivisi hoteli content: imvura idasanzwe yaguye mugoroba kabiri tariki ukwakira yasize imiryango idafite kwikinga ndetse yangiza burundu imyaka bishanga bishenyi kamiranzovu karere kamonyi nkuko tubikesha voicemagnews mvura yibasiye bikomeye umurenge runda rugarika dore n’ingaruka zayo ziganje cyane rugabano rw’iyi mirenge prisca uwamahoro umuyobozi w’akarere kamonyi wungirije ushinzwe imibereho myiza y’abaturage yatangaje mvura yangije inzu ndetse gushaka inzu zabo zisanwa bagasubira byabo yagize abaraye bagize ikibazo inzu zabo zikangirika cyane bagenzi baraye babacumbikiye igisigaye ingamba kureba inzu zabo zasanwa ngira murabizi dukoresha umuganda ariko tunakora raporo tukayishyikiriza minisiteri y’imicungire y’ibiza n’impunzi kugira babone isakaro ariko bitanashobotse natwe nk’akarere turiyegeranya tukabafasha mu nzu zangijwe n’iyi mvura ziherereye murenge runda tugari twa muganza kabagesera izindi eshatu ziri murenge nyamiyaga uyu muyobozi avuga hegitari z’ibigori bishanga bitatu biri murenge runda bishenyi zimaze kubarurwa zangiritse mu gishanga bishenyi hangiritse hegitari z’ibigori icya kamiranzovu yangije ibigori biri hegitari gishanga rwubushyashya yangije ibigori biri hegitari bamwe baturage bafite imyaka bishanga byangiritse bavuga bakoragamo ubuhinzi kijyambere bakoresha imashini zuhira imyaka baguze gahunda nkunganire umwe urabona byose byarengewe duhuye n’igihombo gikomeye cyane buryo nk’uko leta yaradufashije gahunda nkunganire mafumbire n’imbuto twongeye tukabona indi nkunganire twakongera tugasubizamo kuko haracyari kare kuri kibazo uwamahoro yasobanuye kuba igishanga cyasubiye kuba nk’intabire bisaba abari barahahinze bahavugurura ubundi bagashakirwa indi mbuto bagatera bundi bushya kuko igihembwe cy’ihinga kitararenga

title: menya amagambo meza udakwiye kwibagirwa kubwira umukunzi wawe buri munsi
content: urukundo nk’ubusitani bw’indabo bukeneye kubagarirwa kuhirwa buri munsi kubaka urukundo uguhozaho mpamvu hari amagambo make ushobora gohora ubwira umukunzi wawe akarushaho kugukunda kukwiyumvamo iyemeze igihe cyose uzaba ufite ukunda yaba umuhungu cyangwa umukobwa uzajya umubwira amagambo akurikira bizatuma igihe cyose muzaba kumwe bibanyura mwembi ndagukunda iri jambo ijambo ryoroshye kandi rikwiye kubwira umukunzi wawe gerageza kujya uribwira umukunzi wawe igihe agusekeje cyangwa igihe akoze ikintu cyikwibutsa impamvu kumwe nari ndi kugutekereza ni byiza kubwira umukunzi wawe uba umutekereza n’iyo tari kumwe nubona ikintu kigushimishije munsi kimumenyeshe wiriwe ute imenyereze kubaza umukunzi wawe ibibazo ahura nabyo kazi ke buri munsi mubaze mugenzi bakorana nshingano ze mwereke ipfundo ry’urukundo rizabyara umusaruro waberewe niba mukundanye igihe kirekire birororshye kwiyibagiza byinshi kandi ngombwa kwibutsa umukunzi wawe yambaye imyenda igushimisha n’imishyikirano cyangwa ibiganiro biganisha rukundo umvisha umukunzi wawe ingenzi wowe ndetse muntu wamugereranya isi ariwe ubaruta nkunda ibitekerezo byawe ujye ubwira umukunzi wawe ukunda title: buravan michal sengazi herv kimenyi bazifashishwa kwezi kwizihiza imyaka oif imaze
content: ni igikorwa cyatangiye nk’uburyo abari muryango oif uhurije hamwe abaturage bavuga igifaransa basaga miliyoni isi bakwishimira ururimi rw’igifaransa rukoreshwa byinshi kuri nshuro mwaka birihariye cyane cyane ambasade y’u bufaransa rwanda ku rwego mpuzamahanga ho hazaba hizihizwa imyaka muryango oif umaze utangijwe iki gikorwa kizabera rwanda bufatanye n’ibigo leta bitandukanye birimo minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga ndetse n’iy’uburezi abadipolomate bahagarariye ibihugu bigize muryango n’abandi bayobora oif muri werurwe hateganyijwe ibikorwa bitandukanye mujyi kigali by’umwihariko hazabanza gutangiza mugaragaro uku kwezi nk’uko kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka muryango umaze charg d’affaires ambasade y’u bufaransa i kigali jrmie blin juliette bigo uyobora ikigo ndangamuco cy’abafaransa rwanda bazagirana ikiganiro n’itangazamakuru werurwe saa tanu gitondo onomo hotel ibindi bikorwa biteganyijwe harimo igitaramo cy’umuhanzi yvan buravan wegukanye prix title: u rwanda rwatangiye amarushanwa basketball abera i bujumbura rutsindwa
content: ikipe y’u rwanda y’abahungu batarengeje imyaka yatsinzwe n’ikipe y’u burundi y’abakuru amanota abakobwa b’u rwanda batarengeje imyaka batsindwa n’ikipe y’u burundi y’abakuru amanota umutoza w’ikipe y’u rwanda karima cyrille yadutangarije n’ubwo amakipe y’u rwanda yatangiye atsindwa bidahangayikishije kuko kipe icyayijyanye iryo rushanwa ahanini ukwiga kugira bizayifashe kwitwara neza mikino y’akarere gatanu izabera i kigali tariki kugeza ati hano hari amakipe afite abakinnyi bakuze kurusha abana bacu ikindi kandi bagomba gukina imikino myinshi gihe gito kuko hari n’ahateganyijwe gukina imikino ibiri munsi ibi kibazo biduteye kuko tugomba kumenyera gukina imikino nk’iyi buryo kuko nibyo bizadufasha mikino y’akarere gatanu impamvu ikipe y’abakobwa yatsinzwe amanota menshi cyane n’ikipe y’uburundi - ahanini bakoreshaga abakinnyi umunani gusa kuko abandi batandatu biga i kabgayi babuze uruhushya rubemerera kujya i bujumbura ariko bakazitabazwa gikombe cy’akarere gatanu iyi mikino izasozwa cyumweru tariki yitabiriwe n’amakipe y’abagabo n’abagore harimo abiri y’u burundi abiri akomoka repubulika iharanira demukarasi congo n’ayo rwanda iri rushanwa riri rwego gufasha burundi kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka bumaze bobonye ubwigenge imikino irakomeza gatandatu tariki bahungu ikipe y’u burundi b yakinnye burundi a guhera saa tanu gitondo kuri saha kandi u rwanda rwakinnye repubulila iharanira demukarasi congo rdc u rwanda rwongere gukina burundi b saa cyenda z’igicamunsi saha rdc ikine burundi a mu bakobwa saa tanu burundi b izakina burundi a saa kumi z’umugoroba ikipe y’u rwanda ikine n’iya burundi b uko amakipe yatsindanwe turabibagezazo makuru yacu ataha theoneste nisingizwe

title: tour du rwanda niyonshuti uwa kabiri rutonde rusange
content: nyuma y’igice cyitwa itangiriro cyabereye i kigali tariki ejo abasiganwa batangiye irushanwa nyaryo icyiciro mbere cyigizwe n’urugendo bakoze bahereye i kigali berekeje i rwamagana icyiciro y’umunyamerika kiel team type girdlestone dylan ukinana niyonshuti mtn qhubeka ariko rutonde rusange mwanya kabiri muri bice byombi bireshya kilometero umunyamerika reijnen kiel ukinira team type rusange rw’intera bamaze gusiganwa aza mwanya kabiri akurikiye munyamerika kiel umurusha amasegonda ku rutonde rusange niyonshuti akurikiwe n’umusore bakinana mtn mtn qhubeka girdlestone dylan arushwa niyonshuti amasegonda nyuma y’uduce tubiri basiganwe mbere berekeza ntara y’iburasirazuba bakagaruka i kigali kabiri abanyonzi barasiganwa agace gatatu berekeza ntara y’uburengerazuba karere rubavu title: abakozi batsinda leta yabishyuye miliyoni itsindira ebyiri
content: raporo komisiyo ishinzwe abakozi leta igaragaza igihombo leta itezwa n’abayobozi bafata ibyemezo bidakurikije amategeko bigatuma abakozi bagana inkiko muri raporo - manza yatsinzemo ebyiri yishyura amafaranga arenga miliyoni magana atanu ihabwa ebyiri usibye mafaranga kandi hari n’izindi ngaruka zatejwe n’ayo makimbirane nk’ikiguzi cy’umwanya n’amafaranga yakoreshejwe gukurikirana bibazo haba ruhande rw’inzego abakozi bakoreraga ndetse ruhande komisiyo hakiyongeraho ibangamirwa serivisi zindi bakozi bagombaga gutanga ikindi ukuba abakozi batera icyizere ubuyobozi bw’inzego bakorera bikagira igaruka musaruro w’ibikorwa bakora ndetse serivisi bagenera abagenerwabikorwa b’izo nzego mu isesengura ry’iyi komisiyo zimwe mpamvu zatumye inzego leta ziregwa zikanatsindwa harimo kwirukana abakozi buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko gusesa amasezerano y’akazi buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko kudahembera umwanya w’ubusigire guhagarika umushahara w’umukozi cyemezo cy’umuyobozi ubifitiye ububasha gishingiweho kudaha abakozi bemererwa n’amategeko gihe gufatira abakozi ibyemezo bitubahirije amategeko cyangwa ibyemezo bishingiye mategeko atabagenga kudatanga icyemezo cy’imirimo yakozwe mu mwaka - leta yashowe manza abakozi baregaga ibigo leta ibi byatumye leta yishyura amafaranga arenga miliyoni magana atanu frw nyamara yatsindiye miliyoni ebyiri n’ibihumbi magana inani frw gusa aya mafaranga ahanini agizwe n’ayo abakozi bafitiye uburenganzira kabone n’iyo batari kujya nkiko arenga miliyoni magana ane mirongo itandatu frw kongeraho indishyi zisaga miliyoni mirongo itanu frw iri sesengura komisiyo y’abakozi leta ryagaragaje ibigo leta bifite umubare munini w’inzego zaburanye mwaka w’igenzura ibigera byaburanye n’abakozi manza bibiri gusa byatsinze imanza ebyiri bitsindira frw bicibwa angana frw ayo mafaranga arimo abakozi bafitiye uburenganzira imishahara indamunite angana frw ndetse n’indishyi zingana frw harimo kandi abakozi batanu babanje kujuririra komisiyo isanga ubujurire bwabo bufite ishingiro ariko imyanzuro yatanzwe bujurire ntiyashyirwa bikorwa kugeza baregeye inkiko ibi nabyo byatwaye leta miliyoni makumyabiri n’enye frw harimo indishyi zingana frw n’ayo abakozi basanzwe bafiteho uburenganzira angana frw evode minijust ntizura abapfuye urubanza uzatsindwa urarwibwira iminsi ibiri gusa araye bwegure uwari umunyamabanga leta minisiteri y’ubutabera uwizeyimana evode yitabye komisiyo y’abadepite ishinzwe imibereho myiza y’abaturage asobanure impamvu leta itsindwa maze twe tujya inama nyandiko dusaba ibisobanuro ese mukozi yirukanwe ate ariko umuyobozi ntatume ubona impapuro akingira ikibaba uwakoze amakosa minijust ntizura abapfuye hari ahantu dusanga harakozwe amakosa pee ugasanga kujya rukiko ugutesha umwanya umukozi ufite ibindi yakabaye akora akajya rusizi iminsi itanu arara hoteli imodoka inywa amavuta mu gusesengura tugasanga n’impamvu kujya nkiko kuko urubanza uzatsindwa rukiko urarureba ukarwibwira aho tujya transaction tukazana mukozi n’akarere tukabahuza habaye amakosa urasaba leta uwaguha ayangaya dushaka le moindre mal ibibi birarutana-ikibi buhoro tubwira prime minister kuko tudafite ubushobozi miliyari zisaga ebyiri leta yahombye bitewe n’abayobozi bafashe ibyemezo bitubahirije amategeko myaka icumi ibanziriza wagenzuwe kugeza ibigo bikomoka electrogaz ewsarecorw asc o w asa c reg title: perezida kagame yavuze uganda yamusabye abanyarwanda basubukurayo ingendo akabyanga
content: mu ntangiriro z’uku kwezi nibwo uganda yarekuye abanyarwanda icyenda magana y’abari bafungiye butaka bwayo barimo abari bamaze imyaka igera ibiri bafunzwe byaha bigaragara bashinjwa ahubwo bakorerwa iyicarubozo amanywa n’ijoro abo banyarwanda barekuwe bamwe magana y’abo u rwanda rwakunze gusaba uganda kurekura ruvuga bafashwe buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko bagatotezwa ntibagezwe butabera bamwe bagakurizmao gupfa u rwanda kandi rwagiye rwinubira uburyo uganda ikorana n’imitwe ishaka kuruhungabanyiriza umutekano irimo rnc kayumba nyamwasa byatumye werurwe umwaka ushize rugira umwaka mushya yavuze uganda iherutse kumusaba kubwira abanyarwanda bakongera gutemberera gihugu yavuze uganda yabihereye banyarwanda icyenda imaze kurekura n’abandi bake barekuwe mbere ikumva yahita abwira abanyarwanda basubire gukorera ingendo uganda bisanzuye ati bahise bambwira bati mukwiriye kugira mukora ngo mubwire abanyarwanda baze uganda uwabimbwiraga naramubwiye nti kibazo ariko se nindamuka mbyemeye munsi n’ejo n’ejo bundi abanyarwanda bakongera bagafungwa n’abafunzwe mbere batararekurwa yakomeje agira murumva nzasubira kubwira abanyarwanda narababeshye nimwongere muhagarike kujya uganda naramubwiye nti mutubabarire mureke gufata abanyarwanda kuko n’abafashwe ntibigeze bagira bashinjwa imyaka n’imyaka ikindi nimurekere gukorana n’iriya mitwe ishaka guhungabanya umutekano w’u rwanda nibikorwa gufungura umupaka bizahita byikora perezida kagame yavuze kubera umubano w’u rwanda uganda utari wifashe neza byanatumye umwaka ushize kuyobora umuryango afurika y’iburasirazuba eac bikomera kurusha byamworoheye ayoboye umuryango afurika yunze ubumwe ati nubwo ibihugu bike ariko byari bigoye kurusha kuyobora umugabane wose ariko ubuyobozi bwaba ubw’igihugu kimwe n’igihugu cyanjye mpura n’impogamizi kandi igihugu kimwe nkanswe umuryango ngira muzi ibibazo twahuye nabyo n’abaturanyi bacu ariko by’umwihariko umuturanyi wacu majyaruguru uganda yavuze intego eac ubufatanye kwihuza n’imigenderanire myiza y’abayituye gusa ntabwo bipfa kwikora yavuze kuba eac yifuza gufungurirana amarembo hagati y’ibihugu biyigize bitazikora ati kuyikuraho imipaka ugomba kugira ukora ugomba gutsura umubano n’abaturanyi ukabafata nk’uko bagufata ntabwo wahiga abantu kindi gihugu ugaruke uvuga ibintu by’imipaka ntacyo bivuze yavuze nubwo imipaka yakurwaho hagati y’ibihugu kuba abaturanyi bitazavaho kandi bizahora bisaba kubanirana neza perezida kagame yavuze igihe cyose udashaka umuturanyi wawe agera iwawe uba wamaze gushyiraho umupaka ubatandukanya nubwo bigaragara yindi mipaka yaba ihari ati nzatembera ariko ningera rugo rwawe mvuge nti oya sinaharenga uzaba wamaze gushyiraho umupaka hagati y’imiryango nibyo byabaye hagati y’u rwanda uganda minsi ishize kubana nk’abaturanyi perezida kagame yabigereranyije nko guturana mufite inzu z’ibyatsi igihe cyose mwirinda icyatuma ifatwa n’umuriro kuko ikongeza izindi ati iyo ufite inzu z’ibyatsi zegeranye wirinda title: kayonzanyamirama abahembwa badakora bafite ubwoba kuzaryozwa n’ibyo batariye
content: mu karere kayonza umurenge nyamirama hari abakozi bamaze umwaka urenga bahembwa buri kwezi ntacyo bakoze ariko amenshi bahembwa bahita bayasubiza umujyanama w’ubuhinzi ubabwira goronome rab yayamutumye iki gisa n’umukino watangiye mpera buryo bakozi bamaze guhembwa buri umwe nibura amezi nyamara bivugira imibyizi bamaze gukora itarenga umunani amafaranga bahemberwa sacco abanzumugayo nyamirama hagati y’ibihumbi buri umwe kwezi buryo nibura buri umwe amaze gufata agera bihumbi gusa igitangaje babanje kubwirwa ayabo ibihumbi bine nyuma bitanu andi bayaha umujyanama w’ubuhinzi uvuga ayashyiriye goronome rab umwe bakozi aragira twategereje batwereka akazi dukora turaheba ahubwo batubwira amafranga yageze konti zacu mbere y’uko akazi gatangira baduhembye mbere ubwoba buradutaha bamwe barayatinya abandi barayafata gusa njye nyamuha umutima udiha bazantereza akadugudu nituriyemo uyu mushinga watangiye nzeri hakorwa itsinda ry’abahinzi rizakora mirima y’ubushakashatsi babwiwe bagombaga gutubura ibihingwa birimo imyumbati soya ibigori n’ibishyimbo itsinda rimaze kujyaho ryatoye ubuyobozi bukuriwe mwarimu nyirishema jean uyu yaje kunanizwa kuko yatowe abakuriye umushinga batamushaka bifuza hayobora mujyanama w’ubuhinzi singirankabo timoteyo uyu wagombaga kuba intumwa nziza ibageza mugambi guhemba abadakora barangiza bagasubiza amenshi bahembwe bidasakuje niko byagenze amabwiriza akajya acishwa singirankabo nyirishema agera yegura uyu musaza w’imyaka agira ntangiriro nijye abaturage batoye nyuma barabivangavanga nyuma nagiye ntara kubaza umufashamyumvire rab yaraduhaye arambwira baransimbuje nawe yemeza bahembwaga badakora ariko nyuma bitangiye kumenyekana bafashe umurima w’umwe bahinzi bakajya bawukoramo rimwe kwezi bagahembwa ibihumbi bine andi bakayasubiza uyu mushinga bivugwa ukorera turere twa kayonza ngoma kirehe ntara y’uburasirazuba amakuru abahinzi bahabwa kayonza ukorera mirenge mukarange ndego murama rukara ndetse nyamirama singirankabo timoteyo babwira mafaranga yaka yayatumwe goronome ukuriye mushinga ntara uyu mugoronome uvugwa kandi abaturage bamuzi isura ariko ntibazi amazina bagira bati ni umugabo ukunda kuza modoka rab ntituzi amazina telefoni izwi timoteyo bavugana twamubajije impamvu baduhemba amafaranga tukayasubiza atubwira kujya guhemba bagenzi ndego murama mukarange urugero rw’umwe bagize tsinda avuga amaze guhembwa amezi agera icumi nyamara ahamya yakoze imibyizi itarenga itanu muri mezi yahembwe ibihumbi yakoreshejemo ibihumbi andi arayasubiza nta masezerano y’akazi bagira gipande kihaba uwaje n’uwasibye bahembwa kimwe kandi udafite umwanya ashobora kohereza umusimbura umwana umugore umugabo cyangwa umikozi hari inzego zitazi iby’iri tsinda timoteyo avuga rikora umuyobozi w’iri tsinda bavuga abaka amafaranga bahembwe ababwira ayashyiriye goronome yemeza itsinda rimaze imyaka nk’ibiri rikora abarigize bagahemberwa konti zabo sacco ati tumaze imyaaakaaaaaharya buriya ingahe raa-abaza uwari umwegereye nk’ibiri twatangiye turi nyuma umwe aza kuvamo ku munsi umukozi kwezi bahembwa imibyizi timoteyo avuga bipande bagira n’amasezerano imibyizi nyandikia ikayi hanyuma nkazatanga raporo kuru rab bakabahemba dufata umurima w’umwe bagize itsinda tukawuhinga tukamuha imbuto n’ifumbire ubushize twahinze ibishyimbo mwa muberarugo vestine ariko kubera rab iba itakodesheje murima ibivuyemo byose biba ibya nyirawo nyamara nk’uko bamwe baturage babyivugira haje abashyitsi batabazi batambagizwa imirima mwenewabo timoteyo ahitwa mataba bakabwirwa ibigori soya birimo ibya rab byahinzwe n’abo baturage kandi bagabana ibivuyemo ku rwego rw’umurenge nyamirama ariko gahunda bavuga batayizi ku murongo telefoni gitifu nyamirama madame nyirabizeyimana immaculee asubiza aseka kubera gutungurwa title: menya watandukana kubabara ngingo rubagimpande zizengereza benshi
content: abantu benshi gihe usanga bataka ububabare ngingo zitandukanye ugasanga umuntu guhaguruka ndetse kwicara ikibazo gikomeye ibi bikunze kwibasira cyane cyane abageze bukuru nyamara n’abakiri bato ntizibatinya uburwayi bwagera buri wese abantu benshi gihe usanga bataka ububabare ngingo zitandukanye ugasanga umuntu guhaguruka ndetse kwicara ikibazo gikomeye ibi bikunze kwibasira cyane cyane abageze bukuru nyamara n’abakiri bato ntizibatinya uburwayi bwagera buri wese n’ubwo hari imiti myinshi itangwa kuvura ndwara ndetse siporo ikaba miti myiza guhangana n’ubu burwayi hari kurya kunywa byagaragaye byifitemo ubushobozi guhangana n’ubu burwayi muri nkuru tugiye kurebera hamwe bimwe biribwa byagufasha guhangana n’ububabare ngingo ndetse rubagimpande amafi salmon aya mafi azwiho kuba akungahaye binure omega- ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n’ikigo cy’abanyamerika cyandika kurya bivura bwagaragaje abantu bakunze kurya bwoko bw’amafi badakoresha cyane imiti igabanya uburibwe ikanabyimbura kubera binure omega- byakoze akazi kari gukorwa n’iyo miti ibi binure bigabanya uburibwe bikanabyimbura umutobe w’amacunga umutobe w’amacunga kimwe n’indi mitobe myinshi ituruka mbuto isoko nziza vitamin c iyi vitamin igira uruhare gukomera kw’amagufa kandi kuyibura bigira ingaruka kwisana k’umubiri amagufa n’amenyouyu mutobe ingenzi cyane pome uru rubuto rukungahaye kinyabutabire quercetin iki kinyabutabire kikaba kizwiho kugabanya uburibwe kubyimbura ndetse pome ikora kimwe ibuprofen cyangwa diclofenac imiti izwiho kurwanya uburibwe kubyimbirwa quercetin iboneka cyane gice cy’inyuma niyo mpamvu byiza kuyiryana n’igishishwa imineke imineke isoko nziza potassium ukaba umunyungugu wongerera amagufa gukomera irimo kandi magnesium ikaba izwiho guhangana n’ibibazo binyuranye by’imitsi iyi magnesium izwiho gutuma amagufa abamo imyunyungugu ihagije kandi abarwayi b’imitsi bafite amagufa adafite imyunyungugu kurya imineke ingenzi ibinyampeke byuzuye iyo tuvuze impeke zuzuye tuba tuvuga zindi zitabanje kunyuzwa nganda zizigira umweru izi mpeke zizwiho kurwanya kubyimbirwa kuko zibuza poroteyine yitwa c-reactive gukora ikaba mpamvu kurwara indwara kurwara imitsi izo mpeke twavuga ingano ibigori amasaka umuceri uburo hari n’ibindi byinshi bifasha kurwanya ububabare ngingo ndetse rubagimpandetwavugamo tofutangawizitungurusumuicyinzari ese uzi hari inyunganiramirire title: urutonde rw’abakobwa bakunzwe kaminuza gitwe ispg -
content: kuba umuntu yishimirwa biterwa akora cyangwa se zimwe mpano afite zituma agaragarira cyane bagenzi uru rutonde ntiruvuze abantu beza k’umubiri gusa kuko hari bamwe beza mubiri batarugaragaraho kubera uburyo umuryango ispg ubabona uru rutonde rujya kujyaho hakozwe amatora yihariye ayobowe komite top mu matora yakozwe harebwaga ibintu bikurikira ikinyabupfura ubwiza mubiri umuco imyambarire n’imitsindire buri muntu masomo n’uburyo sosiyete imwakira dore urutonde rw’abakobwa ruteye imanishimwe nathalie yiga mwaka kabiri ishami biomedical sciences abantu benshi batunguwe cyane kubona yaje mwanya mbere kubera ubwinshi bw’abandi bakobwa batari bake basanzwe bazwi benshi ispg iturufu nyamukuru yatumye nathalie ashyirwa mwanya mbere igihagararo cye cyiza afite benshi bemeza ashobora kwitabira amarushanwa nyampinga ndetse n’abanyamideri uyu mukobwa avuga neza kandi bisobanutse ururimi rw’igifaransa ndetse n’icyongereza afite impano kubyina kinyarwanda kuko akiga secondaire yabyinaga itorero ndangamuco nyarwanda college saint marie rene i kabgayi uwera noella noella w’imyaka yiga mwaka mbere igiforomo impamvu aza mwanya kabiri akiri mushya muryango ispg biterwa ahanini n’ubwiza mubiri afite ndetse bigaterwa n’umutima yaremanywe wiyoroshya buzima noella umwe bakobwa ispg bazi indimi zitandukanye avuga neza ururimi ry’igifaransa utibagiwe n’icyongereza kandi ugasanga ishuri agira amanota meza ikindi cyagaragaye cyane mukobwa yagera butaka ispg abasore batabarika wasangaga bajya mbuga zabo facebook bakandikaho bamukunda ndetse hari bamwe bavugaga inshuti noella azwiho cyane kwitabira amasengesho kwitabira gahunda nyinshi z’ishuri mu gihe bamwe usanga bishongora bitwaje basa noella ariyoroshya bitangaje benshi bemeza habayeho gahunda kugaragaza nyampinga ispg noella atagaragara mwanya kure liliane kagaju uyu mukobwa yiga mwaka kabiri igiforomo ispg bamwe bemezaga yaza mwanya mbere ariko burya amatora nicyo amaze yagaragaye mwanya gatatu bakobwa bakunzwe cyane sosiyete ispg kagaju usanga kenshi kumwe n’abandi bakobwa begenzi bigana hirya hino babanye neza uyu mukobwa usanga yitabazwa bagenzi kubambarira bukwe nk’uko urubuga rwe facebook rubigaragaza yambarira bagenzi liliane aragwaho kwicisha bugufi cyane ndetse kubaha umuntu ariwe wese aruta umuruta n’uwo bangana vanessa uwimbabazi uzwi vava uyu mukobwa azwi cyane rutonde rw’abakobwa baherutswe gutorwa mwaka w’amashuri ispg yagaragaraga mwanya gatatu vava yiga mwaka gatatu biomedical sciences yongeye kugaragara rutonde ariko asubira inyuma ho umwanya umwe vava umukobwa ukiri muto cyane w’umunyabwenge ishuri urangwa n’itseko nziza benshi bemeza ashobora kuba ariwe mukobwa ispg umwenyura neza kurusha abandi akigera i gitwe bamwe bamubonyemo isura miss rwanda bahati grace indi mpamvu akundwa buzima bwe akunda kureba imikino itandukanye n’indi myidagaduro rusange akaba anazwiho kugira ibisetso byinshi anualite mamie mamie yiga mwaka mbere igiforomo kuba akundwa cyane bitutuka ahanini kugirana ubusabane bagenzi uyu mukobwa umurebye maso ubona akiri muto myaka mamie akundwa n’umubare utari muto w’abasore ispg bitewe n’uburyo umwitegereje maso ubona umukobwa title: intambara kongo ntabwo yigeze ihungabanya umutekano w’u rwanda
content: iyi kompanyi iratangaza gihe hari amakuru atangazwa n’ibitangazamakuru bitandukanye isi avuga intambara ibera kongo ishobora kuba yarahungabanyije umutekano rwanda mu itangazo yashyize title: pggss season yatangiye
content: abayobozi bralirwa n’aba east africa promotors basobanuye hafashwe ingamba sim card izongera gutora inshuro irenze munsi kandi sim card yemerewe gutora itaramara nibura amezi atatu ikora abazatorera interineti hari uburyo kubikurikirana buryo e-mail y’umuntu izajya ibona amahirwe gutora inshuro gusa munsi kugira binyure mucyo usesuye biyambaje inararibonye kugenzura ibijyanye tombora bazakorana pwc pricewaterhouse ikigo mpuzamahanga kugenzura audit company nyuma gusobanurirwa magambo atari maremare cyane abanyamakuru bahawe umwanya kubaza ibibazo kubyo batasobanukiwe neza bimwe bibazo byagaragaye ibijyanye n’impungenge z’ukuntu ubushize harimo abahanzi benshi bitoye bakoresheje sim card baguze bakazinyanyagiza bantu babatore itsinda ryo kujya amerika ryabaye tom close bigatuma atabonana sean kingstone n’ibindi bibazo binyuranye uyu muhango witabiriwe n’ abanyamakuru bakora muzika n’abandi bantu banyuranye harimo abatunganya umuziki producers hatowe abahanzi harimo bane buri cyiciro muzika injyana byakozwe n’abanyamakuru n’abatunganya umuziki bimwe byagombaga gukurikizwa ukuba umuhanzi hejuru y’imyaka akaba nibura yarakoze indirimbo zakunzwe hano rwanda akaba kandi indirimbo ze zarakozwe hagati kandi umuhanzi wegukanye pggss ntagomba kugarukamo abahanzi batoranijwe bazatangazwa gatanu tariki nyuma y’iryo tora ry’abanyamakuru abaturage nabo bazitorera abahanzi bavuye bazaba batowe mbere hanyuma bahanzi abe aribo binjira pggss umwe gusa ariwe uzegukana umwanya n’amahire kuririmbana n’igihangange muzika kitaratangazwa kuko kizatangazwa yindi nama izakurikira hazaba harimo n’abahanzi ibirori byasojwe n’umuhanzi tom close waririmbye abanje gusaba imbabazi abanyamakuru n’ubuyobozi bralirwa east africa promotors kubera uburyo yatutse umunyamakuru dj adams minsi ishize marie clemence cyiza uwimanimpaye

title: iserukiramuco ryiswe giants of africa’ ryari kuzabera i kigali ryasubitswe
content: iserukiramuco ryiswe giants of africa ryagombaga kuzabera i kigali kanama rigahuza ibihugu ryimuriwe kubera gutinya guhererekanya ubwandu covid- mu itangazo ryashyizwe ahagaragara gatatu tariki kamena umuryango giants of africa wavuze kubera ubuzima n’imibereho myiza y’abafatanyabikorwa abatoza abari kuzitabira urubyiruko abacuruzi n’abaturage bakorera cyatumye iserukiramuco ryigizwa inyuma umuryango giants of africa utegura iserukiramuco washinzwe masai ujiri banditse imwe ntego z’iri serukiramuco uguhuza imico itandukanye igize africa rwanda gushyira intera hagati y’abantu n’abandi kimwe bifashe kurwanya ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo kandi guhurira hamwe byaba bivuguruza inzobere by’ubuzima zidushishikariza twese dukora kugira duhashye cyorezo masai ujiri usanzwe umuyobozi toronto raptors makipe akina basketball shampiyona america nba yavuze kwigiza inyuma iserucyiramuco inyungu buzima bw’ikiremwamuntu ati urubyiruko afurika rukwiye ibyiza byacu kandi iserukiramuco rizatanga ibyiza gusa umuyobozi mukuru w’ikigo gishinzwe k’iterambere rwanda rdb clare akamanzi ashyigikiye ikemezo gusubika ibirori ashimangira u rwanda rukomeje kwishimira kwakira ibirori mwaka utaha yagize ubuyobozi bw’igihugu cyacu bwabaye ingirakamaro kugira dutsinde cyorezo dutegereje kuzakira iserukiramuco mbere giants of africa i kigali mwaka utaha ibirori bigamije gufasha urubyiruko kwishimira umukino basketball kwerekana imico abazitabira birori kandi bazahura n’abayobozi b’inganda bateye inkunga ririya serukiramuco baturutse hirya hino isi bakazatanga amahugurwa buyobozi n’uburezi ibirori bizamara icyumweru bihuze urubyiruko rusaga bihugu africa nigeria senegal cameroon mali kenya u rwanda tanzania uganda repubulika demokarasi congo sudan y’epfo somalia jean paul mugabeumusekerw

title: guverineri gatete arasaba ubufatanye gufasha abatishoboye
content: gatete yagize byiza ibikorwa gufasha abatishoboye byahurirwaho n’abatu benshi bityo gahunda y’icyerekezo ikazacyura ikivi abantu baramaze gutera imbere gatete arasaba abagenerwabikorwa abatishoboye ndetse n’ubuyobozi bw’akarere bukwiye kugira uruhare bikorwa kubateza imbere yabisobanuye magambo habaye bnr gusa ifasha miryango bantu bazagera bataragira bagera bnr yatangiye gufasha abatuye mudugudu mwaka babavugururira amazu icyo gikorwa cyatwaye amafaranga agera miliyoni esheshatu bnr kandi yabafasha kujyana abana mashuri y’imyuga none munsi hatashye umushinga w’ubworozi bw’inkoko bnr yatanzeho amafaranga asaga miliyoni bnr kandi yiyemeje kuzitaho gihe cy’amezi atandatu mbere y’uko zitangira gutanga umusaruro murekatete jacqueline umwana w’impfubyi wirera utuye mudugudu w’icyizere yavuze bnr ibakorera byose bibashimisha bakaba bayizeza nabo bazakora bashoboye umushinga babahaye bakazawutunganya neza bakoresheje amahugurwa bahabwa bijyanye n’ubworozi bw’inkoko murekatete asaba bnr n’abandi baterankunga gufasha abana barangije kwiga kubona akazi gufasha imiryango ituye mudugudu kubona umuriro w’amashanyarazi bnr ifasha imiryango igizwe n’impfubyi n’abapfakazi batuye mudugudu w’icyizere mu minsi imbere bnr irateganya bufatanye n’akarere bazafasha miryango mushinga w’ububoshyi kugira imyaka icyenda isigaye icyerekezo gicyure ikivi izasange abatuye umudugudu w’icyizere barateye imbere marie josee uwiringira

title: shelter afrique igiye gushora miliyoni myubakire rwanda
content: shelter afrique kandi irateganya gushora amadolari agera miliyoni bihugu bitandukanye bigize afrika y’uburasirazuba batitaye bihe bibi byashize ahenshi amafaranga yataye agaciro nk’uko umuyobozi shelter afrique allassane ba yabitangarije reuters gatanu tariki imibare itangwa n’ubuyobozi bw’umujyi kigali yerekana hakenewe nibura kubakwa amazu kubamo mashya ariko ashobora kubakwa gusa umwaka ushize shelter afrique yashoye izindi miliyoni z’amadorali y’amerika rwanda ibinyujije banki y’imiturure nyungu y’amafaranga gihe cy’imyaka ibiri shelter afrique kandi irateganya gusinyana amasezerano y’inguzanyo ingana miliyoni z’ amadolari y’amerika n’urwego rushinzwe imyubakire tanzania nayo azifashishwa kubaka inzu kubamo umuryango shelter afrique washinzwe mwaka w’ ugamije gukusanya amafaranga agamije guteza imbere imyubakire mugabane wose afrika jean noel mugabo

title: ibigo bitwara abagenzi ntara ntibizongera gukorera mujyi gati
content: ibi byemezo byafashwe gahunda guca akajagari mujyi bikaba byaratangiye kubahirizwa itariki ukwakira umwaka w’ bikaba byaratangiranye n’igikorwa kwimura ibigo bifite imodoka zitwara abantu ntara ubwo yasuraga ahazimurirwa bigo bimenyerewe kw’izina agence de voyage umuyobozi w’akarere nyarugenge madame mukasonga solange yatangaje bishimira imirimo y’imyiteguro yagenze cyane ibigo byose byabonye ibyumba gukoreramo ndetse n’aho imodoka zizajya zihagarara bityo bikazafasha mubyerekeranye n’umutekano w’abagenzi n’ibintu byabo ngo kuba modoka zije gukorera nyabugogo ntacyo bizabangamira abari basanzwe bahakorera kuko byabanje kumvikanwaho ikindi abakoreraga i remera kicukiro kizahinduka kuko bifasha abatuye bice kuba babasha kujya muburengerazuba batiriwe bajya gutegera nyabugogo izijya mahanga nazo zizakomeza gukorera zakoreragabikaba byaratangajwe n’umyobozi atraco ndetse n’uwa atpr rwanda persons transporters association - atpr ku ruhande rw’abagenzi ariko haracyari impungenge kuko ibigo byose bikorera hamwe bityo bigatera urujijo bamwe bamwe ikindi bifuza bajya bagezwa mujyi umuyobozi atpr akaba yaboneyeho n’umwanya gusaba abagenzi kwihanganira mpinduka kuko gahunda ijyanye guha ishusho nshya kandi nziza umujyi kigali marie jose ikibasumba

title: abahindi bifatanyije n’abanyarwanda kwibuka jenoside y’abatutsi
content: icyo gikorwa kwibuka cyabereye ishuri rikuru bangalore murwamukuru new delhi cyitabirwa n’abantu bagera magana ane nyuma y’urugendo kwibuka umuyobozi uhagarariye u rwanda buhindi williams nkurunziza yavuze jenoside yakorewe abatutsi itazongera ukundi ati twibagiwe ubumuntu duhinduka inyamaswa dutsemba abavandimwe bacu iyi inkovu itari ikwiye kubaho turizeza ibyabaye bizasubira ukundi yatangaje u rwanda ruviriye jenoside rwateye intambwe itangaje ubukungu bw’igihugu bwiyongereye kigereranyo ijana ugereranyije n’imyaka ishize n’ubukene bukagabanuka gipimo ijana myaka itanu ishize iterambere u rwanda rwagezeho rurikesha perezida paul kagame nyuma kuyobohoza u rwanda agahagarika jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mwaka yahitanye ubuzima bw’inzirakarengane zisaga miliyoni nk’uko nkurunziza akomeza abitangaza ibikorwa nk’ibyo kwibuka byabereye kandi n’i pune salem kuri cyumweru tariki biteganyijwe abanyarwanda bagera i chidambaram coimbatore bangalore nabo baza kwibuka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi nshimiyimana leonard

title: chan amavubi akatishije tike atsinze ethiopia- amafoto
content: kuri gatandatu taliki ukwakira sitade kigali mukino kwishyura gushaka itike kwerekeza gikombe cy’afrika cy’abakina imbere gihugu chan cyizaba mwaka cameroon umukino urangiye amakipe yombi anganyije - ariko u rwanda rukomeza giteranyo cy’imikino yombi ubanza ndetse n’uwo kwishyura ni umukino watangiye isaha sacyenda n’igice h amavubi yakiriye ethiopia umukino kwishyura gushaka itike kwerekeza mikino y’igikombe cy’afrika cy’abakina imbere gihugu chan nyuma y’uko umukino ubanza amavubi yatsinze ethiopia - iwayo ethiopia yinjiye mukino isabwa gutsinda harimo ikinyuranyo cy’igitego kugirango ibe yakomeza caption idattachment alignalignnone width abakinnyi b’amavubi babanje kibuga caption caption idattachment alignalignnone width abakinnyi ethiopia babanje kibuga caption umukino waje gutangira imbere y’abakunzi b’amavubi benshi sitade kigali yuzuye ethiopia yatangiye yataka cyane ishaka igitego gihe amavubi yakinaga yugarira iminota ’ yambere yakiniwe rubuga rw’izamu rw’amavubi ku munota manishimwe djabel yacenje myugarioro ethiopia baramutega umusifuzi avuga ikosa djabel yaje gutera neza umupira ariko aynekulu lealem birhanu umuzamu ethiopia umupira arawufata amavubi yakinaga yugarira cyane kubera igitego yatsindiye hanze kino wabanje iminota y’igice mbere amavubi yakinnye yugarira wabonaga umutoza yabasabye kutagira igitego batsindwa ku munota ethiopia yashoboraga kubona igitego nyuma y’umupira watewe neza amanuel yohannes ariko kimenyi yves umupira arawufata caption idattachment alignalignnone width sugira ernest caption ku munota sugira erinest yafashe umupira myugariro ethiopia bagirango yarariye ateye umupira myugariro ethiopia umupira bawushyira koroneli niyonzima haruna ateye koroneli bawusubiza koroneli bongeye kuyitera bawukururamo ugarukiye djabel umupira awuteye ujya inyuma y’izamu gato iminota y’igice mbere yarangiye bongeraho umunota umwe igice mbere cyirangira amakipe anganyije - nyuma kumva inama z’abatoza igice kabiri cyatangiye amakipe aratakana amavubi yaje guhindura imikinire atangira kwataka ku munota sugira erinest yaherejwe neza umupira djabel ashota izamu ariko umusifuzi avuga yarariye mashami vincent yakoze impinduka ashaka ibitego akuramo manishimwe djabel yinjizamo iyabivuje ozey ku munota ’ ethiopia yabonye igitego cyatsinzwe lemene taafesse nyuma guhagarara nabi manzi thierry mukinnyi agahita ashota izamu nyuma gutsndwa igitegi amavubi yasabwa kubona igitego kuko mikino yombi ubanza kwishyura - mashami yahise akora impinduka iranzi munota asimbuye niyonzima olivier sefu amavubi yabonye igitego kwishyura munota ’ cyatsinzwe sugira ernest iminota ’yarangiye hongerwaho iminota ibiri nayo iza kurangira amakipe yombi anaganyije - ariko amavubi aza gukomeza kubera igitego yatsinze hanze bidasubirwaho u rwanda ruhita rubona itike kuzakina imikino y’afrika y’abakina imbere gihugu chan izabera gihugu cameroon caption idattachment alignalignnone width byari uguhatana hagati y’amakipe yombi caption abakinnyi b’amavubi babanzamo kimenyi yves omborenga fitina aimable nsabimana manzi thierry imanishimwe emmanuel imran nshimiyimana niyonzima olivier seif ndabimana eric zidane manishimwe djabel sugira ernest niyonzima haruna abakinnyi etiyopiya babanjemo aynekulu lealem birhanu desta demu tura antheneh tesfaye hayder sherefa juber amanuaer aregawi amanuel yohannes gamo lemeen tafesse adis gebru aschalew tamene seyoum surafe mengistu remdan mohamed andi mafoto ndayiragije maxi justin bwizacom

title: kubeshya telefone bimaze kuba ingeso bamwe
content: kenshi bisi bus itwara abagenzi cyangwa n’ahandi hantu hahurira abantu benshi benshi usanga gukoresha telefone zigendanwa celestin kayijamahe avuga hari igihe umuntu modoka itwara abagenzi nyuma akumva umuntu abeshye bavuganye ageze ahantu runaka gihe imodoka ibatwaye ibura umwanya munini igere ahoagira ujya kumva umuntu arihanukiriye abwiye ageze i nyanza kandi bakigera ruhango bagana i butare yongera uzi hari n’umuntu ukubeshya kandi umubona imbere yawe akakubeshya ahandi kandi umubona imbere yawe atakubonyeuwitwa nsanzabaganwa uu kigero cy’imyaka akaba atuye mujyi muhanga avuga umuntu ubeshya telefone ashaka kugira yerekane gahunda bahanye yazubahirije agira akenshi umuntu abeshya kugira yerekane gahunda yazubahirije ahubwo wenda zaje kwicwa n’imodoka arimo ubwo nyine ariyaranja akamubeshya uburyo imodoka ariyo yamutindije cyangwa ntabure n’akandi kantu amubeshya benshi babona bakanatekereza gikorwa kubeshya telefone bavuga cyeze bantu bazikoresha bibaza byaba byarazanywe n’amatelefone kuko mbere y’umwaduko wazo kubeshya kutabagaho buryo bukabije nyamara kayijamahe avuga bi bitazanywe n’umwaduko w’amatelefone kuko byahozeho ati aka akageso kaba buri wese kuko mbere barabeshyaga ahubwo batabonaga uburyo babeshyamo cyane nk’iki gihe iyo umuntu yakubeshyaga byabaga akumiro bamwe banyeshuri biga kaminuza kigo nko kaminuza nkuru y’u rwanda bavuga ngeso yeze kurusha ahandi hantupromise uwera avuga kaminuza haba ingeso kubeshya cyane kubera akenshi bahugiye gahunda nyinshi kandi bakaba bashaka gukorera gahunda nyinshi gihe kimwe agira nk’ubu umuntu yahanye gahunda n’umusobanurira kandi ugomba kubanza kunywa amata ruhande umubeshya umugezeho kugira ativumbura telefone igikoresho cy’itumanaho cyahimbwe numwongereza alexander graham bell thomas watson kinyejana telefone zigendanwa zadutse rwanda nyuma y’umwaka gerard gitoli mbabazi

title: inama zagufasha kwiyubakamo ubumuntu gutera imbere vuba
content: imyitwarire y’umuntu n’imigenzereze kimwe bimufasha kugena ahazaza he uko umuntu yitwara nabi nako ashyira kaga ubuzima bwe gihe nyamara imyitwarire myiza y’umuntu imusunikira mahirwe imigisha kugera byiza buzima bwe kwiyubakamo ubumuntu kwiyumvamo ubushobozi intambwe nziza ifasha umuntu kugera ntego ze buzima dore inama zagufasha kwiyubakamo ubumuntu gutera imbere vuba igihe urakaye ntukihutire gufata icyemezo kuko uyobowe n’uburakari kwiyobora aheza biramugora igihe ujijinganya utabona neza gukora guhuzagurika shaka akanya gutuza kwitaza abandi utekereze neza ubone igisubizo igihe ubukene buguteye umuntu runaka akakuguriza amafaranga jya uzirikana kumwishyura kandi umwishyurire igihe kuko ejo ejobundi uzongera umukenere burya ibibazo ibihoraho wihemurwa n’ikibazo kizagaruka nutera umukobwa inda ntuziyumvishe umuteye inda gusa ahubwo uzumve wowe mwatangiye urugendo kuzana umuntu mushya si aho guhunga kwihakana wabeshyaga urukundo shikama nk’umugabo kandi wikureho umugayo kuzagira umwana ukugaya abakunegura si bakubeshyera burya umuntu uzavuga intege nkeya zawe gushwana uzagerageze kuba mwiza kurushaho nurangiza n’ibanga ryinshi umusabe ikibi akubonyeho ajya akikubwira ibanga ugikosore ataguteje rubanda burya twese tuzapfa kandi tubitinya kimwe ubabaye wese ubishoboye uzamufashe kandi intwari gukunda mugenzi wayo isumba intwari ijana kurasana icyo ushoboye uzagikore kandi ugikunze cyane cyane impano yawe uzirikane kuyikoresha bikwiriye ntabwo amafaranga akemura ibibazo byose buzima bityo uzirinde guhemuka kubera kuba wowe wowe mbere bifitiye akamaro igihe ushaka kwisuzugura muntu uzakubaha kandi nutagaragaza akamaro kawe si abandi bazaheraho bakuzimanganya ufite impano n’ubwenge bihagije kugira ntiwicwe n’inzara si igihe utabona kwerekeza pfukama hasi usenge imana niyo rumuri rumurikira abatazigera bayoba

title: bpr yatangije uburyo bushya kohereza kwakira amafaranga
content: ubu buryo bushya bwitwa izi cash butuma umufatabuguzi bpr ukoresha telefone yohereza amafaranga serivisi mobile money abasha kohereza amafaranga wundi muntu wese ufite telefone kabone n’ubwo yaba atari umufatabuguzi w’iyo banki richard ndahiro ushinzwe kwamamaza guteza imbere serivisi nshya bpr avuga ibijyanye kohererezanya amafaranga byorohejwe buryo igisabwa ukuba mwese mufite telefone zigendanwa ariko uwohereza akaba akoresha bpr mobile money yagize ukoresheje telefone yawe ushobora kohereza amafaranga nshuti n’abavandimwe ubundi bagafatira amafaranga atm ibegereye karita bakoresheje uwohererejwe amafaranga abona umubare w’ibanga ndetse n’ingano y’amafaranga yohererejwe ubundi akajya atm agafata amafaranga ndahiro yagize uwohererejwe amafaranga yandika umubare w’ibanga ndetse n’ingano y’amafaranga atm imwegereye agahabwa amafaranga ako kanya bpr ifite abakiriya bagera miliyoni n’ibihumbi ifite amashami agera gihugu cyose akoresha ikoranabuhanga interineti ubuyobozi bw’iyi banki buvuga bitarenze kamena amashami azaba akoresha iryo koranabuhanga jean noel mugabo

title: yategetswe n’urukiko guhembera umugore imirimo rugo yakoze
content: urukiko gihugu argentine rwakatiye umugabo igihano guha umugore asaga miliyoni z’amanyarwanda nk’igihembo cy’imirimo rugo yakoze ni umwanzuro wafashwe n’urukiko mbere mugabo yakatiwe igihano guha umugore w’imyaka mafaranga nk’umushahara w’igihe cyose yamaze amukorera imirimo itandukanye rugo ukuvuga imyaka bamaze barashakanye aba bombi bashyingiranywe mwaka uyu mugore warize iby’icungamutungo byabaye ngombwa areka akazi afite kugira abashe kwita rugo n’abana abikora kugeza mwaka yatandukanye n’umugabo nyuma gutandukana n’umugabo myaka y’amavuko mugore ntiyigeze yoroherwa n’ubuzima dore atari akibasha kubona akazi ibitandukanye n’uwari umugabo warabashije kwizigamira bityo ubuzima bwe bugakomeza kibazo mu gufata umwanzuro uru rubanza urukiko rwahaye agaciro kuba mugore yararetse akazi ke akiyegurira imirimo rugo irimo kwita bana babyaranye ndetse mugabo ubwe mu miryango myinshi abagore biharira imirimo rugo kwita bana n’ubwo bafite akandi kazi umucamanza iki cyemezo cy’uru rukiko cyashimwe cyane n’abantu batandukanye baharanira uburenganzira bw’abagore barimo n’umuyobozi wungirije w’itsinda rikurikirana ubutabera bw’uburinganire amerika y’amajyepfo muri argentine abagore baracyaharirwa imirimo rugo kurusha abagabo ubugore akoresha amasaha gihe umugabo wakoze mirimo adashobora kurenza amasaha nk’uko bitangazwa n’ikinyamakuru cyaho cyitwa clarn imirimo rugo iracyakomeje guharirwa abagore

title: musanze fc yaguze abakinnyi batatu yumvikanye n’abandi batatu isezerera umunani
content: mu ijoro ryakeye nibwo ubuyobozi musanze fc bwicaranye n’abakinnyi buteganya gukoresha mwaka utaha w’imikino kipe izaba itozwa seninga innocent abakinnyi baraye bumvikanye n’ikipe bagashyira umukono masezerano barimo ndizeye innocent kigeme’ umaze imyaka ibiri mukura victory nyuma amagaju fc akaba akina hagati kibuga ruhande rw’iburyo kigeme yahawe amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri kimwe rutahizamu munyeshaka gilbert wakiniraga heroes fc ndetse niyonshuti gad evra’ ukina inyuma ibumoso akaba yavuye sunrise fc umunya-nigeria samson okwecuku wakiniye bugesera fc umugande kyambadde fred wakiniraga espoir fc n’umunyezamu ntaribi steven wakiniraga gorilla fc cyiciro kabiri baraye bumvikanye n’ubuyobozi ariko bazabanza kuzana impapuro zibakura makipe uretse bakinnyi bashya musanze fc yongereye amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri dushimumugenzi jean habyarimana eugne moussa ally sova usigaje umwaka umwe ariko akaba yemeye kongezwa abakinnyi basoje amasezerano musanze fc batazongerwa barimo maombi jean pierre nduwayezu jean paul chouchou’ jean didier touya gabiro jean claude mugenzi cdric ramires’ abari bagifite amasezerano basezerewe abanya-nigeria ernest adeola okwecuku okay basigaranye imyaka ibiri y’amasezerano nyuma kumara umwe kimwe n’umunyezamu muhawenayo gad peter otema wakiniraga bugesera fc mwaka ushize w’imikino yifuza kugaruka musanze fc yarimo mwaka w’imikino akayikinira aniga gutoza

title: ikibazo kubonera ibihugu abagizwe abere ictr gikomeje kuba ingorabahizi

title: rwamaganaubwoba bwose baturage bitewe makadamiya zibwe zikaburirwa irengero
content: ubaturage batuye murenge rubona kagari byahi midugudu gitwa mahoro bahangayikishijwe n’uburyo ubuyobozi bw’umurenge bwabaciye amafaranga ibihumbi bitanu frw buri rugo hibwaga imbuto makadamiya z’umushoramari wazihinze murenge nyuma kwibwa kw’izi mbutoubuyobozi bw’umurenge bwahise butegeka abaturage bagomba gushaka uwazibye batamubonye bazahita bishyura mafaranga abaturage baganiriye n’umunyamakuru muhaburarw bavuze badashobora kuriha amafaranga y’ibintu batibye ndetse batanazi byananga bazitabaza inzego nkuru z’igihugu zibarenganure umwe yagize atiumuntu wese ubuze akantu abaturage barihe bariheicyo kintu ntabwo nemeranya n’ubuyobozi nubwo baturihisha ntabwo twaziriha undi agira atiabayobozi b’umurenge daso baraje nama batubwira buri rugo ugutanga ibihumbi ibihumbi bitanutwavuze tuzabaza hejuru twakumva bishoboka tukayatanga twakumva bidashoboka ngo n’ubwo icyemezo cy’ubuyobozi itegeko abaturage bamaze kugitera utwatsi kuko ntibagumya kwishyurira abajura kandi bishyura amafaranga y’umutekeno hari wagize amafaranga twaciwe twavuze ntayo twatangantabwo twarihirira ibisambo buri munsi bakomeza bavuga bazayatanga beretswe ahanditse uwuzajya yibwa bazajya bateranya amafaranga y’ibyo yibwe bakamuriha umunyamabango nshingwa bikorwa w’umurenge rubona byaruhanga jhon ushyirwa majwi yatangarije muhaburarw makadamiya zingirijwe ndetse ziribwa ariko abasaba kuvuga uwabikoze banze kumuvuga abatera ubwoba nataboneka bariburihe makadamiya yagize atini abibye makadamiya barangiza bakazivunagurandababwira muduhe amakuru y’abantu bakora bintunabo barambwira ntawe bazi hanyuma batamuvuze mpita mbabwira mwese mwarabikoze cyangwa se ababikoze murabazi ahubwo murabahishiraubwo mpita mbabwira babahishiriye ingaruka ziraje zigere midugudu

content: ubuyobozi gereza kent county buravuga umwe mfungwa uyifungiwemo yitabye imana nyuma gusanga yashizemo yataye ubwenge ishuka iziritse ijosi rye uwiyahuye umusore w’umunyarwanda w’imyaka witwa akaba yarasanzwe wenyine cyumba afungiwemo mbere gato saa saba n’igice z’ijoro mbere ushize tariki mutarama kugeza icyamwishe ntikiramenyekana neza ariko abashinzwe iperereza barakeka yaba yariyahuye nyakwigendera niyomugabo afunze azira kwiba ibintu bifite agaciro kari munsi y’amadolari ndetse kwangiza umutungo w’abandi ufite agaciro kari hejuru y’amadolari ariko katarengeje amadolari abayobozi b’iyi gereza bavuga nyuma kumusanga asa nk’uwapfuye bagerageje kumugarura buzima bakamujyana bitaro ariko kuwa mutarama akaza gushiramo umwuka bikekwa yaitanywe n’ibikomere yatewe gushaka kwikuramo umwuka nk’uko fox dukesha nkuru ikomeza ivuga amashusho agaragaza ibibera gereza yafashwe gusubirwamo harebwe camera gereza zishinzwe byakurikijwe aho ukuriye gereza michelle young avuga amashusho y’ibibera buri cyumba block agaragara byibuze buri minota yanditswe ubwanditsimuhaburarw

title: amavubi azatangira kwitegura erithrea tariki
content: bitewe n’umwanya mubi u rwanda ruherereyeho rutonde fifa amavubi kimwe n’andi makipe adahagaze neza urwo rutonde azabanza gukina umukino w’ijonjora ry’ibanze mbere kujya matsinda u rwanda ruzakina umukino ubanza eritrea tariki ugushyingo i asmara nyuma y’iminsi ine tariki bakine umukino kwishyura i kigali ikipe izatsinda mikino yombi izahita yerekeza itsinda f rizaba ririmo algeria mali benin nyuma y’iryo jonjora hazakorwa amatsinda amakipe azaba mbere buri tsinda azasigara ahatanira amatike atanu atangwa fifa bihugu afurika bigomba kuzakina igikombe cy’isi ayo makipe azaba yasigaye azatomborana azahura abiri abiri hagati yayo mukino ubanza n’uwo kwishyura amakipe atanu atsinze azabe yerekeza gikombe cy’isi brazil hagato u rwanda ntiruramenya umutoza uzatoza amavubi guhatanira tike kuko nyuma gusezera sellas tetteh hataraboneka umutoza kumusimbura biteganyijwe batoza barenga basabye gutoza amavubi hazatoranywamo uzahabwa ako kazi uzatoza amavubi azashyirwaho nyuma y’itariki ukwakira kuko tariki hazatorwa umuyobozi w’ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amagru rwanda ferwafa afatanyije minisiteri y’urubyiruko umuco siporo n’izindi nzobere mupira w’amaguru zizifashishwa akazagira uruhare guhitamo umutoza uzatoza amavubi theoneste nisingizwe

title: ellen johnson wayoboye liberia yasabye isi guhuza imbaraga bihe
content: uwahoze perezida liberia ellen johnson sirleaf yahamagariye isi kumwumvira igahuza imbaraga kurwanya icyorezo coronavirus cyugarije isi nk’uko gushyira hamwe byatumye igihugu cye n’isi rusange babasha gutsinda ebola mwaka ibi mugore wabaye perezida mbere w’umugore liberia ndetse afurika yabitangarije bbc kiganiro bagiranye asubiza nkunga yaha isi bihe bihambaye irimo yagize kuwa ugushyingo ebola ikajije umurego afurika y’iburengerazuba gihugu cyanjye cyorezo cyari kimaze guhitana abantu abandi bakomeje kwandura nandikiye ibaruwa isi nyisaba yamfasha johnson yakomeje avuga yasabaga ubufasha igihugu cye kiri bihe bibi by’icyorezo ndetse kinakomotse bukene cyatewe n’intambara gihe isi yaramwumvise ndetse iramufasha abasha gutsinda icyorezo ebola ku kijyanye coronavirus johnson avuga habayeho ikibazo kugira amakuru cyorezo ubwiru ibihugu bikabifata nkaho ikibazo kireba ubushinwa gusa bikarinda bifata intera ingana gutya biri ellen johnson sirleaf yabaye perezida w’igihugu liberia kugeza akaba mugore mbere watorewe kuyobora igihugu mugabane afrika yayoboye imyaka harimo n’imyaka yadutsemo icyorezo ebola hagati cyahitanye abantu bageze gihugu cye

title: hatanzwe miliyari y’amapawundi igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinnyi arsenal yasohoye menshi
content: abakinnyi baguzwe munota nyuma premier league batumye mpeshyi hasohorwa miliyari miliyoni z’amapawundi habuze gato akureho umuhigo miliyari miliyoni z’amapawundi yatanzwe yabaye mbere menshi igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinnyi ejo kane umunsi nyuma w’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinnyi mugabane w’uburayi ku munsi w’ejo wonyine amakipe premier league yasohoye miliyoni z’amapawundi - masezerano y’abakinnyi amasezerano y’abakinnyi bacye gutyo munsi nyuma yaherukaga mpeshyi igurwa rutahizamu alex iwobi everton miliyoni z’amapawundi avuye arsenal ryatumye mukinnyi uhenze uvuye ikipe ajya yindi zombi premier league munsi nyuma kuva manchester united ajya inter milan romelu lukaku miliyoni z’amapawundi - harimo igihombo miliyoni y’amapawundi yaguzwe ava everton - kwatumye mukinnyi wahenze mpeshyi avuye premier league arsenal yasohoye akayabo arsenal yasohoye amafaranga menshi cyane kurusha andi makipe bwongereza kugura abakinnyi mpeshyi - miliyoni z’amapawundi ejo munsi nyuma w’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinnyi yaguze myugariro kieran tierney miliyoni z’amapawundi imukuye celtic igura myugariro david luiz miliyoni z’amapawundi imuvanye chelsea tottenham yaguze nguzanyo umukinnyi hagati giovani lo celso imukuye real betis ndetse igura n’umukinnyi ruhande ryan sessegnon miliyoni z’amapawundi imuvanye fulham ariko kugambirira kugura rutahizamu paulo dybala imukuye juventus - byari byakomeje kuvugwaho cyane munsi w’ejo tottenham ntabwo yabigezeho watford yasohoye avugwa miliyoni z’amapawundi kugura umukinnyi ruhande ismaila sarr imuvanye rennes - amafaranga mbere menshi iguze umukinnyi leicester yaguze umukinnyi hagati ukina asatira izamu dennis praet bivugwa yaguzwe miliyoni z’amapawundi imuvana sampdoria burnley yaguze nguzanyo umukinnyi hagati danny drinkwater avuye chelsea manchester city igura nguzanyo umunyezamu scott carson avuye derby newcastle yongera kugura rutahizamu andy carroll utari ufite ikipe akinira inkuru bbc

title: ngoma yafatiwe cyuho ateka kanyanga
content: umunyamabanga nshingwa bikorwa w’umurenge mugesera bizumuremyi jean damascene avuga basanze habineza arimo guteka kanyanga kandi yiyemerera asanzwe akora murimo habineza yemeza aramutse ahawe imbabazi atazongera kubikora habineza yafatanwe ijerekani kanyanga arimo ateka hamwe n’ibikoresho akoresha kuyiteka birimo ingunguru n’ibindi bizumuremyi avuga ibikorwa guteka nzoga kugeza ifatwa nk’ikiyobyabwenge yemera hari abantu bayicuruza murenge ayobora ariko hamwe n’inzego z’abaturage zirimo community policing batanga amakuru bagafatwa kandi bazajya bashyikirizwa ubutabera yagize guca biyobyabwenge si ikintu cyoroshye ariko turizera dufatanije n’abaturage baduha amakuru bizashoboka tuzice kuko zitera umutekani muke ndetse murenge wacu guteka cyangwa gucuruza kanyanga icyaha gihanirwa rwanda kuko kanyanga ifatwa nk’ikiyobyabwenge raporo zishyirwa ahagaragara yaba kurwego polisi cyangwa inzego zibanze bigaragara ibiyobyabwenge kanyanga urumogi ndetse n’ibindi aribyo biza isonga guhungabanya umutekano birimo kwica gukomeretsa jean claude gakwaya

title: muhanga ihungabana rikomoka jenoside si iry’abacitse icumu gusa
content: mu biganiro yagiranye n’abanyamuhanga tariki nyirabahire yasobanuye ihungabana imihindukire y’imyitwarire imiterere iterwa n’ikintu kibi kibaye muntu bimutunguye avuga ihungabana riterwa jenoside yakorewe abatutsi ritagirwa gusa n’abacitse icumu kuko n’abandi bashobora kurigira kubera babonye bakoze cyangwa bumvise gihe jenoside umunyamabanga w’inama njyanama y’akarere muhanga avuga n’abatarahigwaga bashobora guhura n’ikibazo cy’ihungabana gihe cy’icyunamo yagize umuntu ashobora guhungabana bitewe n’ibyo yabonye bakorera abicwaga yarahetse intumbi cyangwa imirambo cyangwa yaragize uruhare bwicanyi umuntu wagize uruhare kwica abantu cyangwa kandi karengane arangwa kwiheba agahora yicira imanza ndetse agahora yifuza uwamubaza byabaye kugira abashe kubivuga abyikurimo nk’uko nyirabahire yakkomeje abisobanura yongeyeho benshi banyarwanda bahuye n’ihungabana ariko ngero zitandukanye abanyarwanda hanze y’igihugu hari ababa bumva buri munyarwanda wese umwicanyi ikaba byatera ihungabana rikomeye nk’uko umunyamabanga w’inama njyanama y’akarere muhanga abyemeza gerard gitoli mbabazi

title: muhanga inyama zikomeje guhenda
content: mukamudenge umwe bazindukiye isoko ry’inyama mujyi muhanga tariki aje kugura kurya yitwaje akadobo gato kavuyemo isabune omo atwayemo inyama zigera ndiba gihe avuga ahahiye umuryango mugari agira wahaha izirenze ikilo ukazabonahe amafaranga yazo ndajyana singombwa bazihaga erega mayi aka kongeye kuba akaboga k’abifashije vedaste mpagaritswenimanaushinzwe ubuhinzi n’ubworozi karere muhanga avuga ibura ry’inyama ikibazo gihangayikishije kubera borozo bajya bakunda korora inka z’inyama agira abaturage benshi usanga biyororera inka z’amata baturage bafata icyemezo korora inka z’inyama kandi hagize ubigira umushinga yakunguka cyane mupenzi umubazi akaba n’umucuruzi w’imyama avuga imyama bacuruza ziba zirimo amoko atandukanye bitewe n’ubushobozi buri umwe wese avuga hari imyama z’inka ikiro kigura amafaranga y’u rwanda izindi zikaba inyama nda hari izindi zitwa iroti zigura amafaranga benshi bavuga zirya umugabo zigasiba mupenzi avuga ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka ikiro cy’inyama make zaguraga amafaranga y’u rwanda mpagaritswenimana avuga batangiye gushishikariza abaturage korora n’amatungo magufi kuko byafasha kugabanya ikibazo cy’inyama kigaragara aka karere gerard gitoli mbabazi

title: rayon vs apr umukino w’imbonekarimwe cyumweru
content: aya makipe adashobora gupfa gukina umukino gicuti hagati yayo akaba azaba ahatanira amanota atatu mukino shampiyona izaba igeze munsi gatanu apr iyoboye urutonde rw’agateganyo ikaba irusha rayon sport mwanya gatatu amanota atatu uretse ngabo albert ruhande apr fc utazakina mukino kubera amakarita abiri y’umuhondo afite bokota labama ruhande rayon sport utarizerwa ijana ijana azaba yabonye ibyangombwa bimwemerera gukina abandi bakinnyi mpande zose bameze neza kandi buri ruhande rwizeye intsinzi jean marie ntagwabira utoza rayon sport nyuma y’imyitozo ikipe yakoze gatanu yavuze abakinnyi biteguye kandi mvune ikanganye afite akaba abona agendeye bakinnyi asanganywe hakiyongeraho bokota labama ushobora kuzakina mukino yizeye gutsinda nyuma gutsindwa la jeunesse abakinnyi bahise babyivana mutwe bategura neza umukino apr kandi abatarakinnye ubushize bazaba bahari kandi n’umwuka mwiza kuko n’ubuyobozi buturi inyuma rayon sport izaba ikinisha mbere shampiyona abakinnyi babiri b’abarundi mbanza hussein ndayisaba tambwe floribert gihe mukino uheruka yatsinzwe apr yorohewe kubona amanota atatu imbere as kigali yayitsindaga ibitego busa apr irimo gushakisha igikombe shampiyona nayo ifite ibikombe byinshi izaba igendera cyane kapiteni wayo ukubutse i burayi olivier karekezi wanadutangarije n’ubwo abona rayon sport ikomeye ariko intsinzi ayizeye nyuma y’imyaka adahura n’iyi kipebiragaragara rayon sport mwaka ihagaze neza ariko kuba naragarutse apr mbona nzafasha cyane gushaka intsinzi ikindi kandi akenshi makipe ahuye ntakunda kunganya haba hagomba kuboneka ikipe itahana amanota atatu ariko ngendeye bushake dufite nk’abakinnyi apr tugomba gutsinda mu gihe rayon sport yatsinda mukino izaba ikomeje gusatira mukeba wayo apr guhatanira igikombe shampiyona ariko apr iramutse itsinze mukino yaba isize rayon sport amanota atandatu atakorohera ikipe rayon sport kuzayakuramo uyu mukino ukaba uhuriranye n’undi w’amakipe ahora ahanganye bwongereza manchester united manchester city byanatumye uwa rayon sport apr wagombaga kuzatangira saa cyenda wimurirwa saa kumi n’igice kugirango abakunda makipe bwongereza banakunda rayon apr batazacikanwa uyu mukino manchester city uzanerekwanwa stade amahoro mbere y’uko uwa rayon apr utangira theoneste nisingizwe

title: abahindi bifatanyije n’abanyarwanda kwibuka jenoside y’abatutsi
content: icyo gikorwa kwibuka cyabereye ishuri rikuru bangalore murwamukuru new delhi cyitabirwa n’abantu bagera magana ane nyuma y’urugendo kwibuka umuyobozi uhagarariye u rwanda buhindi williams nkurunziza yavuze jenoside yakorewe abatutsi itazongera ukundi ati twibagiwe ubumuntu duhinduka inyamaswa dutsemba abavandimwe bacu iyi inkovu itari ikwiye kubaho turizeza ibyabaye bizasubira ukundi yatangaje u rwanda ruviriye jenoside rwateye intambwe itangaje ubukungu bw’igihugu bwiyongereye kigereranyo ijana ugereranyije n’imyaka ishize n’ubukene bukagabanuka gipimo ijana myaka itanu ishize iterambere u rwanda rwagezeho rurikesha perezida paul kagame nyuma kuyobohoza u rwanda agahagarika jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mwaka yahitanye ubuzima bw’inzirakarengane zisaga miliyoni nk’uko nkurunziza akomeza abitangaza ibikorwa nk’ibyo kwibuka byabereye kandi n’i pune salem kuri cyumweru tariki biteganyijwe abanyarwanda bagera i chidambaram coimbatore bangalore nabo baza kwibuka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi nshimiyimana leonard

title: nyamagabe kugwingira bana b’abasigajwe inyuma n’amateka byafashe indi ntera’
content: imwe miryango y’abasigajwe inyuma n’amateka murenge kigeme akagali gasaka bavuga kubera imibereho mibi ikabije babamo abana bagwingira k’uburyo ubarebye utamenya umukuru n’umutoibi bigira ingaruka myigire ababyeyi baganiriye muhaburarw bavuga abana batabasha kwiga bafate mutwe kuko bashonjebamwe bemeza hari bahitamo kutohereza abana ishuri kuko baziko batashobora kwiga neza ngo babikora by’amaburakindi kuko basanzwe bazi akamaro kwiga n’ubwo leta yabafashije byinshi by’umwihariko harimo gukurwa bihuru batuyemo bagatuzwa midugudu basaba bafashwa kwiyubaka binyuze gufashwa kubona imirimo yabaha amafaranga guhahisha kugira bitungeibi byatuma imibereho ihinduka bizimana umwe babyeyi avuga afite abana umunani muri bane nibo bashoboye kugera ishuri abandi bane bakiri bato barwaye bwaki bityo yahisemo kutabohereza ishuri kuko abandi bana babaseka ati iyo batabonye kurya ntibajya kwiga kandi ntiwababwira nimujye kwiga kuko bagiye kwiga ntibakurikira ese wabwira umwana uti andika cyangwa soma atariye uramubwira uti andika kiriya kibaho agahuma kubera inzara n’uburwayi bubugarije colette mukamana umwe babyeyi bafite abana bagwingiyebataniga avuga kubera ubukene batabasha kugurira abana imyenda y’ishuri mu bana batandatu afite babiri gusa nibo yashoboye kugurira impuzankano y’ishuriavuga nyuma kugurira bariya bana babiri impuzankano amikoro yamushiranye mukamana avuga ibibazo byihariye bafite aribyo bituma abana batabasha kwiga ngo n’abarigezemo ntibaritindamo aho akura amafaranga gutundira abaturanyi umucanga kandi kiraka ntigihoraho kutagira ubutaka buhagije guhingaho kimwe bituma bateza nk’abandi bihaze biribwa hanyuma basagurire isoko abagize ikiciro cy’abasigajwe inyuma n’amateka kitwa abatwa’ bamaze igihe kinini mateka y’u rwanda batagira uruhare runini bukungu bw’igihugu bituma badindira iterambere ubuyobozi bw’akarere kanyamagabe bwemera kibazo gihari ariko batangiye kugikurikirana umuyobozi w’akarere nyamagabe bonavanture uwamahoro avuga iriya miryango y’abasigajwe inyuma n’amateka ibayeho nabi kandi bayisuye bakabiganiraho yagize atikubijyanye n’abacyeneye ubufasha bwihutirwa basenyewe n’imvura tugiye gushaka title: u rwanda rwatorewe kwakira imikino volleyball y’abagore rwego rw’afurika

title: impamvu nyamukuru ituma nyirantare’ idacika bamwe bayicuruza bajyanwa nzererezi
content: mu gihe abaturage bashinja bamwe bayobozi b’inzego z’ibanze gukingira ikibaba abakora bakanacuruza inzoga z’inkorano nyirantareigikwangari bavuga impamvu idacika abenshi bafata bayicuruza bakunze kuzica tuzinywera mashyamba masaka hari abagiye babyemerewe kuzikora babyemererwa n’abakuru b’imidugudu n’abashinzwe umutekano undi muturage twavuganye afite ubwoba abazicuruza baramutse bamenye yatanze amakuru bamwica ati murashaka bazatwica bariya nibabiabapima nzoga nyuma kumusobanurira tutazatangaza amazina ndetse foto tuzashyira ahagaragara yatwemereye tuganira adutungira agatoti zidacika kandi zicururizwa ahantu hari abayobozi b’imidugudu mudugudu bakingira ikibabaza abazicuruza ati ubwo bafite ukuntu babivuganyeho nkuriye albert wahoze umuyobozi w’umudugudu w’akamuhoza kagari kimana murenge tumba w’akarere huye avuga abacuruza nyirantare bafite agatsiko k’abagizi nabi bakorana buryo bamenye umuntu wabatanzeho amakuru yaba umuturage cyangwa umuyobozi bamwica ati nashyize imbaraga kurwanya nyirantare bateza inzuki umuntu ucuruza nyirantare niwe mwanzi w’igihugu mbere kuko afite ubugome bwinshi yanga abaturage rukundo afitiye igihugu cye umutanzeho amakuru akakumenya umuturage akakumenya gupfa wapfa niyo mpamvu ubona n’abakuru b’imidugudu batinya niyo mpamvu mubona bidacika avuga bunyice yakomeje agira n’abayobozi wumva baratinya kubera babatega babagirira nabi bifashisha abantu b’ibihazi afite ikipe imurinze kumufata ntibiba byoroshye ashobora gushyiraho yewe moto izenguruka kureba umuyobozi buturuke hari n’umuyobozi w’akagari bakubitiye nzira mu kagari rwanza twarahageze dusanga abaturage kunywa nzoga mwanya y’ihangu batubonye baratatana umwe bazinywa yatubwiye impamvu batareka nzoga zihendutse rucyahana tresphore umuyobozi w’umudugudu nyagacyamo kagari rwanza umurenge save yemeza bamwe bafashe bacuruza nzoga badahanwa bigeraho bikabaca intege ati abafashwe tubashyikiriza polisi bamwe ikabajyana parike cyangwa bakajyanwa transitmu bigo by’inzererezi bakamarayo igihe gitoya babigisha cyangwa se babagira inama ariko bagaruka bakongera bakabikora ugasanga nk’umuntu amaze gufatwa nk’inshuro umwe mubega nyirantare murenge save tuganira yavuze amaze gufatwa inshuro ajyanwa transit mperukayo navuyeyo ntanze ibihumbi ubu narabiretse nubwo yatubwiye yabiretse abamuzi neza batubwiye atakibikorera iwe ahubwo yafunguye amashami agera arindwi abantu igishoro bakenga bakanacuruza agasarura inyungu ntiyamira david umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’ umurenge save avuga igikwangari murenge cyagabanutse cyane kuko bamwe title: ibyihariye itongo ry’umwami kigeri iv rwabugiri ry’i karongiahateguriwe ibitero bikomeye
content: kuwa - kanama umunyamakuru igihe kimwe n’abafite ibigo bifasha mukerarugendo rwanda basuye ahahoze urugo kigeri iv rwabugiri rugendo rugamije gutangiza inzira nshya y’ubukerarugendo bushingiye muco n’amateka uru rugendo rwateguwe n’ ikigo gishinzwe ingoro z’umurage w’u rwanda n’umushinga w’abadage wita iterambere giz rwabimburiwe gusura inkima birunga umuvumbuzi w’umudage dr richard kandt yakozeho ubushakashatsi rwakomereje i shangi kandt yabanje gutura pariki nyungwe yavumbuye isoko y’uruzi nil gusura abanyamuryango koperative zirimo abagi ikorera uburobyi n’ubwato kiyaga kivu masaha y’ijoro tugarure umuco karongi iri tsinda ryasobanuriwe mwami afite ingo nyinshi gihugu akoreramo ibikorwa bitandukanye kuyobora igihugu gusigasira ubusugire bwacyo kigeri iv rwabugiri wabaye ikirangirire n’igihangange atsinda amahanga bitero byose bigera yagiye agaba yubatse urugo cyahoze kibuye karere karongi umurenge rubengera yateguriragamo ibitero ni urugo rwari ruguru gato y’ikiyaga kivu uru rugo yarwubatse atabarutseavuye rugamba i butembo repubulika iharanira demokarasi congo nirwo yakoreyemo umuhango w’umuganura inshuro nyinshizirindwi ugereranyije n’ahandi yagiye awukorera ibitero byinshi kigeri iv rwabugiri yagabye ijwi n’i bunyabungo yabiteguriraga urwo rugo ingabo zatabaruka zikahavugiriza amacumu zizanye n’iminyango zakuye rugamba akazishimira azambika impeta z’ubutwari kuva i rubengera kibuye ugera uru rugo rwari rwubatse modoka ugenda iminota itarenga ugahita ubona icyapa kizamuka gahanda gato kabanza kugeza ahahoze iriba i bwami bavomagaho amazi uvuye iryo riba munsi ryubakiwe kijyambere ugenda metero ugahita ubona inzira y’abanyamaguru igera urugo rwe rwari ruri munsi hagaragazwa n’ikigabiro cy’igihondohondo n’ibindi byarangaga urugo rw’umwami nk’inzu kinyarwanda umuyobozi w’ingoro z’umurage w’u rwanda amb robert masozera yavuze ubushakatsi bwakozwe bwerekanye rwanda hari ahantu nyaburanga hari amateka akomeye hashobora gusurwa n’abakerarugendo harimo n’aho hahoze urugo kigeri iv rwabugiri’ ati mu bushakashatsi dukora burimo gucukura dushaka ibisigaratongo hano twahabonye ibimenyetso by’icyo gihe biranga ubutwari bw’umwami rwabugiri birimo intango z’imitsindo yakoreshaga yavuze habitse amateka menshi kandi hafitiwe gahunda kuyabungabunga gahunda kwagura ubukerarugendo bukarenga gushingira ngagi pariki amb masozera yijeje ubufasha abanyamuryango koperative tugarure umuco biyemeje gutegura ibikorwa bitandukanye kwakira abakerarugendo bazajya basura ahohoze urugo kigeri iv rwabugiri n’utundi duce nyaburanga dukikije umukandara kivu

title: uzatoza amavubi azashyirwaho nyuma y’umukino eritrea
