title: darfur ingabo z’u rwanda ntizizacika intege
content: ibi umuvugizi w’ingabo yabitangaje nyuma yaho abasirikare babiri b’u rwanda ukwakira masaha n’ijoro biciwe ntara darfur umuvugizi w’ingabo z’u rwanda avuga basirikare mubikorwa by’irondo baza kugwa mugico cy’inyeshyamba n’ubu zitari zamenyekana koroneli joseph nzabamwita agira abagizi nabi bateze abasirikare bacu barabarasa habaho imirwano mirwano hapfa abasirikare bacu babiri abasirikare bacu mukwivuna umwanzi bica umusirikare umwe n’umubiri n’ibikoresho afite turabifata ariko none hakomeretse abasirikare bacu bane barimo kuvurirwa i khartoum yemeza aka gace hiciwe abasirikare b’u rwanda mubutumwa bw’umuryango w’abibumbye hari inyeshyamba zitandukanye zirimo n’aba janjaweed bakomeje kwibasira abaturage b’intara darfur hari kandi ingabo leta sudani u rwanda ruvuga rudashobora gucibwa intege n’ibikorwa nk’ibi byibasira ingabo mpuzamahangakoloneli nzabamwita yagize icyambere twagiye butumwa tuzi neza ukwitanga abana b’u rwanda baritanze kugira dushobore kurengera n’ubuzima bw’abandi kandi twitanga n’ubuzima bwacu nicyo mbereubuyobozi bw’ingabo z’u rwanda zikaba zihanganisha imiryango y’abasirikare baguye muntara darfur leta y’u rwanda yamaganye mugaragaro igitero cyahitanye abasirikare babiri b’u rwanda n’umupolisi senegal itangazo minisiteri y’ingabo yashyize ahagaragara nyuma y’iraswa ryabo kuri loni yohereje itsinda rishinzwe gukora iperereza ryimbitse gitero abagikoze n’icyo bagamije mu ntara darfur habarizwa abasirikare b’u rwanda bagera egide kayiranga

title: abasirikare barimo ab’ amerika batangiye imyitozo rwanda
content: ingabo bihugu birimo leta z’ ubumwe amerika ziri rwanda myitozo kubungabunga amahoro gucunga umutekano ingabo bihugu birimo leta z’ ubumwe amerika ziri rwanda myitozo kubungabunga amahoro gucunga umutekano kuri kanama atangiza myitozo kubera rwanda nshuro umugaba mukuru w’ ingabo z’ u rwanda gen patrick nyamvumba yavuze u rwanda rutazahwema gutanga umusanzu warwo bikorwa kubungabunga amahoro yagize u rwanda rwiteguye gutanga umusanzu warwo kugarura amahoro n’ umutekano igihe cyose bikenewe niyo mpamvu twohereje ingabo darfur repubulika centre africa umuyobozi mukuru wungirije w’ ingabo amerika afurika yashimye u rwanda rwakiriye myitozo yongeraho itazaba amasigaragicaro ati nshimishijwe n’ icyizere cyanyu n’ ubushake bwanyu nizeye tuzavana hano ubumenyi bushya n’ inshuti nshya mu izina ry’ umuyobozi wacu john baptist nanjye nangira mbabwire impamvu turi hano yakomeje agira turi hano kugira dufatanye kubaka ubushuti n’ ubushobozi icya kabiri turi hano kugira twese twizere twiteguye gukemura ibibazo biri mugabane afurika icya gatatu turi hano umwe yigire wundi iyi myitozo yatangiye kanama izasozwa tariki izakorerwa kigo gisirikare i gabiro ishuri gisirikare gako abazagira ikibazo cy’ ubuzima bazavurirwa bitaro gisirikare i kanombe iyi myitozo izitabirwa n’ abagera gusa si abasirikare ahubwo harimo n’ abapolisi n’ abasivile

title: harateganywa ubushakashatsi dukingirizo tuberanye n’ingimbi
content: ibi bimwe byavugiwe kiganiro n’abanyamakuru kane tariki akaba ikiganiro cyateguwe n’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima ishami rishinzwe kurwanya sida iki kiganiro kikaba cyari kigamije kumenyekanisha ibizigirwa nama y’igihugu ngarukamwaka kurwanya icyorezo sida bana izabera i kigali tariki kugeza ugushyingo mwaka ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubuzima rwanda biomedical center rbc kivuga nubwo gahunda gukwirakwiza udukingirizo mashuri yisumbuye igifite ingorane kutumvikanwaho bitazatuma gahunda idashoboka dr anita asiimwe umuyobozi mukuru wungirije rbc avuga kubera imyaka y’abanyeshuri mashuri yisumbuye ibarirwa hagati gahunda gukwirakwiza udukingirizo mashuri yisumbuye niyemerwa hazabaho ubushakashatsi bw’udukingirizo tuberanye n’abo banyeshuri dr anita asiimwe agira hazabaho ubushakashatsi bwihuse hagamijwe kumenya udukingirizo turi isoko dutoya cyangwa tunini bana ubu hari ubushakashatsi dufite bwakozwe minisiteri y’ubuzima buvuga hari abavuga udukingirizo duhari isoko ry’u rwanda tudafite impumuro nziza n’ibi tuzabyigaho hazanwe udukingirizo dufite impumuro zidatuma hari abanga gukoresha udukingirizo ishami ry’umuryango w’abibumbye ryita muryango un family naryo rivuga u rwanda nirwemeza ikwirakwiza ry’udukingirizo mashuri yisumbuye rugomba gukora ubushakashatsi dukingirizo tuberanye n’abanyeshuri mashuri yisumbuye dr landry tsigain akorera un family avuga kumenya udukingirizo tungana kuko hari udukingirizo dushobora kuba tunini bamwe utundi tukaba duto bandi yatanze urugero bihugu by’afurika y’amajyepfo kuko higeze kuza udukingirizo tunini bagabo ubushakashatsi bwakozwe minisiteri y’ubuzima mwaka buzima bw’imyororokere y’ingimbi n’abangavu bugaragaza abakobwa batangira gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina myaka abahungu bagatangira myaka inzego z’ubuvuzi zivuga kuba hari abakobwa batwara inda mashuri yisumbuye ikimenyetso cy’uko hadafashwe ingamba zikomeye habaho ubwiyongere bw’ubwandu sida mashuri yisumbuye rubyiruko rusange jean baptiste micomyiza

title: umwaka ibyemezo by’inama y’abaminisitiri iyobowe perezida kagame
content: ku kabiri tariki mutarama inama y’abaminisitiri idasanzwe yateraniye village urugwiro iyobowe perezida repubulika paul kagame inama y’abaminisitiri yemeje imyanzuro y’inama y’abaminisitiri y’izuba yashyiriweho umukono i kigali ukwakira umushinga w’itegeko rigenga serivisi z’umutekano zitangwa n’abikorera inama y’abaminisitiri yemeje amateka perezida akurikira iteka perezida rishyiraho amahoro yakwa serivisi byemezo bitangwa n’inzego z’imitegekere y’igihugu zegerejwe abaturage iteka perezida ryemerera dr nyemazi jean pierre umunyamabanga uhoraho minisiteri y’ubuzima guhagarika akazi title: miss tanja dexters wabaye nyampinga w’ububiligi yatawe yombi mukwabo w’abacuruza ibiyobyabwenge
content: mu mukwabo gufatira cyuho abacuruzi b’ibiyobyabwenge wabereye majyaruguru y’ububiligi gace herentals gitondo kabiri polisi aka gace yataye yombi abantu batanu harimo tanja dexters wabaye nyampinga w’ububiligi nkuko parike anvers yabitangaje mikwabo irindwi yabaye hafashwe abantu batanu barimo n’uyu mugore tanja dexters usanzwe anazwi nk’umunyamideri umuririmbyikazi n’umunyamakuru televiziyo akaba yarafatanywe n’umugabo nkuko ikinyamakuru belga cyabitangajetanja dexters yambitswe ikamba nyampinga w’ububiligi abapolisi bagera hamwe n’imbwa eshanu zihumurirwa n’ibiyobyabwenge nibo mukwabo gusaka ibiyobyabwenge ntabwo byatangajwe haba hari ibiyobyabwenge byafashwe gusa parike yavuze hafashwe imodoka eshatutanja dexters n’umuririmbyikazi aya makuru akomeza avuga hasatswe amashami y’imodoka bwoko kia daf jaguar ubugenzacyaha ntibwatanze imyirondoro y’abantu bafashwe ariko bwatangaje bazitaba bakiregura ndetse bagashyikirizwa umushinjacyahapolisi yataye yombi batanu barimo tanja dexters

title: ngoma abaturage bagaragaje bashaka ibikorwa rememezo n’imibereho myiza
content: abaturage hirya hino gihugu bishimira uruhare bagira ishyirwa bikorwa gahunda z’uturere bagasaba hakomeza gushyirwamo imbaraga ibi babitangaje minisiteri y’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu yatangizaga igikorwa kwakira ibitekerezo by’abaturage bizinjizwa gahunda z’uturere mwaka kuri kabiri turere twose tw’u rwanda hatangiye gahunda gukusanya ibitekerezo by’abaturage bizashingirwaho igenamigambi ndetse kubamurikira ibitekerezo batanze byinjijwe ngengo y’imari ku rwego rw’igihugu gahunda yabereye karere ngoma burasirazuba bw’u rwandaaho minisitiri w’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu profshyaka anastase yanatangiye urunziduko rw’iminsi ibiri abaturage aka akarere bagaragaje bashaka kugezwaho ibikorwa ramemezo by’ubukungu n’imibereho myiza ndetse bashimangira kubaha uruhare igenamigambi bitanga icyizere cy’iterambere rirambye zimwe ngaruka gushyirwa cyiciro cy’ubudehe bavuga kitabakwiye harimo kuba abana b’abanyeshuri basabwa badafite bikabaviramo kureka ishuri hakaba n’abaturage barwara bakarembera kubera kubura ibyangombwa bijyanye n’icyiciro barimo badashoboye kubonera ikiguzi bavuga gushyirwa byiciro by’ubudehe bitajyanye n’ubukungu bafite bituma leta itabitaho bikwiye minisitiri prof shyaka yashimye uruhare abaturage bagira gutanga ibitekerezo asaba inzego zibanze kujya zibatega amatwi kuko ibipimo bigaragaza bitaragera rwego rwifuzwa mu murenge zaza minisitirii shyaka yahuriye n’abaturage b’akarere ngama basabye ibibazo bibangamiye imibereho bizibandwaho igenamigambi ndetse n’ibitaritaweho ngengo y’imari ishize bikazahabwa umwihariko ibipimo by’imiyoborere biherutse gutanagzwa n’urwego rw’imiyoborere rgb bugaragaza imiyoborere abaturage bagizemo uruhare yamanutseho amanota kuko yavuye manota umwaka ushize agera mwaka muhaburarw

title: juliana kanyomozi ati ndabiyamye sinabyaranye muhozi muhungu museven yabihakanye yivuye inyumainkuru
content: umuhanzikazi juliana kanyomozi uherutse kwibaruka umwana w’umuhungu yise tajyanyomoje ibihuha byari byadutse yabyaranye n’umuhungu perezida museveni witwa muhoozi kainerugaba kuwa nibwo julianna yabyaye umwana w’umuhungu kwishumbusha yaherukaga kubura gusa ntiyigeze atangaza se w’umwana amakuru yagiye atunga agatoki abantu benshi nayo mpamvu urubuga facebook rwitwa top secrets leaked’ rwatangaje muhoozi usanzwe umuhungu perezida museveni ariwe waba warateye inda julianna kanyomozi bakabyarana ariko akabihakana asaba hakorwa dna nyuma kubona makurujulianna kanyomozi yahise afata screenshoot y’iyi nkuru y’uru rubuga facebook ayisangiza abakunzi mbuga nkoranyambaga ibi n’ibihuha mubihe agaciro bikwiriyemurakoze kugeza julianna ntaremera gutangaza se w’umwana yise taj nubwo abakunzi benshi bafite amatsiko menshi kumumenya juliana kanyomozi w’imyaka mugabo afite ndetse niwe mwana afite kuko uwe mbere yishwe asthma myaka yashize uyu muhoozi w’imyaka asanzwe umusirikare mukuru gisirikare uganda ndetse ahabwa amahirwe menshi kuzasimbura se butegetsiafite umugore n’abana mu minsi ishizeikinyamakuru blizz uganda cyavuze kigendeye bushakashatsi cyakoze ndetse n’abantu bagiye bandikirana juliana kanyomozicyaketse umuherwe kivuga umunyarwanda witwa habi moses iki kinyamakuru cyavuze juliana n’uyu moses bamaze imyaka myinshi rukundo rw’ibanga ndetse bahisemo gukomeza kubihisha gusa byarangiye urukundo rwabo rweze imbuto iki kinyamakuru cyavuze kandi moses amaze amezi menshi ashyira rukuta rwe amafoto n’amagambo avuga gutwita juliana ariko abantu ntibigeze babiha umwanya blizz uganda yavuze itsinda ry’abanyamakuru bayo bagerageje gufata screenshoots zimwe posts z’uyu muherwe w’umudogiteri ukomoka rwanda witwa habi mosesufite imodoka nyinshiinyubako nziza kandi ihenze mujyi kampala mu butumwa yashyize mbuga nkoranyambaga ze nyuma kubyarajuliana kanyomozi yavuze ’yishimye cyane’ ni umuhungu suhuza taj itariki yavutseho turishimye cyane imana ihabwe icyubahiro tariki juliana kanyomozi yagize ibyago apfusha imfura keron raphael kabugo ufite imyaka y’amavuko wazize indwara asima akaba yaramubyaranye amon lukwago baje gutandukana juliana kanyomozi kenshi yatangaje urupfu rw’imfura rwamusigiye agahinda kenshi gusa umutima wuzuye amashimwe kwibaruka kwe nyuma y’imyaka abuze imfura inkuru yishimiwe benshi bavuze imana imushumbushije yabuze mu isaha ebyiri gusa ifoto muhanzikazi yashyize rukuta rwe instagram imaze gutangwaho ibitekerezo ibihumbi by’abakunzi abahanzi banyuranye n’abandi benshi bishimiye nkuru abahanzi bagenzi uganda n’abo karere bamugaragarije bashimiye cyane kwibaruka kwe harimo dr jose chameleone aline gahongayire spice diana ykee benda iryan namubiru dj pius lydia jazmine sheeba karungi bobi wine n’abandi bantu b’ibyamamare zari the boss lady alex muyoboke judith heard n’abandi juliana kanyomozi n’umwe bahanzikazi beza gihugu uganda afurika yabonye izuba kuwa ugushyingo arasatira imyaka y’amavuko mu gihe amaze muziki yasohoye album nabikowa’ kanyibwe’ bits pieces’ n’izindi azwi ndirimbo zaabu twalina omukwanokibarumamama mbilewomandiana n’izindi

title: arusha callixte nzabonimana arasabirwa igihano gufungwa burundu
content: umushinjacyaha w’uru rukiko paul ngarua yasabiye nzabonimana igihano gufungwa burundu buri cyaha jenoside aregwa byaha byose akurikiranyweho n’uru rukiko nzabonimana wize ibijyanye n’ubutaka kaminuza bufaransa ashinjwa kuba bateguye bagaashyira bikorwa akanategeka ubwicanyi bw’abatutsi ndetse kwica abataravugaga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bwariho ashinjwa kandi kuba yarakanguriye agashishikariza abaturage perefegitura zitandukanye gutsemba abatusi kuba yaratanze intwaro nzabonimana wafatiwe gihugu tanzania kwezi kabiri ahakana ibyaha byose aregwa yabwiye urukiko yarahungiye ambasade y’u bufaransa jenoside yatangiraga ariko umushinjacyaha yahakanye ukwiregura kwe avuga abantu barahungiye ambasade bafite uburenganzira gusohoka igihe cyose babyifurije gutanga ibindi bimenyetso biteganyijwe kurangira gatanu abacamanza bakazahita bajya mwiherero gusuzuma ibyatangajwe mpande zombi uru rubanza rwatangiye kwezi cyenda mu kwezi gushize uru rukiko rwari rwakatiye igihano cy’imyaka abandi bahoze minisitiri babiri kubera uruhare bagize jenoside ariko rufungura n’abandi babiri nyuma kubura ibimenyetso bibahama urukiko ictr rwashizweho nyuma jenoside rwanda rwego gukurikirana abantu b’ingenzi bagize uruhare jenoside yakorewe abatusi abantu barenga miliyoni bayiguyemo gihe cy’iminsi emmanuel hitimana

title: imfubyi jenoside zirasaba kurushaho kwegerwa
content: nubwo u rwanda rufite rugeze guhangana n’ingaruka jenoside abana bagizwe imfubyi baracyakeneye inama urukundo gusurwa kwitabwaho kuko abakagombye kubibaha batagihari nk’uko byatangajwe n’uhagarariye ibuka karere rubavu kabanda innocent kabanda yasabye abanyarubavu kwita bana ndetse n’abapfakazi kabanda yongeyeho ubupfura batojwe butabemerera kwangana mpamvu biteguye gutanga imbabazi babiciye babishaka yagize ntabwo tuzizirika muntu watwiciye uzashaka imbabazi azatwegere tuzazimuha uyu munsi kwibuka tariki wabimburiwe n’urugendo ruva murenge rugerero rujya rwibutso rw’uwo murenge wanaranzwe n’indirimbo z’abana barokotse jenoside yakorewe abatutsi bibumbiye itsinda ryitwa imanzi’ ubuhamya gushyira indabo rwibutso rugerero ku isaha saa sita abanyarubavu bunamiye inzirakarengane iminota itatu hanyuma bakurikirana radiyo ijambo nyakubahwa perezida repubulika yavugiye sitade amahoro mujyi kigali umuyobozi w’akarere rubavu sheikh bahame hassan yashimiye abaturage b’ako karere kuba bitabiriye gahunda benshi anabasaba kuzitabira gahunda z’icyumweru cy’icyunamo zizaba zirimo ibiganiro yongeyeho kwegera abacitse icumu ingenzi bagahumurizwa urwibutso rugerero rushyinguyemo imibiri y’abatutsi gusoza icyumweru cy’icyunamo karere rubavu bikazabera murenge mudende tariki mata kugeza imibare yavuye bushakashatsi bwakozwe ibuka yerekana abazize jenoside bangana rwanda hose pascaline umulisa

title: abaguzi barakangurirwa kwaka inyemezabuguzi ebm
content: abaguzi b’ibicuruzwa n’ababigurisha barasabwa kwaka gutanga inyemezabuguzi itangwa n’imashini y’ikoranabuhanga ebm kugira uruhare rwabo iterambere ry’igihugu rugaragare babisabwe n’ubuyobozi bw’ikigo cy’igihugu cy’imisoro n’amahoro rwanda revenue authority bahembaga abatsinze tombora ebm karere rusizi gatanu tariki werurwe mbera emmy umuhuzabikorwa w’umushinga ebm rra yatangaje gikorwa kigamije gushishikariza abaguzi kwaka inyemezabuguzi kugira umusoro nyongeragaciro tva wiyongere kuko utawutanze ahombya igihugu yagize mu gihe uguze ikintu ntiwake inyemezabuguzi gihamya yemeza musoro nyongeragaciro ucibwa abacuruzi wageze isanduku leta kubera igihe cyose watse inyemezabuguzi haba hari icyizere gushidikanya musoro wageze leta bamwe baturage aka karere bavuga bamaze kumenyera umuco kwaka inyemezabuguzi gihe abandi bavuga batarabisobanukirwa francine nyiransabimana avuga kwaka inyemezabuguzi bimaze kuba umuco kubera kwirinda ingaruka bashobora guhura nazo ati bisigaye byarabaye nk’umuco kuko hari igihe ugenda ugahura n’abantu bafite imodoka rwanda revenue simbizi bakakubaza bati muceri uwuguriye he ati nywuguriye mangazini n’aya bakakubaza bati fagitiri irihe wayibura bakaba bawukwambura hari nabo bawutwaye uwase claudine avuga bagiye kugura ibicuruzwa fagitiri bajya baka kuko babona atari ngombwa bitewe n’uko batari basobanukiwe akamaro kabyo ariko yongeraho babimenyeye bagiye kujya bayaka abasabwa kugura imashini ebm kuzikoresha abanditse musoro nyongeragaciro bafite byibuze igicuruzo miliyoni frw umwaka ubu abasabwa gukoresha imashini ebm bamaze kugera ikigereranyo ubukungu

title: senderi yahawe igihembo n’akarere kirehe
content: yabwiye igihe yahawe gihembo kane tariki gashyantare aka karere akomokamo ati naraye mpawe igihembo cy’indashyikirwa n’akarere kirehe nk’umuhanzi uhavuka ugerageza gushimisha abaturage baho n’utundi turere gahunda z’iterambere ry’igihugu kurinda ibyagezweho kubyongera biciye bihangano by’uburere mboneragihugu yavuze indirimbo zatumye ahabwa gihembo zirimo iyitwa ibidakwiriye nzabivuga’ nta mpamvu n’imwe’ iyo twicaranye’ abanyarwanda twaribohoye’ tuzarinda igihugu’ twambariye gutsinda’ uyu muhanzi yahawe gihembo munsi gusoza ibyitwa open day’ bikorwa n’abatuye aka karere akaba munsi abantu n’ibigo byigenga bakorera karere bahurira imurikabikorwa bakerekana bamaze kugeza baturage hanarebwa gahunda z’ibihe biri imbere senderi aherutse gushyira hanze indirimbo zirimo yise imitako migongo’ ikirashi’ yakoranye intore tuyisenge uyu muhanzi yatangiye kuririmba mbere gato umuziki wiganjemo indirimbo zivuga politiki y’iterambere ry’igihugu isuku kwirinda ibyorezo sida malariya ubukungu urukundo umutekano n’ibindi senderi kandi akunda kwibanda ndirimbo zihumuriza abarokotse jenoside yakorewe abatutsi n’izamagana abahembera amacakubiri reba indirimbo senderi aheruka gushyira hanze yise ikirashi’

content: bitunguranye isiganwa ry’uyu mwaka ntabwo rizitabirwa n’ikipe y’igihugu eritrea cyanahabwaga amahirwe kongera kuryegukana nk’uko byagenze umwaka ushize icyo gihe umukinnyi wayo daniel teklehaimanot niwe wegukanye umwanya mbere nyuma kuvamo eritrea hari bamwe bakinnyi bahabwa amahirwe kuryegukana adrien niyonshuti w’umunyarwanda siganwa azaba akinira ikipe mtn qhubeka afurika y’epfo hari kandi umunya maroc adil jeroul waryegukanye rigitangira rwego mpuzamahanga ndetse n’umunya afurika y’epfo janse van rensburg uretse amakipe abiri y’u rwanda akagera kalisimbi andi makipe azitabira tour du rwanda aturutse hanze maroc izaba yitwaje adil jeroul umwe bakinnyi bahabwa amahirwe kwegukana siganwa hazaza kandi algeria ethiopia team type usa reine blanche izaza ivuye bufaransa flanders avia bubiligi kenya tanzania mtn qhubeka afurika y’epfo izaba ikinirwa adrien niyonshuti mbere gukora isiganwa nyirizina hazabanza kurifungura mugaragaro cyumweru gitondo ariko abanyonzi bazabanza basiganwe intera ireshya kilometero bave kuru stade amahoro banyure station engen bazenguruke banyure kie bagaruke stade amahoro gusiganwa bakora urugendo rurerure bizakorwa nyuma gace etape mbere berekeza i rwamagana agace kabiri abanyonzi bazava i rwamagana berekeza i kigali aka gatatu bazava kigaki bajya rubavu bave rubavu bajye i muhanga gace kanebazasiganwa muhanga - huye gace gatanu gace gatandati bazave i huye bajye i karongi bakazava karongo basubira i kigali bazaba basiganwa agace karindwi nako nyuma iri siganwa ryatangiye mwaka w’ ariko ryemerwa uci union cycliste internationale mwaka ndetse ritangira gukinwa rwego mpuzamaganga haza abanyonzi baturutse bigugu n’amakipe hirya hino isi theoneste nisingizwe

title: u rwanda rwiyemeje kuzamura ubwikorezi bw’indege
content: nzahabwanimana yafunguraga inama y’iminsi ibiri mugaragaro yiga bijyanye n’ubwikorezi gucunga umutekano ndege yagize guverinoma yihaye intego kwita bwikozi bw’indege kandi izakomeza gukorana n’abafatanyabikorwa kuzamura imikorere y’uru rwego iyi nama kubera i kigali yatangiye kuwa mbere tariki ukwakira yitabiriwe n’abakozi bakora nzego zijyanye n’ubwikorezi bw’indege rwanda yateguwe n’urwego mpuzamahanga ry’indege gisivile ruhuza ibihugu afurika nyanja y’abahinde icao-afi bufatanye leta y’u rwanda nzahabwanimana yavuze ubwikorezi bw’indege ingenzi gihugu nk’u rwanda kidakora nyanja yibukije u rwanda igihugu kigendwa naba mukerarugendo benshi kandi ubukerarugendo bukaba butanga umusanzu kuzamura ubukungu bw’igihugu kugeza mukerarugendo barenga bakoresha ikirere kuza gihugu bukerarugendo mu rwanda hakorera ibigo bitandukanye bikora ubwikorezi kirere nk’ikigo cy’u rwanda gutwara abantu n’ibintu ndege rwandair ndetse hakorera n’ibigo bitwara abantu n’ibintu kirere klm brussels airlinesmu mpera z’uku kwezi kanama rwandair yazanye mbere mugabane w’afurika indege mbere zihanitse bwoko boeing - umunyamakuru kigali today

title: ndizihiwe fabien yapfuye yiyahuye kivu
content: amakuru dukesha bakeneyemungu obara umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’akagari gabiro avuga ndizihiwe fabien yagiye gitondo saa kumi n’ebyiri n’igice mugitondo avuga agiye giseke ahacukurwa amabuye y’agaciro yasize abwiye iwabo agiye asize amafaranga telephone bugaruke nyuma kubona atagarutse umuryango wafashe icyemezo kujya kumushaka kuko wakekaga yaba yiyahuye doreko bitari ubwa mbere abigerageje tariki saa kumi nimwe n’iminota mirongo itatu z’umugoroba nibwo umurambo ndizihiwe fabien wabonetse utoragurwa gace kitwa giseke yagaragaye amazi ariho yamunaze nkombe z’ikivu mbonyumukiza justin kabera felesitaababyeyi ndizihiwe fabien bemeza ntawabiciye umwana kuko n’ubundi yajyaga ashaka kwiyahura bakamugarura bavuga umuhungu wabo arwaye amagini kuko bagiye kumuvuza bikananirana biteganijwe nyuma gusuzuma umurambo wajyanywe bitaro kibuye aribwo aza gushyingurwa ndizihiwe fabien apfuye akiri ingaragu yari atuye mudugudu murama akagari gabiro umurenge musasa akarere rutsiro vdaste nkikabahizi

title: abagize urugaga rw’abikorera burengerazuba bashize umukono mihigo
content: abikorera turere turindwi tugize intara y’iburengerazuba tariki bashyize umukono mihigo y’umwaka iyo mihigo ihuriza gushyiraho umwete kwinjiza abanyamuryango bashya rugaga rw’abikorera kugira rurusheho kugira imbaraga kunoza akazi rushinzwe abo karere karongi biyemeje mwaka bazava banyamuryango bakagera bantu mu karere rubavu bavuze itariki ukwakira bazaba bamaze kugera banyamuryango kandi bakazaba baramaze gutanga imisanzu mu karere rutsiro abikorera baho bahize kuzatanga amahugurwa arebana gutanga imisoro bikorera bafatanyije n’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe kwinjiza imisoro rra akarere nyabihu kahize kuzinjiza abanyamuryango bashya bagera aka karere ariko kanenzwe imikorere itanoze komite kubera ahanini ubushobozi bukiri hasi nk’uko byatangajwe perezida w’urugaga rw’abikorera ntara y’iburengerazuba kamuzinzi godefroid bwana kamuzinzi yanasobanuye akarere rusizi nako kakigaragaramo intege nke komite nyobozi y’urugaga rw’abikorera ariko ingamba zirahari kugira hanozwe imikorere komite utwo turere twombi akarere rusizi nako mihigo kashyizeho umukono harimo kuzashishikariza abanyamuryango b’urugaga rw’abikorera bataramenya umubare kuzaba bamaze kwishyura imisanzu bitarenze mu karere rusizi perezida komite nyobozi y’urugaga wenyine wishyuye imisanzu ariko abayigize bemeje bazagera banyamuryango kandi bakazashishikarizwa gutanga imisanzu yaboabo karere nyamasheke basanzwe mbere ntara nyuma kwegukana igikombe cy’umwanya karindwi rwego rw’igihugu bo bahize harimo kuzateza imbere ubucuruzi bwambuka imipaka n’ubuhahirane hagati y’u rwanda congo rdc nyamasheke kandi yahize kuzinjiza abanyamuryango bashya gukoresha imurikabikorwa itariki gicurasi rikazatwara miliyoni frw muri rubavu ho bahize kuzakora urutonde rw’abanyamuryango bakamenya umubare wabo n’abo uturere twose twahuriye muhigo umwe mushyashya winjijwemo biturutse gitekerezo gushakisha abanyamuryango bifite haba bitekerezo mufuka cyatanzwe n’ushinzwe kubaka ubushobozi rugaga rw’abikorera psf mungwarareba donatien ibyo byamaze gukorwa mujyi kigali urugaga rwashatse abanyamuryango b’abaherwe buryo ntawemererwaga kwinjiramo adatanze byibuze amafaranga miliyoni eshanu abo banyamuryango babahaye izina title: akarere rubavu karishimira ibikorwa by’amajyambere kagezeho
content: mu bikorwa byamuritswe harimo umuhanda uhuza imipaka yombi y’u rwanda repubulika iharanira demokarasi kongo grande et petite barierre ukazatwara akayabo k’amafaranga akabakaba miliyoni ndetse n’ umuhanda pave ujya biro by’akarere watangiye gukorwa munsi umuyobozi w’akarere sheh bahame hassan yavuze akarere kabwiye rwiyemezamirimo imodoka zikora mihanda zitazasubirayo utugari tutazikoresheje dusane uduhanda tujya hasuwe kandi umusozi wimuweho imiryango kubera ikibazo cy’isuri yicaga abahatuye gihe cy’imvura uyu musozi murenge gisenyi guterwamo ibiti binyuranye bifata ubutaka hakazubakwamo uduhanda intebe n’ibitare kuruhukiramo mukerarugendo iki gikorwa kizatwara amafaranga miliyoni bavuye musozi ubuyobozi b’akarere rubavu bwasuye akagari karukogo umurenge rubavu birebera ibikorwa ndengera foundation uyu muryango wubatse amasoko y’amazi agemurira abaturage amazi meza ndetse n’ibitaro kijyambere umuyobozi w’akarere yasabye umuyobozi ndengera foundation gufatanya n’akarere bakareba masoko y’amazi yakwaguka abaturage benshi bakavomaho abayobozi banagejejwe ahari kubakwa amashanyarazi ako kagali jean berchmas bahige ukuriye ewsa rubavu yasobanuye mashanyarazi azagera baturage tugali twa byahi kanembwe karukogo ibarizwa mirenge rubavu cyanzarwe bahige yashimangiye mashanyarazi afite ingufu zihagije zizafasha abaturage kwivana bukene bahige yagize mushinga wizwe neza ibikoresho byose birahari igikorwa cyose gikoreshwa n’amashanyarazi kizahakora kirahari mpungenge hasuwe n’isoko ryo ako kagali ariko rizatangira gukorerwamo mutarama nyuma y’ubunani uru rugendo rwasorejwe isoko kijyambere ry’akarere rubavu riri kubakwa mujyi rwagati murenge gisenyi imirimo kubaka soko iracyari hasi ariko irimo kwihutishwa kugira rizatangire gukoreshwa aho riri isoko risanzwe rikorera hazazamurwa irindi gorofa hanubakwe imodoka zihagarara asoza gikorwa umuyobozi w’akarere rubavu sheh bahame hassan yibukije inshingano buri wese kurinda gukoresha neza title: umuvugabutumwa kwizera yatangije umuryango la kunda foundation’ uzajya ufasha abababaye
content: umuvugabutumwa wamenyekanye cyane rwanda witwa kwizera emmanuel yatangije umuryango yise la kunda foundation’ gukora ibikorwa binyuranye by’ubufasha rwego kwibuka umugore witwa kunda therese umaze umwaka yitabye imana umuvugabutumwa wamenyekanye cyane rwanda witwa kwizera emmanuel yatangije umuryango yise la kunda foundation’ gukora ibikorwa binyuranye by’ubufasha rwego kwibuka umugore witwa kunda therese umaze umwaka yitabye imana iki gikorwa cyakoze mitima benshi kwizera emmanuel yagitangirije rusengero evangelical restoration church kimisagara kanama cyari kitabiriwe n’imbaga y’abakirisitu baje kumushyigikira mu rwego gukomeza kuzirikana imirimo myiza yaranze kunda therese usanzwe akorera umurimo w’imana evangelical restoration church umugabo akaba n’umuvugabutumwa ministry aee kwizera emmanuel yatangije muryango yise la kunda foundation’ yavuze uzibanda bikorwa gufasha abakene gufasha abubatse ingo kubana neza kwamamaza ubutumwa mahanga gusengera butarageraho ubwo yatangizaga muryango mugaragaro kwizera emmanuel yavuze igitekerezo kuwushinga cyaturutse bikorwa byiza nyakwigendera therese yasize akoreye isi ashimangira ibikorwa byiza biherekeza nyir’ukubikora n’iyo avuye mubiri yagize kubaho si ukuba uhumuke gusa ushobora kubaho kandi utakiriho imirimo y’abakiranutsi irabaherekeza barangije igihe cyabo isi igitekerezo gushinga foundation cyaturutse bikorwa by’indashyikirwa byaranze umugore wanjye akiriho ndetse n’uruhare rwiza yagize rugo rwacu myaka icumi twamaranye aba kwizera emmanuel bahuriza kuba banezezwa n’imbaraga bamubonamo ziva kristo baziboneye bihe bibi yanyuzemo bishaririye kubura urubavu rwe akiri muto ariko bikaba bitaramuciye intege abe yatana gukomeza gukora umurimo w’imana kugeza magingo kwizera emmanuel aracyakorera umurimo w’imana muryango nyafurika w’ivugabutumwa aee gihugu kenyaakaba akunze kuba igihe kinini la kunda foundation’ izibanda kandi bikorwa gutera inkunga kwiga abana bavuka miryango ikennye cyane izafasha abashakanye kubaka ingo zabo neza ndetse hazajya hakorwa n’amasengesho gusengera ibihugu bitarageramo ubutumwa bwiza umuvugabutumwa kwizera emmanuel avuga byose muryango uzibandaho nk’amasomo yasigaranye yigishijwe n’umugore kunda therese kuko bimwe bikorwa byamuranze buzima bwe hano isi iki gikorwa cyitabiriwe n’imbaga y’abakirisitu baje gushyigikira umuvugabutumwa kwizera emmanuel kwizera yashimangiye n’ubwo umugore batakiri kumwe amufata nk’aho akiriho kubera ibikorwa yasize kwizera kumwe n’umwe bana nyakwigendera yasize bato kwizera emmanuel iburyo bavugabutumwa bakomeye rwanda

title: ferwafa yatangaje igihe ntarengwa gutangaza umwanzuro gusubika amarushanwa
content: ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru rwanda ferwafa ryatangaje bitarenze tariki gicurasi aribwo izafata umwanzuro byerekeye kurangiza gusubika burundu shampiyona y’u rwanda imaze gukinwa kigero ijana ferwafa yavuze yafashe mwanzuro buryo gutegereza umwanzuro guverinoma y’u rwanda byerekeye ingamba kwirinda coronavirus uzamenyekana byumweru uyu mwanzuro ferwafa usohotse nyuma y’aho impuzamashyirahamwe y’umupira w’amaguru afurika caf yasabye amashyirahamwe y’abanyamuryango gutanga gahunda bafite mikino yasubitswe kubera coronavirus mugusubiza ibaruwa caf ferwafa yavuze bazatangaza igisubizo bitarenze tariki gicurasi nyuma y’ibyumweru bibiri inama y’abaminisitiri yatanze ngamba yafashe gukomorera ibikorwa bimwe bimwe bitarimo imikino n’amateraniro ahuza abantu benshi mu ibaruwa ferwafa yandikiye abanyamuryango bayo aribo amakipe atandukanyeyavuze igiye gutegereza ibyumweru leta yatanze gusuzuma ibyemezo byafashwe kuwa mata byaratanze umusaruro muri baruwa harimo ibyemezo birimo gutegereza indi myanzuro leta izatangazwa byumweru yatanzeferwafa izafata umwanzuro bitarenze tariki gicurasi inama n’abanyamuryango iraba vuba batange ibitekerezo ferwafa yamenyesheje abanyamuryango gutegura inama n’abanyamuryango izakorwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga kugira bumve ibitekerezo byabo haribazwa shampiyona n’igikombe cy’amahoro cy’uyu mwaka bizarangira cyane caf yifuza amashyirahamwe y’umupira w’amaguru afurika yatanga gahunda hakiri kare kugira naryo ribone ripanga gahunda y’amarushanwa yaryo umunyamabanga ferwafauwayezu francois regis yabwiye radio bifuza kumva ibitekerezo by’abanyamuryango cyumweru hanyuma bakazafata umwanzuro ukwiriye uzatangazwa bitarenze kuwa gicurasi yavuze buri munyamuryango wese azatanga igitekerezo cye hanyuma bakabiheraho bafata ingamba zikurikiraho shampiyona y’icyiciro mbere yahagaze tariki werurwe hamaze gukinwa imikino makipe andi nayo amaze gukina imikino shampiyona yasubitswe apr fc iyoboye n’amanota mikino rayon sports title: kwibuka danny vumbi bruce melodie basohoye indirimbo ihumuriza abanyarwanda bakoze
content: abahanzi danny vumbi bruce melodie basohoye indirimbo nshya bise kwibuka twiyubaka’ ikaba igamije gufasha abanyarwanda bihe kwibuka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mata abahanzi danny vumbi bruce melodie basohoye indirimbo nshya bise kwibuka twiyubaka’ ikaba igamije gufasha abanyarwanda bihe kwibuka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mata mugihe nk’iki usanga abahanzi ngeri zitandukanye bakunze kuririmba abandi bagategura imivugo batanga ubutumwa kwibuka guhumuriza abarokotse jenoside yakorewe abatutsi nako batanga ubutumwa bushishikariza buri wese kurwanya ingengabitekerezo jenoside ibyabaye rwanda bitazongera ukundi tariki mata buri mwaka umunsi u rwanda n’isi rusange bitangira icyumweru kwibuka inzirakarengane z’ababatutsi zazize jenoside mata danny vumvi bruce melodie ndirimbo bavuga u rwanda rwanyuze mateka asharira agatera intimba mitima benshi ariko abatakaje ababyeyi n’abavandimwe jenoside bakaba bafite umuryango wabo ariwo u rwanda’ rubazirikana bati twabuze twakundaga igihugu kitubera umuryango kitubera ababyeyi kitubera abavandimwe kitubera inshuti none turi u rwanda rwisannye turi inkingi itanyeganyezwa duhanze amaso ejo hari imbere ntambwe idasubira inyuma iyi ndirimbo kwibuka twiyubaka’ imara iminota n’amasegonda bahanzi bayihaye izina ry’insanganyamatsiko y’uyu mwaka ivugango twibuke twiyubaka’ ikaba ikoze buryo bw’amajwi n’amagambo iyi ndirimbo yakozwe ntiyashyirwa mugaragaro bakaba bariyemeje kuyivugurura ikoreshwe bihe kwibuka nshuro muri mwaka igikorwa kwibuka cyabaye buryo budasanzwe abaturarwanda kwibukira rugo rwego kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo coronavirus cyatumye ibikorwa bihuza abantu benshi bigagarikwa rwego kwirinda kwanduzanya httpswwwyoutubecomwatchvmhougmlq

title: nishimwe naomie niwe wegukanye ikamba nyampinga w’u rwanda amafoto
content: umukobwa witwa nishimwe naomie wambaye nimero niwe watowe nyampinga w’u rwanda nyuma gutsinda bagenzi bahanganye final yabereye intare arena uyu mukobwa w’ imyaka wiyamamarije mujyi kigaliyakunzwe benshi ndetse izina rye riramamara mbuga nkoranyambaga kubera ubwiza bwe none birangiye yegukanye ikamba nishimwe ufite umushinga ujyanye kurwanya kanseri y’ibere rwanda yasimbuye nimwiza meghan u wambaye kamba mwaka nishimwe naomie yabaye miss rwanda karindwi wambitswe ikamba marushanwa yateguwe rwanda inspiration back up akaba miss rushanwa ryabaho miss rwanda nishimwe naomie yatoranyijwe bakobwa bajya cyiciro nyuma umutesi denise no ingabire gaudence no umwiza phionah no mutegwantebe chanice no irasubiza alliance no teta ndenga nicole no musana teta hense no umuratwa anitha no akaliza hope no igisonga mbere yabaye umwiza phionah no gihe igisonga kabiri yabaye umutesi denise no abegukanye andi makamba nyampinga w’umuco miss heritage teta ndenga nicole nonyampinga wabaniye neza abandi miss congeniality ingabire diane nonyampinga wakunzwe benshi miss popularity irasubiza alliance nonyampinga uberwa n’amafoto miss photogenic nishimwe naomie no abari bagize akanama nkemurampaka barimo ntarindwa diogene umurerwa evelyne mutesi jolly sherrie silver munyaneza james nishimwe agiye kumara umwaka ahembwa ibihumbi by’amanyarwanda buri kwezi ahabwe imodoka nshya bwoko suzuki suift n’amavuta yayo azamara umwaka wose akoresha imisatsi n’inzara anambikwa imyenda y’ibirori buntu n’amakanzu igihe ayakeneye azahabwa serivisi banki umwaka wose ahabwe ubwishingizi kwivuza umwaka wose gusohokera resitora umwaka wose kimwe kuryama cyumba hoteli la palisse azarihirwa ikiruhuko mujyi dubai n’itike y’indege anishyurirwe ibijyanye n’urwo rugendo byose n’ibindi byinshi bitandukanye birimo guhabwa imyenda siporo igihe ayikeneye gihe cy’umwaka wose igisonga mbere umwiza phiona yahembwe frw gihe umutesi denise wabaye igisonga kabiri yahembwe frw bombi bakazahabwa icyumba hoteli umunsi umwe buri kwezi gihe cy’amezi atandatu kumwe n’umuryango wabo irasubiza alliance wahawe ikamba ry’uwakunzwe benshi miss popularity yahembwaefrw iphone plus gb ndetse anahembwa guhamagara gukoresha interineti buntu gihe cy’umwaka azamarana kamba nishimwe naomi wabaye miss photogenic cyangwa umukobwa wifotoza akaberwa n’amafoto yagenewe igihembo frw miss rwanda yatangiye gihe nyampinga yabaye miss uwera dalila hakurikiraho bahati grace rihabwa kayibanda mutesi aurore ryambikwa akiwacu colombe kundwa doriane arihabwa mutesi jolly atorwa iradukunda elsa afata content: police y’u rwanda yongeye kwibutsa abantu bagomba kubahiriza amabwiriza kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo covid- by’umwihariko iburira abahanzi bakora ibitaramo mbuga nkoranyambaga bemerewe kubikora ariko ababikurikirana ntibave zabo police y’u rwanda yagarutse gitaramo giherutse guhagarikwa cy’itsinda ryakanyujijejo hambere tuff gangs cyabaye mpera z’icyumweru gishize kikaza guhagarikwa kitarangiye ivuga kiriya gitaramo cyakorwaga buryo buhonyora amabwiriza kwirinda ikwirakwira covid- kuko cyabere kabari kamwe mujyi kigali gihe utubari tutemerewe gukora police y’u rwanda ivuga kandi kiriya gitaramo cyariho kibera hari abantu gihe ibikorwa bihuriza abantu hamwe n’amakoraniro bibujijwe umuvugizi police y’u rwanda commissioner of police cp john bosco kabera aherutse kuvuga ibitaramo bitemewe kuko ibikorwa bihuza abantu benshi bitemewe niba uvuze ugiye gukora igitaramo ukoresheje ikoranabuhanga witumira abantu bahurire ahantu hamwe cp john bosco kabera avuga ibitaramo bikorwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga bitabujijwe ariko ababikora bakubahiriza ariya mabwiriza kandi ababikurikira ntibave ati abantu bakurikirane igitaramo cyawe batavuye ndetse batanateraniye hamwe rwego kwirinda ikwirakwira covid- niba igitaramo gikorwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga gikorewe kabari hoteri cyangwa kigahuriza hamwe abantu benshi ukwica amabwiriza umusekerw

title: covid urugendo gusubiza ibintu buryo ruzaba rurerure - perezida kagame
content: perezida kagame avuga ingaruka zizasigwa n’icyorezo covid- zizamara igihe kinini bityo n’urugendo kuzishakira umuti ruzaba rurerure yabivugiye nteko mbere idasanzwe y’umuryango w’ibihugu africa caribe pacific yabaye gatatu tariki kamena perezida kagame wagarutse mubano w’ibihugu acp n’umuryango w’ubumwe bw’iburayi yavuze wakomeje kugenda utera intambwe nziza ati uburayi buzakomeza kuba umufatanyabikorwa w’ingenzi w’uturere twacu kimwe n’uko natwe turi abafatanyabikorwa b’ingenzi b’u burayi perezida kagame wanagarutse masezerano y’i cotonou afite intego kugera harabaye igabanuka ry’ubukene hashingiwe bufatanye bucuruzi politiki aya masezerano y’ubufatanye yashyizweho umukono n’ibihugu birimo africa yagombaga kurangira gashyantare mwaka ariko aza kwigizwa inyuma akaba azageza ukuboza perezida kagame yavuze nubwo isi yugarijwe n’icyorezo covid- ariko kitagomba kuba intambamyi kugera byiyemejwe ariya masezerano ati ingaruka covid- zizamara igihe kinini nyuma gutsinda virusi ariko n’urugendo gusubiza ibintu buryo ruzaba rurerure yavuze uru rugendo rusaba kongera imbaraga bufatanye ndetse gusangira ubushobozi gushaka umuti w’ibibazo bizasigwa n’iki cyorezo yanagarutse bihugu zimbabwe sudan byafatiwe ibihano muryango avuga bihe isi yugarijwe n’ibibazo by’ubuzima biriya bihugu binyamuryango bikwiye gutizwa imbaraga rwego gufasha abaturage babyo yavuze icyorezo covid- cyamaze kugira ingaruka zikomeye buzima bw’abaturage n’ubukungu bw’ibihugu kandi bikiri ibidashoboka kuvuga igihe cyorezo kizamara n’ubukana bwacyo avuga ubushobozi buri gihugu kinyamuryango guhangana n’iki cyorezo bukwiye guhabwa ingufu ati ni urwo rwego ingenzi ibihugu africa caribe pacific bigomba gukorana ngamba kurandura icyorezo kubyutsa ubukungu yavuze by’umwihariko hakenewe ihuzabikorwa bufatanye gutuma ibihugu bibasha kubona imiti inking ndetse n’ibindi bikoresho kurwanya cyorezo chief editor muhaburarw

title: diamond ategerejwe i kigali kwezi gutaha
content: umuhanzi w’ icyamamare afurika diamond platnumz n’ ahandi isi yatangaje kwezi gutaha kanama azataramira abanyarwanda umuhanzi w’ icyamamare afurika diamond platnumz n’ ahandi isi yatangaje kwezi gutaha kanama azataramira abanyarwanda nk’ bigaragara rutonde rw’ ibitaramo muhanzi tanzania azakorera ahantu hatandukanye isi azataramira rwanda tariki knama amakuru agera kinyamakuru ukwezi tutarabasha gutohoza neza avuga diamond ashobora kuzaba aje kwifatanya n’ abanyarwanda gutaha mugaragaro sitade igezweho y’ imikino y’ intoki kigali arena’ iyi sitade ifite ubushobozi kwakira abantu ibihumbi yubatswe sitade amahoro bufatanye guverinoma y’ u rwanda kampani turikiya summa’ ikorera bihugu isi diamond yashyize ahagaragara urutonde rw’ ibitaramo afite uku kwezi - harimo n’ azakorera i kigali diamond platnumz aheruka rwanda ntangiriro icyo gihe azanywe gahunda zitandukanye zirimo kuura inzu guturamo mujyi kigali avuga u rwanda igihugu akunda

title: nta ngaruka n’imwe u rwanda ruzaterwa n’abarusebya perezida kagame
content: mu ijambo rye ritangiza icyunamo kwibuka abazize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi u rwanda cyatangiye gatandatu tariki perezida paul kagame yasezeranyije abanyarwanda leta n’inzego ishamikiyeho bizakora ibishoboka byose kugira inzira y’iterambere u rwanda rwihaye idahagarara perezida paul kagame yagize nababwiraga mahirwe miliyoni miliyoni mahirwe bafitemo kugira badusubize inyuma kuko bidashoboka ntibishoboka ntabwo bishoboka muri jambo yavuze ndimi ebyiri icyongereza n’ikinyarwanda umukuru w’igihugu yibajije impamvu ibihugu byitwa byateye imbere demokarasi ntacyo bikora bigeze imbere y’ubutabera abakoze jenoside bidegembya mijyi yabyo gihe u rwanda rwibuka yavuze n’iyo babafashe babikora nyirarureshwa nyuma y’igihe gito bakabarekura gihe bihugu batewe byiyambaza isi kugira ibifashe guhangana n’abagizi nabi kagame yakomeje agira ntabwo byakumvikana impamvu banyarwanda cyangwa bandi dufitanye isano nk’abanyafurika bitagenda bityo bivuze wenda agaciro k’abanyarwanda cyangwa abanyafurika gato perezida w’u rwanda yasoje ijambo rye asaba abanyarwanda gukomeza kugira imbaraga gukomeza gufatanya kugira bakomeze guhangana n’ibibazo bahura kubaka ubuzima bwabo emmanuel n hitimana

title: u rwanda mwanya gatatu bihugu byiza wakoreramo ubucuruzi afurika
content: iyi raporo yakozwe bihugu bikorerwamo ubucuruzi isi yasanze u rwanda ruri mwanya afurika rukaza mwanya rwego rw’isi rukaba rwigiye imbere ho imyanya itanu ugereranyije n’umwaka washize ibyo u rwanda rubikesha kuba rwaraguye ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi kwihangira imirimo rugerageza kugeza umuriro w’amashanyarazi ahatari hake amategeko agenga imisoro nayo yaravuguruwe ndetse runorohereza abashaka inguzanyo bihangire imirimo n’ubwo ariko u rwanda rwateye intambwe igaragara korohereza abashoramari gushora imari rwanda raporo itunga agatoki bimwe bidahagaze neza gihe rwanda cyane cyane bikorwa birimo kwemerera abantu kubaka guha abaturage uburenganzira butaka bwabo gushyiraho amategeko ahamye arengera abashoramari n’ibindi aha bakwiye kwikubita agashyi bityo bikabafasha gukomeza kwitwara neza ruhando rw’amahanga minisitiri w’ubucuruzi n’inganda francois kanimba yavuze asanga mwanya u rwanda ruriho udakwiye gutuma habaho kwirara avuga hakiri byinshi gukorwa birimo kugabanya umwanya ukoreshwa n’abashaka kwandikisha ubucuruzi kugirango abantu barusheho kwihuta bikorwa by’ubucuruzi n’ibindi madamu mimi ladipo umuyobozi banki y’isi rwanda yagize avuga raporo avuga habayeho gutera imbere buryo bugaragara yagize munsi u rwanda ruri mwanya rwego rw’isi bihugu umuntu yashoramo imari ntekereza tugomba gushima ikirenge rwateye kandi twizera ruzakomeza bityo n’ibindi bihugu bikareberaho anne-marie nwemwiza

title: bugesera umurego kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge
content: ibi baturage babitangaje cyumweru polisi y’igihugu bufatanye n’ubuyobozi bw’akarere bagiye kariya gace guta yombi abaturage bacuruza ibinyobwa bitemewe n’amategeko abaturage batuye aka gace mirambi bavuga gakunda kugaragaramo ikibazo cy’umutekano muke bikururwa n’ibibazo bitandukanye birimo ubujura n’icuruzwa ry’ibiyobyabwenge kanyanga irimo cyane mezi abiri ashije hiciwe abantu babiri karemera sam umuyobozi polisi ntara y’iburasirazuba witabiriye igikorwa guta yombi abaturage bakoze uruganda gucuruza kanyanga kariya gace yatangarije abaturage gihe kitari gito polisi igiye gushyira bikorwa icyifuzo cyabo gufungura ishami ryayo aka gace icyakora ariko karemera yababwiye icyihutirwa kurusha ibindi ukugira ubushake gufatanya n’ubuyobozi bw’akarere guhangana n’ibikorwa bibahungabanyiriza umutekano rwagaju louis umuyobozi w’akarere bugesera kubufatanye n’abari bahagarariye inzego z’umutekano bitabiriye gikorwa yabwiye abaturage bagomba kwirinda ibikorwa gucuruza kanyanga n’ibindi biyobyabwenge byose kuko nyir’abayazana w’umutekano muke karere bugesera rwagaju kandi yavuze ubuyobozi bw’akarere bwari busanzwe buzi ibihakorerwa icyari gisigaye ukuza guta yombi abacurizi kanyangaati’’twari tubizi icyari gisigaye cyari umwanya kuza kubafata iyo uhamwe n’icyaha gucuruza kanyanga inzoga itemewe n’amategeko y’u rwanda uhanishwa igihano cy’igifungo kiri hagati y’amezi atatu n’imyaka itanu cyangwa ihazabu y’amafaranga ibihumbi byaba ngombwa ukabihanishwa byombi mimi rachel mukandayisenga

title: bishop rugagi bagenzi bashyikirijwe parike bakatirwa ikihe gifungo bahamwe n’ibyaha
content: polisi y’u rwanda ntangiriro z’uku kwezi yataye yombi abavugabutumwa batandatu bakurikiranyweho gukoresha inama buryo bunyuranije n’amategeko kurwanya ububasha bw’amategeko abatawe yombi bamaze gushyikirizwa parike yakiriye dosiye kuwa mbere tariki werurwe bakomeze gukurikiranwa n’urwego rw’ubushinjacyaha ibyaha bakurikiranyweho bibahamye bakaba bahabwa ibihano birimo n’igifungo polisi y’u rwanda ntangiriro z’uku kwezi yataye yombi abavugabutumwa batandatu bakurikiranyweho gukoresha inama buryo bunyuranije n’amategeko kurwanya ububasha bw’amategeko abatawe yombi bamaze gushyikirizwa parike yakiriye dosiye kuwa mbere tariki werurwe bakomeze gukurikiranwa n’urwego rw’ubushinjacyaha ibyaha bakurikiranyweho bibahamye bakaba bahabwa ibihano birimo n’igifungo umuvugizi mukuru polisi y’u rwanda cp theos badege kiganiro yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru ukwezicom bamaraga gutabwa yombi yadutangarije nyuma y’aho hahagaritswe insengero zitujuje ibisabwa byaje gutahurwa bamwe bayobozi b’amatorero baremye itsinda bagatangira n’inama zitemewe bagamije gutambamira cyangwa kunaniza iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko cp theos badege yakomeje avuga polisi yatangiye iperereza hakamenyekana ababiri isonga ndetse igatahura n’ibikorwa bigize icyaha bakoze muri byaha harimo gukoresha inama buryo bunyuranije n’amategeko kurwanya ububasha bw’amategeko mu babiri isonga harimo apostle rwandamura charles r pastor nyamurangwa fred bishop rugagi innocent rev ntambara emmanuel pastor dura james pastor kalisa shyaka emmanuel abo batandatu bakaba bamaze igihe bakurikiranwa maboko y’ubutabera ibyaha baregwa biramutse bibahamye bahabwa ibihe bihano iyo uregwa akiburana cyangwa agikurikiranwa n’inzego zinyuranye z’ubutabera akiri umwere kuko urukiko ruba rutaramuhamya icyaha kabone n’iyo yaba yiyemerera icyaha yitwa umunyacyaha urukiko rumaze kukimuhamya buryo ndakuka kandi rukamukatira n’igihano kijyanye n’icyo cyaha kuri bavugabutumwa nabo kugeza abere ariko hakurikijwe ingingo z’amategeko hari ibihano biteganywa n’igitabo cy’amategeko ahana ibyaha rwanda zigaragaza ibihano bahabwa byaha biramutse bibahamye ingingo gitabo cy’amategeko ahana ibyaha rwanda igira iti umuntu wese urwanya ububasha bw’amategeko cyangwa akoshya kuburwanya abigiriye ubugome kandi ruhame ahanishwa igifungo kirenze imyaka itanu kugeza myaka irindwi ibihano bivuzwe gikacya mbere cy’iyi ngingo bikubwa kabiri koshya kwagize ingaruka mbi naho ingingo gitabo cy’amategeko ahana ibyaha rwanda igira iti umuntu wese ukoresha inama mugaragaro cyangwa ukwigaragambya jnzira nyabagendwa atabimenyesheje inzego bireba ahanishwa igifungo minsi umunani ariko kitageze mezi atandatu n’ihazabu y’amafaranga y’u rwanda bihumbi ijana kugeza miliyoni cyangwa kimwe gusa bihano itabwa yombi ry’aba bavugabutumwa bashinjwa gutambamira gufunga insengero zitujuje ibisabwa n’amategeko ryaje kurikira ibyatangajwe perezida repubulika y’u rwanda paul kagame yasozaga umwiherero w’abayobozi bakuru b’igihugu yerekanye yatangajwe n’ukuntu mujyi kigali hafungwa insengero yibaza robine zitanga amazi cyangwa inganda zifitiye abaturage umusaruro yakomeje avuga kuba insengero ziruta robine z’amazi n’ibindi bifitiye akamaro abaturage akajagari’ urusengero bishop rugagi rumwe nsengero zisaga ziherutse gufungwa mujyi kigali zizira kuba zitujuje ibisabwa bishobora gutuma zanahungabanya umutekano w’abazisengeramo hirya hino gihugu insengero zimaze gufungwa zizira kuba zitujuje ibisabwa zirabarirwa bihumbi

title: gatsibo batangiye icyunamo baharanira ubumwe
content: intwaro yakoreshejwe kugira jenoside igerweho ugucikamo abanyarwanda ibice nk’uko byasobanuwe n’ umunyamabanga nshingwbaikorwa w’akagari kabarore rigati gaspard yagize icyo dukwiye gukora uguharanira ubumwe nk’uko leta yacu ibidushishikariza tukirinda ibidukandukanya ahubwo tugahuriza umugozi umwe dufasha abafite intege nke tukagera iterambere mu kagari kabarore umurenge kabarore abaturage baganiriye uburyo mbere y’umwaduko w’abazungu abanyarwanda babanye neza bagarutse kandi buryo abazungu batangiye kuzana ivangura ishuri kugeza nubwo batangiye kwandika ubwoko marangamuntu kimwe ntwaro zakoresheshe kubiba itandukaniro ry’abanyarwanda uretse kuganiro ibiganiro by’amateka yaranze u rwanda abaturage karere gatsibo bafashe umwanya gutekereza bazakorera abacitse icumu jenoside biyemeje buri mudugudu ugomba kugira utegura kizagenerwa abacitse icumu batishoboye abaturage bamaganye bamwe bagaragaye bapfobya igikorwa kugenera inkunga kubacise icumu batishoboye bavuga ivangura bagombye gufasha abatishoboye abaturage bavuga ntacyo bakora bashobore guhoza uwabuze abantu nubwo batanga inkunga ukumufata mugongo atari ivangura kuko gahunda leta zafasaha abantu biciye budehe abaturage bemeranyijwe bagomba kujya bahura buri saa munani kugira go bagire ibiganiro kandi basabwa kwirinda kwamagana ingengabitekerezo jenoside kuko abaharanira ubumwe batagomba kugira ikibatandukanya ku rwego rw’akarere gatsibo igikorwa gutangiza icyunamo cyatangiriye murenge muhura mudugudu taba ariko abaturage siho bagiye kuko bamwe midugudu bagiye bagira ibiganiro bisesengura icyateye jenoside bibukiranya amateka sylidio sebuharara

title: nyamasheke abarimu bishyiriyeho isanduku y’ubwiteganyirize
content: isanduku bise caisse d’entraide et de scurit des enseignants de kibogora yatangijwe gitekerezo cyabo barimu bagamije gukemura ibibazo bafite birimo umushahara muke bahabwa nk’uko nyiramasasu solange uyobora sanduku abitangaza ati twahereye bibazo twari dufite umushahara wacu mutoya tukagira n’ikibazo cyuko twajyaga kwaka inguzanyo mabanki bakatugora bakatwaka n’inyungu ziruhije noneho waba ukeneye udufaranga two gukemura utubazo twihutirwa bikagorana kuyabona nyiramasasu akomeza avuga batangiye gutanga umusanzu buri kwezi amafaranga batanze akabafasha gutanga inguzanyo hagati banyamuryango bakazishyura mushahara gihe kingana n’amezi atatu ikindi inguzanyo yishyurwana n’inyungu ntoya y’amafaranga atatu ijana mu ntangiriro sanduku yagurizaga amafaranga atarenze ibihumbi kuko bagifite ubushobozi buke ariko bashobora kuyarenza kuko amafaranga yiyongereye nyiranzeyimana dyna bwiteganyirize avuga bubafatiye runini kuko bwabaciye bita soudure kwaka inguzanyo mushahara waza ugahita wishyura aba barimu kandi ntibagihura n’ibibazo itangira ry’amashuri basabwa kubonera abana ibikoresho ndetse n’amafaranga y’ishuri iyi sanduku ifite abanyamuryango imaze imyaka ibiri ikora ikaba imaze kugera mafaranga y’u rwanda akabakaba miliyoni buri munyamuryango atanga amafaranga ibihumbi bibiri kwezi akajya isanduku kugeza igihe umugabane buri muntu uzagera bihumbi inama rusange nyuma ikagena bakomeza kongera imigabane cyangwa se bagarukira bagacunga emmanuel nshimiyimana

title: polisi yatangiye umukwabu gufata imodoka zifite ibirahure byijimye
content: umuvugizi w’ishami polisi rishinzwe umutekano muhanda ssp jean marie vianney ndushabandi yatangaje polisi y’u rwanda ishami ryayo rishinzwe umutekano muhanda ryatangiye gukora umukwabu gufata imodoka zifite ibirahure byijimye gihugu hose polisi ivuga imodoka zifite ibirahure byijimye rimwe rimwe zikorerwamo ibyaha nko kunywebwamo ibiyobyabwenge kujyana abana bikorwa bitemewe n’amategeko nko kubajyana tubari tubyiniro ndetse rimwe rimwe bikorwa by’urukozasoni ivuga mukwabu wakorewe gihugu hose munsi mbere w’uyu mukwabu hafashwe imodoka zifite ibirahure byijimye ku munsi mbere hafashwe imodoka ssp ndushabandi yavuze imodoka zifite ibirahure byijimye zitemewe ababifite modoka bica amategeko n’amabwiriza agenga ikoreshwa ry’umuhanda ashingiye iteka perezida repubulika n ryo rishyiraho amabwiriza rusange agenga imihanda n’uburyo kuyigendamo yakomeje agira by’umwihariko ingingo yaryo ndetse n’ubukangurambaga twakoze bihe bishize ariko abatunze ibinyabiziga bifite birahure bakavunira ibiti matwi gatatu tariki nyakanga twatangiye umukwabu gihugu hose gufata imodoka zigifite ibirahure byijimye guhana nyirazo tutaretse kubasaba kubikuraho abazifatanywe barahanwa bakanategekwa kubikuramo iyi ngingo ivuga ibintu bibonerana bigize umubiri w’inyuma w’ikinyabiziga habariwemo ikirahuri gihagarika umuyaga cyangwa ibigize ikibambasi cy’imbere bigomba kuba bikoze buryo bimenetse ibyago gukomereka byagabanuka bishoboka kwose ikomeza ivuga ibirahure guhagarika umuyaga bigomba kuba bikozwe bintu bibonerana bidacuya kandi bikaba bikozwe buryo bidahindura isura y’ibireberwamo kandi gihe bimenetse umuyobozi agakomeza kubona bihagije inzira nyabagendwa ssp ndushabandi yakomeje avuga nubwo twakomeje gukora ubukangurambaga tukanagira inama abafite imodoka zifite ibirahure byijimye babikureho kuko bica amategeko n’amabwiriza agenga ikoreshwa ry’umuhanda byaragaragaye imodoka nk’izi zikomeza kwiyongera bikaba aribyo byatumye dukora mukwabu tubakangurire kubahiriza amategeko turagira inama abafite imodoka zifite birahure byijimye kubihindura kugirango batazabihanirwa hakurikijwe amategeko abazifite baragirwa inama kubikuramo ssp ndushabandi yashimangiye nk’uko bisanzwe guhana abanyamakosa bikorwa izindi ngamba zose zananiranye bityo polisi ikaba yasabye abafite imodoka zifite ibirahure byijimye gukurikiza amategeko n’amabwiriza kugirango bazabikore bamaze kubihanirwa src policegovrw

title: serivisi zabagezeho ariko ireme ryazo ntabwo rirajya murongo neza - minisitiri shyaka
content: nyuma y’imyaka u rwanda ruri rugendo kwegereza abaturage ubuyobozi n’ubushobozi minisiteri y’ubutegetsi bw’ igihugu ivuga gahunda yabaye imbarutso y’iterambere n’agaciro baturage abaturage bagasaba hanozwa ireme ry’imitangire serivisi nirere justine yateze bisi ayishyura amafaranga imugeza murenge jabana aturutse ahitwa ngiryi karere gasabo ahagarariye itsinda ry’abagore bifuza inguzanyo miliyoni n’ibihumbi bayisabye guhera n’ubu ntibarayibona nyuma kugera murenge nirere yakiriwe n’umwe bakozi bawo amubwira akeneye atahamusanze ati ’’bitewe n’uko twadepoje hashize iminsi myinshi ntabwo nyuzwe wenda nza kubona ushinzwe inguzanyo nibwo nari kunyurwa icyakora n’ubwo nirere justine bitamugendekeye neza manishimwe oliva musana elie bagannye umurenge bawusaba kubasezeranya batashye banyuzwe serivisi bahawe musana ’’dutega akamoto tugera hano batwakira neza kibazo cyabayemo na ho manishimwe ’’batwakiriye neza kandi buryo bwihuse’’ abaturage rusange bavuga bishimira kuba servisi bakenera bazibona ku ruhande minisititeri y’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu igaragaza umusaruro w’urugendo kwegereza abaturage ubuyobozi n’ubushoboziurugendo rumaze imayaka minisitiri w’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu prof shyaka anastase ’’rwabyaye agaciro k’umunyarwanda rwabyaye iterambere twagezeho rwazamuye umunyarwanda mibereho kandi rwaduhaye kwegereza umuturage serivisi kuzamura ijambo rye bimukorerwa akishimira igihugu cye’’ urugendo kwegereza ubuyobozi n’ubushobozi abaturage rwatangiye mwaka w’ ese mbere y’uyu mwaka byacaga zihe nzira umunyarwanda abone serivisi akarikumutima callixte umuturage karere gasabo avuga mbere y’uko politiki kwegereza baaturage ubuyobozi bibaho babonaga serivisi biyushye akuya ati ’’byari ibintu by’urugendo rurerure cyane by’ukuri byanasabaga kwigaba mvuze kwigaba ukugenda ukarara nzira ugacumbika rimwe rimwe ugahura n’abakwambura kuzagera perefegitura kuzagaruka byari bigoye byasabaga gupfunyika’’ minisitiri shyaka avuga rugendo kunoza serivisi zimaze kwegera umuturage ati ’’serivisi zabagezeho ariko ireme ryazo ntabwo rirajya murongo neza icya kabiri ukuzamura ubushobozi bw’abashinzwe guha serivisi abaturage ukuvuga inzego zegereye umuturage zikazamuka ariko igisumba byose umuturage ushoboye’’ u rwanda rufite intego binyuze gahunda guverinoma y’imyaka nst mwaka abanyarwanda bazaba bishimira serivisi bahabwa n’inzego leta kigero bivuye byariho chief editor muhaburarw

title: gakenke inkeragutabara n’abafasha barahuguwe mateka
content: kubakira byiza mateka y’u rwanda kugira uruhare kubungabunga umutekano hatangwa amakuru gihe muntu wese wahungabanya umutekano bimwe byagarutsweho mahugurwa yateguwe komisiyo gusubiza buzima busanzwe agenewe inkeragutabara n’abafasha yabereye biro by’akarere gakenke ukwakira afungura mahugurwa umuyobozi komisiyo gusubiza buzima busanzwe abahoze rugamba ntara y’amajyaruguru madamu niyonteze clemence yasabye abitabiriye mahugurwa kuyakurikirana neza kuko ingirakamaro mibereho n’abaturanyi yakomeje avuga mahugurwa agamije guhugura cyane cyane abagore b’inkeragutabara bagahugukirwa gahunda leta dore batigeze bahugurwa bagaruka rwababyaye ndetse kumenya ibibazo bafite bwana safali wilson watanze ikiganiro mateka y’u rwanda mahugurwa yasobanuriye abitariye amahugurwa imvano y’amateka yateye jenoside yakorewe abatutsi yavuze abazungu banditse kandi bakigisha amateka y’u rwanda bayagoreka nkana kugira bacemo ibice abanyarwanda babashe kubategeka bise cyongereza divide and rule by’umwihariko ababiligi banditse amateka y’abanyarwanda bagendeye mateka y’amacakubiri gihugu cyabo hagati y’abafurama flamands n’abawaru wallons dore iwabo byacikaga hagati yayo moko uretse bakoroni safali yakomeje avuga natwe ubwacu twabigizemo uruhare cyane cyane ubutegetsi butandukanye bwagiye busimburana bwahembereye macukubiri kugeza abanyarwanda barangajwe imbere n’ubutegetsi bubi bamburaga ubuzima abavandimwe basaga miliyoni asobanura ikigenderewe kwiga amateka yavuze kubaka ejo hazaza bwana safali yagize kumenya amateka yacu bidufasha kwirinda amabi jenoside tukubakira mateka meza bidufasha kandi kumenya twatsinzwe n’aho twatsinze nk’abanyarwanda ni byiza kwiga amateka kuko ushaka kwiyibagiza amateka ashaka kuyasubiramo ibyo bigamije kubaka ejo hazaza h’igihugu cyacu kizira amacakubiri n’ingengabiterezo jenoside umutekano isoko y’iterambere lt muhozi charles ubarizwa batayo ikorera karere gakenke watanze ikiganiro mutekano yavuze iterambere u rwanda rwagezeho rurikesha umutekano niyo mpamvu tugomba kuwubungabunga kugira tutazasubira inyuma yibukije abitariye amahugurwa batagomba kwirara bagomba gutanga amakuru gihe muntu wese ushobora kuhungabanya umutekano koloneli karegeya claudien komisiyo gusubiza buzima busanzwe witandukanyije fdlr yabasabye gukangurira abavandimwe ndetse n’inshuti zabo zikiri mashyamba kongo gutahuka bagafatanya n’abandi banyarwanda kubaka igihugu cyabo kandi abizeza kuzabafasha kubagezaho butumwa izo nkeragutabara zitandukanyije fdlr zinjijwe gahunda zitandukanye z’iterambere barihirwa amashuri y’imyuga barubakiwe bavanwa nyakatsi ndetse baninjizwa gahunda gira inka mushimiyimana jeannette umwe mubakurikiranye mahugurwa avuga mahugurwa yayungukiyemo byinshi yavuze yasobanukiwe imvano jenoside amateka yagoretswe akaba agiye gufata iya mbere akayarwanya avuga amateka y’ukuri kandi agomba kubaka igihugu cy’u rwanda ayo mahugurwa yitabiriwe n’inkeragutabara hamwe n’abafasha basaga baturutse turere twa rulindo gakenke batahutse bava mashyamba repubulika iharanira demokarasi kongo guhera kugeza mwaka turimo nshimiyimana leonard

content: mu kwezi k’ukuboza ubugenzacyaha bw’u buholandi bwakoze igikorwa gusaka rugo victoire ingabire umuhoza ruri i rotterdam hafatwa ibikoresho bitandukanye birimo mudasobwa ubushinjacyaha bw’u rwanda bwemeza madosiye azabagirira akamaro rubanza ruregwamo victoire ingabire n’abandi bantu bane bahoze gisirikare fdlr ibi bimenyetso bizavanwa buholandi byiyongera bindi ubushinjacyaha bwatanze rubanza rumaze amezi abiri rutangiye alain mukurarinda umuvugizi w’ubushinjacyaha bukuru bw’u rwanda akaba n’umwe bagize itsinda ry’abashinjacyaha bashinja ingabire yatangaje bishimiye kiriya cyemezo cyafashwe n’urukiko ruri i la haye kohereza ziriya nyandiko yabivuze magambo cyemezo cyadushimishije cyane ni ikimenyetso cyerekana ubutabera bw’u rwanda bufitiwe icyizere n’igihugu cy’u buholandi kandi kirerekana umubano mwiza hagati y’ibihugu byombi kohereza madosiye byari byarabangamiwe lin muyizere umugabo victoire umuhoza n’umuholandi w’umwunganizi by’amategeko jan hofdijk umuvugizi w’ubushinjacyaha yagize twizeye madosiye azaza byanze bikunze kuko icyemezo cyafashwe kurwego nyuma kikaba kidashobora kujuririrwa igisigaye ukumenya inzira bizacamo n’uko bizihutishwa ariko kuza bizaza turabyizeye kugira icyi cyemezo kohereza nyandiko gifatwe minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga y’u buholandi yabigizemo uruhare kuko yavuze kugeza urubanza ingabire rurimo kugenda neza muri uru rukiko rumaze amezi abiri hifashishijwe inyandiko ivuye ministeri y’ubutabera y’u buholandi ishimangira ingabire azabona ubutabera bukwiye icyumweru gishize cyarangiye ingabire victoire umuhoza yiregura byaha ashinjwa byose akaba abihakana egide kayiranga

title: umuhanzikazi yareze umugabo m’urukiko kubera mukoraho
content: taylor alison swift bakomeye leta zunze ubumwe amerika yatangiye kuburana n’umugabo ashinja kumukorakora bifotozanyaga akazamura ukuboko ikanzu yambaye bwumvikane bombi uyu muhanzikazi yagiranye ibibazo n’umugabo witwa david mueller wakoraga akazi kuvanga imiziki radiyo gihe ariko akaza kwirukanwa ashinjwa gusagarira taylor swift akagerageza kumukorakora urukiko mujyi denver leta colorado rwakiriye bombi baherekejwe n’ababafasha bijyanye n’amategeko batangiye kuburana rubanza byitezwe ibikorwa byarwo bizamara ibyumweru bibiri the denver channel yakurikiranye ibikorwa by’uru rubanza yavuze hagendewe mpapuro z’inkiko bikaba bigoranye ababurana bazagera mwanzuro gucoca amakimbirane hatagize uhanwa cyangwa yakwe indishyiiki gitangazamakuru cyavuze taylor swift dj david mueller baburana bombi bageze rukiko gitondo kabiri tariki kanama abanyamakuru ntibemerewe gufata amafoto y’imbere rukiko ndetse imyanzuro bayibwirwaga cyumba cyabo associated press yatangaje ababurana bicaye buryo bubagaragaza bateranye umugongo buryo ntawarebanaga n’undi nyuma y’imyaka ine bafitanye amakimbirane itangizwa ry’urubanza taylor swift n’umugabo ashinja kumukorakora abigambiriye rwatangiye ruyobowe n’umucamanza witwa william j martinez leta colorado wungirijwe n’abandi barindwi aba barahiriye kubahiriza amategeko bahawe kutavugira hanze ibizavugirwa rubanza mbere y’uko hamwe babyemeza dj david mueller wabanje kujyana taylor swift nkiko amuryoza yatumye ahinduka igicibwa ndetse akirukanwa kazi biturutse kuba mukobwa yarabwiye itangazamakuru kuko yigeze kumukorakora burenganzira yamuhaye’ bahuriye birori mwaka nyuma umukobwa yajyanye nkiko mugabo amushinja yamukoreye ihohotera ruhame ariko dj mueller yagiye abihakana kenshi ku itariki gicurasi urukiko leta colorado rufite kirego rwasohoye imyanzuro itesha agaciro ibyavuzwe dj mueller wahamyaga taylor swift yarengereye kirego cye kirimo amakuru y’uburyo mugabo yazamuye ukoboko ikanzu akamukora myanya y’ibanga bifotozaga mu kirego yatanze taylor swift yavuze dj mueller yagejeje ukuboko ikanzu ndetse akamukorakora buryo bumubangamira kuko bitari bwumvikane bombi umugabo yarabibajijwe atunga urutoki umuyobozi witwa eddie haskell avuga wabikoze

title: muhanga ababyeyi barasabwa gutoza abana umuco gusoma bakiri bato
content: mu muganda rusange w’abaturage wabereye murenge cyeza karere muhanga abawitabiriye basabwe gufasha abana bakagira umuco gusoma bakiri bato cyane cyane ururimi rw’ikinyarwanda kuko umwana wabitojwe akiri muto bituma akura abikunze ndetse bikazamufasha kwiga andi masomo yigishwiriza ishuri uwineza marie claude umukozi minisiteri y’umuco siporo minispoc avuga nyuma kubona hari abana batazi gusoma ikinyarwanda minisiteri ndetse n’iy uburezi basaba ababyeyi gufata iya mbere gushishikariza abana gukunda gusoma kandi umwana abikoze akabona n’umubyeyi abimufashijemo arushaho kubikunda agira babyeyi mukundishe abana gusoma munabashakire basoma mubagurire udutabo cyangwa ibinyamakuru ntimwumve utanze amafaranga cyangwa ukagura igitabo azaba apfuye ubusa muzigama amafaranga y’icupa ay’imyambaro cyangwa kurya abe nako munazigamira bitabo by’abana ikindi munabakundishe kugana amasomero ntimwumve kwigisha umwana gusoma ikintu gihenze ahubwo mwumve igihenze ukubiha agaciro uwineza kandi akomeza avuga buryo gufasha abana kubafasha kumenya gutanga ibitekerezo bakiri bato badafite ubushobozi kugura ibitabo bashobora gufasha abana bagendeye bidukikije harimo ibyanditse myenda cyangwa ibyapa ku ruhande rw’ababyeyi murenge cyeza bamwe bavuga bitewe n’imiterere y’imirimo cyaro ntibabona umwanya kuba bafasha abana cyane cyane abagore kuko barebwa byinshi gihe abagabo bigiriye tubari abandi bakaba ntibindeba abana bagaharirwa abagore mujawimana redempta umwe babyeyi bahatuye avuga kanya ajya abona gufasha abana kuko asabwa gukora imirimo myinshi ikindi kugura ibitabo ntiyabona ubushobozi bwabyo kubera ubukene agira ntabyo njya nkora icyakora njya numva bicaye babiganira bize ishuri ariko kuba nafata akanya ndebe makayi sinabibonera umwanya mba ngomba guhinga nkabatekera nkanashaka amatungo arya umugabo yigendeye isanteri abandi sinakubeshya yanabibonera umwanya ntagwabira emilien umukozi ushinzwe amashuri y’incuke abanza n’amasomero karere muhanga avuga mashuri aka karere harimo leta n’afashwa leta mashuri leta afite ihuriro ryo gusoma mudugudu afite n’abakangurambaga gusoma babiri buri huriro bafasha abana kumenya gusoma neza ikinyarwanda kandi badategwa n’ibyo basoma bagasoma bakurikije utwatuzo kandi agaragaza n’amarangamutima y’ibyo barimo gusoma hakurikijwe ibipimo bigenderwaho rwanda umwana uzi gusoma kigero cyiza mwaka mbere agomba gusoma amagambo hagati munota umwe mwana mwaka muwa amagambo hagati munota muwa hagati y’amagambo mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe minisiteri y’uburezi mwaka bwagaragaje abana mwaka mbere kugeza muwa title: nyabihu abashumba bahungabanya umutekano w’abaturage
content: bamwe baturage bamaze guterwa impungenge n’imyitwarire y’abo bashumba niyonzima justin umwe batuye ako gace avuga hari abaturage murenge bigogwe bamaze gukubitwa baranakomeretswa ndetse hari n’uwatemwe ajyanwa bitaro tariki abo bashumba akenshi bakunze guhungabanya umutekano w’abaturage usanga abimukira ako gace baraje bashaka akazi abaturage bavuga impamvu bashumba bakomeza gukora urugomo nk’urwo ababikora badahanwa nyabyo iyo hari ufashwe afungwa igihe gito kitarenze ibyumweru bibiri hanyuma bakongera bakamufungura usanga bashumba basa n’abamenyereye gihano kuko usanga bavuga nubwo babafunga bazabafungura abaturage barasaba ubuyobozi bw’umurenge bigogwe gukemura kibazo hataragira n’uwicwa cyangwa agakorerwa ikindi gikorwa cy’ubunyamaswa umuyobozi ushinzwe imibereho myiza y’abaturage murenge bigogwe rwisumbura gerard avuga kibazo cy’abashumba bakizi ariko hari ingamba zikomeye zigiye gufatirwa abashumba ndetse n’aborozi murenge zimwe ngamba zafashwe bagiye gushyiraho ishyirahamwe rihuza aborozi bigogwe buryo buri wese yerekana abashumba agatanga imyirondoro hanyuma bakayandika buryo uzajya akora amakosa azajya akurikiranwa n’amategeko kandi n’ibyo yangije bikabazwa yaragiriraga ikindi abashumba bazajya bagaragaraho imico igayitse nk’iyo uretse gufungwa bazajya basubizwa baturutse kuko usanga abahungabanya umutekano kenshi batanavuka bigogwe abaturage nabo barasabwa kwicungira umutekano gutanga amakuru muntu wese washaka kubahungabanyiriza umutekano kugirango afatirwe ibyemezo safari viateur

title: ndayishimiye eric bakame yatoboye avuga icyatumye yinangira ntasabe imbabazi rayon sport
content: umuzamu ndayishimiye eric uzwi bakame yatangaje icyatumye amara igihe cyose atagaragara kibuga kirimo yategetswe gusaba imbabazi ariko bakamushyiraho amananiza kwandika avuga yafatanyaga komite yayoborwaga gacinya chanse dennis gutega mikino rayon sports babone kumubabarira ibi mugabo yabitegetswe komite iriho rayon sports iyobowe muvunyi paul yamusabye kwandika abeshyera uwari umuyobozi wayo wacyuye igihe gacinya ndayishimiye eric yabwiye ma radio yaha rwanda komite iyoboye rayon sports yamusabye kwandika abeshya yafatanyaga komite yacyuye igihe yayoborwaga gacinya kugurisha imikino bettingndetse rimwe rimwe yakoraga amakosa atuma batsindwaakanabeshya arwaye bakame yavuze komite iyoboye rayon sports yamusabye kwandika ashinja iya gacinya yegukanye ibikombe kugurisha imikino yagize ntabwo nanze kwandika nsaba imbabaziahubwo bambwiraga kwandika nibyo nanzebansabye kuvuga komite kera gacinya prosper bankoreshaka baka bettinga ngo nangaga gukina ndi muzimango naritsindishaga yongeraho atimu myaka rayon twatwaraga ibikombetwarasohotsenatorwaga nk’umuzamu mwizanabanzagamo mw’ikipe y’igihuguumuntu witsindisha se yabigeraho ate aho kubeshyera abantu batakoze nareka umupira bakame yavuze amaze iminsi biganiro afc leopards ariko rayon sports yanze kumuha ibaruwa imusezerera ayerekezemo muhirwa frederick visi perezida rayon sports yabwiye flash fm gitondo bakame yarangije ibihano akanga kugaruka ikipe ndetse ibisobanuro yasabwe atabitanze ahubwo yandikaga bamubajije gihe bakame avuga yavuze kibazo cy’amajwi yateje ururonddogoro yashyizwe hanze kuvugana n’umufanabikamuviramo kwitwa umugambanyi ibi bije nyuma y’uko bamwe banyamakuru b’imikino batangiye gukora icyiswe campain bakame barebe bamuvuganira rayon sport imuhe imbabazi akine cyangwa imuhe urwandiko rumufasha kuba yasinyira indi kipe bakameiburyo afashe igikombe n’uwahoze ayoboye komite rayon sport gacinyabamuhatira guterekaho inkono ishyushye amubeshyere ariwe yatumaga batsindwa abone guhabwa imbabazigacinya wayoboye rayon sport igatwara ibikombe n’agakombe niwe wabaye ipfundo ry’uko bakame yahabwa imbabazi yanditswe habarurema djamali

title: nur ibiciro by’umusanzu bwisungane kwivuza ntibyahindutse
content: vincent muzungu umuyobozi w’ungirije w’ubwisungane kwivuza kaminuza nkuru y’u rwanda yavuze abanyeshuri barimo gutanga umusanzu usanzwe w’amafaranga ibihumbi bitandatu magana atanu y’amanyarwanda muzungu avuga nubwo bigaragara umusanzu w’abanyeshuri utangana serivisi bahabwa ntabwo umusanzu basabwa wiyongereye yagize turacyari kwiga kaminuza itajya igira yongera musanzu w’abanyeshuli nk’uko ibikorera abakozi ibi kaminuza ibikoze byagabanya igihombo cyijya giterwa n’ubuke bw’amafaranga atangwa n’abanyeshuri ukurikije amafaranga abagendaho kwivuza muzungu vincent avuga ubwisungane kaminuza nkuru y’u rwanda butandukanye n’ubwisungane busanzwe kuko ubwa kaminuza bwemerera abanyamuryango kwivuriza bitaro byinshi by’u rwanda muzungu agira ubwisungane bwacu bukora bitaro byinshi gihugu kera intara zikiri buri ntara yabagamo ibitaro bikorana n’ubwisungane kwivuza ubu uturere tudafitemo ibitaro dukorana duke ibi bituma umunyeshuri cyangwa umukozi kaminuza yacu abasha kwivuriza y’aho agiriye ikibazo cy’uburwayi ubwisungane kwivuza kaminuza nkuru y’u rwanda bwabanjirije ubundi bwose rwanda nkuko ubuyobozi bw’ubu bwisungane bubivuga ubu bwisungane bugizwe n’abanyamuryango byiciro bibiri icyiciro mbere kigizwe n’abakozi barimo abarimu n’abakozi biro gihe icyiciro kabiri kigizwe n’abanyeshuri umusanzu w’abanyeshuri amafaranga mwaka gihe umukozi kwivuza yishyura by’umushahara w’ukwezi ariko kamunza ikamurihira kimwe kabiri cy’ayo mafaranga ubu bwisungane bwifashishwa rwanda ariko bushobora gufasha n’umuntu kwivuza mahanga igihe inteko y’umuryango w’ubu bwisungane ibyemeje iyo bibaye umurwayi atanga cy’amafaranga kwivuza n’ubwisungane kaminuza bukamurihira andi mafaranga asigaye kuva nyakanga igiciro cy’ubwisungane kwivuza mutuelle de sant baturage basanzwe cyarahindutse ibiciro bishya bigendera by’iciro by’ubukungu umunyamuryango abarizwamo jean baptiste micomyiza

title: jean paul samputu nama mpuzamahanga i beirut
content: iyo nama ikaba ifite intego kwereka isi rusange ntawe ukwiye guheranwa n’amateka ahubwo mateka akwiye kumusigira isomo samputu yarayitumiwemo nk’intumwa y’amahoro y’umuryango w’abibumbye akaba yaratanze ikiganiro nk’umunyarwanda wababariye abamugiriye nabi aha akaba yaranerekanye abanyarwanda bageze kubabarirana usibye kuba yaratanze ikiganiro nama anaririmba zimwe ndirimbo ze zivuga bumwe n’ubwiyunge nk’uko bigaragara rubuga interineti wwwhealingwoundsofhistoryorg abari nama baganira nsanganyamatsiko igira iti healing the wounds of history addressing the roots of violence ugenekereje kinyarwanda nko kuvuga gukiza ibikomere by’amateka ugaragaza invano y’akarengane umuhanzi jean paul samputu niwe nyafurika wenyine nama ikindi usibye kuba aririmba indirimbo zitandukanye zahawe ibihembo azwiho kuba yarazengurutse isi nk’intumwa y’umuco nyarwanda aho ndirimbo ze zishingiye njyana gakondo y’umuco nyarwanda atanga ubutumwa bw’amahoro n’ubwiyunge iyo nama yitabiriye ikaba yaratangiye gatanu tariki ikazarangira cyumweru tariki norbert niyizurugero

title: min nduhungirehe yakuyeho urujijo cyateye isubikwa ry’inama eac
content: leta y’u rwanda yatangaje inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu by’umuryango afurika y’iburasirazuba eac yagombaga kuba mpera z’uku kwezi yasubitswe busabe bw’umwe bakuru b’ibihugu binyamuryango wagaragaje imbogamizi z’uko atazaboneka amakuru y’isubikwa ry’inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu bigize umuryango afrika y’iburasirazuba eac yamenyekanye nyuma y’uko u rwanda ruri buyobozi bw’uyu muryango gihe rubimenyesheje ibihugu binyamuryango binyuze nyandiko umunyamabanga leta minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga n’ubutwererane ushinzwe ibikorwa by’umuryango afurika y’iburasirazuba amb olivier nduhungirehe yagaragaje gusubika nama byaturutse busabe bw’umwe bakuru b’ibihugu wifuje yakwimurirwa umwaka utahaicyakora yirinze gutangaza munyamuryango yagize ubundi amategeko avuga inama iterana abakuru b’ibihugu bahari ariko udahari akaba ashobora guhagararirwa n’umuminisitiri byanditse masezerano eac ariko akenshi bikorwa bwumvikane umukuru w’igihugu avuga tariki afiteho indi gahunda gihe babyumvikanaho rwose bikaba yindi tariki bisanzwe bikorwa rero hari umukuru w’igihugu kimwe bigize muryango wasabye nyakubahwa perezida pepubulika nk’umuyobozi w’uyu muryango nama yakwimurirwa kwezi mbere cyangwa kwezi umwaka utaha kuko atari buboneke tariki ugushyingo ejo bundi nama perezida repubulika yagiranye n’umunyamabanga mukuru w’uyu muryango village urugwiro yarabimumenyesheje hanyuma nandikira umunyamabanga mukuru menyesha n’abandi minisitiri b’ibihugu bigize muryangoinama y’abakuru b’igihugu eac yasubitswe nanone uretse inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu yasubitswe izindi zari ziteganyijwe zizaba shiti zirimo iy’abaminisitiri iy’abanyamabanga bahoraho ndetse n’indi bucuruzi n’ishoramari izwi business and investment summit icyakora amb nduhungirehe yamaganye ibihuha isubikwa ry’iyi nama byakwirakwijwe bimwe bitangazamakuru gihugu uganda ashimangira gusubika nama ntaho bihuriye n’isubikwa ry’indi nama ishyirwa bikorwa ry’amasezerano luanda hagati y’u rwanda uganda yagize nta n’aho bihuriye kuko gusubika inama kampala byerekeye gushyira bikorwa masezerano luanda ryatewe gahunda y’abagize delegation yacu batari kuboneka mbere tariki ibyo twarabibamenyesheje ariko tubasaba kugena indi tariki twakumvikanaho nama ikaba hanyuma isubikwa ry’inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu eac ryo nubwo ryasabwe n’u rwanda byasabwe n’umukuru w’ikindi gihugu n’ubwo byasabwe uganda gushaka kubihuza binyamakuru uganda ukwigiza nkana gushaka kuvuga byacitse kandi ntaho bihuriye mu kiganiro aheruka kugirana n’abanyamakuru tariki z’uku kwezi k’ugushyingo perezida repubulika paul kagame mukuru w’igihugu uyoboye eac gihe yagaragaje gukemura imbogamizi zikigaragara kwishyira hamwe kw’ibihugu binyamuryango bikwiye gushyirwa imbere kurusha inama ubwazo yagize ubusanzwe ntabwo kuba inama itabaye byakabaye ikintu cyerekana hari ikibazo runaka kuko ibibazo biri ahandi kandi ntibiterwa kuba inama itabaye hari n’igihe twamaze imyaka nama ibaye ariko wenda hari n’impamvu zabiteye ariko njyewe ntangiriro ndabizi neza kwishyira hamwe atari ikintu ujyamo ugahita ubona wifuzaga ibintu tuzi kandi twemera ibintu bidahita bijya buryo ako kanya nk’uko tubyifuza biteganyijwe inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu bigize umuryango afurika y’iburasirazuba izasubukurwa hagati mutarama gashyantare umwaka utaha rba

title: abarenga biga iprc kigali bamaze amezi farg itabaha buruse
content: abanyeshuri barenga biga ishuri rikuru ry’imyuga n’ubumenyi ngiro iprc-kigali bafashwa n’ikigega leta kigenewe gutera inkunga abacitse icumu batishoboye farg baravuga bamaze amezi atanu badahabwa amafaranga kubafasha azwi buruse gusa farg kirizeza bitarenze icyumweru gitaha bazaba bayabonye abanyeshuri bafashwa farg bavuga bagenewe amafaranga ibihumbi buri kwezi kubafasha kugira imyigire igenda neza gusa hari abanyeshuri biga iprc afashwa n’iki kigega bavuga baheruka amafaranga bagenerwa kwezi k’uyu mwaka kuva kwezi babwirwa bagiye kuyabona ariko amaso yaheze kirere bakemeza bigira ingaruka mibereho uwintije oscar yagize ushobora guhura n’ikibazo kubura isabune kandi wundi mubyeyi wagana ugasanga ugiye bitekerezo byinshi rimwe rimwe ukibaza uti wenda biba bimeze gutya ugsanga ibibazo kuko wundi mubyeyi uba ufite kayiranga patrice yunze mugenzi agira iyo mbogamizi irahari yaba abana buzima hanze nzu babamo bashobora kubasohora uburyo kurya buragoye gufotoza note kwigiraho imbogamizi kabatesi donatha avuga nk’umwana w’umukobwa ubuzima kutabona mafaranga gihe buba bukomeye cyane ati imbogamizi ziba zihari mwana w’umukobwa hari ibibazo agomba gukemura buruse itabonekeye igihe ashobora gushaka ubundi buryo kubonamo amafaranga butari bwiza uwamahoro nadine avuga mafaranga ataje binagira ingaruka myigire ati iyo udafite amafaranga ibintu byose birangirika cyane abenshi bategereje buruse kuko ije hari ibintu umunyeshuri akemura buzima buri munsi itinze kuza hari ibintu byinshi byangirika haba buryo kurya buryo bw’imyigire umuhuzabikorwa w’umuryango w’abanyeshuri barokotse jenoside yakorewe abatutsi aerg iprc kigali niyomukiza jean paul avuga muryango udahwema gukora ubuvugizi kibazo cy’aba banyeshuri ariko ikibazo ntigikemuke yagize umunsi nyirizina ntabwo uvugwa ntabwo uzwi ariko mivuganire nakira igisubizo biri nzira gukemuka birashoboka byakemuka nonaha cyangwa se byatindaho bikaba ejo umuyobozi mukuru farg ruberangeyo theophile avuga kibazo cyatewe kuba ingengo y’imari itarahuye n’ibikorwa byari biteganyijwe gukorwa gusa kibazo kirakemuka bitarenze cyumweru gitaha ati uko gutinda ikibazo turakizi twanaganiriye nabo mbere y’uko umwaka w’ingengo y’imari urangira kwezi twarababwiye duti nimwihangane mafaranga dufite amafaranga dufite yatubanye macye twagejeje dosiye minecofin nayo ireba ibyangombwa byose byuzuye ibitari byuzuye turabyuzuza bibaye amahire reka tubabwire amafaranga yanyu yishyuwe ejo cyangwa ejo bundi yarabonetse igisigaye ikigo kiyabona noneho kikayabagezaho cyumweru gitaha bazaba babonye amafaranga
