title: ari maboko polisi kubera gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge
content: umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’akagari manwari gasigwa celestin avuga mpera z’icyi cyumweru dushoje girwa gushakisha ibicuruzwa murwanashyaka bosco wibwe bageze nzu y’uyu musore bahasanga ibiro by’urumogi bigera gasigwa avuga urumogi rugaragara aka gace kabo rukunze guturuka gasarenda y’ishyamba nyungwe icyakora bakomeje gufata ingamba zikomeye kugirango bahangane n’iri kwirakwizwa ry’urumogi twagerageje kuvugana n’inzego z’umutekano karere nyamagabe ariko ntibyadukundira eric muvara

title: ubushomeri buravuza ubuhuha rubyiruko rw’u rwanda
content: leta y’u rwanda iravuga myaka irindwi imbere izateza imbere urwego rw’uburezi mugambi kugira ubukungu bw’igihugu bushingiye bumenyi icyakora imibare y’abarangiza mashuli yisumbuye amakuru kaminuza ntibabone gukora ikomeje kwiyongera minisitiri w’intebe bwana edouard ngirente yizeje abagize inteko ishinga amategeko imitwe yombi kibazo bazakibonera umuti ari imbere y’inteko ishinga amategeko imitwe yombi minisitiri w’intebe yagaragaje politiki y’uburezi myaka irindwi imbere yavuze rusange urwego rw’uburezi rwanda rumaze gutera imbere buryo bugaragara n’ubwo hari n’aho bitameze neza uru urwego ubutegetsi bufata nk’ishingiro ry’izamuka ry’ubukungu myaka ishize imibare itangwa n’ubutegetsi igaragaza byiciro bitandukanye by’uburezi ibyumba by’amashuli abanyeshuli n’ibindi byunganira ubumenyi byazamutse nko cyiciro kabiri cy’amashuri yisumbuye umubare w’abayigagamo basagaga ibihumbi bagana y’abagombaga kuba biga kiciro muri umubare wabo urasaga ibihumbi bangana naho mashuli makuru kaminuza hagati harangije abanyeshuri basaga muri ibihumbi n’imisago barangije ikiciro mbere ho abandi basaga bagize barangije ikiciro kabiri kaminuza abasaga barangije ikiciro gatatu masters and phd’s n’ubwo biri ubushomeri barangiza biganjemo urubyiruko bukomeje kuvuza ubuhuha imibare irashyira abarangije kaminuza n’amashuli makuru igashyira kandi abarangije amashuli yisumbuye bamwe badepite barasanga ikibazo cy’ingutu bagasaba kugira igikorwa depite costance mukayuhi arasanga urubyiruko rwagombye koroherezwa kubona inguzanyo kwihangira imirimo umukuru guverinoma akavuga ministere y’ubucuruzi n’inganda yagihagurukiye naho depite pelagie mukantaganzwa agasanga byibura abarangiza kugira bakomeze bashomere leta yabashyiriraho uburyo kubahugura mugambi kubabyaza umusariuro minisitiri w’intebe avuga gahunda n’ubusanzwe yatangiye ihereye bize ubuhinzi n’ubworozi ufatiye bipimo byagenderwagaho kugaragaza umubare w’abashomeri rwanda - abarangije amashuli yisumbuye ikigo cy’igihugu cy’ibarurishamibare rwanda cyagaragaje kuba bitomora barikubye inshuro enye ni kimwe n’ubushomeri barangiza amashuli makuru kaminuza - none byumvikana bikubye inshuro ebyiri kuri gahunda y’ubutegetsi myaka irindi ukuzahanga by’imirimo mishya idashingiye buhinzi ni gahunda itari nshya kuyari isanzweho guhanga imirimo buri mwaka kandi kugeza itarigeze igerwaho mpuzandengo ubutegetsi bwifuza uretse kibazo cy’ubushomeri barangiza kwiga rwanda abadepite baranagaraza ireme ry’uburezi rigicumbagira impinduka hato hato zitaramba uru rwego zishyirwa majwi nyirabayaza y’ipfapfana ry’ireme ry’uburezi bivuze bigoye gushyira imbere intero kugira ubukungu bushingiye bumenyi igihe haba hadafashwe ingamba zitajegajega yanditswe chief editor

title: eddy kenzo yakoreye indirimbo umukobwa bahuriye i kigali
content: umuhanzi uganda eddy kenzo yakoreye indirimbo umukobwa witwa soleil laurent bahuriye i kigali kigali up nyakanga indirimbo eddy kenzo yakoreye soleil laurent yitwa soraye gusa ntibyatunguranye kuko bahuriraga i kigali gihe bafatanyije byinshi kubera soleil laurent yajyaga rubyiniro kuririmba eddy kenzo yagiye kumufasha muri ndirimbo soleil laurent ubwe ugaragaramo aririmbirwa nk’umukobwa eddy kenzo abwira akunda iyi ndirimbo imaze gukundwa benshi cyane irimo imibyinire kinyafurika ihambayeumuhanzi soleil laurent akomoka gihugu haiti

title: byinshi ruzagayura inzara yashegeshe u rwanda igahitana abasaga ibihumbi
content: iyo inzara yatangiye ahagana ukwakira itewe n’amapfa yamaze imyaka ibiri ayo mapfa yatangiye nzeri yongera kubaho nyuma gato y’itumba ryo igitabo imizi y’u rwanda cy’umusizi nsanzabera jean de dieu kigaragaza nzara yenyegejwe yatewe n’igabanyuka ry’ibiribwa ryaturutse ndwara y’ibirayi bita mildioumildew ndetse ndwara y’ibishyimbo bita chortophila n’ibijumba bihe byari byibasiwe n’indwara bita rhizoctoniarhizoctonie inzara ruzagayura yongerewe ubukana kandi n’intambara kabiri y’isi ndetse n’uko gihe abanyarwanda bagombaga guha umusanzu abakoroni b’ababiligi bahanganye n’ingabo adolf hitler ntambara kabiri y’isi uwo musanzu ugizwe n’ibiribwa n’amatungo icyo gihe imbuto gakondo z’abanyarwanda nazo zari zishoboye guhangana n’ibihe n’uburwayi bw’ibihingwa zari zimaze gucika bazisimbuje ibirayi imyumbati soya n’ibindi abanyarwanda batangaga inka ibishyimbo amasaka amashaza kugaburira abasirikare b’abanyekongo ndetse n’abakozi birombe congo usibye ibiribwa n’amatungo umusanzu w’abanyarwanda ntambara ugizwe n’imirimo y’agahato irimo guharura imihanda kubumba amatafari gutwara imizigo y’abakoloni gukora birombe zahabu gasegereti wolufuramu guhinga ibireti byakoreshwaga gutunganya umuti wica udukoko inzara ruzagayura yiswe amazina menshi bitewe n’ubukana yagiye igaragaza turere dutandukanye tw’u rwanda mu majyepfo yiswe ruzagayura mu duce dutandukanye tw’iburasirazuba yiswe rujukundi rwanyirarushenyi rwakinyebuye cyangwa se rwakabetezi mu majyaruguru bice rubavu nyabihu burera musanze yiswe amazina rudakangwimishanana rugaragazabadakekwa nyirahuku hagati gihugu ndetse n’amajyaruguru y’iburasirazuba izwi matemane burengerazuba yitwa gahoro iyo nzara yagize ubukana bwinshi majyaruguru burasirazuba majyepfo y’igihugu mu bice rusizi nyamasheke niho honyine hatigeze hahura n’iyo nzara mpamvu z’ikirere cyaho ikindi ntara yegeranye congo mbiligi buryo itari kugira ikibazo kubura ibiribwa ahubwo yakiraga abantu bavuye zindi ntara astrida butare gisenyi mu gihe ruzagayura uduce tw’imisozi ihanamye uduce tw’ubutaka busharira uduce turangwamo isuri nitwo twababaye cyane kurusha utundi muri utwo duce kimwe n’ahandi abaturage barazahaye buryo benshi bamaraga iminsi ibir cyangwa se itatu badakoze munwa benshi inzara yarabicaga abaryaga wasangaga barya inguri imizi y’insina imizi y’ibiti amareberebe umutsima uvuye ifu barakatsi acacia cyangwa se y’intembe y’insina iyo ndyo idasanzwe gushidikanya nayo yishe abantu benshi bihe abafite agatege barasuhukaga bakajya gushaka bakura ibiribwa cyangwa se bagurana ibikoresho byabo n’ibiribwa benshi wasangaga barananutse nk’uko bigaragara mafoto y’icyo gihe babitaga ingarisi kubera babaga barashizemo ni nako bitaga imirambo y’abo yahitanye iyo mirambo yasangwaga y’imihanda mirima mashyamba nkengero z’inzuzi n’ahandi henshi nyuma y’uko hafashwe ingamba zinyuranye kurwanya inzara ruzagayura abaturage babishishikarijwemo n’abategetsi b’abakoloni ndetse n’abatware bahinganye ubwira guhera ntangiriro abanyarwanda bahinze ibishyimbo amashaza ibirayi imyumbati n’ibijumba kubera uburumbuke bw’imvura yaguye buryo buhagije umusaruro wariyongereye ibigega byongera guhunikwamo abari barasuhutse bagaruka zabo ubwo abamisiyoneri bahagaritse gutanga amafunguro inkambi z’ingarisi zirafungwa ahagana nyakanga abategetsi b’abakoloni bahagaritse kohereza amakamyo y’ibiribwa rwanda yavaga kongo mu mpera z’umwaka aribwo hatangazwa inzara yarangiye gihugu nubwo inzara ruzagayura yamaze igihe gito yahitanye abantu benshi cyane abamisiyoneri b’abagatolika batangaje raporo ngarumwaka hagati - u rwanda rwatakaje abantu bagera harimo n’abasuhukiye bindi bihugu tanganyika uganda congo mbiligi muri raporo bavugaga abasuhutse bageraga ababaruraga hari bibagirwaga rimwe rimwe kubara abana abagore abarwayi n’abasheshe akanguhe bapfuye cyangwa se bahunze nzara buryo yahitanye bashobora kurenga inzara ruzagayura yangije kandi byinshi itera n’ubujura bukabije gihugu ubwo bujura bwakwiye turere twose tw’u rwanda cyane cyane utwari twarayogojwe n’inzara bwakorwaga n’ingeri zose z’abanyarwanda mu turere tumwe tumwe tw’u rwanda nko teritwari gisenyi bujura bwafashe indi ntera kugera abaturage batatinyaga gutega nzira bagenzi bavuye misiyoni bakabagusha gico cyabo bakabambura ibiribwa bahawe izo ngaruka ruzagayura zateje umutekano muke gihugu bizana urwikekwe n’umujinya mwinshi banyarwanda ahanini mujinya waturukaga bukarihe bw’inzara buremere bw’umusanzu watangwaga n’abanyarwanda

title: ubuhanzi nyarwanda bwahawe umwihariko udasanzwe muganura w’uyu mwaka
content: guhera tariki nyakanga kugeza tariki kanama rwanda hazizihizwa icyumweru cy’umuganura kizarangwa n’ibikorwa bitandukanye minisiteri siporo n’umuco minispoc bufatanye n’inteko nyarwanda y’ururimi n’umuco ralc batangaje mwaka umwihariko uzaba guteza imbere inganda ndangamuco hamurikwa ibihangano nyarwanda ngeri zitandukanye mu kiganiro igihe yagiranye n’ umuyobozi w’ishami ry’umuco ralc dr nzabonimpa jacques yavuze mwaka bahisemo kwibanda buhanzi kuko icyiciro cyafasha igihugu gutera imbere ariko cyasigaye inyuma ati impamvu icyiciro kimwe bigize ubukungu bw’u rwanda cyagiye gisigara inyuma abahanzi bakomeje gufatwa sagihobe nk’abantu baza bakaririmba cyangwa bagashimisha abantu bagahabwa ikinyobwa barangiza bakigendera ntibyahawe agaciro kandi urebye neza usanga icyiciro gifite kuba cyazamura ubukungu bw’igihugu buryo bwihuse kandi buhamye mu gutanga akazi icyiciro gifite guha abantu benshi akazi nitwibanda buhanzi bukaduhangira imyambaro nganda ndangamuco zizatera imbere nk’icyiciro sinema giteye imbere ntabwo cyazamuka cyonyine ahubwo cyazamura icya muzika kikazamura icy’ubwiza n’imideri guhera tariki nyakanga kugeza tariki nyakanga mujyi kigali ahazwi car free zone buri munsi guhera saa kumi n’imwe hazajya habera imurikabikorwa ry’urwego rw’ubuhanzi nyarwanda ngeri zitandukanye zirimo kuririmba imideri sinema urwenya imbyino n’ibindi hari n’uturere twemeye gihe tuzategura gukorera imurikabikorwa ry’abahanzi batwo rwego kubateza imbere tariki kanama nibwo hazaba igitaramo cy’umuganura kimaze kumenyerwa izina i nyanza twataramye kizatangira saa kumi n’ebyiri z’umugoroba rukari i nyanza ku gatanu tariki kanama hazizihizwa umuganura rwego rw’igihugu ibirori byawo bizabera sitade nyanza ariko bikazanizihizwa rwego rw’uturere n’umudugudu dr nzabonimpa yatangaje mwaka hari mwihariko w’uko tariki n’iya kanama umuganura uzizihizwa rwego rw’umuryango hagamijwe gushishikariza imiryango y’abanyarwanda kuba umwe gufashanya ati bigumye rwego rw’igihugu ntibibe muryango ntabwo umuganura waba wabaye umuganura gihe ngewe manuka nkajya iwacu isoko nkifatanya n’abandi banyamuryango tugasabana nk’umuryango abana bato i kigali bagahura babyara bakamenya ibibaranga nk’umuryango umuryango ukarebera hamwe umeze abarimo bakennye batabonye mituweri bagafata ingamba nk’umuryango umuganura banyarwanda mahanga uzizihizwa munsi bazahitamo ariko bitarenze tariki kanama mwaka dr nzabonimpa yashishikarije abakozi leta badafite impuzankano yihariye cyumweru cy’umuganura bakwiriye kuza bambaye kinyarwanda cyangwa bakambara imyenda yakorewe rwanda mu mateka y’ u rwanda umuganura umunsi mukuru ngarukamwaka wubahwaga kandi ugahabwa agaciro ibwami muryango w’abanyarwanda uwo munsi wizihizwaga mwero w’amasaka abanyarwanda bagashimira imana uburumbuke bw’umuryango imyaka n’amatungo yabahaye bivugwa umuganura watangiye kwizihizwa ngoma gihanga ngomijana kinyejana cyenda kwizihiza munsi byaciwe n’abakoroni umutware gashamura rukangirashyamba umwiru ushinzwe umuganura yacibwaga gihugu abanyarwanda bakomeje kwizihiza umuganura miryango munsi wongera guhabwa imbaraga leta y’ubumwe yanashyizeho ikiruhuko buri gatanu mbere w’ukwezi munani kanama amafoto muhizi serge

title: mu rwanda havumbuwe zahabu
content: mu itangazo rigenewe abanyamakuru yasohoye kuwa mbere tariki desert gold ivuga yavumbuye zahabu rwanda kandi yishimiye leta y’u rwanda yayongereye imyaka ine rwego gukomeza ubushakashatsi bwayo kuvumbura ahandi haba haboneka zahabu rwanda ndetse kuyicukura agace rubaya kabonetsemo zahabu gaherereye ntara y’amajyaruguru kandi hari utundi duce dushobora kuzagaragaramo zahabu nk’uko itangazo desert gold ribivuga uretse zahabu rwanda hagaragaye ubundi bwoko bw’amabuye y’agaciro duce dutandukanye desert gold sosiyeti canada yateye imbere byerekeranye n’amabuye y’agaciro muri afurika ikorera ibikorwa byayo rwanda mali senegali ifite imigabane ingana sosiyeti yitwa kinross gold corporation toronto ifite icyicaro leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika anne marie niwemwiza

title: ibice bimwe by’u rwanda bizagusha imvura idasanzwe nzeri
content: ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubumenyi bw’ikirere meteo rwanda cyatangaje uku kwezi nzeri hazagwa imvura ihagije hose gihugu ikagera kigero hejuru y’isanzwe iboneka majyepfo uburengerazuba n’amajyaruguru imibare yashyizwe ahagaragara n’iki kigo igaragaza uku kwezi mujyi kigali hazagwa hagati mm - burasirazuba hagwe hagati mm - ariko ho ikazaba kigero cy’isanzwe kihaboneka mu ntara y’amajyepfo n’uburengerazuba hazagwa imvura hagati milimetero ikazaba imvura irenze isanzwe ihaboneka ndetse majyepfo hazaboneka hagati milimetero nayo izaba hejuru y’ihasanzwe mu kwezi gushize kanama gihugu hose haguye imvura irenze isanzwe igwa nk’uko bitangazwa meteo rwanda imvura idasanzwe yaguye gice kabiri kigana mpera z’uko kwezi imvura yaguye kanama yazamutse buryo budasanzwe kuko nko sitasiyo busogo honyine hari hitezwe imvura ihwanye milimetero hagwa ihwanye milimetero haguye imvura ikabije rwanda byumvikana hiyongereyeho imvura ihwanye milimetero ahantu hatunguranye kugusha imvura irenze isanzwe kwezi bugarama karere rusizi hari hitezwe imvura milimetero bikarangira haguye milimetero byumvikanisha habayeho ikinyuranyo milimetero bisobanuye ibipimo by’imvura byikubye kane isanzwe imvura kandi yikubye enye sitasiyo gitega mujyi kigali yavuye milimetero igera harimo ikinyuranyo milimetero mu gihe i musanze habonetse milimetero hari hateganijwe bivuze imvura yiyongereye cyane ho milimetero ikigereranyo cy’imvura yaguye n’isanzwe igwa kanama inkuru igihe

title: ingingo ivuga umunyamaguru atagira ikosa ikwiye kwiganwa ubushoshozi ibangamira abashoferi
content: umuyobozi polisi y’ u rwanda ntara y’ amajyepfo commissioner of police rutikanga rogers yavuze atekereza ingingo ivuga umunyamaguru atagira ikosa irimo kwigwaho kugira izakorwe buryo butabangamira abakoresha umuhanda umuyobozi polisi y’ u rwanda ntara y’ amajyepfo commissioner of police rutikanga rogers yavuze atekereza ingingo ivuga umunyamaguru atagira ikosa irimo kwigwaho kugira izakorwe buryo butabangamira abakoresha umuhanda yabitangarije musigiti mugandamure karere nyanza tariki mutarama polisi y’ u rwanda yaganirizaga abayoboke b’idini islam bukangurambaga kwirinda impanuka muhanda bwiswe gerayo amahoro niyonsaba idi umuyisiramu usengera musigiti mugandamure akaba n’umushoferi yavuze ingingo kuba umunyamaguru atagira ikosa ibangamira abashoferi ikoreshwa ry’umuhanda kuko habaye impanuka abashoferi bayihanirwa hatitawe mpanuka yatejwe n’umunyamaguru yagize mu by’ukuri ukoresha umuhanda wawe neza utwaye imodoka umuntu wasinze agaturuka ahantu utanazi utamubonye akinjira modokariukagerageza mukwepa ukamugonga wenda agusatiriye ugiye guhabwa ubutabera ntabwo uhabwa ubutabera nk’umuntu wakoreshejwe impanuka uhabwa ubutabera nk’umuntu wayiteje nkaba numva ng’ibyo ibintu byazigwaho neza umwe motari bakorera mujyi huye yatangarije ukwezi atumva ukuntu umunyamaguru atagira ikosa gihe hari abona bambuka umuhanda bashyize ecouteur matwi cyangwa bakagendera mahanda hagati kandi bafite inzira ruhande zabagenewe ati icyo twasaba abadepite bazongera bakicara bagasuzuma neza ngingo kuko abamotari n’abashoferi turaharenganira cp rutikanga yavuze ngingo yashyiriweho kurengera abanyantegenke muhanda gusa abantu kuyiganiraho kugira harebwe ibifutamye byakurwamo yagize nanjye ndi umushoferi ntarajya gipolisi natwaraga imodoka uvuga ndabizi pe ibibazo bizwi umwana afata ikamyo inyuma retorovizeri zitamubona yuriye inyuma buryo shoferi atamubona modoka yicetse cyangwa igafurena vuba mwana akagira icyaba tubibaza mushoferi cp rutikanga avuga tegeko ryari ryagiriyeho kurengera abanyantegenke muhanda ariko nzi ubivuze twese ninako tubiganira hirya hino ntekereza bimwe biri kuganirwaho kugira nibura bashishoze bakuremo ibidakwiye cp rutikanga agira abashoferi inama kujya baguma impanuka yabereye kugira basobanure mpanuka yabaye yatejwe n’ikosa ry’umunyamaguru cyangwa ikosa ry’umunyonzi ibi ariko ntibikuraho gufunga umushoferi wakoze impanuka akica umuntu kuko bikorwa rwego kumurindira umutekano kugira banyiri umuntu batihorera ngo abapolisi bageze ahabereye impanuka bakusanya amakuru bakanabaza ababonye yagenze bityo parike isanze umushoferi arengana ntabwo acibwa amande miliyoni acibwa uwakoze impanuka akica umuntu gusa abashoferi nabo basabwa kwitwarika igihe bageze muhanda ufite uwushamikiyeho kugira birinde gusekurana n’igare ryahuruduka muhanda-shami gahunda gerayo amahoro yatangiye ntagiriro z’umwaka ushize polisi y’ u rwanda ivuga gerayo amahoro yagabanyije impanuka kigero kiri hejuru ubu bukangurambaga bwatangira gutangirwa nsengero bwavugiwe gatolika adepr ear munsi bwatangiwe islam sheikh ntawukuryayo ismael umuyobozi w’abayisilamu ntara y’amajyepfo yavuze kuba butumwa bwatangiwe musigiti byiza kuko bayisilamu harimo ibyiciro byose bikoresha umuhanda abanyamaguru abanyonziabamotari n’abashoferi ati mu ngamba tuhakuye nk’uko twabyemereye umuyobozi polisi twari kumwe dufite imisigiti myinshi itandukanye munsi ntabwo babashije kugezwaho message hagiye hatoranywa imisigiti n’imwe tukaba twiyemeje misigiti tugomba kubagezaho message bakayisobanukirwa rusange urwego rushinzwe ubwikorezi rwanda rutangaza by’impanuka muhanda ziterwa n’uburangare bw’abashoferi bityo kuzirinda

title: hategekimana gangi agiye gutangirira ubutoza marines fc
content: umwaka utaha shampiyona hategekimana bonaventure bakunze kwita gangi azaba umutoza wungirije ikipe marines fc karere rubavu gangi wasoje umupira kubera ikibazo cy’uburwayi yahuye nacyo yemerewe n’ubuyobozi bw’ikipe y’ingabo zirwanira mazi marines fc umwaka w’imikino azatangirana nayo nk’umutoza wungirije yagize ’ umuyobozi marines yabimbwiriye muganga ntabwo mwaka ndumva mwaka utaha rwego kungiriza uzaha uhari mukuru ’ gangi hategekimana avuga mahugurwa y’ubutoza yigeze yitabira ariko ikipe marines fc yamwemereye izabimufashamo rwego kumufasha gutangira mwuga kandi yifuza kuzarenga abatoza batandukanye ati’’ bitewe n’ubushobozi mfite numva namera kuriya bafashe ikipe batarajya mahugurwa bameze abitwa mulisa abitwa mashami usanzwe ubona mupira w’amaguru rwanda njye numva narenzaho kubera ubushobozi mfite’’ hategekimana gangi wakanyujijeho nk’umukinnyi akaba ashaka kuba icyatwa butoza ruhagoyacucom yashatse kuvugana n’ubuyobozi bw’ikipe marines fc buhamye makuru yemezwa gangi ariko ntibyakunda hashize icyumweru gangi avuye bitaro akaba avuga ameze neza kibazo ibihe gangi nk’umukinnyi byamugendekeye neza anyura makipe menshi akomeye rwanda agiye gutangira akazi k’ubutoza nyuma kureka umupira musanze fc gangi azaba yiyongereye rutonde rw’abakanyujijeho nk’abakinnyi kwinjira mwuga w’ubutoza nshutiyamagara ismael ’ kodo’’ watangiye kungiriza as kigali ndikumana hamad katauti kungiriza musanze fc n’abandi srcruhago

title: itabi umuco wakendereye misango y’ubukwe rwanda
content: mu gihe ishami ry’umuryango w’abibumbye ryita buzima oms rivuga umubare w’abanywi b’itabi wagabanutseho miliyoni hagati y’umwaka abarinywa ndetse n’abaricuruza rwanda baravuga ritakiri muco nyarwanda hambere rwanda misango y’ubukwe wasangaga itabi rifite umwanya w’ingenzi gusa gihe abakunze kuyobora imisango y’ubukwe bemeza muco usa nk’aho wamaze kuyoyoka rwamuhizi fidele yagize aho mbyirukiye nabonaga abantu basangira itabi abakuru barinywa bakarisangira ndetse nuryimye bikamubabaza abakuru barisangira baganira rugendo cyangwa se bataramye basangira inzoga ariko habagaho n’igihe inkumi zigeze igihe kurambagizwa yabikaga itabi azaha umusore uzamurambagiza ndetse wajya gutaha akaguha impamba na ho kabagema aphrodice avuga ugukomera itabi muco nyarwanda byanatumye hari imigani n’imwe ihimbwa irishingiyeho gusa agashimangira muco waje guhinduka bitewe n’uko abantu bamenye ububi bwaryo yagize mu muco nyarwanda itabi cyari ikintu gikomeye kuko uwakwimaga itabi n’ikindi yashoboraga kuba yaguha nacyo cyatumaga kinyarwanda baca umugani icyo umutima ushaka amata aguranwa itabi uyu munsi byagiye bihinduka kubera imihindagurikire y’ibihe ntabwo mihango nyarwanda bagikoresha itabi kubera ingaruka zaryo bakagira uburyo babihinduranyamo n’ibindi bintu bitewe n’umuco w’abantu’’ mu bakinywa itabi harimo abageze zabukuru n’abakiri bato bavuga kurireka byabananiye n’ubwo basobanukiwe ububi bwaryo umwe barinywa yagize ariko ikintu numvise kirimo cy’ingorane itabi ucika intege kuko nk’ubu ahantu nashoboraga kuba nakwiruka nkagera sinkibasha kuba nahagera numva ncika intege ibihaha bidakora neza nk’ikintu gishoboka mbonye n’umuti watuma ndireka narireka rwose undi jye ndacyarinywa rwose eeeh n’ejobundi narivuye noneho mara iminsi ntarinywa inzoka ziranyica nenda gupfa nshaka kuruka kandi kunda kuruka ndongera ndisubiraho ariko mbonye umuti warimvura naba ngize amahirwe’’ bamwe bacuruzi b’itabi bavuga bafite ibimenyetso bigaragaza umubare w’abanywi baryo ugenda ugabanuka rwanda umuganga w’indwara z’umutima dr vincent nsengimana yemeza itabi rigira ingaruka nyinshi buzima bw’abarinywa ndetse n’abatarinywa ati niba ubwonko butabonye amaraso ujya wumva habaye stroke umutima imitsi yawo yazibye bakubwira habaye indwara z’umutima bitewe n’uko igice cy’umutima cyabuze amaraso amaraso atagera maguru neza birenge bitewe n’imitsi yazibye ugasanga kubera nicotine ugasanga bamuciye amaguru kubera myanda itabi’’ mu rwanda ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n’ikigo cy’igihugu cy’ubuzima bwagaragaje abagabo banywa itabi ho by’abagore bakaba barinywa ku isi abanywa title: dream boyz umuziki niwo ubabeshejeho
content: iri tsinda rivuga umutungo bafite bawuvanye bitaramo n’ibihembo babonye indirimbo yitabirwaho n’abantu benshi best caller tune kuba baririmbyi bahataniraga gutwara igikombe cy’amarushanwa yiswe primus guma guma superstar yateguwe sosiyeti yitwa bralirwa ikora ibinyobwa iri tsinda ryatangiye muzika mwaka rigizwe n’abasore babiri jean claude mujyanama uzwi izina ry’ubuhanzi tmc platini nemeye uzwi izina ry’ubuhanzi platini dream boyz bavuga ubushobozi buturuka ntambwe nziza bagenda batera kazi kabo muzika urugero batanga nko kuba bamaze kugira indirimbo nyinshi kandi ziza mbere zikunzwe gihugu ibi bituma bagira abakunzi benshi bagatumirwa bitaramo bibinjiriza amafaranga platini aganira kigalitodaycom yemeje bagenda batera intambwe umunsi munsi nko kumenya gukoresha ijwi neza kandi bagenda bagira ubumenyi bundi bitewe guhura n’abandi baririmbyi kenshi yagize twateye imbere kuko amafaranga dukoresha buzima nko kurya kwambara gufasha inshuti ndetse n’ibindi tuyakura muziki dream boyz ibona hari intambwe ishimishije igenda iterwa muzika ariko rusange gutera imbere buryo bw’amafaranga muzika nyarwanda bitaragerwaho platini umwe bagize tsinda abihera kuba bindi bihugu bigize umuryango w’afurika y’uburasirazuba abanyamuziki babarirwa bantu bakize bitandukanye rwanda dream boyz itinda ryamenyekanye cyane ndirimbo magorwa mwaka baza gusohora n’izindi ndirimbo mpamiriza ukuri si inzika bella isano n’izindi iri tsinda rikaba riri gutegura gushyira ahagaragara album kabiri yitwa dufitanye isano itariki ugushyingo nyuma y’album mbere si inzika yashyizwe ahagaragara tariki gashyantare jean baptiste micomyiza

title: mafisango arashaka gukinira rayon sport bokota yanayikozemo imyitozo
content: mafiango wanakinnye rwanda apr fc atracofc mbere kwerekeza tanzania ikipe azam fc yavuye akerekeza simba arimo gukinira avuga azarangiza amasezerano n’iyi kipe kwezi cumi n’abiri kandi ibiganiro bye rayon sport bigenze neza yiteguye kuza kuyikinira kwezi mbere mafisango naramuka aje rayon sport ashobora kuzahasanga bokota lama kuko nk’uko twari twabatangarije agomba kugera rwanda minsi mike yamaze kugera i kigali akaba yanakoze imyitozo rayon sport kabiri rayon sport izanye bokota asimbure faustin usengimana ugomba kwerekeza ikipe y’abatarengeje imyaka izakina shampiyona cyiciro mbere nyuma guhabwa uburenganzira n’ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru rwanda ferwafa gushaka uzamusimbura gusa n’ubwo yatangiye imyitozo ntaremererwa ferwafa gukinira rayon sport kuko itarabona igisubizo kibemerera gusinyisha musore wakinaga darling club motema pembe dcmp congo ariko shampiyona yaho ikaba izasozwa cyumweru jean marie ntagwabira umutoza rayon sport avuga abonye bokota mafisango byafasha ikipe kuko azi ubuhanga bwabo ntagwabira afite icyizere mafisango azaza rayon kuko wanafashe iya mbere asaba yaza gukinira kipe nyuma gutsindwa la jeunesse ibitego rayon sport yatangiye gutegura umukino uzayihuza mukeba wayo apr fc ntagwabira akaba avuga n’ikipe bicaye bakareba amakosa yakozwe n’uko bagomba kuyakosora kugira bazatsinda umukino cyumweruimikono yarangiye yararangiye abakinnyi gutsindwa twamaze kubibavanamo ubu byaba ubuyobozi abakinnyi n’abatoza dushyize imbere umukino apr ku munsi kane shampiyona apr irarusha amanota atatu rayon sport ikaba mwanya mbere n’amanota gihe rayon sport mwanya gatatu n’amanota thoneste nisingizwe

title: arusha callixte nzabonimana arasabirwa igihano gufungwa burundu
content: umushinjacyaha w’uru rukiko paul ngarua yasabiye nzabonimana igihano gufungwa burundu buri cyaha jenoside aregwa byaha byose akurikiranyweho n’uru rukiko nzabonimana wize ibijyanye n’ubutaka kaminuza bufaransa ashinjwa kuba bateguye bagaashyira bikorwa akanategeka ubwicanyi bw’abatutsi ndetse kwica abataravugaga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bwariho ashinjwa kandi kuba yarakanguriye agashishikariza abaturage perefegitura zitandukanye gutsemba abatusi kuba yaratanze intwaro nzabonimana wafatiwe gihugu tanzania kwezi kabiri ahakana ibyaha byose aregwa yabwiye urukiko yarahungiye ambasade y’u bufaransa jenoside yatangiraga ariko umushinjacyaha yahakanye ukwiregura kwe avuga abantu barahungiye ambasade bafite uburenganzira gusohoka igihe cyose babyifurije gutanga ibindi bimenyetso biteganyijwe kurangira gatanu abacamanza bakazahita bajya mwiherero gusuzuma ibyatangajwe mpande zombi uru rubanza rwatangiye kwezi cyenda mu kwezi gushize uru rukiko rwari rwakatiye igihano cy’imyaka abandi bahoze minisitiri babiri kubera uruhare bagize jenoside ariko rufungura n’abandi babiri nyuma kubura ibimenyetso bibahama urukiko ictr rwashizweho nyuma jenoside rwanda rwego gukurikirana abantu b’ingenzi bagize uruhare jenoside yakorewe abatusi abantu barenga miliyoni bayiguyemo gihe cy’iminsi emmanuel hitimana

title: indirimbo queen cha yashyize hanze irigushimangira uburyohe bw’urukundo arimo
content: queen cha bivugwa amaze iminsi afite umusore bakundana nubwo amakuru y’urukundo rwabo atajya yifuza kuyashyira hanze iyo uganiriye n’uyu mukobwa akubwira yahuzwe ibijyanye kuvuga umukunzi itangazamakuru nubwo atanemera hari afite minsi gusa umwe nshuti ze yavuze queen cha hari umusore gukundana gusa birinda amakuru yajya hanze inkuru ziri zica ibintu iy’umusore wahoze ukundana queen cha dj coxxx bivugwa agiye kurushinga gusa muhanzikazi amakuru ahari ahamya muhanzikazi yaba asigaye afite umusore bakundana iyi ndirimbo nshya queen cha yashyize hanze biravugwa ishimangira uburyohe bw’urukundo arimo n’umusore bamaranye iminsi ariko bakaba barahisemo kugira ibanga amakuru ajyanye n’urukundo rwabo queen cha avuga ndirimbo yatangaje indirimbo isanzwe y’urukundo buri wese yatura bakundana gusa kijyanye n’uko yaba indirimbo ivuga urukundo arimo minsi muhanzikazi atangaza amakuru y’urukundo rwe yumva atiteguye kuyavugaho gihe akaba yabwiye inyarwandacom igihe nikigera azabivugaho akanatangaza umusore bazaba bakundana yi ndirimbo nshya queen cha yitwa ishusho y’urukundo’ indirimbo igenda gahoro irimo ubutumwa bwiganjemo ubw’umuntu ubwira bakundana umva hano iyi ndirimbo nshya ya queen cha ’ishusho y’urukundo’

title: guverineri gatete arasaba ubufatanye gufasha abatishoboye
content: gatete yagize byiza ibikorwa gufasha abatishoboye byahurirwaho n’abatu benshi bityo gahunda y’icyerekezo ikazacyura ikivi abantu baramaze gutera imbere gatete arasaba abagenerwabikorwa abatishoboye ndetse n’ubuyobozi bw’akarere bukwiye kugira uruhare bikorwa kubateza imbere yabisobanuye magambo habaye bnr gusa ifasha miryango bantu bazagera bataragira bagera bnr yatangiye gufasha abatuye mudugudu mwaka babavugururira amazu icyo gikorwa cyatwaye amafaranga agera miliyoni esheshatu bnr kandi yabafasha kujyana abana mashuri y’imyuga none munsi hatashye umushinga w’ubworozi bw’inkoko bnr yatanzeho amafaranga asaga miliyoni bnr kandi yiyemeje kuzitaho gihe cy’amezi atandatu mbere y’uko zitangira gutanga umusaruro murekatete jacqueline umwana w’impfubyi wirera utuye mudugudu w’icyizere yavuze bnr ibakorera byose bibashimisha bakaba bayizeza nabo bazakora bashoboye umushinga babahaye bakazawutunganya neza bakoresheje amahugurwa bahabwa bijyanye n’ubworozi bw’inkoko murekatete asaba bnr n’abandi baterankunga gufasha abana barangije kwiga kubona akazi gufasha imiryango ituye mudugudu kubona umuriro w’amashanyarazi bnr ifasha imiryango igizwe n’impfubyi n’abapfakazi batuye mudugudu w’icyizere mu minsi imbere bnr irateganya bufatanye n’akarere bazafasha miryango mushinga w’ububoshyi kugira imyaka icyenda isigaye icyerekezo gicyure ikivi izasange abatuye umudugudu w’icyizere barateye imbere marie josee uwiringira

title: ntitwabona ishimwe duha abaturokoye jenoside- abarokokeye i mwurire
content: ibi byagarutsweho benshi barokotse jenoside bitabiriye imihango kwibuka jenoside nshuro rwibutso mwurire karere rwamagana munsi tariki munyaneza jean baptiste ukuriye ihuriro ry’abarokotse jenoside yagize amahano jenoside yabaye ndengakamere atwara abacu benshi abarokotse shimo twabonera abaduhishe n’ingabo zari iza fpr zahagaritse bwicanyi tukabona agahenge ubu duhagaze gitwari twibeshaho ndetse turangamiye imbere heza terambere rutareka vianney wavuze izina benshi barokokeye i mwurire yibukije bahabanye gitwari bihe bibi bafashanya kandi banasangira duke bafite yanabwiye abataratahaye abatutsi bahahungiye bafatanye urunana kwirwanaho nubwo ababahigaga bitwaje intwaro nyinshi zirimo n’imbunda bahabwaga n’abari abayobozi babi gihe imfubyi zifite ababyeyi n’abavandimwe biciwe i mwurire zaserutse zishimira ababyeyi n’abavandimwe batabarutse gitwari bazize ubusa zashimye abakomeje kuzifasha nyuma jenoside benshi bakaba babaye abasore n’inkumi abandi abagabo n’abagore bizihiye u rwanda bose bashimiye cyane ingabo zari iza fpr inkotanyi zahagaritse ubwicanyi banashimira cyane bamwe batarahigwaga bahishe cyangwa bakaburira abahigwaga igihe abicanyi babaga badashaka hagira n’umwe urokoka mu mihango kwibuka yabereye i mwurire hanashyinguwe imibiri y’abantu bashyinguwe hirya hino rwamagana ahishakiye jean d’amour

title: gael face agiye kuza kwerekana filime ’petit pays’ i kigali
content: gal faye umuraperi w’umunyarwanda ufite ubwenegihugu bw’u bufaransa yatanze integuza agiye kuza i kigali rwanda agiye kumurikira abanyarwanda firime petit pays’ ishatse kuvuga agahugu gato ishingiye gitabo yanditse mbere kuza i kigali firime yerekaniwe mujyi lille gashyantare ejo hashize yerekaniwe i toulouse munsi irerekanirwa i arles ejo izerekanirwa avignon werurwe i nice i toulon werurwe yerekanwe i aix-en province uyu muhanzi ufite indirimbo irruption imaze kurebwa n’abantu barenga miriyoni rubuga youtube yavuze firime izajya isoko werurwe muhango uzabera bufaransa anatangaza mbere y’uko munsi ugera azaba i kigali werurwe azerekana firime yise petit pays muhango uzabera century cinemayavuze nyuma i kigali firime izerekanirwa i reims ahitwa opraims werurwe yerekanirwe mujyi paris ati nzabamenyesha vuba bizabera n’amasaha indirimbo yise petit pays yasohoye werurwe shene youtube imaze kurebwa n’abantu barenga miriyoni enye imaze gutangwaho ibitekerezo abakanze akamenyetso kuyikunda n’ibihumbi uyu muraperi aheruka i kigali gashyantare yamurikaga igitabo ke yise petit pays cyahinduwe kinyarwanda olivier bahizi uwineza firime petit pays irimo nkuru y’ubuzima bw’umwana wavukiye i burundi abyarwa n’umunyarwandakazi w’impunzi n’umuzungu w’umufaransa muri gitabo mwana avuga yabonaga ubuzima gihe ibibazo by’amoko uwo mwana uba ufite hagati y’imyaka yibuka uburyo ubuto bwe bwaje kwicwa n’ibibazo poritike aka karere anavuga kibazo kuvuka babyeyi badahuje uruhu nyuma yaje guhungishirizwa i burayi nabwo yaje kubona kuba imvange bigoye kuko haba i burundi burayi hose abantu bamufataga nk’umunyamahanga amaze gukura yiyemeje kugaruka afurika kuko ariho nibura yumvaga iwabo mu byatumye yumva yigaruriye ikizere ugukunda gusoma kwandika iki gitabo kivuga mateka yaranze u burundi n’u rwanda myaka kugera nyuma yaho guhera tariki mutarama firime ifite iminota yatangiye gukinirwa karere rubavu iyobowe n’umufaransa eric barbier iyi firime yakinwemo n’abana bavutse babyeyi b’abirabura n’abazungu nk’uko bimeze gal faye izagaragaramo kandi nsanzamahoro denis wamenyekanye rwasa sinema nyarwanda akaba yaritabye imana nzeri igitabo petit pays cyaciye uduhigo dutandukanye nko inzu isohora ibitabo yitwa fnac yahembye gal faye nk’umwanditsi mwiza w’umwaka kiciro cy’abanditse ibitabo bwoko roman petit pays’ cyanatoranyijwe bitabo byitabiriye irushanwa mwaka igihembo cyatanzwe hagendewe matora y’abasomyi barenga batoranyije petit pays’ nk’igitabo gikubiyemo inkuru iryoshye kandi y’umwimerere kurusha ibindi gel faye yanegukanye igihembo prix goncourt des lycens abikesha igitabo ke petit pays’ chief editor muhaburarw

title: nyamasheke uruganda rw’icyayi gatare rushobora kutazuzurira igihe
content: ibi byatangarijwe minisitiri w’intebe tariki yasuraga mushinga mudugudu rubyiruko akagari rushyarara murenge karambi karere nyamasheke minisitiri w’intebe yasabye ikigo gishinzwe gukwirakwiza amazi n’amashanyarazi ewsa kwihutisha imirimo y’ingufu z’amashanyarazi bikazarangirana n’ukwezi yasabye hakorwa inyigo y’umuhanda hanika-karambi nawo ujya uru ruganda ruri kubakwa gihe kitarenze icyumweru ikoherezwa minisiteri y’ibikorwa remezo kugira harebwe muhanda wakorwa bitarenze k’uyu mwaka emmanuel nshimiyimana

title: burera bacuruza kanyanga kuko idasaba amafaranga menshi
content: inzego zishinzwe umutekano munsi ushira zidafashe abantu bikoreye kanyanga bayikuye uganda bayizana rwanda abari kuyinywa cyangwa se abayicuruza bakabahana kanyanga babafatanye bakayimena ariko ntibabireka nkurunziza jean baptiste avuga impamvu abantu bamwe bajya bucuruzi kanyanga ugushaka imibereho agira ino niyo itunze abantu bayikuramo amafaranga menshi nyamara bashoye makeya nshimiyimana protais avuga kuba rumwe rubyiruko rujya gucuruza kanyanga kandi ikiyobyabwenge mafaranga y’igishoro ahagije bafite gucuruza ibindi agira niyo waba ufite ibihumbi bibiri ujya bugande ukarangura ukaza ugacuruza yongera ho usibye kuba urubyiruko rucuruza kanyanga runakora akazi kujya kuyikura uganda rukorera abandi aho umuntu afite uwamutumye yagaruka akamuha amafaranga bumvikanye avuga urubyiruko rubonye abarutera inkunga rutasubira gucuruza kanyanga iradukunda viateur avuga abajya bucuruzi kanyanga mafaranga menshi bafite gucuruza ibindi ngo ukubura bagira tariki rvlien avuga hari abayicuruza kuko bafite abayinywa batari bake ako gace agira barayicuruza kuko abantu bayinywa bavuga bayinyweye inzoka zicurama inzoka nda akomeza avuga gace atuyemo kuyicuruza ndetse kuyinywa byabaye nk’umuco hari twaganiriye ariko utarashatse izina rye ritangazwa adutangariza gihe kanyanga abayinywa badahita babona ingaruka mbi zayo ako kanya batazareka kuyinywa agira iyaba umuntu wanywaga kanyanga yahitaga abona ingaruka mbi zayo ako kanya abantu bareka kuyinywa n’abayicuruza bakabireka hagati ubuyobozi burakora ibishoboka ibiyobyabwenge birimo kanyanga bicike kimwe bikorwa bishya abayobozi karere burera bakoze ugushyiraho ikigega cy’amafaranga ahabwa abantu bareka gucuruza kanyanga akabafasha gukora indi mishinga norbert niyizurugero

title: ikiganiro n’abana muhanda cyamuhaye inganzo- ben nganji
content: bisangwa nganji benjamin wamenyekanye ben nganji yasohoye indirimbo nshya yise struggle’ avugamo ubuzima bw’abana muhanda babayemo bushobora kubashora bishuko byatuma ubuzima bwabo burangirira agira asaba leta igitekerezo cy’iyi ndirimbo cyashibutse kiganiro yagiranye bariya bana iyi ndirimbo njyana reggae ben nganji atangamo urugero rugaragaza ibyihebe byashimuse bana bikabigisha kwiba kwica gusahura ariko umwe akabyanga nubwo mahitamo afite akababwira adashobora kubikora mu kiganiro kihariye yagiranye n’umuseke yavuze igitekerezo gukora ndirimbo cyavuye kiganiro n’abana muhanda bamubwira ubuzima babayemo bituma yumva yabikoraho indirimbo ati bambwiye amayeri bakoresha babone amaramuko bamwe bambwiye bashobora guhemuka ariko ntibicwe n’inzara bariho buzima batahisemo mbona nubwo tubanyuraho ntitubyiteho ariko ikibazo kitureba twese avuga nyuma kuganira bariya bana yahise yumva yagaragaza buzima abicishije ndirimbo ati nashatse kugaragaza kugera kure kubi cyangwa kubaho ubuzima bubi bitavuga kwishora byaha muri ndirimbo nagaragaje umwana washorwaga bugizi nabi akabyanga iyi nirimbo ndimi ebyiri ikinyarwanda n’icyongerezo ben nganji avuga yabikoze kuko nabonaga ubutumwa butagenewe abanyarwanda gusa kuko kibazo cy’abana b’inzererezi isi by’umwihariko mugabane mvukamo ben nganji asaba leta y’u rwanda gukumira ikibazo cy’abana muhanda ibinyujije gukemura ibibazo bituma bajyayo ati ni ugukomeza gushyira imbaraga duhereye myumvire y’igituma abana bayoboka imihanda hari ibitera abana kujya muhanda hari amakimbirane miryango kubyara imburagihe ubukene kubyara badashoboye kurera twe dutanga ubutumwa dukoresheje ibihangano ariko ntitwizera bugera bose nk’uko bikwiye ibihango nk’ibi bifasha guhindura imyumvire y’abaturage leta yagakwiye kubishoramo amafaranga ariko natwe turacyagerageza dushoboye dutange umusanzu gufasha abaturage bacu ben nganji yamenyekanye ndirimbo nyinshi zitandukanye harimo mbonye umusaza nsazanye inzara rehema habe n’akabizu n’izindi jean paul mugabeumusekerw

title: mgr rukamba yavuze biganiro bishobora kugeza kwemerera abafite abagore kuba abapadiri
content: mu byumweru bitatu biri imbere uhereye ukwakira abasenyeri bagera amerika y’epfo bazigira hamwe ibibazo bijyanye n’ihindagurika ry’ikirere abimukira n’ivugabutumwa inyandiko igaragaza ibizaganirwaho izwi instrumentum laboris iriho n’igitekerezo gikomeje kugibwaho impaka hibazwa amazonie bishobora kwemerwa abagabo bakuze kandi bafite abagore bakwemererwa guhabwa isakaramentu ry’ubusaserdoti ni igice cyugarijwe n’ubuke bw’abapadiri kugeza abaturage badahabwa misa bikwiye umushumba diyosezi gatolika butare akaba perezida w’inama y’abepiskopi rwanda mgr philippe rukamba yavuze nubwo ibiganiro bigikomeza uburyo bushoboka ahamaze kugaragara ikibazo cy’ubuke bw’abapadiri ati ni ibintu abantu batekerezaho cyane gihe kubera u burayi amerika y’epfo batangiye kugira ikibazo gikomeye cy’abapadiri bato ubundi kuba umupadiri ubutumwa umuntu agira akoherezwa kwigisha ijambo ry’imana gutagatifuza abantu kuyobora kiliziya buriya hari n’aho abapadiri bahari barashatse cyane nko mico aziya hari abapadiri bafite abagore gusa babyemera kare bagashyingirwa ni ibintu bivugwa cyane kubera kibazo abantu bamwe bakavuga bati ariko turabura abapadiri kandi hari abantu wenda bashaka kuba abapadiri abantu bakuru’ noneho ntabwo biremezwa ibintu abantu batekerezaho kuko kudashaka umuntu ashobora kuba padiri yaranashatse nk’uko mico n’imwe liban n’ahandi bagatolika ihari ariko kintu cyari cyagerwaho ibitekerezo gusa musenyeri rukamba yavuze hari kenshi biba nk’abapasiteri b’abaporoso bahinduka abagatolika hari bihugu bimwe bemererwa kugumana abagore kandi bakaba abapadiri byemewe cyangwa bagashakirwa izindi nshingano kiliziya gusa gice kiliziya gatolika u rwanda ruherereyemo umuco uhari uw’uko abapadiri badashaka abagore mgr rukamba yakomeje nko minsi ishize habaye ikibazo gikomeye bangilikani kiliziya ibemerera kuza bafite n’abakirisitu bazanye barakomeza bababera abashumba barashatse gusa ingingo kwemerera abantu bafite abagore kuba abapadiri ntaho iragera yemezwa yumvikana nk’ishishikaje abantu cyane ariko n’iyo abasenyeri amazonie babyemeza bizasaba papa abiha umugisha abanje gutumiza sinode yagutse igizwe n’abasenyeri bahagarariye abandi bihugu byose isi mgr rukamba bishobora kuba bibera gice kimwe runaka ariko isi igomba kubimenya bigomba kwemezwa papa murimo guhuza abantu gutuma habaho ubumwe hagati y’abakristu kandi bigenze bityo urabona bavuye buryo bumwe kubaho bajya bundi ikintu cyasaba abantu bicara bakaganira umuhanga bijanye n’amadini prof linda woodhead mbe yabwiye bbc nubwo ngingo hari abatayivugaho rumwe bidakwiye bibagirwa kiliziya bakwemererwa guhabwa ubusaserdoti amazonie tundi duce dukennye abapadiri bishobora kuba gutyo gusa hari n’ubwo ahandi babona ibisubizo byihariye kibazo cy’ubuke bw’abapadiri gusa hari n’impungenge abubatse bemerewe isakaramentu ry’ubusaseredoti bishobora gutuma n’ahatari ikibazo cy’abapadiri babyifuza cyane ingingo kwemerera abapadiri gushaka abagore yakomeje gutindwaho cyane

title: umuhanzi fulgence nzira kugaruka ruhando rw’umuziki
content: mu kiganiro cyihariye twagiranye yadutangarije amafaranga amaze iminsi akorera kongo-kinshasa azamufasha gusohora indirimbo sitidiyo mu ikubitiro arashaka gukorana lick lick cyangwa masota indirimbo nyampinga ntibishoboka minsi vuba akomeza avuga azanye umuziki w’umwimerere njyana afrobeat idasondetse uzamuhesha itike guhiga abahanzi bakunzwe minsi kamichi kitoko king james knowless yadutangarije n’ubwo atagaragaraga ruhando rw’umuziki amaze iminsi akora indirimbo z’ibigo n’amasosiyete zamuhaga amafaranga atari make ku mpamvu zatumye ava ruhando rw’umuziki gihe gisaga imyaka ibiri avuga mwaka mafaranga muziki none abona abanyarwanda batangiye gukunda umuziki yagize icyanshimisha ugushimisha abakunzi banjye nanjye nkagira mbona birababaje kujya scene ukaririmba ugashishimisha abantu ejo ukaba usaba ababyeyi tike fulgence afite indoto gukora umuziki akamenyekana rwego mpuzamahanga kandi ukamuteza imbere fulgence amaze ibyumweru bitatu gihugu kongo-kinshasa yakoraga ikiraka kuririmba komisiyo y’amatora ifatanyije n’ishami loni rikorerayo nk’uko abivuga kiraka cyari icya meddy wamenyekanye cyane i goma kubera indirimbo amayobera ariko bw’amahirwe meddy yarabuze fulgence akibonye gutyo nshimiyimana leonard

title: rdb yahaye nyabihu tourism ibikoresho bikoreshwa bukerarugendo
content: iyi koperative kandi yahawe ibitabo bikubiyemo amoko y’inyoni kugira izajye imenya amoko y’inyoni ziri gace ikoreramo ndetse n’izimutse zikaza nshya kugira babone bazajya bayobora abakerarugendo babasuye majyambere florent uhagarariye nyabihu tourism yavuze ibikoresho bahawe bizabafasha kumenya inyoni zikunze kuza gace barimo bitewe n’igihe runaka yongeyeho ashimira cyane rdb yabatekereje bufatanye n’akarere nyabihu bakaba barabageneye ibikoresho bizabafasha kazi majyambere yemeza ubukerarugendo bufite akamaro koperative kuko abaza gusura inyamaswa bishyura amafaranga afasha abaturage bahaturiye cyane cyane ababa koperative gukemura ibibazo nko gutanga ubwisungane kwivuza kubona isabune gukaraba n’ibindi majyambere ahamagarira abaturiye ibiyaga amashyamba ibishanga kurushaho kubirinda kurwanya cyose cyahungabanya ibinyabuzima byaba ibiba mazi cyangwa mashyamba kuko umutungo mwiza w’igihugu uzana amadevize bityo hakabaho iterambere nyabihu tourism cooperative yavutse nyuma kubona ubuhinzi atari mwuga wonyine wazamura umuntu ahubwo n’ubukerarugendo umwuga mwiza wazamura nyirawo igihe awukoze neza ku bufatanye rdb baturage basanze nyabihu hari uduce twinshi nyaburanga ndetse banabona hari amoko menshi meza y’inyoni n’ibiyaga karago cyunyu n’ikiyaga nyirakigugu ndetse n’igishanga kitwa hinga bikwiye kurushaho kwitabwaho bikabyazwa umusaruro bimwe bikorwa bakora harimo kwerekana inyoni nziza cyane ziba rwanda by’umwihariko karere nyabihu ndetse banagamije kwigisha abaza babagana kuroba kuko benshi batabizi iyi koperative ifite abayobora abakerarugendoguides bagera n’abanyamuryango bagera safari viateur

title: u rwanda mwanya mbere afurika guteza imbere uburinganire
content: raporo mpuzamahanga buringanire ’the global gender gap index’ yashyize u rwanda mwanya mbere afurika n’uwa isi guteza imbere uburinganire rufite amanota bamwe bagore baravuga amahirwe adasanzwe igihugu cyabahaye ndetse bageze kure bayabyaza umusaruro nyirasagamba arapakurura imodoka yuzuye imyumbati afatanyije n’abakozi modoka iturutse manga y’umusozi uherereye karere kamonyi niy’umuturage w’aka karere abatuye y’uruganda rw’uyu mushoramari wakuranye inzozi kuzaba umuganga akaba asya ifu y’imyumbati bashima igitekerezo gushirika ubwoba yagize kuko byababereye isooko y’amafaranga abatunga buri munsi uyu mushoramari avuga amahirwe u rwanda rwahaye umugore akwiye kuba isoko y’ubukire n’iterambere rirambye gihugu nyirasagamba watangije uru ruganda myaka n’igice ishize avuga amaze kugera byinshi birimo gipangu yaguze miliyoni z’amafaranga y’u rwanda gusa asanga asanga n’ubwo igihugu kimaze gukora byinshi gutinyura umwana w’umukobwa umuryango ukeneye kurushaho kuzamura imyumvire bushobozi bw’umwana w’umukobwa mu gihe habura iminsi mike u rwanda rwifatanye n’amahanga kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga wahariwe umugore minisitiri w’uburinganire n’iterambere ry’umuryango dr bayisenge jeannette avuga bishimira intambwe imaze guterwa gusa hari bagiye kurushaho gushyira imbaraga raporo mpuzamahanga buringanire ’the global gender gap index’ yashyize u rwanda mwanya mbere afurika n’uwa isi guteza imbere uburinganire rufite amanota iceland iza mwanya mbere isi n’amanota chief editor muhaburarw

content: perezida paul kagame yavuze leta y’u rwanda izashakira igihugu umutekano neza ngufu abayirwanya hose u rwanda ruzabageraho ndetse gukina n’umuriro perezida kagame gihe yavuze umutekano w’u title: agatabo gafasha umuturage gusobanukirwa n’ingengo y’imari kashyizwe ahagaragara
content: christophe nsengiyaremye umukozi minisiteri y’imari n’igenamigambi avuga aka gatabo kateguwe kugirango kabe igikoresho gifasha abaturage gusobanukirwa n’uburyo ingengo y’imari y’igihugu itegurwa inakoreshwa kandi ikanagenzurwa nsengiyaremye asobanura aka gatabo kagamije gutanga amakuru yumvikana kandi anyuze mucyo yerekana ingengo y’imari igenewe ubuyobozi bukuru leta n’inzego z’ibanze zegerejwe abaturage umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’ impuzamiryango iharanira uburenganzira muntu cladho safari emmanuel avuga abaturage bafite uburenganzira kumenya amafaranga y’ingengo y’imari ava ibikorwa amafaranga azakoreshwa n’imicungire yayo ubushakashatsi bwakoze bwagaragaje bamwe baturage batarasobanukirwa n’imikorere y’ingengo y’imari usanga bamwe bavugako uretse kumva minisitiri w’imari n’igenamigambi abivuga radio ahandi babizi ingengo y’imari y’igihugu y’umwaka yiyongereyeho uyigereranyije n’uyu mwaka ikaba igeze giteranyo rusange miliyari by’amafaranga y’u rwanda kugeza hamaze gusohorwa udutabo tugera bihumbi tuzajya duhabwa abaturage midugudu nyuma y’igikorwa cy’umuganda eric muvara

title: u bubiligi bwataye yombi umunyarwanda upfobya jenoside
content: rutayisire yashinjwe kuhungabanya ituze rubanda munsi abantu barenga barimo kwibuka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi muhango wateguwe ambasade y’u rwanda bubiligi kugeza ntibiramenyekana rutayisire yaragejejwe imbere y’ubutabera akiri buroko cyangwa yarafunguwe uwo munyapolitiki yabyutse ajya sitade woluwe -saint-pierre brixelles yateguye imihango kwibuka abantu baguye ntambara yabaye rwanda abarokotse jenoside bashinja rutayisire kuba imbere y’abahakana jenoside yakorewe abatutsi rwanda rutayisire afite ishyaka ryitwa banyarwanda tubeho twese riharanira kumvikanisha ibyabaye rwanda atari jenoside ahubwo ugusubiranamo kw’abaturage civil war

title: shakira agiye kubyarana umwana gerard piqu
content: yagize nk’uko bamwe mubizi grard njye dushimishijwe n’uko tugiye kwibaruka umwana wacu mbere uwo muhanzi gerard bashyize ahagaragara iby’urukundo rwabo rwahwihwiswaga n’ibitangazamakuru binyuranye shakira uvuka gihugu colombiya yatangaje bagiye gufata umwanya kwiyitaho ibijyanye n’ibikorwa kwamamaza bakaba babihagaritse ariko bikazasubukurwa minsi imbere nyuma kubyara shakira w’imyaka yibera gihugu espagne mujyi catalogne yibanira n’umukunzi gerard piqu ukinira ikipe barca nk’uko ikinyamakuru lepoint dukesha nkuru kibitangaza mu minsi ishize se umubyara yahakanye amakuru yacicikanaga binyamakuru mpuzamahanga bitandukanye umukobwa atwite william mebarak yabivuze atya numvishe ibitangazamakuru bitangaza umukobwa wanjye atwite ayo makuru si mba aya makuru amenyekanye gihe uwahoze umugabo antonio de la rua yareze shakira babanye imyaka nk’umugabo n’umugore asaba indishyi n’impozamarira kubera gutandukana atabishakaga nshimiyimana leonard

title: murangwa ndangiza hadidja niwe musenateri watorewe gusimbura uwamurera salama
content: ihuriro ry’ imitwe politiki yemewe rwanda kane tariki ukwakira ryatoreye murangwa ndangiza hadidja kuba umusenateri ihuriro ry’ imitwe politiki yemewe rwanda kane tariki ukwakira ryatoreye murangwa ndangiza hadidja kuba umusenateri ni nyuma y’ urukiko rw’ ikirenga rwanze uwamurera salama watoranywe nkusi juvenal murangwa ndangiza hadidja inzobere bijjyanye n’ imisoro n’ amategeko akaba afite uburambe kazi k’ ubujyanama byerekeye imisoro murangwa ndangiza hadidja yakoze bigo leta bitandukanye birimo banki nkuru y’ igihugu bnr mu bwishingizi gisirikare mmi kigo cy’ igihugu kita buzima rbc afite imyaka y’amavuko umunyamategeko afite impamyabushobozi y’icyiciro gatatu kaminuza akaba asanzwe nama y’ubuyobozi banki nkuru y’u rwanda salama uwamurera wangiwe n’ urukiko rw’ ikirenga akora karere rusizi ashinzwe kwandika inyemezabwishyu umuvugizi w’ ihuriro ry’ imitwe politiki yemewe rwanda hon christine mukabunani yavuze urukiko rw’ ikirenga rwababwiye impamvu rwanze uwamurera salama umusenateri adafite ubunararibonye buhagije iri huriro ryitoramo abantu babiri rishaka bazaba abasenateri ariko urukiko rw’ ikirenga nirwo rufite inshingano kwemeza abatowe n’ ihuriro rw’ imitwe politiki

title: huye polisi yafashe abacuruzi b’ibiyobyabwenge
content: muri gikorwa gufata bacuruzi b’ibiyobyabwenge ubuyobozi bw’akagari cyimana gaherereye nkengero z’umujyi butare butangaza bamaze igihe bahanganye n’aba bacuruzi b’ibiyobyabwenge umunyamabanga nsingwabikorwa w’aka hagari vestine nyirahabimana avuga akagari ke gakabije kugira ibyaha bikomoka bucuruzi bw’ibiyobyabwenge kuko abenshi basa n’ababikora mugaragaro ntacyo bikanga nyirahabimana avuga gihe cyose yagerageje gufata abakora biyobyabwenge bamuteye ubwoba nafashe inzoga z’inkorano z’uwitwa kazungu nzigejeje cyicaro cy’akagari ahita azifata ngufu agerekaho kuntera ubwoba ambwira amagambo mumureke mukorere ibya mfura mbi mpite mpunga igihugu itegeko rivuga uwafashwe acuruza inzoga z’inkorano acibwa amande y’amafaranga ibihumbi nyamara nyirahabimana avuga gihe kagari ke bafashwe batajya batanga mande kuko babeshya ntayo bafite bagahita bafungurwa bitarenze iminsi itatu nyuma gufungurwa bagaruka bishyizemo abantu bagize uruhare ifatwa ryabo umuyobozi w’umudugudu kamuhoza denis sibomana umudugudu wiganjemo biyobyabwenge ndetse n’urugomo ruterwa n’ababinyoye avuga bacuruzi bahora bamutera ubwoba bazamwica bidatinze sibomana agatsiko kayobowe n’uwitwa sebagabo muhire eric bakunda kwita rukamya bazanye imihoro bashaka kunyica ariko imana ikinga akaboko kuko baje bambwira bazanyica kandi nibambura bazica abana banjye n’umugore none ndishinganisha kuko babivuze ruhame theogene ndungutse kazungu wafatanwe biyobyabwenge akaba ashyirwa majwi n’abayobozi kubatera ubwoba myaka y’amavuko afite itanu muriyo ayimaze acuruza biyobyabwenge yatawe yombi inshuro eshanu kubera ibiyobyabwenge kazungu ashyira majwi ubuyobozi kuba ntabireka abayobozi bacu babitera kuko banze njya koperative ncuruza ibiyobyabwenge nkaho ntari umuntu nk’abandi kandi muntu urapfira iwange nanjye ubinywa ntacyo birantwara kandi mbinywa buri munsi umuyobozi w’akarere huye eugene kayiranga muzuka avuga aka kagali cyimana gasanzwe kazwiho bikorwa gucuruza ibiyobyabwenge kuko atari inshuro mbere bafashe ababicuruza muzuka avuga abacuruza n’abanywa ibiyobyabwenge aka kagari kahagurukiwe n’inzego z’ubuyobozi bw’ibanze ndetse n’iza polisi cyumweru kwita muryango kubera bihungabanya imiryango myinshi aka karere mayor muzuka abana batari bake aka kagari cyimana bavuye ishuri kubera ababyeyi bahora barwana basinze ntibabone uburere bw’ababyeyiakomeza avuga bafashwe bagiye gukurikiranwaho ibyaha baregwamuri bafashwe bacuruza biyobyabwenge harimo n’umwana wiga cyiciro rusange cy’amashuri yisumbuye cyimana si abacuruzi b’inzoga z’inkorano gusa barangwa aka kagari gusa kuko ubuyobozi buvuga aka kagari kabamo imburamukoro nyinshi zigizwe ahanini n’abandi gerard gitoli mbabazi

title: benshi bagore bagira uruhare gucibwa inyuma n’abo bashakanye
content: nsengiyumva joseph akora akazi gutwara abantu moto i kabuga avuga bitangira umugore agukunda akwitaho ndetse akanakubaha ariko nyuma bikaza guhinduka hano atanga urugero avuga umuntu agishakana n’umugore usanga agushyuhiriza amazi koga nijoro ntabe yarya umugabo ataraza ariko bamaranye amezi atanu ntaba akinamushyirira amazi rwiyuhagiriro cyangwa abe yamutegereza barye ahubwo atangira kumubaza yatinze ikindi umugore atangiye kugenda ahindura imico bituma urukundo rugabanuka n’imibiri igahagana bigatuma umugabo ajya gushaka umunezero ahandi amwenyura nsengimana yagize erega burya umugore abyaye niko abyara ingeso kandi ahanini iza itari nziza tunguhore isaac ufite umugore umwe n’umwana umwe avuga igituma abagore bacibwa inyuma usanga rimwe rimwe bigira nabi bakanga gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n’abagabo bavuga bararwaye yagize se nk’ubu uwanjye muciye inyuma naba nkosheje dore amaze icyumweru atampa hmmmm tudatera akabariro tunguhore yavuze ahanini abagore babyikururira kuko ntiwamara igihe kingana n’iminsi irindwi uryama uteye umugabo ikibuno abure kwigira ahandi ikindi mugabo yagarutseho hari abagore bamara gushaka bundi kanwa kabo ntihongere gusohokamo ijambo riryoheye ugutwi ahubwo bagahorana umwanga n’umushiha ngo hari n’abandi bamara gushaka bagatandukana kwiyitaho kwisiga kwambara neza babiheruka batarabyara umwana mbere yongeraho erega burya isuku n’amagambo ava mugore nibyo bimuryoshya tunguhore avuga mpamvu kugirango umugore yumve yafatishije ubundi yitware ashaka abagore bavuga ingeso kamere mbi z’abagabo ineza solange umubyeyi w’imyaka y’amavuko isaha saa saba n’iminota arimo azunguza acuruza inkweto gare giporoso mujyi kigali avuga amaze imyaka ibiri atabana n’umugabo batandukanye kubera yamucaga inyuma ineza avuga gucibwa inyuma bitavuga umugore yitwaye nabi ahubwo ingeso abagabo bifitemo yagize uwanjye yatangiye gushurashura nkibyara umwana mbere ntaranacupira jye mbona ingeso kamere mbi zabo akomeza avuga abagabo bagira kamere kwikunda kwikakaza iyo akubajije ikintu ukamusubiza bwoba abona wamusuzuguye agatangira kujya gushaka abamwumva kukurusha kwisiga gucya ntacyo bivuze mugabo wamaze kuraruka urubuga rwitwa cheatingwayscom rugaragaza impamvu eshanu zituma abagabo baca inyuma abagore harimo kumva urugo rwe rutamuhaza kuba umugore atakiyitaho kurambirwa gukorera imibonano mpuzabitsina rugo title: u rwanda rugiye kubaka stade nshya iruta stade amahoro
content: nk’uko twabitanagarijwe minsitiri ufite siporo nshingano ze protais mitali batekereje kwagura stade amahoro stade nini u rwanda rufite kugirango ibe nziza ijye rwego mpuzamahanga ariko basanga kuyagura byazatwara igihe kinini ndetse cyenda kungana n’icyo kubaka stade nshya twaganiriye n’inzobere bwubatsi stade batubwira kuvugurura stade amahoro hongerwa ubunini bwayo bigoye cyane buryo igihe n’amafaranga byatwara byenda kungana n’ibyagenda kubaka stade nshya twafashe icyemezo tuzubaka indi hanyuma stade amahoro ikavugururwa biringaniye cyane cyane mugice cyicarwamo n’abanyacyubahiro ikindi kandi kitatuma bavugurura stade amahoro rwego hejuru ibe nini cyanye kuyivugurura byatwara hagati y’imyaka ibiri n’igice n’itatu hagati u rwanda rukaba rwabura rwakirira imikino itandukanye yaba ikinwa gihe n’ubwo minisitiri mitali atatangaje itariki nyayo imirimo kubaka stade nshya izatangirira n’aho izubakwa biteganyijwe izatangira kubakwa gihe gito kuko u rwanda rugomba kuzakira imikino mpuzamahanga myinshi munsi imbere harimo n’igikombe afurika cy’ibihugu chan nk’uko byamaze kwemezwa n’impuzamashyirahamwe y’umupira w’amaguru afurikacaf kugirango u rwanda rwemererwe kuzakira mikino burundu ruzaba rufite nibura stade nini ishobora kuba yakwakira abantu ibihumbi mirongo ine igomba gukinirwaho umukino ubanza n’usoza final ubu u rwanda rufite stade eshatu zishobora gukinirwaho imikino mpuzamahanga arizo stade amahoro stade umuganda yavuguruwe kugira ikinirweho imikino y’igikombe afurika cy’abatarengeje imyaka stade de kigali y’i nyamirambo hagati kandi harimo kuvugururwa stade huye ishyirwa twego mpuzamahanga minisiteri sport ikaba kandi inafite gahunda kuvugurura stade y’i muhanga rwego gutegura imikino mpuzamahanga gufasha amakipe kubona ibibuga byiza gukiniraho theoneste nisingizwe

title: njyewe jambo ngifite batangiye kuvuga imibare y’abangavu batewe inda- guverineri mufurukye
content: umuyobozi w’intara y’iburasirazuba fred mufurukye avuga bitewe n’ikibazo cy’abangavu baterwa inda ntara ayoboyeasigaye abura avuga bandi bayobozi aboneraho gusaba urubyiruko ndetse n’abandi bantu gusenyera umugozi umwe kibazo bakakirandura ntara nk’imihigo y’umwaka utaha ibi guverineri mufurukye yabivugiye kiganiro yahaye urubyiruko rusaga muryango uharanira uburenganzira bw’abakomoka afurika pan african movement ishami ry’u rwanda rwaturutse turere twose tugize intara y’iburasirazuba guverineri mufurukye yagaragaje agahinda aterwa n’umubare munini w’abana b’abakobwa baterwa inda turere tugize intara y’iburasirazubaavuga magingo asigaye abura n’icyo avuga bandi bayobozi bakomoje kibazo agahitamo kubika umutwe atirubyiruko rwacu mwaturuhuye mukareka tugafatanya njyewe jambo ngifite rwose batangiye kuvuga imibare y’abana b’abakobwa b’abangavu batewe indaiburasirazuba akarere mbereaka kabiriaka kaneaka gatandatu wavuga ndagira mbasabe mudusubize ijambo reroiyo ikiganiro gitangiye batubwira kibazodutangira kureba hasi kuko tuzi imibare iteye agahinda yavuze abatera inda n’abaziterwa badaturuka kure abenshi barizwa ntaraasaba urubyiruko n’abandi bantu gusenyera umugozi umwe bakarwanya kibazo cyugarije abangavu ntara atirubyiruko rwacu mwaretse tukiyemeza kibazo tukakirandura ntara y’iburasirazubamurabona kigoye tutagishobora abaterwa inda ngahaabazibatera ngaha siko bimeze abetera inda n’abaziterwa ntebe ziri ngahaariko mushobora kuvuga twebwe ntabwo turimo ariko mufite barumuna banyu bashiki banyu basigaye rugoubu mbasaba nimureke dufatanye ntara y’iburasirazuba buri muntu yange igisebo cy’abana b’abakobwa abangavu baterwa inda kandi twafatanya kibazo tukagikemura

title: abantu bahabwa imiti igabanya ubukana sida buntu
content: ibihugu nibyo byitabiriye inama y’iminsi itatu ibera i kigali serena hotel inama igamije kurebera hamwe uburyo inkunga y’ikigega global fund kigenera bihugu ikoreshwa kugeza tanzaniya kenya ndetse n’u rwanda bikaba biri bihugu bicunga bikanakoresha neza inkunga bihabawa n’iki kigega akaba nayo mpamvu u rwanda rwakiriye nama kugirango abahabwa nkunga bungurane ibitekerezo basangire ubunararibonye bityo imicungire ikigenda nabi bigire kubandi afungura nama minisitiri w’ubuzima dr agnes binagwaho yashimiye abayitabiriye anashima ubufatanye bwiza ikigega global fund kigaragariza ibihugu by’afrika birimo n’u rwanda abasaba kugerageza gukoresha neza inkunga bihabwa hitabwa cyane cyane micungire myiza yayo rwego gukumira impamvu zose zatuma nkunga idakora yagenewe dr binagwaho yanagarutse kukamaro kanini inkunga global fund imarira urwanda nabanyarwanda cyane cyane rwego rw’ubuzima yagize atiiyo tuba tutarabonye inkunga global fund yaduteye ntabwo urwego rw’ubuzima rwanda ruba ruri rugero ruriho nkuko dr ngamije ushinzwe imicungire y’ imishinga global fund yabitangaje mwaka w’ kigega gifasha u rwanda bikorwa bitandukanye ibikorwa bikazarangira bifite agaciro miliyoni y’amadorali ukuvuga miliyari z’amanyarwanda kugeza ibimaze gukorwa bikaba bifite agaciro kangana miliyoni y’amadorali ukuvuga miliyari z’amafaranga y’u rwanda imicungire n’imikoreshereze y’inkunga global fund hari itagenze neza bitewe ahanini kudategura imishinga neza gutanga amasoko buryo butari ruswaariko kuba u rwanda rwarashoboye kwigobotora bibazo ukubera imiyoborere myiza imikoranire y’inzego zitandukanye zirimo urwego rw’umugenzuzi mukuru w’imari leta urwego rw’umuvunyi tutibagiwe n’ishami ryihariye ministeri y’ubuzima yashyizeho rishinzwe kugenzura imicungire nimikoreshereze y’iyi nkunga ikigega global fund gitera inkunga u rwanda gahunda zitandukanye z’ubuzima zirimo kurwanya sida igituntu maralia marie jose ikibasumba

title: ibintu by’ ingenzi umusore agomba kuba afite kugirango inkumi zimukunde
content: n’ubwo bisanzwe bizwi buri wese agira akunda bitandukanye n’iby’abandi hari bimwe bintu bigagara iby’ibanze musore w’umunyarwanda akundwe n’abakobwa ndetse bifuze banarushingana bakibanira akaramata kuba umusore afite akazi nk’uko benshi nkumi babyitangarije bagize bati umugabo akwiye kuba umutware w’urugo kandi akaba anafite ubushobozi kurutunga n’ubwo n’umufasha agomba kumufasha ariko nta je t’aime inzara igutema amara burya mukobwa wakwifuza kubana n’umusore ubwe buzima yifitiye akazi cyangwa akura nicyo cyumvikana ubunyangamugayo kwiyubaha n’ubwo umusore yatunga ibya mirenge burya umunyamanyanga umusambanyi agira umwanda cyangwa atazi kwiyitaho nko myambarire byose bituma nkumi imwifuzaho yayibera umugabo bivuga umusore ugaragara neza kandi wiyubaha ariwe nzozi z’umukobwa wifuza barushingana imibanire gusabana n’abandi nta gushidikanya umusore uzi kuganira gusetsa gukora utundi tuntu dushimisha benshi akundwa n’abakobwa batari bake ibi kandi ho hanagaragara imitoma kuryoshyaryoshya magambo bityo umukobwa akabonamo umusore nk’uwashobora gutetesha gususurutsa urugo rugahoramo akanyamuneza kuba umuntu uzi gufata ibyemezo gushyira gaciro nk’uko umugabo umutware w’urugo ngombwa agira ubushobozi kwifatira ibyemezo kuba ashyira gaciro buryo ashyira buri kintu mwanya wacyo akagira gahunda kandi akagaragaza ibitekerezo byateza urugo imbere burya kandi kugira igitsure kidakabije mugabo abakobwaabagore batari bake barabikunda kugira inzu kubamo iki gikunze kugaragara basore byaro hirya hino rwanda hose ku nkomi cyaro ndetse kugira inzu nicyo kibanze musore wifuza rushinga kuko binamenyerewe buri wese nzu bitandukanye mujyi usanga abenshi bibera nzu bakodesha gusa mijyi cyane cyane ntara abakobwa benshi ntibishimira kuba babana n’umusore udafite inzu bakajya bahora babunza akarago gusa mijyi ikomeye hano rwanda nko mujyi kigali ho icy’ingenzi ukuba umusore afite akazi kuburyo afite ubushobozi gukodesha inzu kubamo n’ubwo nyine kubafite inzu zabo bwite biba akarusho olivier ndikumana

title: danny vumbi yasohoye indirimbo abana babi’ avugamo anita pendo king james ridermann’ igisupusupu
content: umuhanzi nyarwanda ukunze kurangwa n’ udushya buhanzi bwe danny vumbi nyuma kuririmba indirimbo zakunzwe cyane zirimo ni danger baragowe noneho yashyize ahagaragara yise abana babi’ umuhanzi nyarwanda ukunze kurangwa n’ udushya buhanzi bwe danny vumbi nyuma kuririmba indirimbo zakunzwe cyane zirimo ni danger baragowe noneho yashyize ahagaragara yise abana babi’ muri ndirimbo avuga hari ibintu atari azi birimo umuntu yaba tonton adafite amafaranga birimo umugabo ashobora kurira kwarika birimo ifaranga rikubise horoha aha niho ahera akarondora amazina y’ abahanzi barimo riderman mico medbeat chary nina melody austin pius king james n’ abanyamakuru barimo eppa phil peter pendo emmy akavuga abana babi’ ntibamubwiye danny vumbi yatangarije ukwezi ndirimbo ubutumwa yashakaga gutanga abantu bafite amakuru meza badakwiye kuyihererana yagize ubutumwa nashakaga gutanga ubutumwa bwiza ibintu byagirira abantu akamaro mpamvu kugira umuntu abyibikeho akwiye abisangiza bagenzi behari abantu bateye batyo akumva akantu information kari bugire akamaro akakibikaho ntagasangize bagenzi danny vumbi akomeza avuga ndirimbo avuga kuki mutabwiye nko kubaza kuki mutangiye mungira inama avugamo sinari nziko kwamamara bitagira imyaka nabimenye numvise igisupusupu’ nsengiyumva francois waririmbye indirimbo mariya jeanne’ yamenyekanye mwaka umwe bahanzi bakuze kandi bakunzwe muziki nyarwanda danny vumbi avuga ndirimbo muntu yigeze yibasira kuko yavuzemo abana babi’ inshuti ze ati ntabwo nabibasiye bariya bantu navuzemo hariya inshuti zanjye kiriya kibazo mba nkibaza abantu b’ inshuti zanjye nti abana babi kuko mutabimbwiye mubwira ibindi ariko ntabwo mwabimbwiye aho avuga abagabo biherera bakarira ayokwarika’ ntabwo ariwe uba yivugaga gusa bijya bibaho abagabo biherera bakarira’ uyu muhanzi avuga umuntu agenda akura agenda yiga akamenya ibintu bishya sinari nzi umuntu yakwamamara umusaza nabimenye numviye igisupusupu’ danny vumbi umuhanzi w’ umuhanga ariko udakunze content: mu gitondo kane tariki gicurasi nibwo hamenyekanye inkuru y’incamugongo y’urupfu capt rtd seka steven akaba se miss umunyana shanita uyu mubyeyi yitabye imana masaha y’igitondo kane aguye bitaro byitiriwe umwami faisal amaze iminsi arwariye uyu seka steven yabaye ngabo z’u rwanda rdf akaba yaranabaye umuyobozi sosiyete kigali veterans cooperative society’ ikora ibikorwa kwishyuza amahoro y’aho imodoka zihagararaparikingi miss umunyana shanita yabaye igisonga mbere miss rwanda mwaka yanaserukiye u rwanda irushanwa miss university africa ndetse abasha kwegukana ibihembo bitatu muri yegukanye ikamba miss supranational rwanda bimuhesha guserukira u rwanda poland irushanwa miss supranational yahuriyemo n’abakobwa bihugu bitandukanye isi

title: intambwe watera kazi kugira uzamurwe nterapromoted
content: ni kenshi usanga hari abantu bakora akazi ariko ugasanga bamaze imyaka n’imyaka mwanya umwe kazi badashobora kuzamurwa ntera menya ikigo cyangwa umwuga uguha amahirwe kugira ukure mwuga urimo uba wifuza kugenda uzamuka ntera uva ujya yindi kubigeraho urumva bisaba uba ukorera kigo kinini cyangwa se mwuga ugaragarira benshi buryo ukora bibonwa benshi kandi hakaba hari intera bashobora kukuzamuramo haba kigo kimwe kikaba gifite imyanya myinshi ijyanye n’ibyo wize cyangwa se mwuga utuma abawukomeyemo cyangwa abawushoramo imari bakubona bakagushyira mwanya mwizaurugero kigo kimwe ushobora kuba ukora nko banki hanyuma ugatangira ukora guichet ariko ukaba wizeye baazakugira nk’ushinzwe inguzanyo ukazageraho ugakurira ishami ry’iyo banki ukaba wayiyobora cyangwa ukaba wanahita ujyanwa gukora kigo cy’imari gikomeye isi shyira imbaraga ntangiriro z’akazi mu gihe ugitangira akazi icyiza ugukora ugashyiramo imbaraga zawe zose ndetse ugashyiraho n’akarusho kuko burya ibikorwa biruta amagambo ikindi kandi ukora nk’ibyo n’abandi muhuje akazi bakora urumva ntaho utandukaniye nabo erekana itandukaniro ryawe n’abandi utunganye akazi kawe buryo buri wese yaba rwego rumwe cyangwa se ukurusha abona adashodikanya ushoboye kandi baguhaye n’inshingano ziruta ufite wazishobora neza cyane koresha ushoboye abagukuriye babone ukora si byiza utegereza buri gihe bakuvugira birashoboka waba ukora neza cyane ariko bitewe n’uko urwego uriho urwo hasi cyane hejuru ntibabashe kubona imbaraga nyinshi ukoresha si byiza wakwigira bambonye buryo ushaka buri wese amenya wakoze ariko ushobora kubikora buryo butuje rimwe rimwe atari buri munsi ukaba wakwereka abagukuriye ibyiza wagezeho ndetse rimwe rimwe ntutinye kubagisha inama kubyo ushaka gukora nubwo waba uzi neza ugomba kubigenza ariko kugira yumve ufite ibitekerezo byiza abe yanakugirira icyizere menya kubaka izina kuribyaza umusaruro mubo mukorana nibyo koko ushobora kuba ukora neza ndetse rimwe rimwe n’umukoresha wawe akaba yarabimenye ariko kandi birashoboka atari wenyine ufata umwanzuro kuzamura abantu ntera urasabwa kumenya kubana n’abantu mukorana kandi biganiro mugirana ntusibe kubumvisha urukundo ukunda akazi kawe kandi wifuza kugera kure mwuga menyana benshi bagukuriye ntugahore ubaririza ibiro runaka biri n’ibindi nk’ibyo garagara birori byateguwe kazi usure abarwaye cyawa abagize ibyago mbese umenyane n’abantu mukorana ntugatinye kwerurira abagukuriye ukeneye kuzamuka ntera nibyo atari byiza guhoza umuyobozi nkeke uhora umubwira agomba kukuzamura ntera ariko ushobora kubimwerurira rwose gihe ubiboneye umwanya ukwiriye mwereke ushoboye kandi akugiriye icyizere wamuha umusaruro mwiza gusaba akazi myanya isoko kigo ukorera mu gihe ubona kigo ukorera habonetse umwanya rwego hejuru y’urwo uriho ugashyirwa isoko ntukagire ubwoba gusaba ako kazi ibi bizatuma n’abayobozi bawe babona ukeneye kuzamurwa ntera biciye mucyo ikindi kandi bizababera umuyoboro kwerekana mushoboye koko ariko bizagaragara aruko mukoze ibizamini mukabitsinda neza bityo muba musabwa kwitegura neza ibizamini nk’ibi ongera ubumenyi niba mwanya runaka w’akazi ukaba ushaka kuzamuka ntera ngombwa wongera ubumenyi kuko si yihuta vuba ushobora gusanga minsi imbere ubumenyi ufite butazaba buhagije ube wazamuka ntera yewe bamwe hari nubwo usanga ubumenyi bafite butuma bakurwa myanaya barimo ni byiza kwiga kwihugura gukora ibindi byatuma ugira agaciro maso y’abakoresha bawe shaka umuntu ukubera icyitegererezomentor hitamo umwe bagukuriye ukubera umujyanama w’ibihe byose ujye umwiyambaza igihe ubona bitangiye kukugora mubonereho kunga ubucuti ibi bizatuma akurikirana ubumenyi bwawe ndetse arusheho kukubakira ubushobozi kandi gihe habonetse umwanya kukuzamura ntera abe yakwibuka bera urugero rwiza ukuriye kazi ni byiza wubaka ishusho y’umuntu ikigo ukorera kizakenera igihe cyose bizagorana cyane abagukoresha bifuza kugira bagusimbuza gihe babona ubafasha kwigisha abakiri hasi umwuga n’akazi nufata abari munsi yawe ukagenda ubigisha akazi gakorwa bizereka abakoresha bawe umukozi udashobora gusimburwa shaka akazi ahandi ni koko wakoresheje imbaraga nyinshi yewe n’izi ngingo zose warazubahirije ariko urabona musaruro bitanga nta mpamvu kwizirika kazi uriho kandi ubona hanze hari andi mahirwe yatuma waguka mwuga ukora ariko gihe ugiye ahandi ubanze wizere umwanya usize munsi y’uwo ugiye gushaka bitabaye wakwigumira

title: pedro someone yahwituye urubyiruko rwibwira coronavirus yica abakuze gusa
content: umuhanzi niyigena jean pierre uzwi pedro someone arakangurira urubyiruko kwirinda icyorezo coronavirus bikuramo imyuvire gihitana abakuze mu minsi mike ishize hari amakuru yacaracaye mbuga nkoranyambaga urubyiruko n’abakiri bato rusange badafatwa n’indwara coronavirus ishami ry’umuryango w’abibumbye rishinzwe ubuzima oms ryatangaje myumvire atari oms yavuze abakuze bashobora kwibasirwa cyane gusa ivuga urubyiruko narwo rwakwandura avuga ngingo umuhanzi akaba n’umuganga yavuze urubyiruko rudawiye kwigira ntibindeba ati urubyiruko ntirwakagombye kuvuga coronavirus yica abantu bakuze gusa ndashishikariza urubyiruko kwirinda coronavirus iyi ndwara icyorezoco cyugarije isi pandemietugomba kucyirinda twese nk’abanyarwanda kuko umuntu wese yaba umwana muto yaba umukuru umusaza twese cyorezo cyatugeraho turamutse tutubahirije amabwiriza duhabwa ministere y’ubuzima akomeza avuga hari icyamutangaje ati natangajwe n’urubyiruko rwavugaga coronavirus covid- indwara ifata abantu bakuze ariko nsanga rutakwirara kuko cyorezo rubyiruko bacyanduye gishobora kubahitana urugero rufatika umunyamakuru zimbabwe uherutse guhitanwa coronavirus kandi afite imyaka pedro someone kandi nk’umuforomo umaze imyaka kazi avuga kaba akumiro kubona urubyiruko rwirenagagiza kwirinda kandi ndwara iteje igihombo gihambaye ati hari ikindi kandi gufata igihe kinini bitaro ikindi kandi n’iyo ukize indwara umuntu wese agomba kumenya ashobora kugira ubusembwa nyuma yarakize bitewe n’ingaruka ziyo ndwara nabyo birashobokaurubyiruko umubare mwinshi rwanda rugomba kwirinda kandi kwirinda buri wese ukurinda mugenzi wawe imibare y’urubuga worldo meters yerekana isegonda rindi icyorezo covid- cyifashe isi yerekana cyorezo kimaze kugera bihugu hirya hino isi abamaze kwandura cyorezo isi gihe kimaze guhitana kugeza twakoraga nkuru kugeza rwanda harabarurwa abarwayi coronavirus gusa numwe biratangazwa yitabye imana azize virus rwanda nk’uko minisiteri y’ubuzima ibitangaza

title: rwanda singapore africa-nick aster
content: uyu munyamakuru avuga akigera kibuga cy’indege mpuzamahanga kigali yatunguwe cyane kubura bimwe mubyo yiteze ngo ubusanzwe ageze bihugu bikennye atungukira mbwa zizerera umwanda abana basabiriza abacururiza muhanda n’ibindi avuga kimwe yabashije guhita abona rwanda nick ahubwo yiboneye umujyi usukuye cyane imbere abantu bahugiye mirimo ndetse n’abashoramari b’abanyamahanga batari bake ikindi yahise abona imirimo y’ubwubatsi bice bitandukanye ndetse n’ibirango by’imiryango itegamiye leta myinshi yabibonaga henshi uyu munyamakuru avuga yiboneye ukuntu u rwanda rwavuye bihe bikomeye rukaba rufite umutekano n’ubukungu butera imbere gihe kitarenze imyaka nick ageraho yita u rwanda umutako w’afurika uyu munyamakuru avuga ubutegetsi perezida kagame bushima igihugu singapore ndetse bukifuza kugikurikiza iki gihugu gifite ubukungu bumaze kugera ahashimishije rwego rw’isi kandi nacyo myaka ishize cyarabarwaga nk’igihugu gikennye kuri singapore ahantu ushora imari ikunguka buryo abashoramari bazwi cyane isi bahafata nk’iwabo kubera guhorayo agira u rwanda ntirwaba narwo ruri kugera ikirenge mucya singapore uyu munyamakuru kandi avuga nkuru ze zitaha azagerageza gucukumbura ibijyanye n’ibanga u rwanda rikoresha rireshye abashoramari kuko azi neza bisaba kuvugisha ukuri gusesuye ndetse gukorera mucyo mwinshi avuga abayobozi baganiriye bamugaragarije gahunda zitandukanye leta zigamije kuzamura imibereho myiza y’abaturage avuga kandi yanisuriye umwe baturage batujwe nzu nshya ubundi akamutangariza n’ubwo amafaranga yinjiza akiri make gusa yishimiye inzu nshyashya umunyamakuru kigali today

title: rayon vs apr umukino w’imbonekarimwe cyumweru
content: aya makipe adashobora gupfa gukina umukino gicuti hagati yayo akaba azaba ahatanira amanota atatu mukino shampiyona izaba igeze munsi gatanu apr iyoboye urutonde rw’agateganyo ikaba irusha rayon sport mwanya gatatu amanota atatu uretse ngabo albert ruhande apr fc utazakina mukino kubera amakarita abiri y’umuhondo afite bokota labama ruhande rayon sport utarizerwa ijana ijana azaba yabonye ibyangombwa bimwemerera gukina abandi bakinnyi mpande zose bameze neza kandi buri ruhande rwizeye intsinzi jean marie ntagwabira utoza rayon sport nyuma y’imyitozo ikipe yakoze gatanu yavuze abakinnyi biteguye kandi mvune ikanganye afite akaba abona agendeye bakinnyi asanganywe hakiyongeraho bokota labama ushobora kuzakina mukino yizeye gutsinda nyuma gutsindwa la jeunesse abakinnyi bahise babyivana mutwe bategura neza umukino apr kandi abatarakinnye ubushize bazaba bahari kandi n’umwuka mwiza kuko n’ubuyobozi buturi inyuma rayon sport izaba ikinisha mbere shampiyona abakinnyi babiri b’abarundi mbanza hussein ndayisaba tambwe floribert gihe mukino uheruka yatsinzwe apr yorohewe kubona amanota atatu imbere as kigali yayitsindaga ibitego busa apr irimo gushakisha igikombe shampiyona nayo ifite ibikombe byinshi izaba igendera cyane kapiteni wayo ukubutse i burayi olivier karekezi wanadutangarije n’ubwo abona rayon sport ikomeye ariko intsinzi ayizeye nyuma y’imyaka adahura n’iyi kipebiragaragara rayon sport mwaka ihagaze neza ariko kuba naragarutse apr mbona nzafasha cyane gushaka intsinzi ikindi kandi akenshi makipe ahuye ntakunda kunganya haba hagomba kuboneka ikipe itahana amanota atatu ariko ngendeye bushake dufite nk’abakinnyi apr tugomba gutsinda mu gihe rayon sport yatsinda mukino izaba ikomeje gusatira mukeba wayo apr guhatanira igikombe shampiyona ariko apr iramutse itsinze mukino yaba isize rayon sport amanota atandatu atakorohera ikipe rayon sport kuzayakuramo uyu mukino ukaba uhuriranye n’undi w’amakipe ahora ahanganye bwongereza manchester united manchester city byanatumye uwa rayon sport apr wagombaga kuzatangira saa cyenda wimurirwa saa kumi n’igice kugirango abakunda makipe bwongereza banakunda rayon apr batazacikanwa uyu mukino manchester city uzanerekwanwa stade amahoro mbere y’uko uwa rayon apr utangira theoneste nisingizwe

title: imigani y’imigenuranoigice cya dukomereze migani migufi itangizwa ’k m’ twiyibutse tuniyungure ubumenyi

title: bugesera nyuma y’inzara yaharanzwe karahahira utundi turere
content: mu myaka yashize cyane cyane umwaka w’ akarere bugesera kagaragayemo ikibazo cy’amapfa akabije hari abantu bicwaga n’inzara abandi bagasuhukamuri gihe uhatembereye ushobora kugira amateka cyangwa se amakabyankuru y’abantu abenshi baturage hari bahatuye nibo bivugira kibazo cy’inzara kihaherutseniyonzima joseph w’imyaka utuye murenge nyamata akagari maranyundo amaze imyaka aka karere avuga inzara yatangiye kugaragara bugesera mpera y’ ariko ikaza gukaza umurego mwaka w’ avuga gihe ibintu byose byari byarabuze biryo mvaruganda kugeza bijumba bihingiragaagira umva ibijumba ibijumba gihe inaha byaribwaga n’umuntu ufite imodoka ndakubwiza ukuri mukene wapfaga kubyigondera niyonzima yongeraho impamvu yateraga byose izuba ryari ryaracanye buryo batirirwaga bahinga n’uwahinganga ntiyeze avuga igihe ahantu hapfaga kwera ibijumba hari bishanga kandi byajyaga kubageraho byahenze yongeraho mwaka w’ abantu bishwe n’inzara buryo bukabije duce twa gashora ngenda gahembe maranyundo abandi barasuhuka ati gihe abagabo benshi barahungaga kubera kubura bagaburira imiryango abagore bakishyira migozi kubera kubura bagaburira abana mukanzaramba feresita umugore w’imyaka y’amavuko atuye murenge mayange avuga ikintu cyaje kubarokora bugesera haje imishinga n’imwe igatangira kubaha imfashanyo z’ibiribwaagira muri gihe tutarabona imfashanyo amahirwe yasekeraga yabonaga rukacarara icyo gihe twayitaga shira umuteto kuko mbere wasangaga hari abantu batarya umutsima w’amasaka gusa abatuye aka gace bavuga ibintu bisa n’ibyasubiye buryo kuko imyaka irera abantu bakabona ibiryo bavuga ufite inoti y’igihumbi urya amanywa n’ijoro nyirabitanga jolie utuye bugesera avuga nzara ikiharangwa aka karere gahagaze neza isoko ibintu biraboneka ibiboneka kurusha ibindi harimo imboga ibishyimbo imyumbati inanasi ibigori n’ibindi ugeze isoko nyamata gice gicururizwamo imboga abacuruzi bazo nabo bemeza imboga ziboneka bwinshi mukarwema annonciata umucuruzi soko nyamata umaze imyaka igera acuruza avuga ibicuruzwa byabonetse nyuma y’aho mbere gucuruza byasaga n’ibigoranye kubera baburaga barangurira agira ibintu biriho ikibigaragaza inyanya intoryi n’izindi kandi urabona hano isoko abacuruza imboga babaye benshi kandi n’abo tundi turere basigaye baza kurangura hano aganira kigalitodaycom rwagaju louis uyobora akarere bugesera avuga icyatumye inzara igabanuka aka karere leta yafashe ingamba gutera ibiti n’amashyamba hirya hino kariya gace avuga iterwa ry’ibiti ryatumye imvura itangira kugwa n’imyaka ikaboneraho gutangira kwera ati ubu hari ibicuruzwa abacuruzi b’ i kigali baza kurangura inaha ndetse nubu dufitanye ubuhahirane n’intara kirundo gihugu cy’u burundi yongeraho byose babigezeho bakangurira abaturage gukora cyane guhinga kuzigama gukora imirimo itegamiye buhinzi gusa muri ako karere hari igihe cyageze bitoroshye kubona n’igiti kubera izuba ryari ryarahibasiye umuntu yashoboraga gusanga amatungo yapfiriye nzira kubera kubura ubwatsi n’amazi kuko
