title: shampiyona apr fc yaratsinze rayon sports fc iratsindwa
content: nyuma gustindira as kigali stade regional i nyamirambo ibitego busa apr fc ikipe irimo guhagarara gikombe shampiyona ibitse yatangiye gusiga amakipe zihanganye ibi ikaba yabigezeho icyi cyumweru ibikesha ibitego by’abasore bahagaze neza minsi olivier karekezi kapiteni w’iyi kipe n’umunya uganda dan wagaluka rayon sport mukeba mbere apr fc yatakaje amanota imbere la jeunesse yiganjemo abakinnyi bakiri bato kandi byagaragaraga bamenyeranye cyane bayitsinda ibitego bibiri kimwe ikindi cyaje gukomeza mukino emmanuel ruremesha umutoza la jeunesse wahoze atoza rayon sport akaba ayizi neza ndetse nyuma y’umukino akaba yaradutangarije yifuzaga gutsinda rayon sport kugirango agaragaze la jeunesse atari ikipe yisukirwa kandi akiri umutoza ukomeye jean marie ntagwabira umutoza rayon sport n’ubwo yatsinzwe ntiyababaye bitewe n’uko hari abakinnyi bakomeye bakina inyuma batagaragaye mukino avuga atarenganya abahakinnye n’ubwo ntandaro gutsindwa twabuze amahirwe menshi imbere y’izamu ariko kandi n’ibitego twatsinzwe byatewe n’abakinnyi bakina inyuma ariko simbabaye kuko abakinnyi nari nizeye bakina iddy nshimiyimana mbanza hussein tambwe floribert munota nyuma byaje guhinduka gusa abakinnye bakoze bashoboye cyane abenshi badasanzwe babanza kibuga gusa ntagwabira yizeye kuzaba afite abakinnyi bakomeye azaba ahanganye apr fc ikipe yanatoje igihe kirekire mukino utaha uzahuza makipe tariki ukwakira stade amahoro police fc indi kipe yatangiye shampiyona ifite umuvuduko inatsinda ibitego byinshi yagaragazaga ishobora kuzahangana apr rayon sport ikazitwara igikombe dore n’umutoza wayo w’umunya serbia goran kuponovic yatakaje amanota abiri i huye imbere mukura vs nyuma kunganya ubusa busa umukino marine etincelles utegerejwe n’imbaga y’abanya rubavu kubera guhangana bitajya bishira hagati y’aya makipe warangiye etincelles atahanye amanota atatu nyuma gusinda marine ibitego busa stade umugandakuri stade mumena kiyovu sport izahagararira u rwanda mikino confederation cup yahatsidiye bitagoranye amagaju ibitego shyaka jean akili mabula serugaba erc barebye ncundura amakipe yazamukiye rimwe cyiciro mbere mwaka ndetse akaba yombi yanatangiye shampiyona yitwara nabi nyanza fc espoir zanganyirije ubusa busa i nyanza ubu apr isonga n’amanota etincelles irayikurikiye n’amanota rayon sport mwanya gatatu ifite amanota gihe police fc iza mwanya kane n’amanota amakipe nyuma marine kumwanya nota rimwe ifite ikaba ibanzirizwa as kigali mwanya n’inota rimwe thoneste nisingizwe

title: abandi bapolisi bagiye koherezwa darfur
content: aba bapolisi bazasangayo abandi basanzwe barinda umutakano ntara sudani y’amajyepfo yazonzwe n’intambara z’urudaca amakuru dukesha urubuga polisi y’igihugu avuga umukuru polisi y’igihugu igp emmanuel k gasana ijambo yabagejejeho mbere y’uko bagenda yabasabye kurangwa n’ikinyabupfura gukorana akazi nabo umwuga abasaba kuzirikana indangagaciro z’igihugu gukorana neza n’abaturage b’aho bagiye commissioner cyprien gatete uyobora butumwa b’amahoro ntara darfur unamid yabasabye kuba intangarugero gukorera hamwe kugira isura y’u rwanda ikomeze igaragare neza aba basirikare rwego ofisiye bagiye butumwa bw’umwaka umwe bazakora nk’abajyanama cyane gahunda gufasha abaturage kwicungira umutekano kurwanya ihohotera rishingiye gitsina gucunga umutekano makambi kuri abapolisi b’abanyarwanda butumwa bw’amahoro hirya hino isi nko haiti cote d’ivore liberiya sudani bagera emmanuel n hitimana

title: covid- gusohoka rugo mpamvu yumvikana birabujijwe keretse abajya gutanga gusaba serivise z’ingenzi
content: guhera ijoro ryo gatandatu u rwanda rwashyizweho ingamba nshya gukumira virusi corona zirimo kubuza abantu gusohoka mpamvu zihutirwa itangazo guverinema y’u rwanda ryashyizweho umukono ministiri w’intebe edouard ngirente rivuga bashyingiye ntera icyorezo virusi corona kimaze gufataku isi buryo ibindi bihugu bihangana n’icyorezo virusi corona bikavuga ngombwa hakwiriye kongera ingamba ndetse n’imbaraga gukumira ikwirakwizwa ry’icyorezo virusi corona rwanda iryo tangazo rivuga guhera gatandatuisaa tanu n’iminota z’ijoro ngamba zishyizweho kandi zizamara igihe cy’ ibyumweru bibiri gishobora kongerwa mu ngamba zashyizweho leta y’u rwanda isonga ingendo zitari ngombwa zirabujijwe kandi gusohoka rugo mpamvu yumvikana birabujijwe keretse abajya gutanga gusaba serivise z’ingenzi harimo kwivuza guhaha serivise banki n’izindi hongeye gushimangirwa kandi kwishyurana hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga bigomba gukoreshwa ahashoboka hose kurusha kujya banki atm ukuvuga byuma bashyiramo ikarita bigasohora amafaranga ingamba gatatu irareba abakozi leta n’abikorera basabwa gukorera akazi zabo keretse abatanga services z’ingenzi zavuzwe haruguru imipaka kandi irafunzwe keretse banyarwanda bataha ndetse n’abandi batuye rwanda byemewe n’amategeko abo bakaba bazashyirwa kato gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri ahantu ibiro minisitiri w’intebe bivuga hateganyijwe gusa ubwikorezi bw’ibicuruzwa byinjira cyangwa bisohoka rwanda burakomeza indi yafashwe ngamba gatanu ivuga ingendo hagati y’imijyi n’uturere tw’igihugu zitemewe keretse bajya kwivuza cyangwa bafite impamvu zihutirwa aha ho ubwikorezi bw’ibicuruzwa burakomeza bisanzwe nk’uko iryo tangazo ribigaragaza amasoko n’amaduka byafunzwe keretse abacuruza ibiribwa ibikoresho by’isuku farumasi essence mazutu n’ibindi bikoresho by’ibanze ku batwaraga abagenzi motontibyemewe iryo tangazo rigira riti keretse izigemuye ibicuruzwa bivuga imodoka zitwara abagenzi mijyi zikomeza gukora hubahirijwe intera metero hagati y’abagenzi utubari twose turafunga ariko resitora zirakomeza gukora hatangwa serivisi guha kurya abakiriya bakabitahana ibizwi take away’ rurimi rw’icyongereza leta yasabye abayobozi b’inzego z’ibanze n’izumutekano gushyira bikorwa mabwiriza risoza risaba abaturarwanda gukomeza kwitwararika bakurikiza amabwiriza bahawe rikagira riti ubufatanye bwacu ngombwa guhashya cyorezo usesenguye uburyo ngamba zikora buzima bwose bw’igihugu birasa n’aho u rwanda rwinjiye bihe bidasanzwe izi ngamba zije ziyongera zindi zafashwe minsi mike ishize zirimo gufunga insengero kiliziya n’ibindi bikorwa bihuza abantu benshi chief editor muhaburarw

title: isiganwa km de bugesera ry’uyu mwaka ryigijwe inyuma
content: irushanwa ngarukamwaka ryo gusiganwa ibilometero rizwi izina km de bugesera ry’uyu mwaka ryamaze kwigizwa inyuma abaritegura bazarishyira gihe babona kizaba cyiza mu itangazo ryashyizwe hanze gasore serge foundation itegura rushanwa ifatanyije n’akarere bugesera rivuga rushanwa ryamaze kwigizwa inyuma ni itangazo rigira riti banyarwanda namwe nshuti km de bugesera twifuje kubamenyesha yuko km de bugesera iteganyijwe isubitswe tukasabagezaho indi tariki bihe biri imbere mutwihanganire kubw’izo mpinduka kandi murakoze iri tangazo rije nyuma y’uko n’ibindi bikorwa bihuza abantu benshi birimo n’ibya siporo byamaze guhagarikwa kubera icyozeroz coronavirus mu kiganiro yagiranye rwandamagazinecom gasore serge washinze gasore serge foundation yirinze gutangaza byinshi kuru subikwa ry’iri rushanwa ariko avuga bazarishyira gihe cyiza bantu gasore serge washinze gasore serge foundation nayo itegura rushanwa ifatanyije n’akarere bugesera avuga iry’uyu mwaka bazarishyira gihe cyiza bantu km de bugesera isiganwa ritegurwa foundation gasore serge ifatanyije n’akarere bugesera hamwe n’abandi baterankunga minisiteri siporo ishyirahamwe ry’umukino gusiganwa maguru ndetse n’iry’umukino gusiganwa magare uyu mwaka rizaba ribaye nshuro gatanu km de bugesera y’umwaka ushize yabayemo gusiganwa maguru ntera y’ibilometero byitiriwe irushanwa intera y’ibilometero umunani bana ndetse n’intera y’ibilometero bitatu bakina bishimisha run for fun gihe abasiganwe magare bakoze intera y’ibilometero umwaka ushize abakinnyi b’ikipe gusiganwa maguru apr yankurije marthe bakobwa nimubona yves bahungu begukanye imyanya mbere gusiganwa maguru kirometero

title: coronavirus abatwara amakamyo babujijwe kugira bacumbika uganda
content: abashoferi batwara amakamyo yinjira uganda ntibazemererwa gutwara abantu modoka zabo gucumbika hoteli cyangwa inzu z’abantu ingamba nshya kurwanya coronavirus gihugu bbc dukesha nkuru itangaza perezida yoweri museveni uganda yatangaje nyuma y’uko abashoferi b’amakamyo barenga binjiye uganda bavuye kenya babasanganye cyorezo mu ntangiriro z’iki cyumweru uganda yatangiye gupima abashoferi b’amakamyo yinjira gihugu byateje umubyigano udasanzwe w’izi modoka mupaka uhuza kenya uganda inzira iva cyambu mombasa kenya ingenzi cyane m bwikorezi bw’ibicuruzwa n’ibindi nkenerwa byinshi uganda rwanda sudani y’epfo n’uburasirazuba dr congo perezida museveni yavuze guhagarika ubwikorezi bw’imizigo byaba ukwigerezaho yanenze abaturage uganda bashatse gusagarira abatwara amakamyo nibo babazanira coronavirus gusa yavuze koko bateye impungenge ndetse abagereranya n’igihe cy’indwara sida myaka abashoferi b’amakamyo karere byavugwaga aribo bayikwirakwiza mijyi n’aho bagendaga bahagarara abaminisitiri bashinzwe ubuzima bihugu bigize umuryango afurika y’iburasirazuba kwezi gushize bakoze inama bemeza nubwo ibihugu byafunze imipaka imodoka nini zitwara imizigo zigomba gukomeza kugenda hagati y’ibi bihugu imibare itangwa minisiteri zishinzwe ubuzima bihugu igaragaraza abamaze kwandura coronavirus

title: rusizi haravugwa ubwumvikane buke koperative kovepo
content: ubuyobozi bw’iyi koperative buvuga itegeko rigenga amakoperative ryahinduwe manda ikajya myaka ine cyakora umukozi ushinzwe amakoperative murenge kamembe asobanura atari ahubwo bashaka kurenganya abanyamuryango burenganzira bwabo ubu bwumvikane bucye hagati yabanyamuryango komite nyobozi koperative kovepo bwatangiye kugaragara nteko rusange yabaye tariki bamwe banyamuryango bavuga umutungo koperative wacungwa nabi kuko genzura rikorwa umuyobozi w’iyi koperative ndagijimana janvier avuga kuba amatora ataba inama rusange yabyanze kandi n’itegeko rikaba ryarahindutse ku kibazo cy’ibarura ry’umutungo avuga buri gihebwe abanyamuryango bagaragarizwa umutungo wabo uhagaze umukozi ushinzwe amakoperative murenge kamembe asobanura manda y’inama y’ubuyobozi koperative imyaka itatu kandi ntawemerewe gukora manda zirenze nsengiyumva akomeza avuga manda y’abagize inama y’ubugenzuzi imyaka ibiri kandi wemerewe gukora manda ebyiri zikurikirana bityo akaba asanga koperative idafite uburengenzira guhindura itegeko ariyo mpamvu ibirikubiyemo bigomba kubahirizwa koperative kovepo yatangiye gukora mirimo gucuruza mafi n’ibiyakomokaho mwaka kugeza munsi ifite abanyamuryango musabwa euphrem

title: ninshuro zingahe umugabo ashobora kurangiza kwezi kugirango agabanye kwandura cancer yamabya
content: ninshuro zingahe umugabo ashobora kurangiza ejaculation kwezi kugirango agabanye ibyago kwandura cancer yamabya igisubizo kiri hano nkuko bigaragara bushakashatsi kozwe n’impuguke matthieu boivin kinyamakuru le journal de montreal kuwa mata ubwo bushakashatsi bwakozwe kubantu bagabo igihe kingana nimyaka bwagaragaje abagabo barangiza qui ejaculent byibura incuro kwezi bigaragaza kugabanuka kw’ibyago kwiyongera canceri yamabya ubwo bushakashatsi kugeza bugaraza kurangiza mugabo inshuru nyinshi byibura nkizo twavuze haruguru bigabanya ubwiyongere cancer nkuko ubushakashatsi bwakozwe jennifer rider umuhanga buganga ishuri ryubuvuzi rusange boston university munyandiko ’medscape actualites et opinions ’bibugaragaza hagati mwaka wi abantu basaga basubije ikibazo byerekeranye n’inshuro barangiza mukwezi abari hagati yimwaka kugeza mwaka ikurikiraho basubije kibazo buryo bukurikira ku bagabo bakozweho bushakashatsi abagabo bafite canceri y’amabya bishwe nayo ibisubizo byagaraje abagabo barangiza byibuze inshuro kwezi bafite byibuze kutarwara cancer abarangiza byibuze inshuro hagati bashobora kwandura ubwo bushakashatsi kandi bwagaraje abagabo hagati y imyaka kugeza barangije byibuze inshuro kugeza bagagaje byamahirwe kwandura cancer bwagaragaje kandi abarangiza hagati y’incuro kugeza kwezi bafite kutandura gusa nkuko umushakashatsi janet stanford yagaraje tu tavuga incuro umuntu arangiza aribyo bigaragaza kwiyongera cg kugabanuka kwiyo cancer agakomeza avuga ubushakatsi bugikomeje kugirango bagaragaze izindi zaba zigabanya cg zongera irwara cancer yamabyagusa murubwo bushakashatsi basoza bavuga myaka bamaze basuzumira byahafi bagabo byagaragaje gusohora kenshi kumugabo bigabanya ubwiyongere canceri yamabyacancer de la prostate yanditswe hakizimana dieudonnemuhaburarw

title: gishwati residents decry delayed land compensation
content: the affected residents who were evacuated from kanama nyakiriba and kanzenze sectors to pave way for the re-forestation of gishwati forest have expressed concern over delayed compensation for their land residents claim that they were promised to paid in a period of one month during presidential paul kagame’s visit to nyabihu district in this issue for paying residents affected expropriation is still in the process what i say is that concerned government departments are soon to finalise the process residents should wait a little bit longer as the issue is being resolved says hassan bahame the mayor of rubavu district the mayor said that issue has reached to the ministry of finance and economic planning to the affected residents gishwati area in nyabihu district has been divided into different parts including the crop farming area with terraces the animal farming area with cattle farms in place and the wilderness area where re-forestation is taking place

title: nyabihu umugabo yishe umugore utwite inda y’amezi atatu
content: umuyobozi w’umudugudu kageri kagari bukinanyanatwizerimana labani avuga n’ubundi muryango wahoraga makimbirane kuko twizerimana jean pierre wahitanye umugore amuteye umugeri mutima yakundaga gucyura abagore benshi twizerimana jean pierre acumbikiwe sitasiyo polisi kora murenge jenda karere nyabihu bamwe baturanyi barimo n’umukecuru yaberaga nzu bavuze twizerimana jean pierre amaze gutandukana n’abandi bagore barenga bane twizerimana jean pierre bakunze kwita sosoma ndetse n’uwo nyakwigendera abimukira murenge jenda kuko umugabo yaje aje gupagasa aturutse murenge shyira umugore akaba yakomokaga murenge jomba bombi bahuye baje gushaka akazi bakaba babanaga badasezeranye byemewe n’amategeko umuyobozi w’umudugudu kageri mahano yabereye yashishikarije abaturage kugira umuco gutabarana kandi bakajya banavuga ingo babona zikunze kubamo amakimbirane kugira zirusheho kwitabwaho gukurikiranwa mahano nk’aya abaye araba safari viateur

title: mafisango arashaka gukinira rayon sport bokota yanayikozemo imyitozo
content: mafiango wanakinnye rwanda apr fc atracofc mbere kwerekeza tanzania ikipe azam fc yavuye akerekeza simba arimo gukinira avuga azarangiza amasezerano n’iyi kipe kwezi cumi n’abiri kandi ibiganiro bye rayon sport bigenze neza yiteguye kuza kuyikinira kwezi mbere mafisango naramuka aje rayon sport ashobora kuzahasanga bokota lama kuko nk’uko twari twabatangarije agomba kugera rwanda minsi mike yamaze kugera i kigali akaba yanakoze imyitozo rayon sport kabiri rayon sport izanye bokota asimbure faustin usengimana ugomba kwerekeza ikipe y’abatarengeje imyaka izakina shampiyona cyiciro mbere nyuma guhabwa uburenganzira n’ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru rwanda ferwafa gushaka uzamusimbura gusa n’ubwo yatangiye imyitozo ntaremererwa ferwafa gukinira rayon sport kuko itarabona igisubizo kibemerera gusinyisha musore wakinaga darling club motema pembe dcmp congo ariko shampiyona yaho ikaba izasozwa cyumweru jean marie ntagwabira umutoza rayon sport avuga abonye bokota mafisango byafasha ikipe kuko azi ubuhanga bwabo ntagwabira afite icyizere mafisango azaza rayon kuko wanafashe iya mbere asaba yaza gukinira kipe nyuma gutsindwa la jeunesse ibitego rayon sport yatangiye gutegura umukino uzayihuza mukeba wayo apr fc ntagwabira akaba avuga n’ikipe bicaye bakareba amakosa yakozwe n’uko bagomba kuyakosora kugira bazatsinda umukino cyumweruimikono yarangiye yararangiye abakinnyi gutsindwa twamaze kubibavanamo ubu byaba ubuyobozi abakinnyi n’abatoza dushyize imbere umukino apr ku munsi kane shampiyona apr irarusha amanota atatu rayon sport ikaba mwanya mbere n’amanota gihe rayon sport mwanya gatatu n’amanota thoneste nisingizwe

title: ihohoterwa ntirikorerwa abagore gusa n’abagabo nabo barahohoterwa
content: ibi bikaba biterwa hari abagore bamwe barumvise nabi politiki y’uburinganire ndetse n’ubwuzuzanye aba bagabo bavuga abagore babiterwa kudasobanukirwa neza gahunda y’uburinganire bumva ukubashyira hejuru y’abagabo ibyo bigatuma bamwe bikorera bashatse rugo hari kandi n’ababa bashaka kuba abagenga b’umutungo w’urugo bonyine abagabo babyanga bikabaviramo guhohoterwa umusaza witwa pontien rutazihana utuye murenge rusatira karere huye avuga amaze imyaka isaga ahohoterwa n’umufasha uyu musaza avuga yabonye arembye agahitamo kwahukana agasiga umugore nzu wenyine dore yemeza yabonaga bashakanye atakimuha agaciro kamukwiriye nk’umugabo bashakanye uyu musaza avuga igihe cyageze ndetse umugore akajya amwima ibiryo agira ndahohoterwa kandi ntibigarukira rugo gusa hari igihe nigeze kurwara njya bitaro umugore aranyihorera ntagira abaturanyi banyiteho sinzi byari kumera yongeraho kugeza sinzi icyahinduye umugore wanjye aramutse ankundiye nakongera nkagaruka rugo rwanjye tugakomeza kubana nk’uko byahoze mbere nyamara umugore w’uyu mugabo ahakana kuba ahohotera umugabo akavuga umugabo yamutaye nyuma kubona ntako bameze rugo yongeraho inzara imurembeje yigendeye nyuma aza kugaruka ati ubu turabana avuga arabeshya ataha hano ndetse n’uburiri bumwe n’iyo atashye ndamusasira nkanamugaburira umwe baturanyi b’uyu mugabo bavuga musaza ashobora kuba afite ikibazo cy’ihohoterwa rugo rwe kuko ashobora kuba atagaburirwa yagaburirwa agahabwa ikijumba kitagira ikindi akakirisha umunyu umwe baturanyi b’uru rugo agira umugabo se utagitaha rugo rwe akagenda abunga akazinduka n’umuturage umubonye mugabo ki yaraboze pe ferdinand muneza

title: muco adonis wahimbye nzogera yavuze’ yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya
content: ndategereje’ indirimbo muco adonis yakoze ugushyingo mu buryo bw’amajwi yakozwe nicolas mucyo david madebeat amashusho atunganywa fleury legend usanzwe unakorera umuhanzi israel mbonyi ubutumwa buyirimo bwubakiye magambo aboneka bibiliya bitabo habakuki ezekiyeli yesaya agusha kubwira abantu nubwo bashobora kuba mwijima umunsi uzagera bugacya muco adonis yabwiye igihe yayanditse gusubiza imbaraga bacitse intege yagize yubakiye butumwa bw’umuntu wiringiye ibihe bibi arimo bizahinduka bikaba byiza umubabaro ugahinduka umunezero ni indirimbo y’ibyiringiro gutegereza amasezerano y’umwami imana’’ yavuze gihe yabonye umwanya uhagije kwandika ibindi bihangano kuko umwanya uhari wagira yitwaza byaduhaye umwanya kongera kwegerana n’imana n’abantu mutaherukanaga’ muco adonis yatangiye umuziki akiri umwana aririmba korali philadelphie gurison des mes yamamaye ndirimbo shimwa yewe goligota’ impano yagaragaye cyane yitabiraga igitaramo cyateguwe n’umuhanzi witwa shyaka mu yaririmbye itsinda ryaririmbaga country music ryitwa the bishops yaje gusohora album yayo mu nibwo muco adonis yatangije one nation itsinda ryamamaye cyane kubera indirimbo zirimo nzogera yavuze’ umurwa wera’ ku bw’ubuntu bwawe’ uyu muhanzi yaje gutandukana bagenzi yerekeza rwanda yakomereje umuziki nk’umuhanzi wigenga yakoze album zirimo rizasohora’ urwibutso’ nayo iriho indirimbo ndategereje’ n’izindi urwibutso’ ndi amahoro’ urukundo ruhebuje’ n’izindi ibikorwa gutangira umuziki butaka bw’u rwanda yabikoze ugushyingo gitaramo yise made in heaven’ cyabereye kigali serena hotel

title: abatangabuhamya rubanza munyenyezi bemerewe kubutanga
content: steven mcauliffe yatangajeko umwirondoro w’abatangabuhamya wujuje ibisabwa kandi kizinga awubonamo nkuko byari byatangajwe n’abunganira munyenyezi yanasabye hakumvwa ubuhamya bwabo kuko bamaze gukorerwa ubugenzuzi nubwo mpande zombi bubasha zifite guha cyangwa kwambura abanyamahanga uburenganzira nkiko umushinjacyaha yatangaje bategarugori aribo bisabiye gutanga ubuhamya bushake uru rubanza biteganijwe ruzatangira kuburanishwa kwezi umwaka utaha umushakashatsi by’umutekano thomas andersen jr wakoze igenzura buhamya bw’abarega munyenyezi avuga munyenyezi aregwa kuba yaragiye atanga abantu kumwe bakicwa abandi barimo abategarugori akabashyira abasirikare bagakorerwa ibyamfura mbi amagambo n’imvugo zitesha umuntu agaciro n’ibindi munyenyezi batrice w’imyaka yinjiye leta zunze ubumwe amerika mwaka ahabwa kuba umuturage w’iki gihugu yaje gutabwa yombi mwaka w’ kwezi aregwa kuba yarabeshye kubijyanye kwinjira guhabwa uburenganzira gutura leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika ubwo munyenyezi yasabaga uburenganzira gutura gihugu yahakanye ruhare yagize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi rwanda mwaka w’ nyuma y’igihe ariko byaje kugaragara yabeshye ubushinjacyaha bukaba bumukurikirana marie jose ikibasumba

title: mayweather agiye guhura mcgregor mukino bise byendagusetsa
content: ni umukino bamwe bise byendagusetsa ariko ushobora gutuma bagabo bombi batsindira amafaranga miliyoni z’amadolari y’amerika mayweather w’imyaka y’amavuko yashyize videwo rubuga nkoranyambaga twitter yemeza mukino uzaba yagize ni impamo mcgregor umunya-irlande w’imyaka y’amavuko ufite umuhigo guterura ibintu bitaremereye yagize imirwano izaba uyu mukino w’abateramakofi b’ibiro bicye n’ibiri rugero uzaba umwe yihenze cyane mateka y’iteramakofi mayweather ufatwa nk’umuteramakofi w’intyoza kurusha abandi gihe cye yagiye kiruhuko mwaka adatsinzwe rimwe mirwano yitabiriye naho mcgregor utarigeze rimwe akina iteramakofi kinyamwuga afite umuhigo kwezi cumi kumwe mwaka mikino njyarugamba ikomatanye yigeze gukabya mayweather bazarwane mikino njyarugamba ikomatanyemu kwezi cumi kabiri mwaka nibwo akanama k’imikino ngororamubiri leta california kahaye mcgregor uruhushya rw’iteramakofi rumwemerera gukinira leta zunze ubumwe z’amerika bwana white uhagarariye mcgregor yagize impamvu conor mcgregor umuntu ukomeye nkuko ameze ahangara umuntu wese ho hose n’igihe cyose azahangana floyd mayweather kandi azagerageza kumutsinda yanditswe chief editormuhaburarw

title: u rwanda rwatorewe kwakira imikino volleyball y’abagore rwego rw’afurika
content: icyemezo guha u rwanda gutegura kwakira mikino cyafashwe tariki nama y’ishyirahamwe ry’afurika ry’umukino volleyball yabereye cyicaro cy’iri shyirahamwe i cairo gihugu misiri igihugu mauritius nicyo kizakira imikino y’abagabo izaba tariki - ikipe izatwara marushanwa izahita yegukana itike gukina imikino olempike izabera i london gihugu cy’u bwongereza mwaka amatariki imikino y’abagore u rwanda ruzakira izaberaho ntabwo yemezwa iyi nama y’ishyirahamwe ry’afurika ry’umukino volleyball iyobowe perezida w’ishyirahamwe ry’afurika ry’umukino volleyball dr amr elwani ikaba yitabiriwe n’uhagarariye ibihugu bitandukanyeu rwanda rwari ruhagarariwe mbaraga alexis jacques furaha
